40001001	Tyenwa rushpakinri Geso Kristopirana. Tawiklopishni Geso, ga wa Gawraklopishni Tawi.
40001002	Gawra wugenetlu Gisaaka. Gisaaka wugenetlu Gakowo. Gakowo wugenetna Gota ga wa gimolene.
40001003	Gota Tamara wugenetyana Pare ga wa Sara. Pare wugenetlu Gesromo. Gesromo wugenetlu Gara.
40001004	Gara wugenetlu Gaminata. Gaminata wugenetlu Naasoni. Naasoni wugenetlu Salmo.
40001005	Salmo Racha wugenetyalu Poosi. Poosi Rota wugenetyalu Gowe. Gowe wugenetlu Gesi.
40001006	Gesi wugenetlu pogirchi Tawi. Pogirchi Tawi, wa Goriyasu ganunronanni wugenetyalu Salomo.
40001007	Salomo wugenetlu Rowowa. Rowowa wugenetlu Gawi. Gawi wugenetlu Gasa.
40001008	Gasa wugenetlu Gosapata. Gosapata wugenetlu Gora. Gora wugenetlu Gosuya.
40001009	Gosuya wugenetlu Gowata. Gowata wugenetlu Gacha. Gacha wugenetlu Gesechi.
40001010	Gesechi wugenetlu Manasese. Manasese wugenetlu Gamonu. Gamonu wugenetlu Gosiyasu.
40001011	Gosiyasu wugenetna Gechoni ga wa gimolene, gajriikaklugogne, wa Wawilonya yinitkana.
40001012	Gajrikapkalunenanu Wawilonya satokyatkana. Gechoni wugenetlu Salatili. Salatili wugenetlu Sorowawili.
40001013	Sorowawili wugenetlu Gawiyo. Gawiyo wugenetlu Geliyachi. Geliyachi wugenetlu Gasoro.
40001014	Gasoro wugenetlu Satose. Satose wugenetlu Gachimi. Gachimi wugenetlu Giliyo.
40001015	Giliyo wugenetlu Geleyasa. Geleyasa wugenetlu Matana. Matana wugenetlu Gakowo.
40001016	Gakowo wugenetlu Gosi, Mariya gnuru. Wala rushpakya Geso, wa Kristo chinkaluru.
40001017	Giyagni wane pejnuklopisha gwashle, Gawrakluyakawa ga wa Tawiklupotunanuko, pamole gepkoxamkoje gwashlu. Tawikluyakawa ga wa Wawilonya yinriklupotunanuko pamole gepkoxamkoje gwashlu. Wa Wawilonya yinrikluyakawa ga wa Kristoklupotunanuko, pamole gepkoxamkoje gwashlu wane.
40001018	Wane rixa gishpakleta Geso Kristo. Wa runro Mariya, Gosi galuka gnunrotletinitkalo, mawakanuwalo, tetkatka kamshiro tixinritka Giwekikaluru Kpashiri chinanu.
40001019	Ga wa tganurupa Gosi, gi rixanu poyagkakachrini gi raluka pogitlepiranatlo, rushinika giknoklemtlo pochkeruko.
40001020	Yanshinikanyeginatinri, Gitsrukaachitowreru gipgujewnayegitlu rupnawleya. Wane chinru, “Gosi, Tawiklopisha, gi pika gwaletanro pganunropa Mariya. Gi rixanu wala gwiyachri Giwekikaluru Kpashiri chinanni.
40001021	Tushpakawgenetanu toturu. Geso pgiwakatanru. Gi rixanu Wale gognetkakanna rayinerutene mukochireyna.”
40001022	Pejnuruko tye wane gixka poyagkakikolupa Gitsrukaachi tokanu, tokanchi geneklewatachriya. Wane china:
40001023	Waneplo sato makloji mapnokatowa kamshiropni. Toturu tushpakawgenetanu. Rutakgiwakatanruna Gemanwuru. Walenwa yokaakaluru: Wixaymalu Goyakalu.
40001024	Yotunotinitka rumkanatinriya, wane rixatka Gitsrukaachi towreru towtapyawakatkalu. Rawatkalo ganunro.
40001025	Gi wa retawalo tushpakawgenetinpotunanuko muchinanu toturu. Giwakatlu Geso.
40002001	Wane rixa. Wetle Pokchi Gotechijne rushpakini Geso, wa pogirchi Giroreklu, kgimatkalerune tkachi gishpatyawaka sreta runyana. Gerosale rapokna.
40002002	Wane chinna, “¿Ginaklu wa Goteyone Pogire gishpakachritka? Gi rixanu tkachi gishpatyawaka sreta wetyalo katagirite. Wuna wyoptsojityentapyaplu.”
40002003	Pogirchi Girore jempiranyegitinitkalu, kojwakanshinikanuta, pejnuruneko Gerosale gajeneymananuko.
40002004	Rapatna pejnuruneko tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yonchikgapine yinenu. Repomgana ginaka rushpakini Kristopa.
40002005	Wanna wane china, “Wetle, Gotechijne. Gi rixanu wane chinyongatka tokanchi geneklewatachriya:
40002006	Ga wa pixa, Wetle Pokchi, Gotachijne, Galikakni gi wa mturpotyi, Gota gitsrukatene getanu, Gi rixanu pixa yegi rushpakini Gitsrukaachi. Wale girukotanna nayinerutene Gisrayiline.”
40002007	Giyagni Girore pochkeruko tomgana wa kgimatkalerune. Repomsapotutna tegipgujewnalgognetka katagiri.
40002008	Wetle yokanatna. Wane china, “Gajewa. Gepomsapotutanna wa mturu pirana. Wa gikshikiniplu ginkakapanno, gita koxa yoptsojityentapyaplu.”
40002009	Pogirchi yijnakotinitkana, yatkana. Waneklu katagiri wa tkachi gishpatyawaka sreta retinrona, kosekananumtna, tapokinpotuko; mturu gwiyawaka ginaple tutuka.
40002010	Retinitkalona katagiri, rumuwatna. Rumuwpotutna.
40002011	Jiglokapjimtatkana, retluna mturu runroyegi, Mariya. Yoptsojityegitatkaluna. Kotpukatkalona ponikowatinrina yegi. Ranikyegitatkaluna genekashlukaka: kori ga wa pgamlupagiri yochpiikalurupa, ga wa mirmunga.
40002012	Yokanatkana rupnawleyna Girore yegi ma satokinitpatkana, gichijnena yatkana. Pagapoko yapamtatkana.
40002013	Yinitkana kgimatkalerune, Gitsrukaachi towreru gipgujewnagipnayegitlu Gosi. Wane chinru, “Palnanutka. Panikanutkalu mturu ga wa runro. Pasukanutka. Gigipto pyanutka. Wane pwanatanutka wane nchininpotukyi Gita. Gi rixanu Giroremka gijganru mturu ruylatyaplu.”
40002014	Yotunotinitka wale, goyechno ranikatkalu mturu ga wa runro. Gigipto yatka.
40002015	Rupninipotunanuko Girore wane rawa, poyagkakikolupa Gitsrukaachi tokanu wa tokanchi geneklewatachriya. Wane china: Gigipto ntomgiylu Noturu.
40002016	Giyagni Girore getnawa gapnokatkaluru kgimatkaleruneya, rumtuwnapotuta. Ruylajixanna pejnurunniko mturunni Wetle gwachinni ga wa psolu sretako wale sreta gwachinni, gepi walapuyegirunni, wanepnute mturunpotni walegognepotuko rixa jemletyawakna kgimatkalerune.
40002017	Giyagni poyagkaakatka tokanchi geneklewatachri Geremiya tokanu. Wane china:
40002018	Ramachijne jemika tsru wamonchi: chiyaglu, saplewjekteru. Rache twugenenni tuchiyagata. Gi taluka gimnanuukota, gi rixanu maleshanatkana.
40002019	Ga wa rupnininatka Girorni, Gitsrukaachi towreru gipgujewnagipnayegitatnaklu Gosi Gigiptoya.
40002020	Wane chinru, “Puyokanutka. Panikanutkalu mturu ga wa runro, ga wa Gisrayilinchijne pyanutka. Gi rixanu rupnanatkana mturu galuka giylaletachinni.”
40002021	Giyagni yotunomtatka. Ranikatkalu mturu ga wa runro. Gisrayilichijne yatka.
40002022	Giyagni Gosi yijnakyegitlu Garchelawo pogirewatinritka Goteya, rurni Girorni kashriglutka, pika wane yaleta. Yokangipnatkatka. Kalilesreta yatka.
40002023	Wane yatka. Pokchi rawatka, Nasare chinkaluru, poyagkakikolupa tokanchi geneklewatachri tokanu: Nasare gajeru chinikolupa.
40003001	Walegognekaka runa Gwa Katlewakleru. Gotechijne yineru mwiyawakanu runkaklewatya.
40003002	Wane china, “Genshinikanutanu, gi rixanu tengogne pogirewatyawaka gi gowukatka.
40003003	Gi rixanu tyenwa runkakyegitanru tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiya. Wane china: Yineru mwiyawakanu pogimewatya tokanchi: Galpokotanru Gitsrukaachi gatnugapote; Mpotukatanru gigapkaka.”
40003004	Kameyopixi kamrutikaluru rutaka Gwa. Pamta gipchiji rushrika. Ga wa tsetskaka nikjeta. Ga wa wrolga gosha gajero rura.
40003005	Giyagni yayegitluna Gerosale gajene, ga wa pejnuruneko Gote gajene, ga wa pejnuruneko Gortagasreta gajene.
40003006	Gortagapga katikna waleya. Rupgujtamukochiretnawana.
40003007	Gixo Gwariseyone ga wa Sariseyone retinitka Gwa katlewatyawaka ginachine, wane chinna, “¡Gimnu pixkalungi! ¿Katu yimakgi gasukyegityawaklu jgekanchipa?
40003008	Giyagni genshinikanuwlu kamrure gkamruretpotutanu.
40003009	Gi gkagwaka wane chinkakletinwa, ‘Waneywu wutsrukatni Gawrani.’ Gi rixanu gita wane chingi, Goyakalu gimkata gipgujewnakakletanna Gawraklopishanemka tyekaka sotlukakaya.
40003010	Gagmunasko rapokatka gepchi. Pejnuruko gagmuna kiglejiru mwanutu kayiikalurupni. Xirnachri ruknookona.”
40003011	Wane koxa china Gwa, “Gita galikakni katgi gonuya genshinikanutinri chinanu. Ga wa najxigi ginachri gita pnute muchkonurutu. Gi wa gita gimukluni nanikyaplu yoshmaklejixi. Wale katangi Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya ga wa xirnachriya.
40003012	Ruplokapre kashicha. Powratpotutanru giylakaajetikowaka. Rapatjetanru trikneji rumretyawakaplu, ga wa yoxikanru gichicha xirniyawaka gike rixiniko muwnakatupa.”
40003013	Giyagni Kalile runyatka Geso. Gorta gapga Gwa yegi ya, wale katyaplu.
40003014	Seyni Gwa gaalipotutmaklu. Wane china, “Gita gimkata katkota Pixaya, ¿ga wa Pixa ginyegitno nkatyapyi?”
40003015	Giyagni rugita Geso. Wane chinru, “Puchichanno xani. Gi rixanu kigleru wane wixinri, psolpotuyako wpoyagkaklewatinripa.” Waneklu rugitatkalu.
40003016	Giyagni rali katkoklunutka Geso, waneklu gonu rushpakyatka. Retlu tengogne gitpukachri ga wa Giwekikaluru Goyakalunu gijrukachri motkoko pixka. Rapyegitatkalu.
40003017	Waneklu satu tokanchi tengogneya, wane china, “Tyenwa Noturu nushinikanru potu. Wale giglenshinikanutno.”
40004001	Giyagni yineru mwiyawakanu Giwekikaluru ganiklu Geso, yantaletikolupa tsru kamchiya.
40004002	Geso, rali gogajirewatinitka gepkoxamkojmolegogne ga wa gepkoxamkojmoleyechno, wanepnute nachlu.
40004003	Rapyegitinitkalu kyantaletlewakleru, wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, wane pchinanru tye sotlukaka jimapro rixinwa.”
40004004	Seyni Wale gigita. Wane china, “Wane chinayongayegitkalurutkani: Gi wa niikalurupje ruwekya yineru, Seyni pejnuruko tokanchi Goyakalu chinyawaka.”
40004005	Giyagni tsru kamchi kpashiri pokchi raniklu. Kpashiwakapji gwachri tenoptaji potu rutaklu.
40004006	Wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, gewi pakaxikamtini. Gi rixanu wane chinayongayegitkalurutkani: Gitowrene towutanu Pixa chinanu. Kashichanyina gimyoyna, gi pagogneko sotlu putspejixitinripa.”
40004007	Geso wane chinru, “Wanekoxa chinyongayegitkalurutkani: Gi pyantaletanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute.”
40004008	Magka tenolu potu ranikatnaklu tsru kamchi. Psolchijiko rekakgityalu pejnuruko pogirewatyawaakaka ga wa ruglenkaka.
40004009	Wane chinru, “Pejnuruko tyekaka nenekanyi pyoptsojityegitinipno.”
40004010	Giyagni Geso wane chinru, “Pyanutka, Satanasyo. Gi rixanu wane chinayongayegitkalurutkani: Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute pyoptsojityegitanu. Walepje pyonogyegitanu.”
40004011	Giyagni tsru kamchi giknokamtatkalu. Goyakalutowrerune yayegitatkalu. Rupxakatkaluna.
40004012	Geso yijnakotatka Gwa samyookatka. Satokatka. Kalile yatka.
40004013	Ruknokamtatkalu Nasare. Kapernawo yatka. Wane rawatka, tsru wenuspuwnaga gwachri pokchi, Sapolonosreta ga wa Neptalisreta,
40004014	poyagkakikolupa tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiya tokanu chinyawaka:
40004015	Sapolonchijne ga wa Neptalchijne gajene, tsru wengapo, Gorta wakanute, Kalile payinchijne,
40004016	Yine mapshagawaka tuplatachine Retluna tsru pokamlalu. Gipnalusreta, gipnalchikle tuplatachine pokamlalu gipgujewnayegitna.
40004017	Wanekluyakawa yinuwaka ginkaklewleta Geso. Wane china, “Genshinikanutanu, gi rixanu tengogne pogirewatyawaka gi gowukatkalu.”
40004018	Kalile Wennespuwnaga yapanata Geso. Retna gepi moletkakachine: Simo, Petro giwakatletachri, ga wa repuru Gantirishi. Tsru wenu chaluganatna gi rixanu kshimagaklerunni.
40004019	Wane chinna, “Tekali. Gwagajxigitanno. Yine gwapjetachine nixkakanutkagi.”
40004020	Waneklu rutakamtatkaluna chalnekakna. Romkagitatkaluna.
40004021	Wane yapamtna. Wane retyana pimrine gepi moletkakachine, Sewereyo wgenene: Santiyako ga wa repuru Gwa. Kanawa rawanatna, ruruymana Sewereyo. Ramtanatluna chalnena. Wane tomgiyna.
40004022	Waneklu ruknokamtatkalona kanawa. Ga wa rurna ruknokamtna. Geso romkagitatkana.
40004023	Psoluko Kalile yapamta Geso. Runkaklewawaklepjikakayna runkaklewatya. Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi runkakleta pogirewatyawakapirana. Pejnuruko yayixlu ga wa pejnuruko gagijewnalu Wale gituukakyana yine.
40004024	Psoluko Suri poshalpiranamta. Ranikyegitluna pejnuruneko yayixachine, pnumnu gixa yayixletachine, salewnachine, ga wa kamchichachine, ga wa popukalerune, ga wa giktegachine. Rutuukakna.
40004025	Gixoluru yineru gomkagitlu, Kalile gajene, ga wa Ntekapoli gajene, ga wa Gerosale gajene, ga wa Gota gajene, ga wa Gorta wakanute gajene.
40005001	Gixolune yine reta. Magka kanika. Tuplata. Yayegitluna yimaklene.
40005002	Yinuwaka yanumsaleta. Runkaklewyegitna. Wane china:
40005003	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni kwamonurune Goyakalu munangachine, gi rixanu wannani tengogne pogirewatyawaka.
40005004	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni wamonuwatachine, gi rixanu gimnanuukalunepni.
40005005	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni mayogone, gi rixanu wanna yoptotanru psolchijneko.
40005006	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni nachgimane poyagkaklewluya, ga wa gonunnagatewatachine poyagkaklewluya, gi rixanu wannanwa jinanurunepa.
40005007	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni kgetwamonrerune gi rixanu getwamonutkalunepni wanna.
40005008	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni powragajirune, gi rixanu wanna getanru Goyakalu.
40005009	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni maluukakane gipoyikgayegkakachine, gi rixanu wanna Goyakalu wgenene chinkona.
40005010	Giglenshinikanyegitkalunni kojwakjetkalune poyagkaklewlena chinanu, gi rixanu wannanni tengogne pogirewatyawaka.
40005011	“Giglenshinikanyegitkalungi yangingina, kojwakingina, psolpotuyako rektutetingina Gita chinanu, rayloklewashatinrina.
40005012	Gimuwatanu. Gimjikpotutanu, gi rixanu tsrupotupni gwenutikolupa tengogneya, gi rixanu wane rixa kojwaakotnina tokanchi geneklewatachinni muchinanu gwachinni gixaya.
40005013	“Gixni wa tye psolchijneko tuwnegi. Gi wa mro rixinitka tuwu, ¿klu tuwutka? Gike kigleyatkalu, seyni maleka ruknokanruna yineya rakatooko.
40005014	“Gixni wa pokamlalu tye psolchijneko pokamlachijnetachingi. Magka rogote gwachri pokchi gi rumkata yogimatkota.
40005015	Ga wa yineru gikoxa yochpiklo katalo ga wa gimatumpuko rutaklo, seyni wa katalo kgapi tutaako, pejnuruneko panchi gwachine tpokamlatyegitinripa.
40005016	Giyagni wane gixa pokamlatletanu yine getanuya, reta kamruretyapgina kigleru rixinri gkamrure, rumalwutyapluna gixa Giru tengogne Gajeru.
40005017	“Gi gkagwakanru wa nuninri nuknokapyaplu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru, gi wa tokanchi geneklewatachine kirukateko. Gi wa nuna nuknokyaplu, seyni npoyagkakyaplu.
40005018	Gi rixanu galikakni wane nchingi, Nikawninpotunanuko tengogne ga wa tye chiji, gi pajina, gi satuna yotmokle nikawninri Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya, pejnurpotunanuko ma mixkanuwpotunanuko.
40005019	Giyagni gi gixachrikokta kaspukiniplu satu tye yokanru mtserutu potu ga wa yimakna yine ma kamrutyanupluna tye mtserutu potu yokanru, walepni mturu potu chinkona tengogne pogirewatyawakaya. Seyni gi gixachrikokta kamrutlu ga wa wane rixa yimakletna yine, walepni wa tsru chinko tengogne pogirewatyawakaya.
40005020	Gi rixanu wane nchingi, mpoyagkaklewle tsru ma mixkanupa yonchikgapine poyagkaklewle ga wa Gwariseyone poyagkaklewle pnute, gi gapokanuna tengogne pogirewatyawaka.”
40005021	Wane china, “Gixa yijnakotlu wa tsrunni wane chinikowaka, ‘Gi puylatanru yineru,’ ga wa ‘Girukokta giylatlu yineru rumkata giklukanuwnayegjixkota.’
40005022	Ga wa Gita wane chingi, girukokta gimtuwnayegitlu gimole maleshawaka rumkata giklukanuwnayegjixkota. Girukokta wane chininri gimole, ‘Manshinikanutyi,’ jemanshinikankakjetikowaka rumkata ganikletlu tsrukakalune. Girukokta wane chininri, ‘Seprolokachriyi,’ rumkata Gigena xirnachri yaleta.
40005023	“Giyagni panikinri penekashle Goyakalu getanu, ga wa wane pushinkapinri pumole pwamontakinri, wane pixanu:
40005024	Genekashjetikowakakwa ginaple putkapanru penekashle. Gajewa. Muchinanu gapka pumatletapanutkalu pumole. Waneklu wane pyanutka. Putakanru penekashle.
40005025	“Giyampotu pumatletanutkalu payegixjeru gatnugapo puyapinikopshinri, ma samyookanpakyi payegixjeru wa kgiklukanuwnayegjixlewakleru yegi. Ga wa kgiklukanuwnayegjixlewakleru ma samyookanpakyi gitowereru yegi, yoshmakjetikowaka pma yoshmakikotupa.
40005026	Galikakni wane nchinyi, gi wane pushpakini pma wenutkanuwalo talipre mchataajpotunanuko.”
40005027	Geso gomkagi wane chinretna, “Gixa yijnakotlu wa tsrunni chinikowaka: Gi pumopatlewatanu.
40005028	Gita wane chingi, katukokta sato suxo getini, retsotanutinro, rumopatlewatatka walaya rajiya.
40005029	“Giyagni wa potukleygale mukochirewkakinipyi, pkoshpakanru. Puknokanru pixyegiya. Gi rixanu kigleyyi pixinripa satupje pumane psojite pamginri, psolumaneko Gigena xirnachri pma muknokikotupa.
40005030	Ga wa potuklemyo mukochirewkakinipyi pustakanru. Puknokanru pixyegiya. Gi rixanu kigleyyi pixinripa satupje pumane psojite pamginri, psolmaneko Gigena xirnachri pma mamginitipa.”
40005031	Wane chinna, “Girukokta giknokagnunrota, renekanro kiruka ma ganunrotyanpatkalo.
40005032	Ga wa Gita wane chingi: Girukokta giknokagnunrota gapoklewlumigjeya, gimopatlewatachro rixkakanro. Ga wa girukokta gnunrotlo giknookaluro, rumopatlewatatka.
40005033	“Gyijnakotatnaklu wa tsrunni wane chinikowaka: Gi wa maleshawaka Goyakalu kawchinanu pchinanu. Poyagkakanru Gitsrukaachi chinanu, wa pupiratanru Wale kawchinanu pchinre.
40005034	Ga wa Gita wane chingi, giketsotaji Wale kawchinanu nchinanu: gi wa tengogne kawchinanuko, gi rixanu walenwa Goyakalu tuplapijere;
40005035	gi wa chijiko, gi rixanu rutspanjixgapreni; gi wa Gerosale kawchinanuko, gi rixanu tsru Pogirchi pokchini;
40005036	gi pujiwu kawchinanuko, gi rixanu gi pumkata klatalu gixkakletlu pajiwutsapje, gi ksajiruko.
40005037	Wane nchintokanutanu, gigi: ‘Gigi;’ gike: ‘Gike.’ Gi rixanu wanepnutetka mugletu ruyakatyatka wale.
40005038	“Gyijnakotlu wane chinikowaka, ‘Ygalchi, ygalchi chinanu. Ygichi, ygichi chinanu.’
40005039	Ga wa Gita wane chingi, gi psatkakyegitanru mugletu, seyni gi gixachrikokta giptagojityi potuklesretgoji, pasretgoji koxa puprotakgojyegitanru.
40005040	Paluka jigyegletjeru kgiklukanuwnayegjixlewakleru yegi, paluka gwamkaletjeru puchichankoxlu pumkaluchrata.
40005041	Gi gixachrikokta yakakinyi gepi kilometro waleyma pyinripa, gepkoxamkoje kilometro pyanu waleyma.
40005042	Penekanru pagjitjeru. Girukokta galuka ganikleshatyayi, gi paalixanru.
40005043	“Gyijnakpiranatlu wane chinikowaka, ‘Pushinikanru pumwastsitanru ga wa payegixanru pkamnixjeru.’
40005044	Ga wa Gita wane chingi, gishinikanna gkamnixjene. Gagjitanru ruglenshinikanyegitikolupna gkamakpirjetjene. Kigle getle gixanna gayegixjene. Gagjigogneyegitanna gyenetjene ga wa gkojwakjene,
40005045	tengogne Gajeru Giru wgenene gixinripa. Gi rixanu Wale gishpakaklu tkachite muglene chinanu ga wa kiglerune chinanu. Gina rixyegitna poyagkakachine ga wa mpoyagkaakane koxa.
40005046	Gi rixanu gishinikinipna wa gishinikjene, ¿klu gimapnutko? ¿Gi ge waneko pixka rixna gijgawenutachine?
40005047	Ga wa gimolenepje galukini, ¿klu gkamruta gixa pimrine pnute? ¿Gi ge waneko pixka rixkoxna payineko?
40005048	Giyagni mmagatikanepgi, gixa Giru pixka tengogne Gajeru mmagatikatni.”
40006001	Geso gomkagi wane chinretna, “Ggirukotinwa yine getanuya. Gi wa poyagkakachinepgi wanna getyapgi. Wane gixini, gi wa rapnutanungi Giru tengogne Gajeru.
40006002	“Giyagni petwamonrewle penekashlewatinipa, gi wa pkowjixanu pixa penute, wa sanowashatachine pixka kowjixjetna ginkaklewakapjikakaya ga wa gatnugapkakaya, yine gimalwutyapna. Galikakni wane nchingi rapnutkatkana.
40006003	Wa petwamonrewle peneklewashatini, gi wa pkegnetesretatemyoko gimatanru wa potuklesretatemyo pkamrutinri,
40006004	wa yogimatikowaka penekashlewatinripa. Ga wa Puru, yogimatikowaka getyachri, pgujewaka rapnutinyi.
40006005	“Wa gagjigognetini gi wa sanowashatachine pixka gixanu. Gi rixanu wanna galuka gagjigognereta tunwatachine ginkaklewakapjikakaya ga wa gipututsojriykaka, wa yine getyapna. Galikakni wane nchingi, rapnutkatkana.
40006006	Ga wa pixa gagjigognetini, pjiglokanu pugruko. Pushyatanru pupgyaptote. Pagjitanru Puru yogimatikowaka gwachri. Ga wa Puru yogimatikowaka getyachri pgujewaka rapnutinyi.
40006007	“Gagjigognetini gi wa goyanumsaleshatachinepgi payine pixka. Gi rixanu wanna kagwaklu gixo tokanchiya yijnakotikolupna.
40006008	Gi wa wanna pixka gixanu gixa. Gi rixanu gixa Giru gimata kluneru gmagatya gma magjitkanuwalu.
40006009	“Wane gixa gagjigogneretanu: Wuru, tengogne Gajeru, gipashichgiwakatkalurupyi.
40006010	Runanutka Pixa pogirewatyawaka. Pixa galukyawaka wane gixkalurupni; tengogneko pixka rixko tyechijne.
40006011	Penekanwu xawakni wnikanrupa tyegogne chinanupa.
40006012	Pkaspukinwu wmukochire wixa pixka wkaspukyana pnu wixjene.
40006013	Gi wa yantaletikowakako putakanwu, seyni pushatkapanunwu galikaka mugletuya.
40006014	“Gi rixanu gixa kaspukinna yine pnu gixjene, Giru tengogne gajeru, kaspukinkoxgi gixa.
40006015	Seyni gma kaspukinna yine pnu gixjene, Giru koxa gi kaspukmukochiretanungi.”
40006016	Geso gomkagi wane chinretna, “Wa gogajirewatinipa gi wa sanowashatachine pixka gixgojitanu wamonuwnagojitachine. Gi rixanu gektu rixgojitnawana wa yine getyapna gogajirewatachine gixyawakako. Galikakni wane nchingi rapnutkatkana.
40006017	Ga wa pixa gogajirewatinipa, ringi psagjiwutanu, ga wa perkagojitanu.
40006018	Pma metikotupa yine yegi wa pogajirewatinri, seyni Puru yegi yogimatikowaka gwachri. Ga wa Puru yogimatikowaka getyachri pgujewaka rapnutinyi.
40006019	“Gi wa tye chiji mponikowatini, wa kochopa ga wa puchowlu gimtukyawaka, ga wa kachowguru kotamgiyawaka, chowguwatinripa.
40006020	Seyni tengogne mponikowatini galikaka, mumtuklewatikowaka gi wa kochopako, gi wa puchowluko, mkotamgikowakanu kachowguru, mchowguwatikowakanu.
40006021	Gi rixanu ginakaktaplu mponikowle wanekoxaplu gaji.
40006022	“Wumane katalote walenwa wuygale. Giyagni potukaygale pixinipa, psoluko pumane pokamlapa.
40006023	Seyni puygale mugletu rixinipa, psoluko pumane mapshagalupni. Giyagni pokamlalu pumane gwachri mapshagalu rixini, ¡gi pamapshagnunanuktalu!
40006024	“Gi satuna gimkata wayegrechri gixleta gepi gitsrukaachine yegi. Gi rixanu waka rayegixanru satu, satu rushinikanu. Waka satu rupxaletanu, satu reyikanu. Gi gimkata gipxaletletlu Goyakalu ga wa ponikowlu.
40006025	“Giyagni wane nchingi, gi gkojwakanshinikanutinwa giwekinriya, klu gnikanuna ga wa klu giranuna. Gi koxa gimaneya, klu gmakatanu. ¿Gi ge tsrupotni giwekinri niikaluru pnute, ga wa manchi gitaakaluru pnute?
40006026	Getpotutanna tengogne yapachine koshichine mutaklewatkanni. Gi jirgana. Gi rawluna wa gignantakjetikwakaya. Ga wa Giru tengogne Gajeru goglutna. ¿Gi ge kiglepotgi gixa wanna pnute?
40006027	¿Katu gixa gimkata yognikletlu giwekinriya pshinitsonuji gkojwakanshinkanrewleya?
40006028	“¿Klu koxa gkojwakanshinikanutnawa gmakatanruya? Getjetanru kagwuru chiji gajeru, gi rixpoko tseruwnaleta. Gi kamrurewpotuta. Gi jiweta.
40006029	Seyni wane nchingi gi wa Salomoko psolu pogirewleyako makawata satu tyegwukaka pixka.
40006030	Ga wa Goyakalu wane gixa makatletinri kshana xawakni gwachri, yechikawa xirnachri ruknookonatka, ¿gi ge wale pnute makatangi gixa? Psotsotaji galixachingi.
40006031	Giyagni gi wa gkojwakanshinikanutinwa, wane nchininri, ‘¿Klu wnikanuna? ¿Klu wuranuna? ¿Klu wutakanuna?’
40006032	Gi rixanu payine pejnuruko tyekaka rujgana. Ga wa Giru tengogne Gajeru gimatlu tyekaka pejnuruko galukanru.
40006033	Seyni muchinanu gapka gijganru Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka, ga wa Wale poyagkaklewle. Pejnuruko tyekaka gyognikiko.
40006034	Giyagni gi wa gkojwakanshinikanutinwa yechikawa chinanu. Gi rixanu waneplu kojwakanshinikanrewlu yechikawapa. Poyagotatka pagognekaka wa gektutu.”
40007001	Geso gomkagi wane chinretna, “Gi wa ruklukanuwna nchinyegitanru satu, gma muklukanuwnayegjixikotupa.
40007002	Gi rixanu gikta gixpoko giklukanuwnayegjixletna pimrine, waneko pixka gixa giklukanuwnayegjixkotanu gixa. Waneko pixka rixa: Wa yantapi gixa yantajetinri, walako gyantatiko.
40007003	“Ga wa waneko pixka rixatnaka. Wutakashatanru: Pixa getlu kapopejiru pumoleygale gwachri, ga wa ¿puygaleko gwachri kaknalu gi peta?
40007004	Ga wa wane pchinanru pumole, ‘Gichikaka. Nwanruchi puygale gajeru kapopejiru.’ ¡Ga wa petanru pixako puygale gwachri kaknalu!
40007005	¡Sanowashatachriyi! Muchinanu gapka puknokanruchi kaknalu puygale gajeru. Waneklu petpotutanutkalu puknokyaplu pumoleygale gwachri kapopejiru.
40007006	“Gi wa kewene penekanru wa kpashiri. Gi giknokanru katajiroji perlaji gixanu kochine yegi, ma makatokyanupluna gijixiya, ma muprotkapyegityanupgi, ma suskatyanupgi.
40007007	“Gagjitanu ga wa geneeko. Gijganu ga wa gikshikanu. Giylaylagipgyaptotetanu, gkotpukyegitko.
40007008	Gi rixanu girukokta gagjita, yoptota. Ga wa gijgachri rukshika. Ga wa giylaylagipgyaptotetachri kotpukyegitko.
40007009	“Ga wa gixa, ¿giru jeji wa gituru gagjitinri jimapro, renekanru sotlu?
40007010	Ga wa shima ragjitini, ¿gimnurge renekanru?
40007011	Giyagni wa gixa muglenmakgi gimata genekawgenreta kigleru genekashle, pnutlu Giru tengogne Gajeru kiglerkaka renekanna ragjitjene.
40007012	Giyagni pejnurkakako gixa galukanru wa yine wane gixyapgi, waneko pixkapotuko gixankoxna wanna. Gi rixanu tyenwa tokanchi yokanatkaluru ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachine tokanu.
40007013	“Gjiglokanu mtsergipgyaptotetu. Gi rixanu tsru gipgyaptoteru, tsrugapolu wa gamgikowakgapo. Gi gepikanna walegapo jiglokachinena.
40007014	Gi rixanu mtsergipgyaptotetu, mtsergapotni giweklugapo. Gi gixo gikshiklu.”
40007015	Geso gomkagi wane chinretna, “Ggirukotinwa wannaya tokanchi geneklewatachine gixashatachine, ginyegitjene gowegane pixka gixamkatachine, seyni gitokoya kewetnane kmatsurune pixkalunni.
40007016	Kamrurna gimatinna. ¿Kawshipirege jirgiylona gowaji? Ga wa ¿kawshisureruylege jirgiylona gikersagi?
40007017	Wane rixa pejnuruko kigleru gagmuna, kiglejiwlerni. Seyni wa gektutu gagmuna muglejiwletni.
40007018	Gi rumkata kigleru gagmuna muglenjiwleta. Gi koxa rumkata mugletu gagmuna kiglejiwleta.
40007019	Pejnuruko gagmuna kiglejiru mwanutu kayiikalurni. Xirnachri ruknooka.
40007020	Giyagni kamrurna gimatinna.
40007021	“Gi pejnuruneko ‘Gitsrukaachi, Gitsrukaachi’ nchinjene gapokanru tengogne pogirewatyawaka. Seyni Nuru tengogne Gajeru gishinikanru kamrutachri, jiglokanru.
40007022	Walegognepa gi gepika wane chinanno, ‘Gitsrukaachi, Gitsrukaachi ¿gi ge tokanchi geneklewatachinwu Pixa giwakaya? ¿Gi ge pgiwakaya maleka wuknokna kamchine?’ ¿Gi ge pgiwaka wkamrutyalu gixo giyaklukaka?
40007023	Giyagni nunkakpotutanna, ‘Gi pagogneko numatgi. Knanu gyanutka Gityegiya, mukochri kamruklerungi.’
40007024	“Giyagni girukokta yijnakotlu tye ntokanu, ga wa wane rixlu, jeji kshinikanuru pixkalutu, sotlumta gogo kamrupjitachri.
40007025	Gina gijruka. Rapogata. Kannipgyalu gajpopokannipgyata. Yantamuchkonupjitlu wale panchi. Gi wa yawna, gi rixanu sotlumta gogo poyegitanruni.
40007026	Giyagni girukokta yijnakotlu tye ntokanu, gi wane rixa, jeji manshinikanutu pixkalutu, ksatu gogo kamrupjitachri.
40007027	Gina gijruka. Rapogata. Kannipgyalu gajpopokannipgyata. Yantamuchkonupjitlu wale panchi. Yawnamtana. Tsru yawnalu rixana.”
40007028	Wane rixa. Wa Geso tye tokanchi rali ginkakletinitka, wa gixolune yine giglajita runkakaklewleya.
40007029	Gi rixanu tsru gitaakaluru pixka rixa ginkaklewleta. Gi wanna yonchikgapine pixka rixa.
40008001	Magka yopikyatka. Gixolune yine gomkagitlu.
40008002	Wane satu gijirgitutachri yayegityalu. Yoptsojityegitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, palukiniplu pumkata powratletanunno.”
40008003	Romyokyegitlu. Kamruklu. Wane china, “Naluklu powra pixinripa.” Waneklu rujirgitle rutukyatka.
40008004	Geso wane chinru, “Petanu. Gike punkakanu. Seyni pyanu. Pekakgitinwa sasertote yegi. Penekanru genekashlu wa Moysisi yokanatanru. Walepni gipgujtalewlu wanna chinanu.”
40008005	Kapernawo rapokinitka, satu ksolaloteru ginyegitlu. Ragjitlu.
40008006	Wane china, “Gitsrukaachi, nopji ruklugana ntseruwakleni. Giktegachrina. Salewnachripotuna.”
40008007	Wane china, “Wane nyanu Gita. Nutuukakapanru.”
40008008	Ksolaloteru gigita. Wane china, “Gitsrukaachi, gi numukluyi wa nopji washrempuko papokinripa. Seyni wane pchinatokanushatanu. Ntseruwakle gitukanutka.
40008009	Gi rixanu gita koxa jejno tsru gitaakalune rapukote gwachrino. Gita koxa solalone gitakika. Wane nchinru wa tye, ‘Pyanutka.’ Yatka. Satu wane nchina, ‘Punanu.’ Runa. Wane nchinru nwayegreru, ‘Pkamrutanru wa tye.’ Kamrutlu.”
40008010	Geso yijnakotinri, ruglajita. Wane chinna romkagitjene: “Galikaka wane nchingi, gi satuna Gisrayiline yegi nukshikyalu tye pixkalutu galixlewlu.
40008011	Wane nchingi, runanna gixo tkachi gishpatyawakasreta gajene ga wa tkachi gimxityawakasreta gajene. Tengogne pogirewatyawaka tuplatanna Gawrayma, Gisaaka, ga wa Gakowoyma.
40008012	Seyni wa pogirewatyawaka gwachinemka giknookalunenapni mapshagawaka maleka. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.”
40008013	Geso wane chinru ksolaloteru, “Pyanutka. Palixyawakpotuko pkamrutikatka.” Rutuukakatka tseruwakle wanekluyakawa.
40008014	Petropji ya Geso. Retlo Petro gimajiro. Tukluganatana, tpachwatana.
40008015	Kamrukamyotlo. Tupachwalgatka. Tyotunomtatka. Wala gipxakatkalu.
40008016	Kayi rixinitka ranikyegitluna gixo kamchichachine. Maleka ruknokna kamchine tokanuya. Rutuukakna pejnuruneko yayixachine,
40008017	poyagkakikolupa tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiya tokanu. Wane china: Waleko gwalu wugroklewle. Raniklu wyayixlekaka.
40008018	Geso getna gixo yine Wale yegi. Yokanrewata wakanu yinripna.
40008019	Satu yonchikgapri gapyegitlu. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, nomkagitanyi ginakakokta pyinipa.”
40008020	Geso wane chinru, “Kewnechrone waneyna kapna. Ga wa koshichine tengogne yapachine waneyna rawyawakna. Ga wa Gita Yineru Wgenno maleshayno nutspanjiwutyawaka.”
40008021	Satu yimakleru wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi puchichanno muchinanu gapkachi wane nyanu, nuruchi gipnini, ga wa nkapnamtanu.”
40008022	Geso wane chinru, “Pomkagitanno. Petashatanna gipnachine kapnaletanna wannanunekni gipnachine.”
40008023	Kanawa ruptekatka. Yimaklene gomkagitlu.
40008024	Waneklu tsru yowjereshpurga rixa tsru wenu. Wa kanawa tuygajetlo gishpurga. Seyni Wale gimkananumta.
40008025	Yimaklene yayegitlu. Komyekluna. Wane chinruna, “¡Gitsrukaachi, pognetkakanwu! ¡Wamginripatka!”
40008026	Wale wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu pikachingi? Psotsotaji galixachingi.” Giyagni yotunota. Chigetjetlu kannipgyalu ga wa tsru wenu. Tsru mayegixgalu rixatka.
40008027	Giyagni jejine giglajita. Wane chinna, “¿Gi gixachri jejnige wa tye? Wa kannipgyalu ga wa tsru wenu yijnakotanru.”
40008028	Wakanu rapoka Gergesenonesreta. Yoptotapluna gepi kamchichachine, yomlechi yegi ginyachine. Kmatsurunpotni. Wane rixkalchinanna gike gimkata giknoglegapotlu walegapo.
40008029	Wane saplewatyana. Wane chinna, “¿Gi rixwu wixa ga wa pixa, Geso, Goyakalu Wgene? ¿Punge gewi psaletpotutyapwu ma mapookanuwa gipapko?”
40008030	Gowukako rawanatikna gixo kochine. Nikanatna.
40008031	Ga wa kamchine ragjitluna. Wane chinruna, “Puknokinipwu, puchichanwu kochinemane wjiglokinripa.”
40008032	Wane chinna Geso, “Gajewa.” Wanna gishpakamtatka. Kochine yegi yatkana. Waneklu pejnurunniko gixolunni kochinni pagakaxikamtkalunenni gitawakapjita rujrukamtyanna. Tsru wenu rapokanna. Gonu rupniyanna.
40008033	Kochi kogluklerune gasukamta. Pokchi yana. Runkaklewatna pejnurpiranako kamchichachineya.
40008034	Giyagni pejnuruneko pokchi gajene yayegitluna. Yoptotapluna Geso. Retluna. Ragjitluna pnusretako yinripatka.
40009001	Kanawa ruptekatka Geso, koprugatatka. Gipokchi yatka.
40009002	Waneklu satu giktegachri ranikyegitluna, gijeko giklugachri. Geso geta galixletna wanna. Wane chinru giktegachri, “Kiglenshinikanupyi, Wiwi. Kaspukmukochiretkalurutkayi.”
40009003	Wa pimrine yonchikgapine wane chinanshinikanutna, “Tyenwa mupashiregnuchi china.”
40009004	Rumatanshinikanutinna Geso, wane chinna, “¿Klu chinau mugletu gyanshinikanuta gajiya?
40009005	Gi rixanu ¿girni wa myapretu wane chinikolu, waka, ‘Kaspukmukochiretkalurutkayi,’ waka wane chinru, ‘Palnanutka. Pyanamtanutka’?
40009006	Seyni wa gimatyaplu wa Gita Yineru Wgenno tyechijne gitaakalurno kaspukmukochirewlewatachripno” —giyagni wane chinru giktegachri, “Palnanutka. Pwanutkalu pujeko. Pyanutka pupji.”
40009007	Giyagni wale palnatka. Gipji yatka.
40009008	Gixolune getanatlu. Pikna. Rumalwutluna Goyakalu, gi rixanu renekyana yine wane rixa gitakletikolupa.
40009009	Wane yiyatka Geso. Retlu satu jeji, girukotlewatachine gijgawenjetikowaka tuplanatachri. Matiyo giwakni. Wane chinru, “Pomkagitanno.” Palnamtatka. Romkagitatkalu.
40009010	Wane rixa. Panchi nikjetikowaka tuplanata. Wanena gi gepika gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune gapokachine. Tuplatna nikjetikowaka Gesoyma ga wa yimaklene.
40009011	Gwariseyone getinna. Wane chinkanna yimaklenni, “¿Klu chinanu gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune rumnika gyimakjeru?”
40009012	Yijnakotinitka Geso, wane china, “Wa gichkolune gi ralukluna kpinrewakleru, seyni wa yayixachinena galikaka.
40009013	Gajewa. Gimatanutkalu klunerpiranni. Naluklu getwamonrewlu. Gi wa genekashlu giylatkaluru naluka. Gi rixanu gi nuna ntomgiyapna poyagkakachine seyni kmukochirerune.”
40009014	Giyagni Gwa yimaklene yayegitlu Geso. Wane chinruna, “¿Klu chinanu wixa ga wa Gwariseyone gixo kata gogajirewata; ga wa Pixa yimaklene gi gogajirewata?”
40009015	Geso wane chinna, “Gi rumkata wamonuwnaletna wa kashimyolu getachine wannayma rawinikopshini gnunrowatachri, wa xani pixka Gita gimwakopshinna nyimaklene. Seyni runanu pagogne wa gnunrowatachri konkoklunpatka wannayegiya. Waneklu rogajirewatanna wanna.
40009016	“Gike gamatlu muchkirgasamatkatuwa mkachritsole. Gi rixanu waleko ramle sama jiprojiklu mkachri. Pnute rixa giskakletanatka.
40009017	Gi koxa wa tsrutsoleji nikchimtamapa rutakgatlona winga gerotga. Wane rixkoklunu tsapkaka gipshekgata. Ga wa wingani tuyokgatana. Salewnanatka tsapni koxa. Seyni gerotmapa rutakgatlona gerotga winga. Gepiko gimretka.”
40009018	Runkakiniwana tyepirana, runyegitlu satu gitsrukaachi. Yoptsojityegitlu. Wane chinru, “Nshichni gajerya tupnanawa. Seyni punanu. Putakamyogontapanro. Tuwekanu.”
40009019	Palnamta Geso. Romkagimtlu yimakleneyma.
40009020	Wanero sato suxo pamole gepi walapu gigragalewatachro. Gitjimne tyapamtyalu, tkamrukamkaptostsitaplu.
40009021	Gi rixanu wane china walananuko, “Nkamrukamkatyapjeplu nutukanu.”
40009022	Wa Geso giprotaka. Retanatlo. Wane chinro, “Kiglenshinikanupyi, Wiwi. Palixle gitskalakyi.” Wanekluyakawa tutskalga suxo.
40009023	Geso gapokatkalu gitsrukaachipji. Retna tumlejitachine ga wa gixolune sejrewnachine.
40009024	Wane china, “Gixrikanu. Wa mturo gi wa tupna, seyni tumkanata.” Ruxpiranatluna.
40009025	Wa gixolune maleka koshpaaka. Jiglokamtatka. Kamrukamyotlo. Tyotunotatka mturo.
40009026	Pogitpiranamtkatka psolchijneko walechijne.
40009027	Wane yiyatnaka Geso. Romkagimtluna gepi maygalene. Saplewjenanumtna. Wane chinna, “¡Petwamonutanunwu, Tawiklopisha!”
40009028	Panchi rapokinitka, maygalene ginyegitlu. Ga wa Geso wane chinna, “¿Galixge numkata wane gixleta?” Wane chinruna, “Gigi, Gitsrukaachi.”
40009029	Giyagni kamrukaygaletatkana. Wane chinna, “Galixyawakpotuko gkamrutikotka.”
40009030	Rumrekgatatkana. Ga wa Geso rujretpotutna. Wane chinna, “Ggirukotinwa gike gimatanru.”
40009031	Seyni yatkana. Poshalpiranamtluna psolchijneko walechijne.
40009032	Yinitkana, satu jeji ranikyegitluna myanumatkatu, kamchichachrina.
40009033	Maleka ruknoklu kamchi. Wa myanumanatkatu yanumsatatka. Gixolune giglajita. Wane chinna, “Gi pagogne Gisrayilichijne retika tye pixkalutu.”
40009034	Seyni wa Gwariseyone wane china, “Kamchi gitsrukate giyakleya maleka ruknokna kamchine.”
40009035	Papokchimnunanuka yapa Geso, tsru pokchikaka ga wa mtserutu pokchikaka. Runkaklewawaklepjikakna runkaklewananumtya. Runkakletananumtlu Kiglerupotunanu Tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana. Rutuukakananumtlu pejnuruko yayixlukaka, ga wa pejnuruko gagijewakchi yinyegiya.
40009036	Retna gixolune yine. Retwamonutna, gi rixanu kojwakanshinikanutnawana. Giknookalurune gowegane pixka, girukotapratachri waneyamigjene.
40009037	Giyagni wane chinna yimaklene, “Galikakni gixlu jirgakalurupa. Seyni wa kamrurewaklerune gi gixna.
40009038	Giyagni gagjitanru jirgakalurupa Gitsrukate jirgalyegipa yokanatyapna kamrurewaklerune.”
40010001	Pamole gepi yimaklene tomga. Rutakna kamchine puchotlewatachine chinanu maleka ruknokyapna, pejnuruko yayixlukaka rutuukakinripna ga wa pejnuruko gagijewakchi
40010002	Pamole gepi yokanatanune giwakna walenwa: muchinanu Simo wa Petro chinkaluru, ga wa repuru, Gantirishi, ga wa Santiyako, Sewereyo wgene ga wa repuru Gwa;
40010003	Wilipi ga wa Wartolo, Tomasu ga wa Matiyo gijgawenutachri, Santiyako, Galgweyo wgene, ga wa Tateyo.
40010004	Simo Kanani gajeru ga wa Gota Giskaryote samyokjerupa.
40010005	Geso yokanatatkana nyi pamole gepi. Wane china yokanretna, “Gi wa payingapoko gyanu. Gi wa Samaritane pokchiko gapokanu.
40010006	Seyni gowegane gamgachine yegi galikaka gyanu, Gisrayiliklopishane yegi.
40010007	Gyinipa ginkaklewananumtanu. Wane nchinanu, ‘Tengogne pogirewatyawaka gi gowukatka.’
40010008	Gituukakananumtanna yayixachine. Gyotunkakananumtanna gipnachine. Mpowratananumtanna gijirgitutachine. Maleka giknokanna kamchine. Genekashatkaluru gyoptota. Genekashlewatanu koxa gixa.
40010009	Gi wa koriko ntapgatanu, gi wa sroschiko; gi wa sintawoko giskotatanu.
40010010	Gi tsapako yagaplu chinanu, gi gepimkaluko, gi yoshmakjixrechishpatako, gi wa kanojerchiko. Gi rixanu wa kamrurewakleru rumkata yoptoletlu nikanru.
40010011	“Girukokta pokchi gapokanu tsru pokchi ga wa mturu pokchi, gepomlewatanu ginaklu kiglepiranyegirupji. Wane gwanu gyinpotunanuko.
40010012	Wa panchi gapokinipa galukanna wane gajene.
40010013	Wa panchi gajene rumukane rixinrina, waneyapna gixa giglenunshinikanu. Seyni ma mumuklunu rixinrina giglenunshinikanu satokyegitangi.
40010014	Katukokta gi yoptotangi, gi yijnaktokanutangi, walepji gyinpatka ga wa wale pokchiya, giplokjiximtanu gistapjixipagi, rumatikolupna.
40010015	Galikakni wane nchingi wa gakotkalurupa Sotomachijne, Komorachijne gajenniya wale pokchi gajenni pnute wa giklukanuwnalgognepatka.
40010016	“Xawakni Gita yokanatgi gowegane pixkalungi kewetnanetskala. Giyagni galpokonshinikanutanu gimnune pixka, ga wa myokwirenepgi motkokone pixka.
40010017	“Ggirukotinwa yineya. Gi rixanu samyokangina jemanshinikankakjetikowaka. Runkaklewawaklepjikakayna kochipjetingina.
40010018	Girukotlewatachine yegi ga wa pogirchine yegi ganiiko Gita chinanupa, gipgujtalewlu chinanu wanna yegi ga wa payine yegi.
40010019	Wa nsamyookoklunupa gi wa gkojwakanshinikanutinwa gi nchina yanumsaletinripa. Gi rixanu waneklupapko geneeko wane nchinanrupa.
40010020	Gi rixanu gi wa gixapni yanumsatachinepgi, seyni Giwekikaluru gixa Girunu gixa gitokote yanumsatini.
40010021	“Molchi samyokanru gimoleko rupninripa, ga wa girchi gituru. Ga wa wgenchine kamnixanna rurunna ruylatikolupna.
40010022	Gayegixkalunepgi pejnuruneyako Gita giwaka chinanu, seyni wa kashnantakanshinikanutachri yoptukyawakpotunanuko wale gognetkaako.
40010023	Tye pokchiya kojwakingina gasukanu. Papokchi gyanu. Gi rixanu galikakni wane nchingi, gi gnikawna wane yaletanu papokchimnunanuka Gisrayilichijne nma munkanupachi Gita Yineru Wgenno.
40010024	“Yimaklechi gi wa tsrunwa yimaklewatachri pnute. Gi wa wayegrechriko, rutsrukate pnute.
40010025	Poyagotyalu yimaklechi wa yimakjeru pixka rixinripa, ga wa wayegrechri wa rutsrukate pixka rixinripa. Welsewo chinmakluna kapjiru pnutenapna gipji gajenepni.
40010026	“Giyagni gi mpikanna. Gi rixanu maleshlu giyogimatkaluru gi wa mupgujetkotpakni. Maleshlu pochkeruko mumatkotupa.
40010027	Wane nchinyagi Gita mapshagawakaya, pokamlawakaya wane nchininri gixa. Gijnakpotuko gyijnakotinri, panchi gayiji ginkakletinri.
40010028	Gi mpikanna manchi giylatachine seyni giweklu gi rumkata giylaletna. Seyni Wale galikaka mpikanu giweklu gimkata gamgakakletachri ga wa manchi Gigena xirnachriya.
40010029	¿Gi ge wa ganikajiproji chinanu rushankaka gepi koshichine? Ga wa gi satuna wanna chiji gijruka gixa Giru mwaknu.
40010030	Gijiwtsako pejnuruko yantatkalurni.
40010031	Giyagni gi mpikanu. Kiglepotgi gixa gixo koshichine pnute.
40010032	“Giyagni girukokta gipgujtatanno yineyegiya, Gita koxa gipgujtatanru Nuru tengogne Gajeru yegi.
40010033	Girukokta ginutatanno yinyegiya, Gita koxa ginutatanru Nuru tengogne Gajeru yegi.
40010034	“Gi gkagwakanru nuninri wa tyechijne nutakyaplu kiglegwashle. Gi wa nuna kiglewashle nutakinripa seyni yoglolewapi.
40010035	Gi rixanu nuna nkotspalatyapna: Jeji wa ruru kamnixinripa, Ga wa tshicho tunro tkamnixinripa, Ga wa tomekanunro tgimajiro tkamnixinripa.
40010036	Wa jeji kamnixjene, walepji gajeneko kamnixanru.
40010037	“Girukta gi wa galukpotutno ruru, runro pixka pnute, gi wa rumukluno Gita. Girukta gi wa galukpotutno gituru, rushicho pixka pnute, gi wa rumukluno Gita.
40010038	Girukta gi gwanro koroshiteshkita, gi rawgajxigitanno, gi rumukluno Gita.
40010039	Girukta gikshika giwekleta, ruwekinri ramginina. Girukta gamtakanru ruwekinri Gita chinanu, rukshika giwekletanu.
40010040	“Gixa yoptotachri, Gita yoptota. Wa Gita yoptotachri nyokanatjeru yoptota.
40010041	Tokanchi geneklewatachri giwakaya tokanchi geneklewatachri yoptotachri, wale yoptotanru tokanchi geneklewatachri gapnutikolu. Poyagkakachri giwakaya poyagkakachri yoptotachri, wale yoptotanru poyagkakachri gapnutikolu.
40010042	Girukokta genekanru girapistonopje kachiklegalu satu mturu wanna nyi mturune nyimakleru giwakaya, galikakni wane nchingi, gi wa ramga gapnutkotanu.”
40011001	Wane rixa. Geso rali towutletatkana pamole gepi yimaklene, wane yiyatka, papokchikaka wannanu yimaklewatinripa ga wa runkaklewatinripa.
40011002	Yoshmakikowaka Gwa yijnakpiranyegityalu Kristo kamrure. Giyagni yokanatna yimaklene Gesyegi.
40011003	Wane chinruna, “¿Pixaklege ginachripyi, waka wkagwakerge satu?”
40011004	Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Gajewa. Ginkakapanru Gwa gyijnakotanrukakaya ga wa getanrukakaya.
40011005	Maygalenenanu getatka. Ga wa myankanenanu yanatka. Ga wa gijirgitunatachine powratkatka. Ga wa majnakonenanu jemashatatka. Ga wa gipnachine yotunkaaka. Ga wa kwamonurune yegi runkakletika Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi.
40011006	Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru mutspetkatu Gitaya.”
40011007	Yanananumtinna, Geso yinuwaka ginkakletna gixolune yine Gwapirana, “¿Kluneru getapa yineru mwiyawakanuya? ¿Satu kapanrege kannipgyalu kowshikanrurge?
40011008	Seyni ¿kluneru getapa? ¿Satu jeji popchimkalurege gitakachri? Gike. Pogirchinepji rawna popchimkalu gitakachine.
40011009	Seyni ¿klu chinanu wane gyapa? ¿Satu tokanchi geneklewatachrirge getapinripa? Gigi, wane nchingi. Tokanchi geneklewatchri pnute.
40011010	Gi rixanu walenwa yonpiranyegitkaluru: Petanu. Gita yokanatlu notowreru pixa penute. Wale galpokotanru patnugapote pixa penute.
40011011	“Galikakni wane nchingi, gi wa rupgujewna satu suxo gishpakyachri, Gwa Katlewakleru pnute tsru. Seyni wa mtserutu potu tengogne pogirewatyawakaya tsruni Gwa pnute.
40011012	Gwa Katlewaklerukluyakawa ga wa xanigognenanu tengogne pogirewatyawaka muchkowyegitka. Muchkowatachine kashichlu.
40011013	Gi rixanu pejnuruneko tokanchi geneklewatachine ga wa tokanchi yokanatkaluru Gwaklupotunanuko runkakletpiranatluna.
40011014	Galuka yoptoletiniplu walenwa Giliya wa ginachripa.
40011015	Girukokta kajnakopnapa wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
40011016	Geso gomkagi wane chinretna, “¿Giru pixka nutakanna nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine? Mturune pixka, giputu tuplanatachine, rupxalunna tomsanatachine.
40011017	Wane chinna: Wtumlejyegitgi. Gi wa gansata gixa. Wamonuwata gixa yegi. Gi wa nchiyagjeta gixa.
40011018	Gi rixanu runa Gwa. Gi wa nika. Gi wa rura. Wane chinna, ‘Kamchi waneylu.’
40011019	Nuna Gita Yineru Wgenno, nikachrino ga wa girachrino. Wane chinna, ‘Getanru. Satu jeji tsru nikalu. Winga kgirakleru. Gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune gipxaalu.’ “Wa gimatkalewlu potukalu gekakgitka kamrureya.”
40011020	Giyagni Geso yinuwaka chigetjeretna pokchikaka gajene. Wale chinanu chigetjetna gi rixanu wanna getanmaklu gixo potu ruyaklewle kamrujetyawaka. Ga wa retmakluna, gi waleko renshinikanutyana. Wane china chigetjeretyana,
40011021	“¡Gi waneni pixa Korasi pokchi! ¡Gi waneni pixa Wetsayta! Gi rixanu Tiro pokchiniya ga wa Sito pokchiniya wanepmaklu giyaklewlukaka nkamruyegityagi gixa, wannanimka muchikawako renshinikanutannimkana. Kawshistugalu mkachrimka rutakmanetinnimkawanna ga wa chichipagimka rutakmanetinnimkawana.
40011022	Ga wa wane nchingi, Tiro ga wa Sito pnute salewnalenapgi gixapni giklukanuwnalugognepa.
40011023	Ga wa pixa Kapernawo, tengognepotunanuko pixka putaaka. Ga wa gipnachine gwiyawakapotunanuko pixka putaako. Gi rixanu wa Sotoma gajene yegi kamrutikomka giyaklewlu pixa yegi kamrutikaluru, xanigognenanumka rutukna.
40011024	Ga wa wane nchingi wa gakotkalurupa Sotomachijne gajenniya gixa pnute wa giklukanuwnalgognepatka.”
40011025	Walegogne Geso wane china, “Numalwutyi, Nuru, tengogne Gitsrukate ga wa chiji, tyepirankaka Pixa yogimatyana kgimatkalerune ga wa kanshinikanurune, ga wa mturune pekakgita.
40011026	Gigi, Nuru, gi rixanu wane Pixa gigleretle getletlu.
40011027	“Ptowruko samyokno Nuru. Gikena gimatlu Gituru, seyni Girchipje gimatlu. Gikena gimatkoxlu Girchi, seyni Giturupje ga wa girukokta raluka gekakgireta Gituru.
40011028	“Ginanu Gita yegi, pejnurunekgi gama kamrurewletachingi, gitjitachingi. Gita gapnankakanutkagi.
40011029	Gikamrurewatinno. Gimatinno. Gi rixanu mayogotno Gita. Mturu gixnachriwano najiya. Ga wa gikshikanru gapnanunshinikanutinripa.
40011030	Gi rixanu myapretni gikamrurewatinipno. Ga wa nutjitanru munotni.”
40012001	Walegognekaka sana yapanata Geso gapnanutikalurugogne. Yimaklene nachi. Yinuwaka sustakagwuremtluna gitaklugwu. Nikluna.
40012002	Gwariseyone getanata. Wane chinruna, “Petanna. Gapnanutikalurugogneko ginanshichkalurni kamrutna pyimaklene.”
40012003	Wale wane chinna, “¿Gi ge getyongapiranyegitlu Tawi kamrutanru? Wa nachichini wale ga wa waleymalune koxa.
40012004	Gi rixpoko jiglokletlu Goyakalupji. Niklu jimaprokaka gekakgitkaluru. Walenwa ginanshichkaluru wale nikyaplu, ga wa waleymalune koxa. Sasertotenepje nikanruni.
40012005	¿Gi ge getyongatkoxlu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya wa gapnanutikalurgognekaka kpashiwakapji, sasertotene gimuteru pixka gixkaklu gapnanutikalurgogne? Gi wale chinanu ruklukanuwnanna.
40012006	Gita wane china, gewlu kpashiwakapji pnute tsru.
40012007	Gimka giklukanuwnayegjixanna muklukanuwnakane, gimatinmaka klunerni tyepirana: Naluklu getwamonrewlu. Gi wa genekashlu giylatkaluru naluka.
40012008	Gi rixanu gapnanutikalurugogne Gitsrukatno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno.”
40012009	Wane yiyatka. Wanna ginkaklewawaklepji yatka.
40012010	Waneru satu jeji giprigamyotachri. Repomgaluna. Wane chinruna, “¿Munanshichkotlege wa gapnanutikalurugogne pinitikolu?” Wane chinna gepomgaletluna jigyegityapluna.
40012011	Geso wane chinna, “¿Giru jeji wane gixa yegi, sato gowega waneyalutu? Walamka gijrukanu kapna gapnanutikalurgogneko. ¿Gi ge kashichanro ga wa koschekanro?
40012012	¿Gi ge kiglepotlu yineru gowega pnute? Giyagni munanschichkotni gapnanutikalurugogne kigleru kamruruya.”
40012013	Giyagni wane chinru jeji, “Pomyokanu.” Romyokatka. Ruglewamyotatka. Kigletkalu pasretako pixka.
40012014	Yatkana Gwariseyone. Jemanshinikankakyegitluna ruylatyapluna.
40012015	Rumatinitka Geso, wane yiyatka. Gixolune yine gomkagimtlu. Pejnuruneko rutuukaka.
40012016	Rujretna ma pogijetyapluna,
40012017	poyagkakikolupa tokanchi geneklewatachri chinyawaka Gisayiya. Wane china:
40012018	Getanru nupxakjeru Gita tsomitanru. Nushinikanru potu. Wale gigletanshinikanutno. Giwekikaluru Gitanu nutakanru payine yegi runkakletinri gitakyagoklewlupirana.
40012019	Gi wa yangalewatanu. Gi wa saplewjetanu. Gike yijnaktokanutanru gatnugapoya.
40012020	Wa katsluksu gischokachri gi wa sustonganu. Wa yochpiikalurchopa gimoliinatachri gi wa ruwakanu, koshpakinpotuklu giklukanuwnayegjixlu raalirewatinripa,
40012021	payine kagwaklewatinripa Wale giwakaya.
40012022	Giyagni Wale yegi raniika satu kamchichachri. Walenwa maygaletu, myanumatkatu. Rutuukaklu. Giyagni wa maygaletu myanumatkatu yanumsatatka, retatka.
40012023	Pejnuruneko gixolune giglajita. Wane chinna, “¿Gi ge Tawiklopishakni wa Tye?”
40012024	Wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinri, wane chinna, “Wa Tye gi wa maleka giknokna kamchine, seyni Welsewoyapje chinanu, wa kamchine gitsrukate.”
40012025	Geso gimatanshinikanutanna wanna. Wane chinna, “Pejnuruko pogirewatikowaka wa wane gajene kotspalanshinikankakmaka wannakakluko, giknookalurupni pogirewatikowaka. Pejnuruko pokchikaka ga wa panchikaka wa wane gajene kotspalanshinikankakmaka wannakakluko, gi rumkata gwagognereta.
40012026	Satanasyokaklukmaka maleka giknoklu Satanasyo, walenanuko kotspalkakanshinikanutinmakwa. Giyagni ¿gi rixpoko gwagogneretanu wale pogirewatyawaka?
40012027	Ga wa Gita Welsewo chinanumka maleka nuknokanna kamchine, gwugenene ¿katu chinanu maleka ruknokna? Giyagni gwugenenepni gixa gitakyagokachinepni.
40012028	Wa Giwekikaluru Goyakalunu chinanu Gita maleka giknokinna kamchine, galikakni gixyegitkalu Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.
40012029	“¿Gi rixpoko satu gimkata jiglokapjiretlu gichkolu, chowgutyaplu rejnunkate, ma mostutkanuwalu wa gichkolu? Waneklu chowgutyalu gipji gajeru.
40012030	“Gitasreta mwakatu, walenwa nkamnixjeru. Gitayma mapatjetkatu, kotspalewata.
40012031	Giyagni wane nchingi, pejnuruko mukochri ga wa mupashiregnuchi kaspuukalurupni yinyegiya. Seyni ginnakokta yine Giwekikaluru mupashichkane, gi wa kaspukikna.
40012032	Girukokta gapatno Gita Yineru Wgenno kaspukikalurupni. Seyni girukokta gapatlu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gi wa kaspukiko, gi wa tyegogneyako, gi wa ginachripgogneko.
40012033	“Waka gagmuna kigleru rixa ga wa giji koxa kiglejiru, waka mugletu rixa gagmuna, ga wa giji koxa muglejitu. Gi rixanu gijiya rumatika gagmuna.
40012034	Gimnu pixkalungi. ¿Gi gixpoko gimkata yanumsaletlu kigleru, muglenekgi gixini? Gi rixanu klunerutka yineru gaji tsepowniyachri, wale yanumatya ginamaya.
40012035	Kigleru yineru, raji ponikowle kigleru, kiglekakalu koshpakya. Mugletu yineru raji gixolewniyachri mugletu, mugletkaka koshpakya.
40012036	Ga wa wane nchingi, pejnuruko tokanchi yanumsashatinrina yine, rugyegitanruna giklukanuwnalgognepa.
40012037	Gi rixanu ptokanu chinanu muklukanuwnakaakotupyi, ga wa ptokanu chinanu koxa giklukanuwnayegjixkalurupyi.”
40012038	Giyagni pimrine yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone gigita. Wane chinna, “Yimaklewatachri, waluka getletlu pixa kamrutanru getkaluru.”
40012039	Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Gimuweekakgognenatachine muglene, kgimopataklerunni ragjitluna getkaluru, seyni getkaluru gi wa reneekona, seyni Gonasu tokanchi geneklewatachri getkalurutepje.
40012040	Gi rixanu tsro potu tsru wenu gajeronanwaka rawanata Gonasu mapgogne, mapyechno, waneko pixka nixanu Gita Yineru Wgenno. Mapgogne, mapyechno chiji gitokote nwanatanu.
40012041	Giklukanuwnalgognepa jejinni, Niniwe gajenni, yotunotanu nyi gimuweekakgognenatachineyma. Wannani giklukanuwnakakanna nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine. Gi rixanu wannani genshinikanuta Gonasu ginkaklewle chinanu. Ga wa xani gewru Gonasu pnuterutu.
40012042	Giklukanuwnalgognepa tyotunotanu tkachi kegnetesreta gajerni pogirewatachroni nyi gimuweekakgognenatachineyma. Tuklukanuwnakakanna, gi rixanu yoptukyawakchijiko tunya tyijnakotyaplu Salomo gimatkalewle. Ga wa getanru. Gewru Salomo pnuterutu.
40012043	“Kamchi puchotlewatachri yineru rushpakamtinika, pnumnu yapanatatka, popriwaakaka. Rujgalu rapnanutyawakapa. Gi wa rukshiklu.
40012044	Giyagni wane china, ‘Nsatokanutka nopji nuyakatyawaka.’ Wane rapokinitka rukshiklu malepjiru, saxritkaluru ga wa galpokotkaluru.
40012045	Giyagni wane ya. Waleyma ranikna pimrine payokgipre kamchine wale pnuterune muglene. Jiglokna. Wane rawna. Ralipretka gektutu giknogatkalu tye jeji muchinanu pnute. Waneko pixka rixanna nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine muglene.”
40012046	Gixolune yine runkaklewyeginatiniwa, runro ga wa repurune maleka tunwatachine, raluka giynumsaletluna.
40012047	Satu wane chinru, “Gewna punro ga wa pepurune, maleka tunwatachine. Raluka giynumsaletyina.”
40012048	Rugitlu wane chinjeru. Wane chinru, “¿Katni wa nunro? ¿Katni wa nepurune?”
40012049	Romyokyegitna yimaklene. Wane china, “Ga ga nyinwa nunro, ga wa nepurune.
40012050	Gi rixanu girukokta kamrutlu tengogne Gajeru Nuru gishinikanru, walenwa nepuru, ga wa nepuro, ga wa nunro.”
40013001	Walegogne panchi rushpakamtya Geso. Tsru wenuspuwnaga tuplata.
40013002	Rapatyegitluna gixolune yine. Kanawa ruptekatka. Wane tuplata. Ga wa pejnuruneko gixolune yine wanga gwa.
40013003	Gi gepikapirana runkakna yapkakluya. Wane china, “Wane rixa. Wa kgitaklewakleru gitaklewtapanu.
40013004	Kopalajitini pimriji gatnugapostsi gapokajita. Runna koshichine. Niklokajitluna.
40013005	Pimriji sotlu gwiyawaka gapokajita mwiyawakanu potu kajpa. Waneklumka rupchekni. Mpixnuwakapotni chiji.
40013006	Ga wa rushpakini tkachi jimanatkalu. Ma matskinu chinanu rupriganatka.
40013007	Pimriji kona yegi gapokajita. Tseruwna konkaka. Kapotanatkalu.
40013008	Pimriji kiglewaka chiji gapokajita. Wane jiwatya. Rawa satu satpachaji, satu patsrujirmoleji, satu mapmoleji.
40013009	Kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
40013010	Runyegitluna yimaklene. Wane chinruna, “¿Klu chinanu yapkaklu punkaklewyegityana?”
40013011	Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Gi rixanu wa gixa geneeka gimatyaplu giyogimanatkaluru tokanchi tengogne pogirewatyawakapirana, seyni wanna gi wa geneeka.
40013012	Wa waneyalutu wanepnute reneeka. Waneyamigjetu wane rixle konikona.
40013013	Giyagni yapkaklu nunkaklewyegityana, retinmakna ma metinitipna, yijnakotinmakna ma yijnakotinitipna, ma mumata jeminitipna.
40013014	Wane rixa poyagkakikolupa wannaya Gisayiya tokanchi geneklewatchri ginkakle. Wane china: Gijnakopna gyijnakotini, gi gimata jemanru. Getini getinmaka, gi gimatanru.
40013015	Gi rixanu shikowgajkaakana nyi yine. Ga wa gijnakopnayna kyapreru yijnakotyana. Ga wa rushyaygaletna ma giygalna metinitipna; gi wa gijnakopnayna yijnakotinripna; gi rajiyakna rumata jemyana; ma kashrijetikotupna, nma mutuukakyanupna.
40013016	“Seyni giglenshinikanyegitkalurni giygale gi rixanu geta, ga wa gijnakopna gi rixanu gyijnakota.
40013017	Gi rixanu galikaka wane nchingi, wa tsru galuklu rixmakluna gixo tokanchi geneklewatachine ga wa poyagkakachine. Raluka getletmakluna wa gixa getanru. Gi retluna. Raluka yijnakletmakluna wa gixa yijnakotanru. Gi wa yijnakotluna.
40013018	“Giyagni gjemanru gixa kgitaklewakleru yapkaklepirana.
40013019	Girukokta yijnakotlu tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana, ga wa gi rumata jemlu, runa mugletu. Kashichlu raji gitaakaluru. Walenwa gatnugapostsi gitaakaluru.
40013020	Ga wa sotlu gwiyawaka gitaakaluru, walenwa yijnakotlu tokanchi. Waneklu rumuwlepotuko yoptotlu.
40013021	Seyni gi katskiri. Pshinitsonu gwachripa. Wa runini salewakchi ga wa kojwawakchi tokanchi chinanu, waneklu rutspekaaka.
40013022	Ga wa kona gwiyawaka gitaakaluru wale yijnakotlu tokanchi. Wa kojwakanshinikanrukaka tyegogneya, ga wa ponikowlu yokwire kapotlu tokanchi. Gi wa jiwatanatka.
40013023	Wa kiglewaka chiji gitaakaluru walenwa yijnakotlu. Rumatjemlu tokanchi. Jiwata: satu, satupachaji; satu, patsrujiremoleji; satu, mapmoleji.”
40013024	Satu yapkaklu runkakyana. Wane chinna, “Tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa, kiglejiru gitakachri rusanate.
40013025	Seyni rumkakopshinna yine runa kamnixjeru. Rutkaplu triko pixkalutu kshana, triko ganikajite. Yatka.
40013026	Giyagni wa gitaakaluru gipchekinitka, kaji rixinitka, waneklu koxa rupgujewna triko pixkalutu kshana.
40013027	“Wayegrechine gapyegitlu kwangixleru. Wane chinruna, ‘Gitsrukaachi, ¿gi ge kiglejiru putaklu wa pusanate? Giyagni ¿ginaka ruyakatya triko pixkalutu kshana?’
40013028	“Wale wane chinna, ‘Satu jeji nkamnixjeru wane gixlu.’ “Ga wa wayegrechine wane chinruna, ‘Giyagni ¿gi ge paluklu wa woplipchetapyaplu?’
40013029	“Wale wane china, ‘Gike. Wa goplipchetinri gma moplityakoxaplu triko.
40013030	Getasha tseruwnaletanru gepiko, jirgakoklunpotunanuko. Jirgakoklunpatka, wane nchinanna wa jirgachinepa, “Muchinangapka goplitanru triko pixkalutu kshana. Gostuptajetanru yoxikikolpatka. Ga wa triko gapatjetanu. Rumretikowakapji gitakanru.” ’ ”
40013031	Satu yapkaklu runkakatnakna. Wane chinna, “Tengogne pogirewatyawaka mostasaji pixka rixa. Satu jeji ganiklo. Rusanate rutaklo.
40013032	Walenwa galikaka ptowruko kajiruji mtserujitu potu. Seyni wa tseruwninitka walenwa tsru potu kshana gitaakaluru pnute. Gagmuna pixka rixa. Giyagni teno yapachine koshichine gina. Waleplu shalewatna.”
40013033	Satu yapkaklu runkakatnakna: “Tengogne pogirewatyawaka gisekachri pixka rixa. Sato suxo gwalu. Gepmole masu yaglu trikopagi tyapjetlu, psoluko rusekinpotunanuko.”
40013034	Pejnuruko tyekaka yapkakluya Geso ginkakna yine. Wa yapkaklu migje gike runkakna,
40013035	wa poyagkakikolupa tokanchi geneklewatachri chinyawaka. Walenwa china: Nyanumatanu yapkakluya. Rekamrutkoklunuyakawa tye psolchijneko yogimanatkalurkaka nunkakletanu.
40013036	Giyagni rungatkana gixolune. Panchi yatka Geso. Yimaklene ginyegitlu. Wane chinruna, “Punkakpokowakatanwu wa sana gajeru triko pixkalutu kshana yapkaklupirana.”
40013037	Rugita Geso. Wane china, “Wa kiglejiru gitakachri walekno Gita Yineru Wgenno.
40013038	Sanni wa tye psolu chijiko. Ga wa kiglejirni wa pogirewatyawaka gajenni. Ga wa triko pixkalutu kshana walenwa muglene.
40013039	Ga wa kamnixjeru walenwa tsru kamchi, triko pixkalutu kshana gitakachri. Wa jirgalni walenwa ralipregognepa. Ga wa jirgachinepa wannanwa Goyakalutowrerune.
40013040	“Giyagni wa kshana triko pixkalutu wane rixa goplitkotanu. Yochpiikotanu. Wane rixanu ralipregognepatka:
40013041	Gita wa Yineru Wgenno nyokanatanna notowrene, pogirewatyawaka rapatinrina pejnuruko gitspetkalurkaka. Ginanshichkaluru kamrutachine koxa rapatanna.
40013042	Wanna xirnachri giknooko. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.
40013043	Giyagni poyagkakachine gatajiwnanu, tkachi pixka, Rurna pogirewatyawakaya. Kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa yijnakotanu.
40013044	“Tengogne pogirewatyawaka ponikowlu pixka rixa sana yogimatkaluru. Satu jeji rukshikinitkalu, yogimatatnaklu. Rumuwle chinanu rushankaplu pejnuruko wane rixle. Ragjitanru wale sana.
40013045	“Wanepnutetnaka tengogne pogirewatyawaka kmarnewakleru pixka rixa, kigle katajiroji perlaji gijgachri.
40013046	Rukshiklo sato kwenuro potu perlaji. Rushankaplu pejnuruko wane rixle. Ragjitatkalo.
40013047	“Wanepnutetnaka tengogne pogirewatyawaka tsru chalu pixka rixa. Tsru wenu ruknokgatka. Rawlo pnumnu gixachro shima.
40013048	Wa katsepo rixinitka chalu, wanga koshpatyatkalona. Tuplatna. Tsomitatkalona kiglero. Kojita rutakna. Ga wa gektuto shima maleka ruknokanatkalona.
40013049	Wane rixanu ralipregognepa. Rushpakamtanna Goyakalutowrerune. Konanna muglene poyagkakachinetskalaya.
40013050	Towrechine xirnachri giknokanunna. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.”
40013051	Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge gimata jemlu wa tye pejnurkakakopirana?” Rugitluna, “Gigi.”
40013052	Wale wane chinna, “Giyagni pejnuruko yonchikagapri ginkaakaluru tengogne pogirewatyawakaya, satu jeji pixka rixa kapjiru. Ponikolewle koshpakyalu gerotkaka ga wa kapokotkaka.”
40013053	Wane rixa. Rali ginkakletinitkalu tyekaka yapkaklu, wane yiyatka.
40013054	Gichijne yatka. Wanna ginkaklewawaklepji runkakjetyana. Wane rixa. Wanna giglajita. Wane chinna, “¿Ginaka rawyalu tye gimatkalewlu ga wa tye giyaklukaka?
40013055	¿Gi ge kyosokokleru wgenekni wa Tye? ¿Gi ge Mariya chinkalurokni wa runro? ¿Ga wa repurune Santiyako ga wa Gosi, ga wa Simo, ga wa Gota chinkalune?
40013056	¿Gi ge pejnuroneko repurone wixa yegi? ¿Giyagni ginaka pguta rukshikyalu pejnuruko tyekaka gimatkalewlu ga wa ruyaklewle?”
40013057	Wale pupjetyana. Seyni Geso wane china, “Maleshlu tokanchi geneklewatachri Goyakalunni mkagwakpiratkotu ga wa gichijnepjeya, gipjiya.”
40013058	Gi wa gixo giyaklu kamruta waneya ma malixlena chinanna.
40014001	Walegognekaka Girore pasreta girukotlewatyachri yijnakpogiwletlu Geso.
40014002	Wane chinna wayegrene, “Walenwa Gwa Katlewakleru. Gipnachinetskala yotunomtyatka. Giyagni kgiyaklewaklerni.”
40014003	-
40014005	Gi rixanu Gwa giykotlu Girore. Wane chinru, “Ginanchichkalurni pepuru gnunro pwayegitinripa.” Wale chinanu raluka giylaletmaklu. Seyni yine pika wale, gi rixanu tokanchi geneklewatachri kagwakyaluna. Giyagni Girore kashichjixatkalu Gwa. Rostujixlu. Yoshmakjetikowaka rutakjixatkalu Giroryana, Wilipi repuru gnunro, chinanu.
40014006	Meyiwlu kamrutka Girore poyagkakle walapute chinanu. Wanna ganikajite tansatya Giroryana nshicho.
40014007	Tmeyitlu Girore. Giyagni rupiratyalo Wale kawchinanu renekyaplo klunerukokta tagjityaplu.
40014008	Wa wala jigetkaluro tunroya. Wane china, “Penekanno gewiya satu kotajipi Gwa Katlewaklerujiwu.”
40014009	Giyagni wa pogirchi wamonuwata. Wa Wale kawchinanu chinre ga wa waleyma gwanatachine nikawakakwale renekjixatkalo.
40014010	Yokanrewatatka. Rustaknoojixatkalu Gwa yoshmakjetikowakaya.
40014011	Kotajipi ranikjiwutikatka. Makloji geneekatka. Tunro yegi taniklu.
40014012	Rapokna Gwani yimaklene. Ranikmanetatkaluna. Kapnatatkaluna. Runkakpatkaluna Geso.
40014013	Geso yijnakpiranyegitanatkalu, wane kanawa yiyatka. Yineru mwiyawakanu yatkana wanna mkoje. Wa gixolune jeminitka, pokchikaka ruyakatyatkana. Romkagitluna. Chiji yapamtna.
40014014	Ruptekinitka Geso, retna gixolune yine. Retwamonutna. Rutuukakna yayixachine.
40014015	Wa kayi rixinitka yimaklene gapyegitlu. Wane chinna, “Gewni yineru mwiyawakanu. Wa kayitkani. Giyagni pyokanatanna gixolune pokchikaka yinripna, ragjityapluna nikanrupna.”
40014016	Geso wane chinna, “Gi wa magatyana wane yinripna. Genekanna nikanrupna.”
40014017	Wane chinruna, “Maleshaywu gewi, seyni pamyo jimapropje ga wa gepi shima.”
40014018	Wale wane china, “Ganikyegitanno gewi.”
40014019	Peklomta gogo tuplajixatkana gixolune yine. Rawlu pamyo jimapro ga wa gepi shima. Teno yigata. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Jiknajrotlu. Renekna yimaklene. Ga wa yimaklene geneksatna gixolune yine.
40014020	Pejnuruneko nikatka. Jinanutkana. Koschekatkaluna gixetachri psojkaka, pamole gepi kojita katsepo.
40014021	Wa nikachine pamyo waragka jejine. Gi wa kyagna suxone. Gi wa mturuneko.
40014022	Waneklu kanawa ratskojixatkana yimaklene, wakanu kosekinripatkana, rungakopshinna yine.
40014023	Rali gingaletinitkana gixolune yine, magka kanika Walepje, ragjigognetinripa. Kayi rixinitka wane rawanatatka Walepje.
40014024	Ganikajgatkalo kanawa. Rutwatjekakanro gishpurga, gi rixanu kannipgyalu satkakanro.
40014025	Rumrereekastsitkani, Geso yayegitatkana. Tsru wenumta yapananumta.
40014026	Yimaklene getinri tsru wenumta yapananumtini, kojwakanshinikanutna. Wane chinna, “¡Pagixanutkani!” Piklena saplewatna.
40014027	Waneklu ruynumatatkana Geso. Wane chinna, “Kiglenshinikanupgi. Gitni. Gi wa mpikanu.”
40014028	Giyagni Petro gigitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, Pixa pixinipa ptomganno Pixa yegi nyinripa. Gonumta nyapamtanu.”
40014029	Wale wane china, “Punanu.” Kanawa ruptekamtya Petro. Gonumta yapamta, Geso yegi yinripa.
40014030	Retinitkalu gichkonnipgyalu, pikana. Yinuwaka gimxiklemtanatka. Saplewatana. Wane china, “Gitsrukaachi, pognetkakanno.”
40014031	Waneklu Geso gomyokyegitlu. Kashichlu. Wane chinru, “Psotsotaji galixachriyi. ¿Klu chinanu maponshinikanukletyi?”
40014032	Kanawa ruptekinitkana, rutukannipgyamtatka.
40014033	Giyagni kanawa gwanatachine yoptsojityegitluna. Wane chinna, “Galikakpotunanni Pixni wa Goyakalu Wgenyi.”
40014034	Koprugatinitkana, Genesarechijne rapokna.
40014035	Yine gimatatkalu wane gajene. Yokanrewatna psolusretako walesreta. Yayixachine pejnuruneko ranikyegitluna.
40014036	Ragjitluna gimkaluptostsipje kamrukinripna. Pejnuruneko kamrukjene wanna gitskalgatka.
40015001	Giyagni Gwariseyone, yonchikgapine Gerosale giyakatyachine gapyegitlu Geso. Wane chinruna,
40015002	“¿Klu chinanu pyimaklene giknoklu gitsrukaachinni giykole? Gi rixanu gi rerkamyotna wa jimapro nikinna.”
40015003	Wale gigitna. Wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu koxa gixa giknoklu Goyakalu yokanatanru giykole chinanu?
40015004	Gi rixanu Goyakalu wane china, ‘Pkagwakpiratanru puru, punro’ ga wa ‘Girukta kamakpirjetlu ruru, runro walepni gipnanuna.’
40015005	Ga wa gixa wane china, ‘Girukokta wane chinru ruru ga wa runro, “Nenekashle gixanupmaka Goyakalu nenekashatanutka, wa nenekashle gixa gipxakikolupmaka.”
40015006	Wane gixachri gi kagwakpiratanutkalu ruru, runro.’ Wane gixa giknoklejetlu Goyakalu yokanatanru gixa giykole chinanu.
40015007	Sanowashatachingi. Goyakalu tokanu kigle reneklewata Gisayiya gixapirana. Wane china:
40015008	Nyi yine gispuyna kagwakpiratnona seyni rajiyna wajra yanna Gitaya.
40015009	Magijeru yonogleyegitnona. Runkakletluna yokanrekakna yine wa Goyakalu tokanu pixkalutu.”
40015010	Tomgana gixolune yine. Wane chinna, “Gyijnakotanu. Gimata jemanu.
40015011	Gi wa ginama jiglokyachri puchotlu wa yineru. Seyni wa ginama gishpakyachri, walenwa puchotlu yineru.”
40015012	Giyagni yimaklene yayegitlu. Wane chinruna, “¿Gi ge pumata wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinri wa tye tokanchi jigekanuwatna?”
40015013	Seyni rugitna. Wane chinna, “Pejnuruko gitaakaluru ma mutakanutu Nuru tengogne Gajeru goplitkalurupni.
40015014	Getashatanna. Maygalenkakluko koseekakachinni. Wa maygaletu kosekinmaklu maygaletu kapna rumujruukakanna.”
40015015	Petro gigita. Wane china, “Punkakpokowakatanwu tye yapkaklu.”
40015016	Geso wane china, “¿Wane koxa gixge gixa mumatjemkangi?
40015017	¿Gi ge gimata jema wa pejnuruko ginama jiglokyachri, ginanwaka ya? Rushpaka gichkajetyawaka.
40015018	Seyni wa ginama gishpakyachri raji ruyakatya. Walenwa puchotlu yineru.
40015019	Gi rixanu yineru gaji rushpakya mugletu shinikanchi, giylalewlu, gimopatlewlu, gapoklewlu, chowguchkaka, gixasha gipgujtalewlu, mupashiregnuchi.
40015020	Tyekakni wa puchotlu wa yineru. Ga wa meromyogkatu nikini gi wa puchotlu yineru.”
40015021	Wane yiyatka Geso. Tirosreta ga wa Sitosreta yatka.
40015022	Wanero sato suxo Kanani gajero, walesreta giyakatyachro. Tsaplewjeta. Wane china, “¡Gitsrukaachi, Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanunno! Nshichni kamchichachropotuna.”
40015023	Seyni gi satu tokanchi rugityalo. Wa yimaklene yayegitlu. Ragjitluna. Wane chinruna, “Pyokanatanro, gi rixanu tsaplewjegajxigiyakatwu.”
40015024	Wale gigita. Wane china, “Gi wa nyokanatka, seyni wa gowegane chinanupje gamgachine Gisrayiliklopishane.”
40015025	Giyagni tapoka. Tyoptsojityegitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, pupxakanunno.”
40015026	Rugita Wale. Wane china, “Gi kigleru wa kashichikolupa yine wgenene nikanru, kewe wgenene ruknokyegitkomka.”
40015027	Wala wane china, “Gigi, Gitsrukaachi. Seyni wa kewene niklu rutsrukatna nikawakakwale gijrukyachripopeji.”
40015028	Giyagni Geso gigita. Wane chinro, “¡Suxo, tsruni palixle! Wane pixikolupa palukyawaka.” Wanekluyakawa tutukawgenetatka.
40015029	Wane yiyatka Geso. Kalile Wennespuwnaga yapa. Magka kanika. Wane tuplata.
40015030	Rapyegitluna gixolune yine. Wannaymana myankane, maygalene, myanumatkane, mastsine, ga wa pimrine gixo. Gesojixistsi rutaakana. Wale gituukakna.
40015031	Wane rixini ruglajitna gixolune yine, reta yanumletkana myanumatkane, ga wa mastsine kigletka, myankane yanatka, ga wa maygalene getatka. Rumalwutluna Gisrayiline Goyakalute.
40015032	Geso tomgana yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Netwamonutna gixolune yine, gi rixanu waneyatkana mapgogne Gitayma. Maleshayna nikanruna. Gi naluka yokanretna mniikane ma mujxipakgapotinitipna.”
40015033	Yimaklene wane chinru, “¿Ginaka gawinri wixa wane pejnu niikaluru yineru mwiyawakanuya, wunanutyapna wane pejnu gixolune yine?”
40015034	Geso wene china, “¿Gi pejnu jimapro waneygi?” Wanna wane china, “Payokgipre ga wa psotsotaji kopaji.”
40015035	Towutna wa gixolune yine tuplatinripna chiji.
40015036	Kashichatkalu payokgipre jimapro ga wa shima. Poyagnutlu. Jiknajrotlu. Renekna yimaklene, ga wa yimaklene geneksatna gixolune yine.
40015037	Pejnuruneko nikatka. Jinanutkana. Ga wa gixetachripsojkaka koshchekna payokgipre kojita katsepo.
40015038	Wane nikyachine gepkoxamkoje waragka jejine. Gi wa kyagna suxone, gi wa mturuneko.
40015039	Rungatkana gixolune yine. Kanawa ruptekatka. Maktalasreta yatka.
40016001	Gwariseyone gapyegitlu ga wa Sariseyone rumlukanutyapluna. Ragjitluna rekakgityapna getkaluru tengogne gajeru chinanu.
40016002	Seyni Wale gigitna. Wane chinna, “Wa kayi rixinitka, wane nchina gixa, ‘Kiglegogneru gi rixanu gasergogneru.’
40016003	Ga wa goyechnokawa, ‘Xawakni ginapni,’ nchina, ‘gi rixanu gasergogneru ga wa kwamongognetaa rixa.’ Sanowashatachingi. Gimata getgogneretlu tengogne ga wa ¿gi ge gimkata gimata getletlu gipapko gimaxiklechi?
40016004	Gimuweekakgognenatachine muglengi, kgimopatakleruneko gagjitlu getkaluru, seyni getkaluru gi wa rekakgitkona seyni Gonasu tokanchi geneklewatchri getikalurutepje.” Ruknokamtna. Yatka Geso.
40016005	Wakanu rapokinitkana yimaklene. Ramtaka ganikletluna jimapro.
40016006	Geso wane chinna, “Xako ggirukotinwa wa gisekachriya Gwariseyonenu ga wa Sariseyonenu.”
40016007	Wannananuko gishinikanuwata. Wane chinna, “Gi rixanu gi waniklu jimapro.”
40016008	Geso gimata. Wane china, “¿Klu chinanu gixnanuko gishinikanuwata wa jimapro gma manikiniti chinanu? Psotsotaaji galixachingi.
40016009	¿Gi ge gimata jemawa? ¿Gi ge gishiniikoxlu wa pamyo jimapro wa pamyo waragkane chinanu, ga wa gi pejnu kojita gkoschekyalu?
40016010	¿Gi ge gishiniikoxlu wa payokgipre jimpro wa gepkoxamkoje waragkane chinanu, ga wa gi pejnu kojita gkoschekyalu?
40016011	¿Gi gixge gi gimata jema gi wa jimapropiranni wane nchinyagi? Gimretinwa gisekachriya Gwariseyonenu ga wa Sariseyonenu.”
40016012	Giyagni rumata jemluna gi wane chinna wa gisekachriya jimapro chinanu rumretinwana, seyni wa Gwariseyone ginkaklewleya ga wa Sariseyonenu.
40016013	Susari Wiliponusreta yinitka, Geso gepomgana yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Wa yine ¿katu wane chinna wa Gita Yineru Wgenno nixinri?”
40016014	Wanna wane china, “Pimrine wane china, ‘Gwa Katlewakleru.’ Ga wa pimrine, ‘Giliya.’ Ga wa pimrine, ‘Geremiya.’ Waka satu tokanchi geneklewatachri kagwakyayina.”
40016015	Wale wane china, “Ga wa gixa, ¿katu wane chinno?”
40016016	Rugita Simo Petro. Wane china, “Pixni Kristoyi. Goyakalu giwekachri Wgenyi.”
40016017	Giyagni rugita Geso. Wane chinru, “Giglenshinikanyegitkaluryi Simo, Gonasu wgenyi, gi rixanu gi wa kamaneru, gi wa kagragalu gekakgityi, seyni wa Nuru tengogne Gajeru gekakgityi.
40016018	Seyni Gita koxa wane nchinyi, pixni Petroyi, ga wa tye tsru sotlu gogotemta nkamrutanru gapatjetikowaka Gitanu. Gi wa gipnachine gishyatikowaakaako gichkolu gapatjetachine pixka.
40016019	Pixa nenekanru kotpukapi tengogne pogirewatyawaka chinanu. Klunerukokta pixa gostutanru tyechijneya, tengogne koxa rostutiko. Klunerukokta pkaspuka tyechijneya, tengogne koxa kaspukiko.”
40016020	Giyagni rujretna yimaklene gikena ma munkakinitipna wa Kristo rixinri.
40016021	Wanekluyakawa Geso Kristo yinuwaka gekakgiretna yimaklene, rumkata Gerosale yaletinripa. Wane gixo salewninripa tsruneya, tsrukakalune sasertoteneya, ga wa yonchikgapineya; ruylatikolupa ga wa mapgogne rixinri yotunkakikolupa.
40016022	Petro ganiklu. Yinuwaka chigetjeretlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, kigle gwalepyi. Gike pixiniko wane pixanu.”
40016023	Giyagni Wale giprotakyegitlu. Wane chinru Petro, “Najxigi pyanutka, Satanasyo. Nutspekakjermakyi. Gi pushiniklu wa Goyakalupirana, seyni wa yinepirana galikaka.”
40016024	Giyagni Geso wane chinna yimaklene, “Katukokta galuka gwa gajxigletno raalixinwa walenanuko. Rawanro koroshishkitate. Romkagitanno.
40016025	Gi rixanu girukokta galuka gishatkapletlu ruwekinri, ruwekinri ramginina. Girukokta gamtakanru ruwekinri Gita chinanu, rukshikanru ruwekinri.
40016026	Gi rixanu ¿klu gaprini wa yineru psolu chijikmaka wane rixletanu, seyni ruwekinri ramginina? Ga wa ¿klu rupekotanru yineru ruwekinripa?
40016027	Gi rixanu nunanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno Nuru goyaknuyma, notowreruneyma. Waneklu satkaka rixpoko kamruretyawaka napnutinitkalu.
40016028	Galikaka wane nchingi, pimrine gewi gwachine gi getumganru gipnalu ma metkanuwalunachi Gita Yineru Wgenno ginachripatkano npogirewatyawakaya.”
40017001	Patsrujirgogne giknoginitka, Geso ganikna Petro ga wa Santiyako, ga wa repuru Gwa. Satu magka tenolu ranikna wannapje.
40017002	Wane wanna getanu satuko kogetkogatka. Yochiigojita tkachi pixka. Ga wa gimkalu klatpotlu pokamlalu pixka.
40017003	Moysisi ga wa Giliya gipgujewnayegitna ruynumsanatjene.
40017004	Rugita Petro. Wane chinru Geso, “Gitsrukaachi, kigleru gewi gawinri. Palukiniplu, wkamrutanru mapa gimajechri. Pixanupa satu, Moysisinupa satu, ga wa Giliyanupa satu.”
40017005	Wa yanumsanatiniwa, satu kyachgapererumko katajiru chikletyegitna. Waneylu satu tokanchi kyachgapererumkoya wane chinachri, “Tyenwa Noturu nushinikanru potu. Wale gigletanshinikanutno. Wale gyijnakotanu.”
40017006	Yijnakotinitkaluna yimaklene tye tokanchi, chiji rapokgojitna. Pikpotutna.
40017007	Geso yayegitna. Kamrukna. Wane chinna, “Gyotunotanutka. Gi wa mpikanu.”
40017008	Tunogitinitkana, gike retatkana. Gesopjetkani.
40017009	Wa magka yopikinitkana, rujretna Geso. Wane china, “Gi satuna ginkakanu wa getanruya nma yotunotkanuwa Gita Yineru Wgenno gipnachinetskalaya.”
40017010	Yimaklene gepomgalu. Wane chinruna, “¿Gi chinkoxna wa yonchikgapine wa Giliya gingapkatanu?”
40017011	Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Giliya galikakni rungapkatanu rugletyaplu ptowruko.
40017012	Seyni wane nchingi, Giliya ginpatka. Gi rumatluna. Seyni wane rixluna klunerukokta ralukyawakna. Waneko pixka rixannona Gita Yineru Wgenno. Wannaya nsalewnanu.”
40017013	Wa yimaklene gimata jematkalu wa Gwa Katlewaklerupirana runkakletinri.
40017014	Wa gixolune yegi rapokinitkana, runa satu jeji. Yoptsojityegitlu.
40017015	Wane china, “Gitsrukaachi, petwamonutanru noturni. Gi rixanu popukalerunni. Yayixachrinni. Gixo kata xirnachri yana. Gixo kata gonu yana.
40017016	Pyimaklenyegimka nanikniri. Gi rumkata gituukakletanruna.”
40017017	Rugita Geso. Wane china, “¡Ya nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine malixkane, mpotukane! ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta numwanutkagi? ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta nakotangi? Ganikyegitanno.”
40017018	Geso chigetjetlu kamchi. Rushpakamtatka kamchi waleya. Ga wa mturu gitukatka wanekluyakawa.
40017019	Giyagni yimaklene gapyegitlu Geso. Wannapje rixinrina, wane chinruna, “¿Klu chinanu wixa gi gimkata giknokletlu maleka?”
40017020	Geso wane chinna, “Gi rixanu psotsotaji galixa. Gi rixanu galikaka wane nchingi, waneygi gixkamka galixle mostasajipso pixka, wane nchinanru tye magka, ‘Wane pushpakinitka. Pnu pyanutka.’ Ga wa pnumka yanu. Gikenapmakni gma mumkatanutupmaka.
40017021	Wa tye pixkalutu gi gishpaka seyni gagjigognerupjeya ga wa gogajirewlupjeya.”
40017022	Kalile rapatanatinna, Geso wane chinna, “Samyookalurupno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno, yine kashichyapno.
40017023	Ruylatannona. Mapgogne rixinri nyotunkaako.” Wanna wamonuwnapotutanna.
40017024	Kapernawo rapokatkana. Girukotlewatachine gijgawenyegitachine ginyegitlu Petro. Wane chinruna, “¿Gyimakjeru gi ge wenutanru wa girukotlewatachine gijgawenre?”
40017025	Petro wane china, “Gigi.” Jiglokapjimtini, Geso gapka yanumata. Wane china, “¿Gi pixka getle pixlu Simo? Tyechijne pogirene, ¿katu yoptotyalona sroschi marnewlu girukotikolu chinanu, ga wa satkaka yineru chinanu? ¿Gimolenyegiyna waka pnu gajenyegiya?”
40017026	Petro wane china, “Pnu gajeneyegiya.” Geso wane chinru, “Giyagni gimolene gishpaka.
40017027	Seyni wma jigekyapna, tsru wenu pyanu. Pkowchontapanu. Wa muchinanu gapka pkosetanropa, wala shima pkoschekanu. Pkomchaknamatanro. Pukshikanro sroschiproji. Wala pwanu. Penekanna Gita chinanu ga wa pixa chinanu.”
40018001	Waneklu yimaklene gapyetitlu Geso. Wane chinna, “Giyagni ¿girni wa tsru potu wa tengogne pogirewatyawakaya?”
40018002	Tomgalu satu mturu. Wanna ganikajite rutaklu.
40018003	Wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, gma kashrijetkoklunupa, mturune pixka gma mixkanupa, gi gapokanuna tengogne pogirewatyawaka.
40018004	Giyagni girukokta mturu rixnawa tye mturu pixka, walepni wa tsrupotupa tengogne pogirewatyawakaya.
40018005	Girukta yoptotlu satu tye pixkalutu mturu Gita giwakaya, Gita yoptota.
40018006	“Girukokta gitspekaklu wa satu wa nyi mturune wa nalixjene Gita, kiglemkalu waleya rushriknojitikolupa wa tsru sotlu ginripiya, tsru wenu ruknokikolupa.
40018007	“¡Gi waneni tye psolchijne gajeneko gitspekaklu chinanu! Gi rixanu galikakni waneplu gitspekaklu, seyni ¡Gi waneni wale jeji wale chinanu runa gitspeeru!
40018008	Giyagni wa pumyo ga wa pujixi gitspeekakinipyi pustakanru. Puknokanru pixyegiya. Kigleyyi mastsi ga wa yokmatachriyi puwekinri pjiglokinripa wanepnute gepimyo pixini ga wa gepjixi pixini, puknookona xirnachri yegi gike rixini mnikawnakatu.
40018009	Wa puygale gitspeekakinipyi pkoshpakanru. Puknokanru pixyegiya. Kigleyyi wa puwekinri pjiglokinripa paygalepjeya wanepnute gepiygale pixini puknookona Gigena xirnachri.
40018010	“Xako gi geyikanru satu nyi mturune, gi rixanu wane nchingi Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene wanna chinanu psolgogneko retgojitluna Nuru tengogne Gajeru.
40018011	Gi rixanu nuna Gita Yineru Wgenno nognetkakapyaplu gamganatachri.
40018012	“¿Gi pixka getle gixlu gixa? Waneyapmkalu satu yineru satu pacha gowegane ga wa tamganmaka sato gowega, ¿gi ge magka ruknokamtna wa mturujmole mturuji gowegane, ga wa rujgaplo wa gamgachro?
40018013	Wa rukshikinro, galikaka wane nchingi rumuwpotuta wala chinanu, wa mturujmole mturuji mamgakane pnute.
40018014	Wane rixa. Giru tengogne Gajeru gi raluklu wa satu nyi mturune gamginri.
40018015	“Giyagni wa pumole mukochirewyegitinyi, pyayegitanru. Pekakgi giklukanuwnayegletanru gixapje gixini, pixa ga wa wale. Wa yijnakotinipyi, pukshikmoletatka.
40018016	Ma yijnakotkamkayi satumka ga wa gepimka panikanu pixayma, wa gepi getachine ga wa mapa pejnuruko tokanchi poyegitko.
40018017	Wa ma yijnakotkanupna wanna, punkakanna gapatjetachine. Ga wa gapatjetachine gi yijnakotanu waneklu mjemkatu pixka ga wa gijgawenutachri pixka pixa getletanru.
40018018	“Klunerukokta gixa gostutanru tyechijneya, tengogne koxa rostutiko. Klunerukokta gkaspuka tyechijneya, tengogne koxa kaspukiko.
40018019	“Galikakni wane nchinatnakgi, wa gepi gixa wanerutu nchinanshinikanutini tyechijneya, klunerukoktapirana gagjitini, Nuru tengogne Gajeru wane gixingi.
40018020	Gi rixanu ginakaktana gepi, mapa ngiwaka chinanu gapatachine, wanna ganikajitkoxno Gita.”
40018021	Giyagni Petro yayegitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, ¿gi pejnu kata mukochirewyegitanno nomole, ga wa gita kaspukinri? ¿Payokgipre katpotunanrege nkaspukinri?”
40018022	Geso wane chinru, “Gi wane nchinyi wa payokgipre katpotunanuko, seyni payokgipremole payokgipre.
40018023	“Giyagni tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa, pogirchi. Raluka giglepokletlu wayegreneyma riwishkatna.
40018024	Yinuwaka giglepokletlu riwishkatna. Wale yegi raniika satu riwishkatachri. Gixo potu waragkaproji riwishkatachri.
40018025	Maleshaylu wenutyaplu. Giyagni gitsrukaachi yokanatlu rushagkikolupa wale, ga wa ganunro, ga wa wugenene, ga wa pejnuruko wane rixle, wenutikolupa.
40018026	“Giyagni yoptsojityegitlu wayegrechri. Wane chinru, ‘Gitsrukaachi, ma pognanutupyi gitaya. Nwenutanyi pejnuruko.’
40018027	Giyagni gitsrukaachi getwamonutlu wayegrechri. Rushotatkalu. Kaspukyegitatkalu riwishkatyalu.
40018028	“Yatka wale wayegrechri. Rukshiklu satu waleyma wayegrechri, wale riwishkatjeru, satu pachaproji riwishkatachri. Kashiplajitanru. Kachinekanru. Wane chinru, ‘Pwenutanutkano wa priwishkatyano.’
40018029	“Giyagni wa rixje wayegrechri gijixistsi yoptsojityegitlu. Ragjitlu. Wane chinru, ‘Ma pognanutupyi gitaya. Nwenutanyi pejnuruko.’
40018030	“Maka wale gi galuklu. Seyni wane ya. Yoshmakikowaka rutaklu wenutinpotunanuklu riwishkatyalu.
40018031	Giyagni retinrina rixje wayegrechine, wamonuwnapotutna. Runkakapluna rutsrukatna pejnuruko wane gixkaluruya.
40018032	“Giyagni repuklu rutsrukate. Wane chinru, ‘Mugletu wayegrechriyi. Pejnuruko wa tye priwishkate nkaspukyegityi gi rixanu pagjitno.
40018033	¿Gi ge pumkatkoxlu pixa petwamonutyalu pixje wayegrechri, wa gita pixka wane nixa getwamonretyi pixa?’
40018034	“Rutsrukate gimtuwnayegitlu. Saletlewatachine yegi samyoklu wenutinpotunanuklu pejnuruko riwishkanatanru.
40018035	“Waneko pixka rixangi gixa Nuru tengogne Gajeru, gma kaspukiniplu satkaka gixa gajiya gimole mukochirewyegitingi.”
40019001	Wane rixa, rali ginkakletinitka Geso tye tokanchikaka, Kalile yiyatka. Gotesreta, Gorta wakanute yatka.
40019002	Romkagitluna gixolune yine. Wane rutuukakyana.
40019003	Rapyegitluna Gwariseyone. Rumlukanutanruna. Wane chinruna, “¿Munanshichkotlege wa yineru ruknokagnunrotini kluneru chinanukokta?”
40019004	Wale gigita. Wane china, “¿Gi ge getyongatlu wa kgiyaklewakleru, yinuwakyawakpotunanuko jeji, suxo kamrutna?
40019005	Wane china, ‘Giyagni jeji rutspalitinitkana ruru ga wa runro. Rupxaletanrotkani ganunro. Wa gepinanna pamanepje rixanutkana.’
40019006	Giyagni gi gepitkana, seyni pamanepjetkana. Giyagni wa Goyakalu gapatanru ma mutspalkakinitipa wa yineru.”
40019007	Wane chinruna, “¿Gi rixkoxge Moysisi yokanrewata kiruka geneekaluropa ma ganunrotyanpatkalo, ruknokyaplo?”
40019008	Wane chinna, “Wa nshiknu gaji chinanu Moysisi gichichgi giknokagnunrotinripa. Seyni wa yinuwakyawakpotunanuko gi wane rixa.
