40019009	Gita wane china, girukokta giknokagnunrota gapoklewlumigjeya, sato ganunrotinitnaka, rumopatlewatatka. Girukokta gnunrotlo giknookaluro rumopatlewatatka.”
40019010	Wane chinruna yimaklene, “Wane rixini jeji ganunro chinanu, gi wa kigleylu ganunrowatinri.”
40019011	Giyagni Wale wane chinna, “Gi wa pejnuruneko gimkata yoptoletlu tye tokanchi, seyni wannapje wa geneekalunepje.
40019012	Gi rixanu wanena mumkata gnunrowletkane runronanwakna rushpakinyakawna. Wanena mumkata gnunrowletkane wa yine wane gixkakanune. Wanena mganunrowashatkane tengogne pogirewatyawaka chinanu. Gimkata yoptoletachri yoptotanru.”
40019013	Giyagni Geso yegi raniikana mturune rutakamyogogotyapna, ga wa ragjigognetinripa. Ga wa yimaklene chigetjetna.
40019014	Ga wa Geso wane china, “Getashatanna mturune runyegitannona. Gi gimaletanna. Wa wanna pixkalune wannanni wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.”
40019015	Rutakamyogogotna. Wane yiyatka.
40019016	Wane rixa. Satu ginyegitlu. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri kigleru, ¿klu kigleru nkamrutanu nyoptotyaplu wa nuwekinri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa?”
40019017	Wane chinru, “¿Klu chinanu pepomgano kiglerupirana? Gi satuna waneru kigleru; satupjeru: Goyakalu. Wa paluka jiglokletinri giweklu, pkamrutanru yokanrukaka.”
40019018	Wane chinru, “¿Girni?” Geso wane chinru, “Gi puylalewatanu. Gi pumopatlewatanu. Gi pchowguwatanu. Gi maleshawaka pupgujtalewashatanu.
40019019	Pkagwakpiratanru puru, punro. Pushinikanru pumole pixananuko pixka.”
40019020	Wane chinru makluji, “Pejnuruko tyekaka nkamrutatka nmaklutinyakawa. ¿Kluneru wanepnute nmagatya?”
40019021	Wane chinru Geso, “Palukiniplu wa mmagatikatu pixinripa, pyanu. Pushankanru ptowruko wane pixle. Penekanna wa kwamonurune. Waneyapyi ponikowle tengogneyapa. Punanu. Pomkagitanno.”
40019022	Wale tokanchi yijnakotinitka, ralimta wamonuwatachri, wa waneyanru gixo wane rixle.
40019023	Giyagni Geso wane chinna yimaklene, “Galikaka wane nchingi, wa ponikolu kyaprepotlu tengogne pogirewatyawaka rapokinripa.
40019024	Wane nchinatnakgi, myapretmakni kameyo tsapujripna tjiglokinripa, wa ponikolu pnute jiglokyaplu Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.”
40019025	Wa yimaklene yijnakotinri, ruglajpotutna. Wane chinruna, “Giyagni ¿katni gimkata gognetkaakota?”
40019026	Yopukgatna Geso. Wane chinna, “Wa yineya mumkatkotni wa tye, seyni Goyakalu pejnuruko gimkata.”
40019027	Giyagni rugita Petro. Wane chinru, “Wixa giknokamtatkalu pejnuruko. Womkagitatkayi. Giyagni ¿klu waneyapwu?”
40019028	Geso wane chinna, “Galikaka wane nchina, wa ptowruko gerotewatinipa, wa noyaknu ntuplapijere ntuplatini Gita Yineru Wgenno, waneklu gixa koxa wa nomkagitjengi pamole gepi tuplapije, pguru tuplapijerkaka, ntuplatanu. Pamole gepinerune Gisrayiline gitakyagokanu gixa.
40019029	Pejnuruneko girukokta giknokamtatkalu panchi, yegwakane ga wa repurune, ga wa ruru, ga wa runro, ga wa ganunro, ga wa wugenene, ga wa gichijne Gita giwaka chinanu, yoptotanru satu pacha kata pnute. Wanepnute yoptotanru ruwekinri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu.
40019030	Seyni gixo muchichachine gapkatpotutanu. Gapkatpotutachine wannapni wa muchichachinepa.
40020001	“Gi rixanu wa tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu yineru pixka rixa, kwangixleru. Goyechnokawpotuko yayegitna rusanate rowashate kamrurewatachinepa, kamrurewjixyapna.
40020002	Rupiratyana wale ga wa kamrurewatachineyma pamoleprojipni pagogne. Yokanatatkana rusanate rowashate.
40020003	“Tenotkalu tkachi yatnaka. Retna pimrine giputu tunwanatachine, wa mkamrurewatkane.
40020004	Wale wane chinna, ‘Gajewa. Gixa koxa nusanate gyanu. Nenekangi poyagotyawaka.’
40020005	“Giyagni wanna wane ya. Tumananu kwanjixleru rumepe yaletatnaka. Ga wa kayinwaka koxa yatnaka. Waneko pixka rixatnaka.
40020006	Rumxiikastsi tkachi yatnaka. Rukshikna pimrine tunwanatachine, mkamrurewatkane. Wane chinna, ‘¿Klu chinanu gewi psolgogneko ntunwashgognenata?’
40020007	“Wane chinruna, ‘Gi rixanu gi satuna kamrurewjixwu.’ “Wane chinna, ‘Gajewa gixa koxa. Nusanate gyanu.’
40020008	“Wa kayi rixinitka kgisanateru wane chinru girukotlewjixanru, ‘Ptomganna kamrurewatachine. Pwenutanutkana kamrurna wenru. Gapkatatachine pyinuwaka wenutletanu, ga wa muchichachinpotunanuko.’
40020009	“Rapokna wa rumxiikastsitka tkachi yinuwaka kamruretachine. Pamoleproji satkaka yoptota.
40020010	Rapookoxna muchi kamrurewletachine. Kagwaka yoptoretluna wanna pnute. Ga wa wanna koxa satkaka pamoleproji yoptota.
40020011	Rawatkalona. Kegemgayegitluna wa kgisanateru.
40020012	Wane chinna, ‘Wa nyi gapkatatachine pshinitsonu kamrurewtapna. Ga wa wixako pixka pixna, wa gakota salewnalgognenatachinwu ga wa gemeru.’
40020013	“Wa wale gigita. Wane chinru satu wannate, ‘Nomole, gi wa mpoyagkaakotu nixyi. ¿Gi ge pupiratyano pamoleproji chinanu?
40020014	Ga ga pixanu pwanutka. Pyanutka. Naluka genekletkoxlu wa tye gapkatatachri pixako pixka.
40020015	¿Gi ge munanshichkotni wa nkamrutanru wa nalukyawaka gita wa gitanuya? ¿Waka ksotanuygalegolyi gi rixanu kiglerno gita?’
40020016	“Wane rixanna muchichachine. Wannapni gapkatatachinpatka. Ga wa gapkatatachine, wannapni wa muchichachinpatka. Gi rixanu gixolunni wa tomgakalune, ga wa gi gixpotna wa tsomitkalune.”
40020017	Gerosale kanikinpatka Geso, pamole gepi yimaklene kegnetetamnugapo ranikna. Wane chinna,
40020018	“Xani Gerosale wkanikanutka, ga wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyookalurpatkano tsrukakalune sasertotene yegi, ga wa yonchikgapine yegi. Ruklukanuwnayegjixannona nupninripa.
40020019	Payineko yegi samyokannona yenetyapnona, kochipjetyapnona, koroshishkita rutakyapnona. Seyni mapgogne chininri nyotunkaako.”
40020020	Giyagni tyayegitlu Sewereyo wgenene ginro twugeneneyma. Tyoptsojityegitlu. Pagixanu tagjitlu.
40020021	Wale wane chinro, “¿Klu paluka?” Wala wane chinru, “Wane pchinanu tuplatinripna nyi gepi nwugenene satu potuklesretate ga wa satu pkegnetesretate pogirewatyawakaya.”
40020022	Wane chinna Geso, “Gi gimata wa gixa gagjitanru. ¿Gimkatge giiretyalo wa girapistono wa Gita girinro? ¿Gimkatge gkatletikolu wa katlu wa Gita katikolu?” Wanna wane chinru, “Wumkatlu.”
40020023	Wane chinna, “Wa girapistono nurapre girini. Wa katlu wa Gita katikolu wale koxa gkatikolupa. Seyni wa tuplalu npotuklesretate, wa nkegnetesretate gi wa Gitanni nenekyaplu, ga wa wannanupni galpokyegitkalunepni Nuru chinanu.”
40020024	Wa pamole yijnakotinri, rumtuwnana wa gepi moletkakachine chinanu.
40020025	Geso tomgana. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimata wa tsrukakalune payineko yegi towutlewpotutna. Wanna gitsrukatene tsru gitaaka wanna chinanu.
40020026	Seyni gi wane gixkakanu, seyni girukokta galuka tsru gixletnachriwa gixyegkakluko walepni wa gipxakjerupa.
40020027	Girukokta gixyegkakluko galuka muchinanu gixletnawa, walepni gwayegrerupa.
40020028	Gita pixka wa Yineru Wgenno gi nuna nupxakikolupa, seyni nupxaklewatinripa, nenekyaplu nuwekinri nwenutyaplu ruspakinripna gixolune yine.”
40020029	Geriko yamtyatkana. Gixolune yine gomkagitlu.
40020030	Gepi maygalene gatnugapostsi tuplatachine, wa yijnakotinitkana wa Geso giknoginritka, wane china sapletna, “Gitsrukaachi, Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanunwu.”
40020031	Gixolune yine chigetjetna pochke rixinripna, seyni wanepnute saplewjetna, “Gitsrukaachi Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanunwu.”
40020032	Wa Geso tunwata. Tomgana maygalene. Wane chinna, “¿Klu galukatka wa nixyapgi?”
40020033	Wane chinruna, “Gitsrukachi, Wumrekgatinripa.”
40020034	Giyagni Geso getwamonutna. Kamrukaygaletna. Wanekluyakawa retatkana. Romkagitatkaluna.
40021001	Kayegikatkaluna Gerosale. Wetpage yana, Goliwa Magkateya. Giyagni Geso yokanatna gepi yimaklene.
40021002	Wale wane chinna, “Tujra pokchi wunaple gyanu. Wane gikshikinro mporo kwugenero tsatkaluro, twugeneyma. Gkoshpirokanro. Ganikyegitanno.
40021003	Girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘¿Klu chinanu gkoshpiroklo?’ Wane nchinanu, ‘Gitsrukaachi galukna. Waneklutka satkakjixanna mporone.’ ”
40021004	Ptowruko wa tye wane gixkalurni wa poyagkakikolupa wa tokanchi geneklewatachri chinyawaka. Wane china:
40021005	Wane pchinanro Gerosale, wa Siyo nshicho, Petanru Pogire punyegitjeru. Mayogotu, mporotji tuplatachri, ga wa mporo wgenetji. Walenwa prachi kgitjiklero wgene.
40021006	Ga wa yimaklene wane ya. Wa Geso china towutyawakpotukna rixna.
40021007	Rawpatkalona wa mporo ga wa twugene. Sapowakatjitatkalona gimkaluyma. Wanna gogo tuplamta.
40021008	Gixolune yine potu gikwekamkata gatnugapoya. Pimrine gistaklu gagmunasurkaka. Rukwekluna gatnugapo
40021009	Gixolune kosekamtachine ga wa kaptomtachine saplewjenanumta. Wane chinananumtna: “¡Wuya, Tawiklopisha! ¡Gimalwutkaluru ginachri Gitsrukaachi giwakaya! ¡Wuya tengognepotuya!”
40021010	Wa Gerosale rapokamtinitka, psolu pokchi gajeneko gimyeka. Wane chinna, “¿Katni wa tye?”
40021011	Ga wa gixolune wane china, “Tyenwa Geso, Nasare Kalilesreta giyakatyachri, tokanchi geneklewatachri.”
40021012	Geso jiglokamta kpashiwakapji Goyakalunu. Ruknokna pejnuruneko kgishanrewaklerunni gagjijetachinni kpashiwakapjiya. Yawnajkaklo kwalkaka gipekoserojiprojitachinni, motkoko gishanretachinni tuplapijere koxa.
40021013	Wane chinna, “Yonatkalurni: Wa nopji gagjigognewakapji chinkalurupni. Ga wa gixa wane gixatkalu gitawakapna kachowgurune gwiyawakapna.”
40021014	Giyagni kpashiwakapji runyegityaluna maygalene, ga wa myankane. Rutuukakna.
40021015	Tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yonchikgapine getlu giglajrukaka Wale kamrutanru. Ga wa mturune retna saplewjetachine kpashiwakapjiya, wane chinachine, “¡Wuya, Tawiklopisha!” Rumtuwnana.
40021016	Wane chinruna, “¿Gi ge pjemna wane chinyawakna?” Geso wane china, “Gigi. ¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu: Wa mturunenamaya ga wa gashichachinenamaya puglepotutlu gimalwuru?”
40021017	Ruknokamtna. Tsru pokchi ruyakatya. Wetaniya ya. Wane rawamta.
40021018	Goyechnokawpotuko tsru pokchi satokatka. Nachneru.
40021019	Retlo satopje gikera gatnugapostsi gwachro. Yayegitlo. Gike rukshikyalo. Tosurepjeni. Wane chinro, “Gi pagogneko kajpatkayi.” Wanekluyakawa tuprigamtanatka gikerni.
40021020	Yimaklene getlo. Ruglajitna. Wane chinna, “¡Ge! ¡Wanekluyakawa tuprigamtanatka gikerni!”
40021021	Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Galikakni wane nchingi, wa kalixlegi gixinipa, gi wa gnutanshinikanutini, gi wa tyepjeni wa gikerapirana wane gixanu, seyni koxa wa tye magka wane nchininiplu gixa, ‘Puxrikanu. Tsru wenu puknokinwa,’ wane rixanu.
40021022	Wa gagjigognetinipa pejnuruko girukokta gagjita galixinri, gyoptotanru.”
40021023	Wa kpashiwakapji yinitka, wa runkaklewanatini, rapyegitluna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yine tsrutene. Wane chinruna, “¿Katu gitakyi tyeya?”
40021024	Giyagni Geso gigitna. Wane chinna, “Gita koxa gepomgangi satu tokanchiya. Wa ginkakinipno Gita koxa ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.
40021025	Wa Gwa katlewle ¿ginaka giyakatyachrini? ¿Tengogne waka yinyegiyakla?” Giyagni wannananuko gishinikanuwata. Wane chinna, “Wane wchininipmaka: Tengogne giyakatyachrini, wane chinanunwu, ‘¿Klu chinanu koxa gi galixlu?’
40021026	Wa wane wchininipmaka: Yine yegi giyakatyachrini, gixolune yine wpikanuna. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko kagwaklu Gwa tokanchi geneklewatachri Goyakalunu rixinri.”
40021027	Rugitluna Geso. Wane chinruna, “Gi wumata.” Wale koxa wane chinna, “Gi Gitako ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.”
40021028	“Seyni ¿gi pixka getle gixlu gixa? Gepi wgenru satu jeji. Tsru gituru rapyegita. Wane chinru, ‘Wiwi, nusanate nowashate pyanu. Tyegogne wane pkamrurewatini.’
40021029	“Wale gigita. Wane china, ‘Gi jmerno.’ Seyni gowukshini renshinikanuta. Wane yatka.
40021030	“Gapkatatachri rapyegitatnaka. Waneko pixka chinatnaklu wale. Wale gigita. Wane china, ‘Gitapni, papa.’ Seyni gi wane ya.
40021031	“¿Giru wa nyi gepi ruru gishinikanru kamruta?” Wanna wane china, “Tsru gituru.” Geso wane chinna, “Galikakni wane nchingi wa gijgawenutachinni, kapoklewaklerone gixa pnute jiglokanna Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.
40021032	Gwa ginyegitgi poyagkaklewlugapoya. Gi wa galixlu. Ga wa gijgawenutachine ga wa kapoklewaklerone galixlu. Ga wa gixa getinri gi wa waneklu genshinikanuta wa galixyaplu.”
40021033	“Gyijnakotanru satu yapkaklu. Waneru satu jeji kgisanateru. Wale gitaklu sana gowasha. Pirijeretjetlo. Tapgatyawakapa jitota. Tenopjiru kamruta. Renekamtna sana girukotachine. Pnu yatka wajra.
40021034	Tjirgikolustsitka wayegrene yokanyegitna sana girukotachine yegi rawapyapluna sana gwiyachritka.
40021035	“Ga wa sana girukotachine kashichna wayegrene. Satu kochipjetna, ga wa satu ruylatna, ga wa satu sotlujetna.
40021036	Rumepe yokanretatnakna pimrine wayegrene muchichachine pnute. Waneko pixka rixkanna wannani.
40021037	Gapkatatachri potu gituru yokanyegitna. Wane china, ‘Kagwakpiratanruna noturu.’
40021038	Wa sana girukotachine retinitkaluna gituru, wane chinkakna wannakakluko, ‘Tyenwa yoptotachripa. Wuya. Wuylaganru. Waneyapwu wa yoptotanrupmaka.’
40021039	“Kashichanruna. Gowasha ruknokyanruna. Wane ruylatyanruna.
40021040	“Giyagni wa kgisanateru gininitka, ¿gi rixanutkana wa wanna sana girukotachine?”
40021041	Wane chinruna, “Wa gektune ruylapotutanna. Pimrine girukotachine renekamtanutnaklu sana. Wanna genekanru sana gwiyachritka topapko gapokinitka.”
40021042	Geso wane chinna, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu wa Tokanchi Yonatkaluruya? Wa sotlu myoptotkotu kamrupjitachineya Wale gitaaka yoptowaka gitsejita. Gitsrukaachi chinanu kamrutka wa tye. Rakaglajiygaletwu.
40021043	“Giyagni wane nchingi, wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka konkalurupni gixyegiya. Panerune reneeko wa pogirewatyawaka kamrure kamrutachinepa.
40021044	Katupnikta tye sotlu gitspetanuna rumlokpotutanuna, ramgapotutanuna. Ga wa tye sotlu gijrukgogotanrunapa ramgapotutanuna.”
40021045	Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinitkalu yapkaklukaka Wale chinyawaka, rumatluna wannapirana china yanumsaletinri.
40021046	Rujgaluna gi rixpoko kashretyapluna, seyni gixolune yine pikna, gi rixanu tokanchi geneklewatachri kagwakyaluna.
40022001	Rugita Geso. Yapkaklu runkakyatnakna. Wane china,
40022002	“Tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa pogirchi. Kashimyolu kamrutyalu gituru.
40022003	Wayegrene yokanata tomgiyapna chanixkalune kashimyolu yegi. Seyni gi raluka ginretna.
40022004	“Rumepe yokanretatnakna pimrine wayegrene. Wane china, ‘Ginkakapanna chanixkalune, “¡Getanru xani! Ralixatka nnijitu nwakate jejine ga wa nuxowaakakanune giylatkalunetka. Pejnuruko galpokotkalurutkani. Ginanu kashimyolu yegi.” ’
40022005	“Wanna gi jemlu, seyni ralimtna. Satu rusanate ya. Ga wa satu marnewjetyawaka ya.
40022006	Pimrine kashwayegretanruna wale wayegrene. Rektutetkanna ga wa ruylatkanna.
40022007	Ga wa pogirchi yijnakotinri wa tyepirana, jigekanuwata. Yokanatna solalotene. Ruylajixanna wa nyi kgiylalewaklerunni. Yochpikpokchitanna.
40022008	“Giyagni wane chinna wayegrene, ‘Wa kashimyolu galikaka galpokotkalurni, seyni wa chanixkalune gi wa rumuklunina.
40022009	Giyagni gajewa. Rutspalgapotyawaka gyanu. Nchanixanna ginnakokta gikshikanune, kashimyolu yegi yinripna.’
40022010	Yatkana wanna wayegrechine. Wa gatnugapkaka yana. Rapatjemtkana pejnuruneko rukshikanunna mugleneymananuko ga wa kiglerune. Ga wa kashimyolu yegi yomitna nachnewatachine.
40022011	“Jiglokamta pogirchi retyapna wa nachnewatachine. Wane retyalu satu jeji kashimyolu getachinemkalu mutaakatu.
40022012	Wane chinru, ‘Nomole, ¿gi pixpoko jigloklemta gewi wa kashimyolu getachrimkalu mutaakatyi?’ “Seyni wale pochke.
40022013	Giyagni pogirchi wane chinna wa kamrurewyegitjene, ‘Gostujixitanru, ga wa gostumyotanru. Maleka giknokaganru mapshagawaka.’ Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.
40022014	“Gi rixanu gi gepikna chanixkalune, ga wa gi gixna tsomitkalune.”
40022015	Giyagni wane yana Gwariseyone. Jemanshinikankakna wa kashtokanutyapluna.
40022016	Yimaklenna yokanyegitluna Giroreyoneyma. Wane chinna, “Yimaklewatachri, wumatyi Pixni mayrokletu. Galikaka potu punkaklewata Goyakalu gatnugapotepirana. Gike pkagwakpirata, gi rixanu gi putakyagokna jejine.
40022017	Giyagni punkakanwu. ¿Gi pixka getle pixlu Pixa? ¿Wa munanshichkotnige Goteyone genekyaplu wenrukaka wa Pogirchi Susa waka gike?”
40022018	Seyni Geso gimatlu wanna muglenu. Wane china, “Sanowashatachingi, ¿klu chinanu gimlukanutno?
40022019	Gekakgitanno wa sroschiproji Susa wenutikolupa.” Ranikyegitluna paproji.
40022020	Wane chinna Wale, “¿Katunni wa tye yaglu ga wa toyonga?”
40022021	Wane chinruna, “Susa yagluni ga wa Susa yongani.” Giyagni wane chinna, “Giyagni genekanru Susa Susanni, ga wa Goyakalu Goyakalunu.”
40022022	Yijnakotinitkaluna, ruglajitna. Kaspukamtatkaluna. Yatkana.
40022023	Walegogne rapyegitluna Sariseyone, wane chinachine maleshlu yotunrupa gipnachineya. Repomgaluna.
40022024	Wane chinna, “Yimaklewatachri, Moysisi wane china: Mwugenetniko gipninina satu, wa repuru gwanro wale gnunronanni, ruxolewnakakinripa giklopishapa yegwakluni chinanupa.
40022025	Wixa yegi wanena payokgiprerune moletkakachine. Muchinanu tsru gnunrowata. Waleni gipnanuna muknokawgenetkatniko. Repuru gwatnaklo.
40022026	Waneko pixka rixana gapkatatachrini, ga wa mapa rixinrini, ga wa payokgiprepotunanniko.
40022027	Pejnurunniko gipnanatka. Tapkata gipukatanatka suxni.
40022028	Giyagni wa yotunruklupa ¿giru gnunropni wa payokgiprenni gnunronanni? Gi rixanu pejnurunenniko gnunronanni.”
40022029	Giyagni rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Gixa pupjeta gi rixanu gi gimatlu wa tokanchi yonatkaluru gi wa Goyakalu giyaklewleko.
40022030	Gi rixanu yotunruklupa gi wa jejineko gnunrowatanu. Gi wa suxoneko gnuruwatanu, seyni tengogne gajene Goyakalutowrerune pixka rixanutkana.
40022031	Wa yotunotachinepa gipnachinepirana, ¿gi ge getyongatlu wa tokanchi Goyakalu chinyawakgi?
40022032	‘Gitni wa Gawra Goyakalute, Gisaka koxa Goyakalute, ga wa Gakowo koxa Goyakalute.’ Gi wa gipnachine Goyakalutni, seyni giwekachine Goyakalute.”
40022033	Wa yijnakotinitkaluna gixolune yine, ruglajitna wa runkakyana.
40022034	Giyagni wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinri Wale kochrokna Sariseyone, rapatjetna wanna mkoje.
40022035	Satu wannanyi yonchikgapine gepomgalu. Rumlukanutyaplu, repomgalu. Wane chinru,
40022036	“Yimaklewatachri, ¿girni wa tsru potu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi pejnuruko pnute?”
40022037	Rugitlu. Wane chinru, “Pushinikanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute psolpotuyako pajiya, psolpotuyako punshinikanuya, psolpotuyako pushinikanutletanruya.
40022038	Tyenwa tsru potu ga wa muchinanu yokanru.
40022039	Ga wa gepi chininri tye pixka rixa: Pushinikanru pumole pixnanuko pixka.
40022040	Wa tye gepi yokanru chinanni pejnuruko Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachine chinyawaka.”
40022041	Rapatanatinna Gwariseyone, Geso gepomganna.
40022042	Wane chinna, “¿Gi nchina gixa wa Kristoya? ¿Katuklopishni?” Wane chinruna, “Tawinu.”
40022043	Wane chinna Wale, “Giyagni ¿gi rixa Tawi wa Giwekikaluruya wane chinru Gitsrukaachi? Wane china:
40022044	Gitsrukaachi wane chinru Nutsrukate, ‘Ptuplatanu npotuklesretate, wa nutakinpotukna Pixa kamnixjene pujixipta rapukote.’
40022045	Giyagni waleko Tawi wane chininri Gitsrukaachi, ¿gi rixpokotyawaka giklopishayapni?”
40022046	Gi satuna gimkata gigletokanutlu. Walegognekakayakawa gi satuna tserpiranawata gepomgaletlu wanepnute.
40023001	Giyagni gixolune yine yanumyegita Geso, ga wa yimaklene koxa.
40023002	Wane chinna, “Moysisi tuplapijere tuplatna yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone.
40023003	Giyagni pejnuruko chinyawakgina gkamrutyaplu, wale gkamrutanu. Seyni gi wa kamrutyawakna gkamrutanu gixa. Gi rixanu wane chinna, seyni gi wane rixa kamruretluna.
40023004	Gi rixanu rumlutluna ginolu, kyapre ganikolu. Wale rutjikaakana yine. Seyni wannako gi wa gimyojiyakna raluka komyekletyaluna.
40023005	“Ga wa pejnuruko kamrurna wane rixna wa retikolupa yineya. Gi rixanu tserutamtapotutlona yoptoyegitjerna yonchimta. Tserutluna gimkaluptostsimta gwachri.
40023006	Ralukluna tsrukakalune tuplapijere meyiwluya, ga wa tsrune tuplapijere ginkaklewawakapji gajerkaka.
40023007	Ralukluna giputuya ralukikolna, ga wa yine wane chinyapna, ‘Rawii, Rawii.’
40023008	“Ga wa gixa gi wa ‘Rawi’ nchinko, gi rixanu satupjeru gyimakjeru wa Kristo ga wa pejnurunekgi gixa moletkakachingi.
40023009	Gi satuna gixa ‘nuru’ nchinanu tye chijiya, gi rixanu satupjeru Giru tengogne Gajeru.
40023010	Gi wa kgiykolewaklerune nchinko gi rixanu satupjeru giykotjeru. Walenwa Kristo.
40023011	Wa tsru potu gixa yegi gajeru, gipxakjerupni wale.
40023012	Gi rixanu girukokta tsru potu gixnawa, walepni wa mturupotupa. Girukokta walenanuko mturu potu gixnawa walepni wa tsru gitaako.
40023013	“¡Gi waneni gixa yonchikgapingi, ga wa gixa Gwariseyone, sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu gixni wa gishyatlu wa tengogne pogirewatyawaka yinyegiya. Gi rixanu gi wa gixako jigloka. Gi koxa gichi jiglookakletna jiglokachinmaka.
40023014	¡Gi waneni yonchikgapingi, ga wa gixa Gwariseyone sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu gkonapjijetanna gipnagnurutachronni. Gixashleya gogagjirgognerkakgi. Giyagni giklukanuwnapotutanuna.
40023015	“¡Gi waneni yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyone, sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu tsru wenu ga wa popriwaka chiji gyotaljeta gixa, satupje Goteyo gitaknachriwa gixkakyapa. Ga wa wane rixkoklunu, wane gixkaklu Gigena xirnachri gajeru pixkalutu gixa pnute gepi kata rixanu.
40023016	“¡Gi waneni gixa! Maygalenekgi kosekachingi. Wane chinachingi, ‘Girukokta wa kpashiwakpotugruko kawchinanu koschekachri, gike rixa. Seyni girukokta wa kpashiwaka potu gajero kori kawchinanu koschekachri walenwa giklukanuwnachrini.’
40023017	¡Seprolokachingi ga wa maygalengi! Gi rixanu ¿girni wa tsrupotu? ¿Waka kori waka kpashiwaka potu wa kori kpashiri rixikowaka?
40023018	Ga wa, Girukokta gima wa genekashlu yochpikjetikowakakwa kawchinanu koschekachri, gike rixa. Seyni gima girukokta wale gogo gwachri genekashlu kawchinanu koschekachri, walenwa giklukanuwnachrini.
40023019	Maygalengi, ¿girni wa tsru potu: genekashlu waka yochpikjetikowakakwa wa genekashlu kpashiri rixikowaka?
40023020	Wa yochpikjetikowakakwa kawchinanu koschekachri, gikwa kawchinanu koscheka ga wa waleymananuko pejnuruko walekwa gwachri kawchinanu.
40023021	Kpashiwakapji kawchinanu koschekachri, walepji kawchinanu koscheka ga wa walepji Gwachri kawchinanu.
40023022	Tengogne kawchinanu koschekachri, Goyakalu tuplapijere kawchinanu koscheka ga wa wale gogo Tuplatachri kawchinanu.
40023023	“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Gi rixanu pamolete gwenutyalu pgamlusureru, ga wa ganisiji, ga wa kominoji, ga wa gkaspuklu wa tsru potu yokanru Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi chinyawaka. Walenwa poyagkaklewlu, getwamonrewlu, ga wa galixlewlu. Tyekaka gimkata kamrureta. Gi wa pimri koxa gkaspuka kamruretanu.
40023024	¡Maygalenekgi kosekachingi! ¡Yosla gixirikachine pixkagi gixa, ga wa kameyo gnikloka!
40023025	“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi, Gwariseyongi! Sanowashatachingi. Gi rixanu mpowratlu kolpeto rogote ga wa kajpapago rogote, seyni gitokoya katsepoylu chowguchi ga wa makotnachinwa.
40023026	Gwariseyo maygaletyi, muchinanu gapka powratanru kolpeto gitokote ga wa kajpapago gitokote, wa rogo gajeru koxa powra rixinripa.
40023027	“¡Gi wanengi gixa yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Sanowashatachingi. Gi rixanu wane pixka gixachingi, yomlechkaka galatawnachri. Maleka galikaka retika kiglepotlu. Ga wa gitoko katseplu gipnachrigapu ga wa pejnuruko kapcholu.
40023028	Waneko pixka gixa gixa koxa. Maleka galikaka yine getyawakgi poyagkakachinepgutgi. Seyni wa gitokoteya katsepoygi nsanowashle ga wa gmukochire.
40023029	“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Sanowachatachingi. Gi rixanu gixa kamrutlu wa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni kapnatikowaka. Gigletlu poyagkakachinni yomle.
40023030	Wane chinachingi, ‘Wutsrukatenniklu gawkamka koxa wixa, gi wa wupxakmakna Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatchinni giylatikolu.’
40023031	Wane gixa gipgujtaletnawa wa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni giylatachineklopishangi.
40023032	Gixa koxa poyagkakanru gitsrukatenni yaglu.
40023033	“¡Gimnu pixkalungi! ¿Gi gixpoko gasukletinri Gigena xirnachri giklukanuwnayegjixikolupa?
40023034	Giyagni Gita yokanyegitgi Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine, ga wa kgimatkalerune, ga wa yonchikgapine. Pimrine wanna giylatanu gixa. Koroshishkita gitakanna. Pimrine wanna gkochipjetanu ginkaklewawaklepjiya. Papokchimnunanuka gkojwakinna.
40023035	Wa gixa giklukanuwninripa pejnuruneko poyagkakachinegraga, chiji gipkaakalurugraga, wa Gawili poyagkakachrigragakluyakawa Sakariygragaklupotunanuko, Warachi wgene, wa gixa giylatanruna kpashiwakpotugruko ga wa yochpikikowakakwa ganikajiteswa.
40023036	Galikaka wane nchingi, wa nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine giklukanuwna pejnuruko tyekakaya.
40023037	“¡Gerosale, Gerosale! Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni giylatachriyi. Ga wa pyokanyegitikolunni sotlujetachriyi. ¡Gi pejnu katananukta naluka gapatjewgenretyi, gaxawripa pixka tapatjewgeneta! Tomejimpuko tutakna. Ga wa pixa Gesosale gajengi gi galuklu.
40023038	Gwiyawakapjikaka giknokamtanuna gixapni.
40023039	Gi rixanu wane nchingi, xaniyakawa gi getanutkanno wa gixa wane chininpotunanuko: Giglenshinikanyegitkalurni Gitsrukaachi giwaka ginyachri.”
40024001	Kpashiwakapji rushpakamtya Geso. Yatka. Rapyegitluna yimaklene, rekakgityapluna kpashiwakapjikaka.
40024002	Geso wane chinna. “¿Getluge tyekaka? Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa rutukanuna sotlu rogotkakinripa, gi wa mujroleekatunpakni.”
40024003	Goliwa Magkate tuplata. Yayegitluna yinaklene wanna mkoje. Wane chinruna, “Punkakanwu. ¿Giklupni wa tyekakapa? ¿Klu getkaluru wanepa wa puninipa ga wa yoptukgognetyawakapa?”
40024004	Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Xako gi satunako yokwitangi.
40024005	Gi rixanu gixo ginanu ngiwakaya. Wane chinachinepa, ‘Gitni wa Kristo.’ Gixopni yokwitanna.
40024006	Gyijnakotanutkalu giylalupirana ga wa pogiwlesha giylalupirana. Gi gkegeknanuwatanu. Rumkata wane gixleta, seyni gi wa yoptukyawakapnichi.
40024007	Gi rixanu yotunyegkakanna pachijne gajene pachijne gajene yegi ruylakakinripna. Ga wa pogirewatyawaka gajene yotunyegkakanna pogirewatyawaka gajene. Waneplu nachlukaka ga wa giyolikchijrukaka pachijnemnunanukaya.
40024008	Tyekakapni pejnuruko muchichachripa wa kachinolkakapa.
40024009	“Wanepnute gixapni samyokalunenapgi nsaletikolupa ga wa giylatikolupa. Ga wa gayegixko payinemnunanukoya Gita giwaka chinanu.
40024010	Giyagni gixopni gitspekaakona. Samyookakanna. Rayegixkakanna.
40024011	Rupgujewnanna wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Yokwitanunna gixoni.
40024012	Mukochri gixolewnakalu chinanupa, gixopni masata galuklewletannatka.
40024013	Seyni wa kashnantakanshinikanutachripa yoptukyawakapotunanuko wale gognetkaako.
40024014	Muchinanu ptowruneko payinerumnunanuka runkakikolupna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana. Waneklupatkani yoptukyawakapa.
40024015	“Giyagni getinpatkalu gagnanutkaluru gimtuklewatachri potu, Ntanyili, Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri chinyawaka, kpashiwakapji rawanatini,
40024016	(Wa getyongatachripa gimata jemanru), waneklu Gote gwachinepni gasukanuna. Magkakaka yanna.
40024017	Panchi gogoshrichi gwanatachripa gi gijrukanuna ranikyaplu gipji gajeru.
40024018	Wa sana gwachri gi wa satkapanu rawapyaplu gimkalu.
40024019	¡Gi waneni wa kamshironepni wa gashichakachinepni wale gognekakpatka!
40024020	Gagjigognetanu gi waneyapgi ginapuklu gasuktalu, gi wa gapnanutikalurgogneko.
40024021	Gi rixanu wanepatkalu tsru salewakchi wa mwajejetkatu reyinuwakletinitkalu tye psolchijneko ga wa xanigognenanu salewakchi. Gi wane rixanu.
40024022	Wa Gitsrukaachi ma sustakanmaklu walegognekaka gi pamanenupnikmaka gishatkapkona, seyni tsomitkalune chinanu sustaklu walegognekaka.
40024023	Giyagni satu wane chininipgi, ‘Gewru Kristo,’ ga wa wane chininipgi, ‘Ga ga waneru,’ gi wa galixanu.
40024024	Gi rixanu rupgujewnanna wale migje Kristone, ga wa wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Kamrutanruna tsru getkalurkakapa ga wa koglajrukakapa yokwitikolupmakna tsomitkalune wa rumkatmaka wane gixleta.
40024025	Xani nunkakatkagi ma mapookanuwa.
40024026	“Giygani girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘Wane rawa, yineru mwiyawakanumka,’ Gi wane gyanu. Ga wa ‘Gitokogruko rawa,’ gi galixanru.
40024027	Gi rixanu, wa rawrakle pixka rixanu, tkachi gishpatyawakasreta rawrakini pixka ga wa rumxityawakasretpotunanuko pokamlata, wane pixka nixa ginretanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno nuninipa.
40024028	Gi rixanu ginakakokta rawmanetanu gipnachri, wane rapatjetinna klatatalune.
40024029	“Wa ruknoginitka tyegogne gajeru salewakchi, waneklu: Ruchpokanu tkachi. Ga wa ksuru gi wa pokamlatanu. Ga wa tengogne tujirotini katagirkaka. Wa gichkolkaka tengogne gajeru kowshiwshitko
40024030	“Wanepnute tengogne rupgujewninitka Gita Yineru Wgenno yigapkakle. Giyagni kegeknanuwatanna payinerumnunanuko tye psolchijne gajeruko. Retinpatkanona Gita Yineru Wgenno ginachripatkano. Tengogne gajeru kyachgapererumko numunanu. Tsru nuyakle, tsru noyaknu numunanu.
40024031	Nyokanatanna notowrene. Tsro pogimnupotuplo kowgimayma nyokanatanna. Wanna gapatjetanna ntsomitanune gepkoxamkojesretayako, yoptukyawakapotunanuko tengogne ga wa pasreta yoptukyawakpotunanuko.
40024032	“Gimatanru yapkaklu gikerapiranaya. Wa tyosnuygalejiplutinitka, tupcheksuretinpatka, gimatanutkalu wa walapustsitkani.
40024033	Waneko pixka gixanu gigognepirana. Getinpatkalu wane gixlutkani tyekaka, gimatanutkalu gi gowukpatkalu. Gipgyaptostsitkalu.
40024034	Galikaka wane nchingi, gi ruknoganu tye gimuweekakgognenatachinesha wa ptowruko tyekaka ma mixkanuwa.
40024035	Wa tengogne ga wa chiji giknoganu, seyni wa ntokanu gi giknoganu.
40024036	“Seyni walegogne, wale gipapko, gike gimata, gi wa Goyakalu towreruneko tengogne gajene, gi wa Gituruko, ga wa Girchipje galikaka gimata.
40024037	Gi rixanu Nowgogneklu pixka nixa gapokletanu Gita Yineru Wgenno.
40024038	Gi rixanu wa gonnewlu ma mapookanuwagognekaka wane rixa nikletna, rurna, ganunrowatna, ga wa ganuruwatna wa Nowe jiglokingognepotunanuklo pumlekwa.
40024039	Gi rumatna rapokinipotunanuko gonnewlu ga wa ranikanna pejnurunniko. Wane pixka rixanu napokinipa Gita Yineru Wgenno.
40024040	Giyagni gepi jejine sana gwanatanu. Satu ganiika ga wa satupni giknokamtkona.
40024041	Gepi suxone ginripagita satu ginripiya. Sato ganiika. Satopni giknokamtkona.
40024042	“Giyagni gixa giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimata girugogne runanu Gitsrukate.
40024043	Ga wa gimatanru wa tye. Wa kwangixlerupji gimatkamka girpapko runinripa kachowguru, ruyokanmaka. Gi retashatanmaklu kotamgiyaplu gipji.
40024044	Giyagni galpokotinwa gixa koxa, gi rixanu gi gimata gixa girpapko nunanu Gita Yineru Wgenno.
40024045	“Giyagni ¿girupni wa wayegrechri gaponshinikanutkaluru ga wa kshinikanuru? Wale rutakamta rutsrukate gipji gajene chinanu, wale geneka nikletyapna nikjetinnapapko.
40024046	Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru wale wayegrechri wa runini rutsrukate rukshikyaplu wane gixanatachri.
40024047	Galikaka wane nchingi pejnuruko wane rixle chinanu rutakanru.
40024048	Ga wa gektutu wayegrechri wane chinanutka rajiya, ‘Ramga ginreta Nutsrukate,’
40024049	Yinuwaka giylakletletna ruwayegretkone. Nika, ga wa rura gimetachineyma.
40024050	Wale wayegrechri gitsrukate ginanu. Ma kagwakgognetinitgogne, runanu. Ma mumatinpapko runanu.
40024051	Kochipjepotutanru. Sanowashatachineyma rutakanru walenupa. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.
40025001	“Giyagni tengogne pogirewatyawaka pamole maklojine pixka rixanu. Wanna koscheklo yochpiikalurkaka wannanuko. Rushpakamtna yoptotapyapatkaluna gnunrowatachripa.
40025002	Pamyona manshinikanurone, ga wa pamyo koxa kanshinikanurone.
40025003	Giyagni wa manshinikanurone koscheklo yochpikjetanrona, seyni gi ranikluna ringi.
40025004	Seyni wa kanshinikanurone ganiklu ringi pastonoya yochpikjetkaluroyma.
40025005	Ramganatinikopshini gnunrowatachripa ruxapnewanatna, rutnonatna pejnuroneko. Rumkanatna.
40025006	“Ganikajyechno jemka saplechi wane chinachri, ‘¡Tyepatkani! Gnunrowatachripatkani. Gishpakanu. Gyoptotapanru.’
40025007	“Giyagni pejnuroneko maklojine yotunota. Ruglepokotlona yochpikjetanrona.
40025008	Giyagni manshinikanurone wane chinna kanshinikanurone, ‘Psoji genekanunwu gringite. Wa wyochpikjetanro giwniyanatkawu.’
40025009	“Seyni wa kanshinikanurone gigitna. Wane chinna, ‘Gike. Gi getko poyagotanu wixa chinanupa ga wa gixa chinanu koxa. Seyni gagjitapangonuklu gixanupa wa ragjijetikowakaya.’
40025010	“Ragjitapakopshinruna rapokatka gnunrowatachripa. Ga wa galpokonatachinetka jiglokamtatkaluna kashimyolu yegi. Rushyatkatka gipgyapto.
40025011	“Gowukshini pimrone gina maklojine. Wane chinna, ‘Gitsrukaachi, gitsrukaachi, pkotpukyegitanunwu.’
40025012	“Rugita wale. Wane china, ‘Galikaka wane nchingi, gi numatgi.’
40025013	“Giyagni giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimatlu gigogne, gi wa gipapkoko.
40025014	“Gi rixanu tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa wajra yachri. Tomgana wayegrene. Renekamtna wane rixle.
40025015	Satu reneka satu pacha waragkaproji, ga wa satu gepkoxamkojemole waragkaproji, ga wa satu gepmole waragkaproji. Satkaka rumkatyawaka renekna. Wajra yatka.
40025016	Wa satu pacha waragka yoptotachri ralimta. Marnewatatka. Walaya satu pacha waragkatnaka yoptotatnaka.
40025017	Waneko pixka rixa wa gepkoxamkojemole waragkaproji waneyalutu. Gepkoxamkojmole waragkatnaka yoptotatnaka.
40025018	Ga wa gepmole waragkaproji yoptotachri ralimta. Jitotlu chiji. Yogimatatkalo rutsrukate serojiprojite.
40025019	“Gowukshini potu runa wanna wayegrechine gitsrukate. Ruglepokotluna kwentatna.
40025020	Rapoka satu pacha waragkaproji yoptotachri. Raniklo pimro satu pacha waragkaprojitnaka. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, satu pacha waragka penekamtno. Petanu. Pimro satu pacha waragkaproji nyoptotatnaka walaya.’
40025021	“Rutsrukate wane chinru, ‘Poyagnu, wayegrechri kigleryi ga wa poyagkakachriyi. Psotsotaji putakika poyagkakachriyi. Gixo potu chinanu nutakinyi. Putsrukate gimuwatyawaka pjiglokanu.’
40025022	“Rapoka koxa gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji yoptotachri. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji penekamtno. Petanu. Pimro gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji nyoptotatnaka walaya.’
40025023	“Rutsrukate wane chinru, ‘Poyagnu, wayegrechri kigleryi ga wa poyagkakachriyi. Psotsotaji putakika poyagkakachriyi. Gixo potu chinanu nutakinyi. Putsrukate gimuwatyawaka pjiglokanu.’
40025024	“Rapoka koxa gepimole waragkaproji yoptotachri. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, numatyi jeji shiko gajiryi. Pma mutaklewatyawakanu pjirgiya. Pma muknokajityawakanu papatjetya.
40025025	Npika. Nalimta. Nyogimatlo pserojiprojite chiji gitokote, wa gepmole waragkaproji. Waneyyi wa pixanu.’
40025026	“Rugita rutsrukate. Wane chinru, ‘Wayegrechri mugletyi ga wa ma mernuwatachriyi. ¿Pumatmakge wa nma mutaklewatyawakanu njirgiya, nma muknokajityawakanu napatjetya?
40025027	Giyagni pumkata gitakletlo nserojiprojite kgipekoklerune yegi, wa napokini nyoptotanmaklo gitanuko ga wa gixolewnachroymananuko.’
40025028	“ ‘Giyagni gkonanro waleya gepimole waragkaproji. Wa satu pacha waragkaproji waneyalutu genekanro.
40025029	Gi rixanu waneyalutu psoluko reneeko. Ruxolewnayegitanru. Ga wa waneyamigjetu, wane rixleko koniko.
40025030	Ga wa wayegrechri gike gapri migje maleka mapshagawaka giknokanru. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.’
40025031	“Wa noyaknu numuninipa Gita wa Yineru Wgenno ga wa pejnuruneko notowreneyma, natajiwniyawaka ntuplapijere ntuplatanu.
40025032	Gita getanu rapatjekaakona payinemnunanuka. Nkotspalatanna. Wa gowegane girukotachri pixka kotspalatna gowegane chiwo wgeneneyegiya.
40025033	Potuklesretate galikaka nutakanna gowegane. Kegnetesretate nutakanna chiwo wgenene.
40025034	“Giyagni Gita pogirchino wane nchinanna npotuklesretate gajene, ‘Ginanu, Nuru giglenshinikanutanune. Gyoptotanru pogirewatyawaka gixa chinanupa galpokotkaluru ma mutaakonuwa tye psolchijneko.
40025035	Gi rixanu nachinanno. Geneka nikletno. Nonunnagatewanata. Geneka giiretno. Pnu giyakatyachrino. Gyoptotno.
40025036	Mamkatno. Gmakatno. Nyayixa. Nsalwayegitno. Yoshmakjetikowakananno. Ginyegitno.’
40025037	“Giyagni poyagkakachine gigitanno. Wane chinannona, ‘Gitsrukaachi, ¿giklu wetyi pnachinatini ga wa woglutyi, waka gonunnagatewatachriyi ga wa weneka giiretyi?
40025038	¿Giklu wetyi pnu giyakatyachriyi ga wa wyoptotyi, waka mamkatyi ga wa wmakatyi?
40025039	¿Giklu wetyi pyayixanatini ga wa yoshmakikowaka pwini pixa, ga wa wunyegityi pixa?’
40025040	“Wa Gita pogirchino gigitanna. Wane nchinanna, ‘Galikakni wane nchingi, girukokta wa mturu potu wa nyi nomole wane gixini, wane gixno Gita.’
40025041	“Wanepnute wane nchinankoxna wa nkegnetesreta gwachine, ‘Gixrikinno, kamakpiratkalungi. Xirnachri gyanu gike rixiniko muwnakatu, tsru kamchi chinanu galpokotkaluru ga wa gitowrenenupa.
40025042	Gi rixanu nachi nixinina, gi geneka nikletanno. Nonunnagatewanatinina, gi geneka giiretanno.
40025043	Pnu nuyakatinina, gi wa gyoptotanno. Mamkatu nixini, gi wa gmakatanno. Nyayixinina ga wa yoshmakikowaka nwini, gi wa nsalwayegitanno.’
40025044	“Giyagni wanna koxa gigitanno. Wane chinannona, ‘Gitsrukachi, ¿giklu wetyi wa pnachinatini ga wa ponunnagatewatini ga wa pnu puyakatini, mamkatu, ga wa yayixachriyi ga wa yoshmakikowaka pwini, waneklu gi wa wupxakyi?’
40025045	“Gita gigitanna. Wane nchinanunna, ‘Galikaka wane nchingi, gi rixanu gi wane gixlu satu nyi mturpotune, gi wa Gita wane gixa.’
40025046	“Wane yanunna saletikowakapna gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu. Ga wa poyagkakachine wane yanna giwekikowaka gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu.”
40026001	Wane rixa. Rali ginkakletinitkalu Geso pejnuruko tyekakapirana, wane chinna yimaklene,
40026002	“Gixa gimatlu wa gepigogne giknoginpatka, waneplu Tsru Giknoglushgogne ga wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyooko, koroshishkita nutakikopatka.”
40026003	Giyagni tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yine tsrutene gapata. Sasertotene gitsrukatpotupji rapatyana. Kaygwasu giwakni.
40026004	Jemanshinikankakna kashichyapluna Geso yokwireyna, ga wa ruylatyapluna.
40026005	Wane chinna, “Gi wa tsrugogneklupni. Ma mejnugimalewatinitipna yine.”
40026006	Wetani rawanata Geso, gijirgitutpachri Simopji.
40026007	Tapyegitlu sato suxo. Waneylo pastono klatalo, pgamlugalu yegi. Kwenuru potu. Nikawaka tuplanatini Geso, tuyokjiwutlu.
40026008	Wale retna yimaklene. Rumtuwnana. Wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu wane tixa salewnaleta?
40026009	Gi rixanu tumkata gishankakotmaka tsru wenruya, renekikolupna kwamonurune.”
40026010	Geso gimatlu. Wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu nsalewnakaklo twu suxo? Gi rixanu kigleru kamrurchi tkamrutyano.
40026011	Gi rixanu waneygognenanupgi wa kwamonurune gixayma, seyni Gita gi wa gimwagognenanutanutkagi.
40026012	Gi rixanu tuyokmanetno pgamlugalo, wa nkapnatikolupa tkamrutyano.
40026013	Galikaka wane nchingi, ginakakokta runkakletiko Kiglerupotunanu Tokanchi wa psolchijneko wa tye koxa tkamrutanru wala wane chinkalurupa wa tushinikikolupa wala.”
40026014	Giyagni satu pamole gepi rixinri, Gota Giskaryote giwakatletachri tsrukakalune sasertotene yegi ya.
40026015	Wane chinna, “¿Klu galuka genekletno, gita samyokangi Wale?” Rupiratyaluna mapmoleproji.
40026016	Wanekluyakawa rujgalu ruglepoktapinri samyokyaplu.
40026017	Muchinangogne jimaprojpa gisekachri myapjetkotugognekaka yimaklene ginyegitlu Geso. Wane chinruna, “¿Ginaka paluka galpoklejixwu wa Tsru Giknoglushgogne pnikyawakapa?”
40026018	Wale wane china, “Pokchi gyanu wale jeji yegi. Wane nchinanru, ‘Yimaklewatachri wane china, “Nogognestsitkani. Pixa yegi Tsru Giknoglushgogne nkamrutinri nyimamkleneyma” ’ ”
40026019	Ga wa yimaklene Geso chinyawakna kamrutna. Ralpokotluna Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanu.
40026020	Kayimnu chininitka nikawaka tuplatatka pamole gepi yimakleneyma.
40026021	Wa nikanatinna, Geso wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, satu gixate rixinri samyokanutkano.”
40026022	Wamonuwnapotutna. Yinuwaka wane chinretna satkaka, “¿Gitgetkopni, Gitsrukaachi?”
40026023	Giyagni rugitna Wale. Wane chinna, “Girpaktanwa Gitayma gigakachri kolpetoya gimyoya, walepni wa samyokanno.
40026024	Galikaka Gita wa Yineru Wgenno wane nyanu chinyawaka wa yonchi Gitapiranaya. ¡Gi waneni wa tye jeji, wale chinanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyooko! Kiglemkalu tye jeji chinanu ma mushpaakannimka.”
40026025	Giyagni rugita Gota wa samyokjeru. Wane chinru, “¿Gitgetkoni, Rawi?” Wane chinru, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
40026026	Nikanatinna wanna, Geso kashichlu jimapro. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Jiknaglu. Renekna yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Gyoptotanru. Gnikanru. Tyenwa nomane.”
40026027	Kashichlo girapistono. Poyagnutyegitlo. Renekna. Wane chinna, “Giranu walaya pejnurunekgi.
40026028	Gi rixanu tyenwa nograga wa gerotu tokanchi gipiratkaluru chinanu, gixoluru yineru chinanu giyookaluru, wa mukochri kaspukikolupa.
40026029	Ga wa wane nchingi, xaniyakawa gi wa nuranutkalo twu gowajga wa walegognepotuko wa nuranro geroto wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawakaya.”
40026030	Wa wanna shikaletinitkalu gimalwuru, rushpakamtatkana. Goliwa Magkate yana.
40026031	Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Tye yechno pejnurunekgi gixapni gitspeekaakona Gita chinanu. Gi rixanu kayongalutkani: Nuylakanru girukotapratachri, ga wa gowegane gapatyawaka gajene kotspalkaakona.
40026032	Wa nyotunotinpatka, Gita gapka kosekanu gixaya. Kalile nyanu.”
40026033	Petro gigita. Wane chinru, “Pejnurunekmaka gitspetanu Pixa chinanu, gike nixiniko nutspetanu gita.”
40026034	Geso wane chinru, “Galikaka wane chinyi, tye yechno ma yanumatkanugnapuwa gaxawripa, mapa kata pnutatanno.”
40026035	Petro wane chinru, “Numkata gipnaletankoxmaka Pixayma, gi nnutatanyi.” Ga wa pejnuruneko yimaklene wane china.
40026036	Giyagni sana ya Geso wannayma. Getsemani chinikowaka sana yana. Wane chinna yimaklene, “Gewi ntuplatanu, nagjigognetapinikopshini.”
40026037	Ranikna Petro ga wa gepi Sewereyo wgenene. Yinuwaka wamonuwnaleta. Ga wa kojwakanshinikanutka.
40026038	Giyagni wane chinna, “Nonshinikanu nwamonuwnapotutya gipukchi pixka potuko. Gkagwakanu gewi. Giyokanu Gitayma.”
40026039	Wane rajrinya psotsotaaji. Yoptsojita. Yonoogojpotuta. Ragjigogneta. Wane china, “Nuru, rumkatini wane gixletikolupa, ruknoganu tye salewakchi Gitaya, seyni gi wa Gita galukyawakapni, seyni Pixa galukyawakapni.”
40026040	Yimaklene yegi ya. Retamtna gimkanatachine. Wane chinru Petro, “Giyagni ¿gi gimkata giyokletge Gitayma pshinitsonu?
40026041	Giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu gma yantaletikotupa. Wa jmerenshinikanurungi galikakni, seyni gimane muchkotni.”
40026042	Rumepe wane yaletatnaka. Ragjigognetapa salewnalepirana. Wane china, “Nuru, nma murkanuwalo gi tumkata giknogletini Gitaya wa twu girapistono, wane gixkalurupni palukyawaka.”
40026043	Rumepe yayegletatnakna. Retamtna gimkanatachine, gi rixanu ruxapnewlena chinanu gi rumkata gimrekaygaletna.
40026044	Rajrinatnaka. Ragjigognetapa mapa kata rixinri. Waneko pixka chintokanutatnaka.
40026045	Wanepnute yimaklene yegi yatnaka. Wane chinna, “Gimkapanuchi. Gapnanutanutka. Nopapkostsitkani Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookotka kmukochirerunemyoya.
40026046	Gyotunotanutka. Gayanutka. Gi gowukatkalu nsamyokjerupa.”
40026047	Wa yanumsanatiniwa, runatka Gota satu wa pamole gepi rixinrina. Waleymana gixolune yine kyoglolewaprerune, kgagajererune. Runna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrunekoxasreta gajene.
40026048	Wa samyokjerupa genekna saturutu gimaxiklechi. Wane china, “Girukta namlutanu gita, Walepakni. Gkashichanru.”
40026049	Rapyegitinitkalu Geso, waneklu wane chinru, “¡Rawi!” Ralukatkalu ga wa ramlutlu.
40026050	Geso wane chinru, “Nomole, ¿klu chinanu puna?” Giyagni rapyegitluna. Geso. Kashichatkaluna.
40026051	Ga wa satu Gesoymalutu koshpaklu yoglolewapre. Rustaklu sasertotene gitsrukate potu wayegreru. Yostakjepitlu.
40026052	Giyagni Geso wane chinru, “Pumretanru pyoglolewapre. Rawyawaka putakanru. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko yoglolewapi koschekachri, yoglolewapiko ruylatiko.
40026053	¿Waka gkagwakluge gi numkata gagjiretlu Nuru; Walemka gitakyegitanutkano yokgipimole waragka pnute solalone gitowrene?
40026054	¿Seyni gi rixpoko poyagkaakotanmaka Tokanchi Yonatkaluru wane chinachri rumkata wane gixleta?”
40026055	Waneklu Geso wane chinna wa gixolune yine, “¿Ginyegitno gixa yoglolewapiyma gagajeyma, kachowguru pixka gixa kashretnoge? Pagognemnunanuka gixayma ntuplanata. Nunkaklewata kpashiwakapjiya. Gi wa wane gkashichyano.
40026056	Seyni pejnuruko tyekaka wane gixkaluru poyagkakikolupa wa yonchi, Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine yonga.” Ruknokamtluna pejnuruneko yimaklene. Rasukatkana.
40026057	Ga wa Geso kashichachine ganiklu. Sasertotene gitsrukate potu Kaygwasu yegi ranikatkaluna, rapatyawakatkana yonchikgapine ga wa tsrune.
40026058	Wa Petro gomkagitlu gogajxigiyako. Sasertotene gitsrukatpotupjipotunanuko romkagitlu. Gitoko jigloka. Tuplanata towrechineyma retyaplu rushinityawakapa.
40026059	Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya rujgaluna gipujtalewlusha galikaka migje Geso chinanu ruylajixyapluna.
40026060	Gimka gepikna gipgujtalewashatachine gapokachine, seyni gi rukshikluna. Gapkatamtachine gepi gapoka,
40026061	wane chinachine, “Wale wane china, ‘Numkata jijrolekletlu kpashiwaka potu Goyakalunu, ga wa mapgogne nkamrupjitanutnaklu.’ ”
40026062	Palna sasertotene gitsrukate potu. Wane chinru, “¿Gike pugita? ¿Klu rupgujtatyayina wa nyi?”
40026063	Seyni Geso pochkeru. Sasertotene gitsrukate potu wane chinru, “Goyakalu giwekachri kawchinanu nkoschekjixyi. Punkakanwu, ¿Pixlege wa Kristo, Goyakalu Wgenyi?”
40026064	Geso wane chinru, “Pixa chinyawaka. Seyni wane nchinyi, Xaniyakawa gixa getanno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno tuplatyawakapa giyaklu potuklesretate, nuninkoxapa kyachgapererumkoya tengogne.”
40026065	Giyagni wa sasertote gitsrukate potu suskamkata. Wane china, “Mupashiregnuchi china. ¿Klu wanepnute magatyawu gipgujtalewatachine? Getanu wa xani. Gyijnakotatkalu ma mupashiregnuya. ¿Gi pixka getle gixlu?”
40026066	Rugitna. Wane chinna, “Ruklukanuwna rupninripa.”
40026067	Giyagni rutskagjegojitluna. Yotmutluna. Pimrine giptagojitlu.
40026068	Wane chinna, “Kristo, Goyakalu chinanu punkakanwu: ¿Katu giylakyi?”
40026069	Malekputu tuplanata Petro. Wane tapyegityalu sato wayegrechro. Wane china, “Pixa koxa Geso Kalile gajeruymananyi.”
40026070	Seyni pejnuruneko getanuya nutata. Wane china, “Gi numata gikta pchina.”
40026071	Rushpaka. Maleka gajeru gipgyaptote ya. Satu getatnaklu. Wane chinna wa wane gwanatachine, “Tye koxa Geso Nasare gajeruymananu.”
40026072	Wale kawchinanu nutatatnaka. Wane china, “Gi numatlu wa jeji.”
40026073	Pshinitsonu rapyegitluna wane gwanatachine. Wane chinruna Petro, “Galikakni pixa koxa wannaymananyi. Gi rixanu ptokanu pumatika wa wane pixinri.”
40026074	Giyagni yinuwaka kamakpiirewleta. Yinuwaka Wale kawchinanu chinreta, “Gi numatlu wa jeji.” Waneklu gaxawripa yanumatatka.
40026075	Rushinkaplu Petro wa Geso tokanu, wane chininri, “Ma yanumatkanuwa gaxawripa, mapa kata pnutatanno,” chinyalu. Rushpakamtatka. Maleka ya. Chiyampotuta.
40027001	Goyechnokawpotuko jemanshinikankakjetikowaka jiglokna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yine tsrutene Geso chinanu, wa ruylatyapluna.
40027002	Rostutluna. Ranikatkaluna. Pilato girukotlewatachri yegi samyokluna.
40027003	Giyagni Gota wa samyokjeru retatkalu wa ruklukanuwnayegjixikolutka, kashrijetanshinikanuta. Satkaklo wa mapamoleproji tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune yegi.
40027004	Wane china, “Gita mukochirewatatka. Nsamyoklu muklukanuwnakatugraga.” Wa wanna wane chinru, “¿Gi rixwu wixa? Petanru pixa.”
40027005	Ruknokamtlo sroschiproji kpashiwakaya. Ralimta. Rushriknojitnanatkawa.
40027006	Tsrukaklune sasertotene gwalo sroschi. Wane chinna, “Ginanshichkalurni tuknokikolu wa kpashiri gignantakikowaka, gi rixanu granchi wenroni.”
40027007	Jemanshinikankakna. Walaya ragjitluna kajpa kamgakleruchijne, pnu giyakatyachine kapnatikowakapa.
40027008	Giyagni wane chinkaluru Granchichijne xanigognenanu.
40027009	Waneklu poyagkakatkalu Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri Geremiya wane chinyawaka: Rawlona mapmoleproji sroschi wa rutakwenutikolu wenru, wa pimrine Gisrayiliklopishane gitakwenutanru.
40027010	Reneklona kajpa kamgakleruchijne chinanu, Gitsrukaachi chinyawakno.
40027011	Girukotlewatachri getanu tunwata Geso. Ga wa girukotlewatachri gepomgalu. Wane china, “¿Pixlege wa Goteyone Pogiryi?” Geso wane china, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
40027012	Wa jigyegitkoklunu tsrukakalune sasertoteneya ga wa tsruneya koxa, gike rugita.
40027013	Giyagni Pilato wane chinru, “¿Gi ge pjema gi pejnupiranananukta jigyegityayina Pixa?”
40027014	Gi satuna tokanchi rugityalu. Giyagni girukotlewatachri giglajpotuta.
40027015	Wa tsrugogneklu satu yineru rushyegjetna gostutkaluru girukokta ralukanruna.
40027016	Giyagni waneyananna gostutkaluru kpogiru, Warawasu giwakatletachri.
40027017	Giyagni rapatinitkana, Pilato wane chinna, “¿Giru galuka wa nkaspukyegityapgi? ¿Warawaslege waka Geso wa Kristo chinkaluru?”
40027018	Gi rixanu wale gimata wa ranxalna chinanu samyokluna.
40027019	Gitakyagoklewatikowaka tuplanatini wale, ganunro yokantokanyegitlu. Wane chinru, “Petashatanru Wale poyagkakachri. Gi rixanu xawakni gixo nsalewna Wale chinanu nupnawleya.”
40027020	Ga wa tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune gishinikanutna gixolune yine wa Warawasu galikaka ragjitinripna, ga wa Geso ruylajixinripna.
40027021	Rugita girukotlewatachri. Wane china, “¿Giru galuka wa nyi gepi wa nkaspukyegityapgi?” Wanna wane china, “Warawasupni.”
40027022	Pilato wane chinna, “Giyagni ¿gi nixyaplu Geso wa Kristo chinkaluru?” Pejnuruneko wane china, “¡Koroshishkita gitaakalurupa!”
40027023	Girukotlewatachri wane china, “¿Klu gektutu kamruta?” Wanepnute potu tsaplewatna. Wane chinna, “Koroshishkita gitaakalurupni.”
40027024	Giyagni Pilato getinri gike rumkata, seyni wanepnute galikaka rixa gejnugima, gonu koscheka. Reromyoga gixolune yine getanu. Wane china, “Muklukanuwnakatno tyegragaya. Gixa getanutkalu.”
40027025	Pejnuruneko yine gigita. Wane chinna, “Wixa chinanupni gigragaya, ga wa wwugenene chinanupni.”
40027026	Giyagni kaspukyegitna Pilato Warawasu. Rali kochipjetjixletinitkalu Geso, samyokatkalu koroshishkita rutakikolupa.
40027027	Giyagni girukotlewatachri solalotene ganikatkalu Geso. Tsrupji Pretoryopji ranikluna. Pejnuruneko solalone gapatyegitlu.
40027028	Giyagni Waleko gimkalu komkagatkaluna. Pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri yoshmakatkaluna.
40027029	Kona kamgikaluru sagyeta yoshmakjiwutatkaluna. Katsluksu samyokluna, potuklemyo. Yoptsojityegitluna. Ruxpiranatluna. Wane chinruna, “¡Wuya, Goteyone pogire!”
40027030	Rutskagjetluna. Kashichluna katsluksu. Ruylajiwutluna.
40027031	Rali gixpiranatletinikaluna, komkagatkaluna mkachri. Waleko gimkalu yoshmakatnakluna. Ranikatkaluna, koroshishkita rutakyapatkaluna.
40027032	Rushpakamtinitkana. Retluna Surene gajeru, Simo giwakatletachri. Wale rutjijixlona Geso koroshishkitate.
40027033	Rapokluna Kolkota chinikowaka. Walenwa Gijiwuswaga yegi chinikowaka.
40027034	Reneka giiretmakluna winga shepichlega yapjetkaluro. Retumgamkalo. Gi raluka giiretlo.
40027035	Koroshishkita rutakatkaluna. Kotspaltamkatluna. Gipenoklu rutakluna gimkalu.
40027036	Tuplatna. Wane retanatyaluna.
40027037	Gijiwu gogwakate rutakyaluna jigyegitikolu yonga, wane chinachri: Tyenwa Geso Goteyone Pogire.
40027038	Giyagni Waleyma koroshshkita rutaakana gepi kachowgurune, satu potuklesreta, satu kegnetesreta.
40027039	Wa giknogachine mupashiregnuchi chinruna. Ruwnownojiwutna.
40027040	Wane chinruna, “Pixni wa kpashiwakapji jijrolekachripyi, mapagogne pkamrupjitanutnaklu. Pixnanuko gognetkakinwa. Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, koroshishkita pujrukini.”
40027041	Waneko pixka china gixpiranatletluna tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yonchikgapine, ga wa tsrune. Wane chinna,
40027042	“Pimrine rognetkaka. Walenanuko gi rumkata gognetkakletnawa. Goteyone Pogirmaka, koroshishkita rujrukini xani. Walixanmaklu.
40027043	Raponshinikanutkamkalu Ruru Goyakalu. Rushatkapanru xani ralukiniplu. Gi rixanu wane china, ‘Goyakalu Wgenno.’ ”
40027044	Waneko pixka rixa yangaletluna kachowgurune Waleyma koroshishkita gitaakalune.
40027045	Tumananutkani ruchpokatka tkachi psolchijnepotunanuyako. Kayinwakasreta rapokinpotunanuko rumrekatka.
40027046	Kayinwakpapko Geso saplewata. Tsru plaji rixa. Wane china, “Geloyi, Geloyi, ¿Lama sawajtani?” Walenwa, “Noyakalute, Noyakalute, ¿klu chinanu puknokatkano?”
40027047	Jeminrina pimrine wane gwanatachine, wane chinna wanna, “Pete. Wale tomgalu Giliya.”
40027048	Waneklu rasukamta satu wannate. Rawlo katsopi. Kachgalu shichponkaklu. Katsluksu rutaklu. Reneka giiretlu.
40027049	Pimrine wane china, “Getashatanru. Wetkoxewa gikta runanu Giliya rognetkakapyaplu.”
40027050	Rumepe saplewletatnaka Geso. Tsru saple rixa. Kaspukatkalu ruwekinri.
40027051	Waneklutka mkachrichrata gimaletanatachri kpashiwaka gajeru giskakamtatka. Gepichratatkalu. Teno rumuyaka giskakletyatka chijiina.
40027052	Ruyolikchijita. Sotlukaka gitspatjeta. Rutpukamta yomlechkaka. Gi gepika kpashirinni gapnanutachinnimane yotunota.
40027053	Wa yotunotinitka Wale, waneklu yomlechi rushpakyatkana. Kpashiri pokchi yatkana. Gixolune yegi rupgujewnayegitna.
40027054	Ga wa ksolaloteru ga wa waleymalune Geso girukotanatachine getlu wa giyolikchijru, ga wa wane gixkalurkaka. Tsru piklu rixanna. Wane chinna, “Galikakni Goyakalu Wgenni wa tye.”
40027055	Wane rawanatna gixo suxone gowuka getanatyachine. Kalile romkagityaluna Geso. Rupxakanatluna.
40027056	Wannaymana Mariya Maktala gajero, ga wa Santiyako, Gosi ginro Mariya, ga wa Sewereyo wgenene ginro.
40027057	Kayi rixinitka runa satu jeji ponikolu, Garimate gajeru. Gosi giwakatletachri. Wa Geso yimaklerkoxni wale.
40027058	Wale yayegitlu Pilato. Gesnimane ragjita. Giyagni Pilato genekjixmanetlu.
40027059	Gosi gwamanetatkalu. Powrachratalu poyitatkalu.
40027060	Waleko giyomlepmaka gerotupna rutaklu, sotlu yomlechi gipgyaptote gakanokachri. Wane yiyatka.
40027061	Wane rawanatna Mariya Maktala gajero, ga wa sato Mariya. Tuplanatna yomlechi ginaple.
40027062	Waleprikgogne, walenwa gapnanutikalurgogne, Pilato yegi rapatyana tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa Gwariseyone.
40027063	Wane chinna, “Gitsrukaachi, wushiniklu wa wale kyokwirewaklerni wane china, ‘Mapagogne giknoginpatka nyotunotanu.’
40027064	Giyagni pyokanrewatanu girukotayomletikolupa mapgogne rixinpotunanuko, ma chowgutapyapluna yimaklene goyechno, ma wane chinyanupna yine, ‘Yotunomtatka gipnachinetskalaya.’ Gapkatatachri pupjeru muchinanu pnute ma mixinitipa.”
40027065	Pilato wane chinna, “Waneygi girukowatachine. Gajewa. Gignantakanru gimatyawaka.”
40027066	Wane yatkana. Rugnantakluna yomlechi. Rupitluna sotlu, girukowatachineymananuko.
40028001	Ruknoginitka gapnanutikalurgogne, rumrerekamtinitka muchinangogne wa simana, wane yana Mariya Maktala gajero ga wa sato Mariya, yomlechi retapyapna.
40028002	Waneklu waneru tsru giyolikchijru. Gi rixanu Gitsrukaachitowreru gijruka tengogneya. Rapoka. Rakaprurutlu sotlu yomlechi gajeru. Wale gogo tuplanatatka.
40028003	Rawrakle pixka rixgojita. Gimkalu klataa rixpotuta giwru pixka.
40028004	Wale piklena chinanu wa girukowatachine giypiypitana. Gipnachine pixka rixanna.
40028005	Goyakalutowreru gigita. Wane chinna suxone, “Gi mpikanu gixa. Gi rixanu numatgi Geso gijga, wa koroshishkita gitakanatkaluru.
40028006	Gi wa gewitkalu. Yotunomtatka wa Wale chinyawaka. Ginanu. Getapanru rutakanatikowaka.
40028007	Gajewa. Nteyakawamtanu. Ginkakapanna wa yimaklene yotunomtinritka gipnachinetskalaya. Kosekatkagi. Kalile yatka. Wane getinitkalu. Nunkakatkagi.”
40028008	Giyagni wanna yomlechi teyakawamtyatkana. Pikachine ga wa gimuwatachine potu. Rasukamtna yimaklene runkakapyapna.
40028009	Makakta Gesokni wa yoptotapna. Wane chinna, “Kiglenshinikanupgi.” Rapyegitluna. Kashjixitluna. Yoptsojityegitluna.
40028010	Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Gi mpikanu. Gajewa. Ginkakapanna nomolene wa Kalile yinripatkana. Wane retinnona.”
40028011	Wane yakopshinna, pimrine girukowatachine pokchi yatkana. Tsrukakalune sasertotene runkakapna pejnuruko retanrutkana wane gixachritka.
40028012	Rapatjetna tsruneyma. Jemanshinikankakna. Gixo sroschi reneekana solalone.
40028013	Wane chinkana, “Wane nchinanu, ‘Yimaklene goyechno ginapa. Chowgutpatkaluna, wumkanatni wixni.’
40028014	Wale yijnakotinipa girukotlewatachri, wixa giglepokyegitangi. Mkojwakanshinikanutkane wixkakangi.”
40028015	Wanna yoptotlo sroschi. Wane rixna wa runkakikowakna. Giyagni poshalpiranatka Goteyone yegi xanigognenanu.
40028016	Giyagni pamole satupje yimaklene Kalile yatkana, satu magka yegi wa Geso chinyawakpotukna.
40028017	Retinitkaluna yoptsojityegitluna. Seyni pimrine nutanshinikanyegitlu.
40028018	Rapyegitinitkana Geso, ruynumsatna. Wane chinna, “Psolpotuko nutakika tengogne ga wa chiji.
40028019	Giyagni gyanu. Gyimakanna payinemnunanuka. Gkatanna Girchi giwakaya, ga wa Gituru giwakaya, ga wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri giwakaya.
40028020	Ginkakanna kamrutyapluna pejnuruko nyokanatyagi. Gjemanu: Gixayma nwanu psolgogneko yoptukgogneshatyawakpotunanuko.”
41001001	Tyenwa yinuwakikolu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi Geso Kristopirana Goyakalu Wgene.
41001002	Wane rixa yokanatkaluru Gisayiya Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri. Wane china: Gita yokanatlu notowreru pixa penute. Wale galpokotanru patnugapote.
41001003	Yineru mwiyawakanu saplewatyachri wane china: Galpokotanru Gitsrukachi gatnugapote. Mpotukatanru gigapkaka.
41001004	Gwa katlewata yineru mwiyawakanuya. Wane runkakyana yine genshinikanutachinepa katinripna. Ga wa kaspukamukochiretikolupapirana runkakna.
41001005	Rushpakyegitluna pejnuruneko Gotesreta gajene ga wa Gerosale gajene koxa. Wanna ptowruneko katka Gorta gapgaya. Rupgujtamukochiretnawana.
41001006	Wa Gwa makatlu kameyopixi. Wa pamta gipchiji rushrika. Wale niklu tsetse ga wa wrolga gosha gajeru.
41001007	Runkaklewata. Wane china, “Runa najxigi Gita pnute muchkonurutu. Gi wa Gita gimukluni nyomshokinri nkoshpirokyaplu yoshmaklejixitsa.
41001008	Gita galikakni katgi gonuya. Wa Wale katangi Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya.”
41001009	Wane gixlutkani walegognekaka. Nasare Kalilechijne runyatka Geso. Wane Gorta gapga Gwa katyalu Geso.
41001010	Waneklu wa gonu yotunotyatka. Retlu gitpukachri tengogne, wa Giwekikaluru motkoko pixka rixa, Wale gogwaka gijrukyachri.
41001011	Tengogne runya satu tokanchi wane chinachri, “Pixni Noturyi nalukanruyi. Pixa gigletanshinikanutno.”
41001012	Waneklu wa Giwekikaluru ganiklu yineru mwiyawakanu.
41001013	Wane rawanata yineru mwiyawakanuya gepkoxamkojemolgogne. Wane rumlukanutyalu Satanasyo. Wane rawanata kmatsurunetskala. Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene gipxaklu.
41001014	Waneklu kashichkoklunutka wa Gwa. Wanepnute Geso wane ya, Kalile ya. Runkaklewata Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana.
41001015	Wane china, “Gigogne poyagkakatka. Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka gi gowukatkalu. Genshinikanutanu. Galixanru Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi.”
41001016	Tsru wenustsi Kalile yapamta. Retlu Simo repuruyma Gantirishi, chalugjetachine tsru wenuya, wa kshimagaklerune.
41001017	Wane chinna Geso, “Ginanu gwagajxigitanno. Yine gwapjetachine nixkakanutkagi.”
41001018	Waneklutka ruknokamtatkaluna chalnena. Romkagitatkaluna.
41001019	Wane rajrinya. Retlu Santiyako, Sewereyo wgene repuruyma Gwa. Wanna koxa kanawa gwanata. Ramtatluna chalkaka.
41001020	Waneklutka tomgana Wale. Ruknokamtluna rurna Sereweyo kanawaya kamrurewakleruneyma. Wane yana. Rawgajxigitluna.
41001021	Kapernawo rapokinitkana, gapnanutikalurugognekaka jiglokjeta ginkaklewawakapji. Wane runkaklewlejetya.
41001022	Ruglajitna wa runkaklewleya. Gi rixanu runkakna tsru gitaakaluru pixkako rixa. Gi wa yonchikgapine pixka rixa.
41001023	Waneru runkaklewawaklepjiyna jeji wa kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu. Wale saplewata.
41001024	Wane china, “¡Ya! ¿Gi pixannatkawu Geso Nasare gajeru? ¿Puna pumtukpotutapyapwu? Numatyi Kpashiryi Goyakalunu.”
41001025	Geso chigetjetlu. Wane china, “Pochkepyi. Pushpakanutka waleya.”
41001026	Wa kamchi puchotlewatachri shipchojtakakanru jejni. Saplewjetana tsruplaji. Rushpakamtatka wa waleya.
41001027	Pejnuruneko giglajita. Giyagni repomgakakna. Wane chinna, “¿Klunerni wa tye? ¿Klu gerotu ginkaklewlutkani wa tye? ¡Waleni wa tsru gitaakaluru pixka rixa! Wale yokanatna kamchine puchotlewatachine. Jemluna Wale.”
41001028	Waneklu pogiwata psolchijnepotunanuko Kalilesretaya.
41001029	Wanepnute rushpakamtinitkana ginkaklewawakapjiya, wanna wane yana Simo, Gantirishipji, Santiyakoyma, Gwa koxa.
41001030	Wa Simo gimajiro gikluga. Tpachwata. Giyagni walapirana runkakluna.
41001031	Giyagni rapokinitka kosemyotlo, yotunkaklo. Tupachwalgamtatka. Wala gipxakatkana.
41001032	Wa kayi rixinitka wa rumxikinitka tkachi ranikyegitluna pejnuruneko yayixachine, kamchichachine.
41001033	Wa pejnuruneko tsru pokchi gajene gapatjeta gipgyaptoya.
41001034	Geso gituukakna gixo yayixachine pnumnunanuka gixachri yayixluya. Wale giknokna maleka gixo kamchine. Gi ruchi yanumsaletna kamchine, gi rixanu rumatluna.
41001035	Yotunomta goyechnokawpotuko, ma mumrereekanuwa. Rushpakamta. Wane ya yineru mwiyawakanu. Wane ragjigognetya.
41001036	Simo, waleymalune gijgalu.
41001037	Rukshikluna. Wane chinruna, “Pejnuruneko gijgayi.”
41001038	Wane chinna Geso, “Wane gayanu papokchikaka gawastsitanune yegi. Wane koxa nunkaklewatini. Wale chinanukni nuna.”
41001039	Wane ya. Runkaklewananumta runkaklewawaklepjikakayna psoluko Kalileya. Ruknokyana maleka kamchine.
41001040	Satu gijirgitutachri ginyegitlu. Ragjipotutlu. Yoptsojityegitlu. Wane chinru, “Palukiniplu pumkata powratletno.”
41001041	Geso getwamonutlu. Romyokyegitlu. Kamruklu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu. Powra pixinripa.”
41001042	Waneklutka gijirgitlu gitukyegitatkalu. Powratkalu.
41001043	Rujretlu. Yokanatatkalu.
41001044	Wane chinru, “Gike punkakanu. Seyni pyanu. Sasertote pekakgitapinwa. Penekashatanru powranuya wa Moysisi yokanatanru. Walepni gipgujtalewlu wanna chinanu.”
41001045	Wa wale gishpakamtatka. Yinuwaka ginkakletletlu gixo. Poshalpiranamtlu. Giyagni wa Geso gi wa gimkata gapokletlu gipgujewnaleta tsru pokchiya, seyni maleka rawanata yineru mwiyawakanuya. Runyegitluna Wale pnumnunanuka gajene.
41002001	Gi gixogogne giknoginiwa, Kapernawo rapokatka. Yijnakyegitinitka panchitkalu,
41002002	rapatjekakna gixolune. Gi wa gipgyaptoko poyagotatka. Geso ginkakna wa tokanchi.
41002003	Runna. Ranikyegitluna giktegachri. Ranikjene gepkoxamkoje.
41002004	Gi wa rumkata gapyegletluna gixo yine chinanu. Suswakluna wa washre Wale ginaple. Wane rixa kotpukleswatluna. Wane jijrukyaluna gijeko wa giktegachri giklugyawaka.
41002005	Geso getlu wanna galixle. Wane chinru giktegachri, “Wiwi, pmukochirkaka pkaspukikatka.”
41002006	Wane koxa tuplanatna pimrine yonchikgapine. Wanna gishinikanuwata rajiyna.
41002007	Wane chinna wanna, “¿Klu chinanu wane china yanumsaleta wa tye? Mupashiregnuchi china. Gike gimkata kaspukmukochirewleta. Satupjeru Goyakalupje.”
41002008	Giyagni rumata Geso Walenanuko wane rixanshinikanutinrina. Wane china, “¿Klu chinanu wane gixanshinikanuta tyekaka wa gajiya?
41002009	¿Girni wa myapretu potu? Wane chinikolu giktegachri, ‘Wa pmukochirkaka pkaspukikatka,’ ga wa wane chinikolu, ‘Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekotanu. Pyanutka.’
41002010	Wa gimatyaplu wa Gita Yineru Wgenno tyechijneya gitaakalurno kaspukmukochiretjerupno,” wane chinru giktegachri,
41002011	“Pixa wane nchina, Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekomtanu. Pyanutka pupji.”
41002012	Yotunomtatka. Waneklutka koschekjekomtatka. Rushpakamtatka pejnuruneko getanu. Giyagni pejnuruneko giglajita. Rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Wane chinna wanna, “¡Gi pagogneko wane pixkalutu weta!”
41002013	Rumepe gishpakleta. Tsru wenu yatka. Pejnuruneko yine ginyegitlu. Wale ginkaklewyegitna.
41002014	Ruknogamta. Retlu Rewi Galgweyo wgene. Tuplanata girukotlewatachri wenutikowaka. Wane chinru, “Pomkagitanno.” Palnamtatka. Romkagitatkalu.
41002015	Waneklu wane rawanatini Geso wa nikawakakwa Rewipji, gixna gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune nikawakakwa koxa rawanatna Gesoyma, yimaklene koxa. Gi rixanu gixolunni yine. Romkagitluna.
41002016	Wanena yonchikgapine. Wannanwa Gwariseyone koxa. Retanatluna nikyawaka wannayma kmukochirerune ga wa gijgawenutachine. Wane chinkanna wa yimaklenni Gwariseyoneya ga wa yonchikgapineya, “¿Gi rixatka wa wannayma nika, rura, wanna gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune?”
41002017	Geso yijnakotlu. Wane chinna Wale, “Wa gichkolune gi galuklu kpinrewakleru, seyni yayixachine galuklu. Gi wa nuna ntomgiyapna poyagkakachine, seyni wanna kmukochirerune ntomginripni.”
41002018	Wa Gwa yimaklene ga wa Gwariseyonenu gogajirewata. Runna. Wane chinruna, “¿Klu chinanu wanna Gwa yimaklene wa Gwariseyone yimaklene koxa gogajirewata, ga wa Pixa yimaklene gi wa gogajirewata?”
41002019	Wane chinna Geso, “Gi rumkata gogajirewletna wanna kashimyolu getachine gnunrowatachri wannaymalutuwa, Gita pixka nyimakleneymano. Wa wannayma rawanatini gnunrowatachri gi rumkata gogajirewletna, xani pixka wa Gita gimwakopshinna nyimaklene.
41002020	Runinpatka pagogne wa gnunrowatachri konikolgognepatka wannayegiya. Waneklu rogajirewatanna wanna.
41002021	“Gikena gamatlu wa muchkirgakatu mkachri gitsole. Wane rixkoklunu, waleko gerotu sama suskaklu gitsole. Wanepnuteyaka rixa giskakletanatka.
41002022	Gikena giyokgatlu winga gerotu, tsapkaka tsrutsoleji. Wane rixkoklunutka, winga suskakanru tsapkakni. Tuyokgata wino. Tsapkaka salewna. Seyni wa winga gerotu tsapa gerotu tutakgatka.”
41002023	Wane rixa. Sana yapanata gapnanutikalurgogne. Yimaklene yanananumta. Yinuwaka sustakagwuremtluna gitaklugwu.
41002024	Giyagni Gwariseyone wane chinru, “Petanu. ¿Klu chinanu wane rixna gapnanutikalurgogne wa ginanshichkalurgogne?”
41002025	Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu wa gi rixpokota Tawi, magatini wa nachichini wale ga wa waleymalune?
41002026	Gi rixpoko jiglokletlu wa Goyakalupji, wa Gawiyatari walenwa sasertote gitsrukatpotu. Niklu jimaprokaka gekakgitkaluru. Wa walenwa ginanshichkaluru niklu. Sasertotenepje niklu. Reneekoxna rumotsane.”
41002027	Wane koxa chinna Geso, “Wa gapnanutikalurgogne yine chinanu kamrutka. Wa yine gi kamrutka gapnanutikalurgogne chinanu.
41002028	Giyagni wa gapnanutikalurgogne koxa gitsrukatno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno.”
41003001	Jiglokatnaklu ginkaklewawakapji. Waneru satu jeji giprigamyotachri.
41003002	Giruktatluna Geso wa gapnanutikalurgogne rutuukaklewatinri wa jigyegityapluna.
41003003	Wane chinru wa jeji giprigamyotachri, “Pyotunotanu ganikajiya.”
41003004	Wane chinatnakna Geso, “¿Girni wa gapnanutikalurgogne muklukanutu kamrutkalurupa: waka kiglerge waka gektutlege? ¿Gognetkaklurge giweklu waka giylalu?” Ga wa wanna pochke.
41003005	Reknojtayegitna. Jigekanuwata. Wamonuwna wa shikgaji rixinrina. Wane chinru jeji, “Pomyokanu.” Romyoka. Ruglewamyotatka.
41003006	Rushpakamtna Gwariseyone. Waneklutka Giroreyoneyma jemanshinikankakyegitluna Wale ruylatyapluna.
41003007	Geso gitspalamta. Tsru wenu ya yimakleneyma. Romkagimtluna gixolune yine Kalile gajene Gote gajene koxa,
41003008	Gerosale gajene, Gitome gajene, ga wa pasreta Gorta gajene, Tirostsi gwachine, Sitostsi gwachine, gixolune yine. Jemyegitluna gi pixkalutukokta kamruta. Runyegitluna Wale.
41003009	Wane chinna Geso wa yimaklene galpokjixanutkalo kanawa gixolune yine chinanu ma machpakyanupluna.
41003010	Gi rixanu gi gepika rutuukaka. Giyagni rujirkojetna Wale gogo yayixachine pejnunanuka kamrukyapluna.
41003011	Ga wa kamchine puchotlewatachine getinri yoptsojityegitluna. Saplewatna. Wane chinna wanna, “Pixni wa Goyakalu Wgenyi.”
41003012	Geso gijretna gixo gi rupgujetanruna.
41003013	Kanika magka. Tomgana Wale gishinikanune. Runyegitluna.
41003014	Geso gitakna pamole gepi Waleyma gwachinepa, wa yokanatanunepa ginkaklewatachinepa,
41003015	wa kamchine maleka ruknokyapna.
41003016	Rutakna pamole gepi: Simo; wale rutakgiwakata Petro;
41003017	wa Santiyako, Sewereyo wgene; Gwa, wa Santiyako gepuru (Giwakatna Wowanerge; walenwa rutlogle pixkalune),
41003018	wa Gantirishi, wa Wilipi, wa Wartolo, wa Matiyo, wa Tomasu, wa Santiyako Galgweyo wgene, wa Tateyo, wa Simo Muchkopiranawatachri;
41003019	wa Gota Giskaryote samyokjerupa.
41003020	Panchi rapokinitkana, rapatjetatnakna yine. Giyagni wa wanna gi gimkata nikletna.
41003021	Wa jempiranyegitluna wa Wale gimwanune. Runna kashichyapmakluna. Wane chinna wanna, “Sepronachrinatkani.”
41003022	Gerosale yopikyana yonchikgapine. Wanna wane china wa waneylu Welsewo, wa tsru potu kamchiyma ruknokna kamchine maleka.
41003023	Wa tomginitkana Geso, wane china yapkakluya, “¿Gi rixpoko maleka giknokletinwa Satanasyokakluko?
41003024	Wa pogirewatikowaka gajene wannakakluko kotspalanshinikankakmaka, gi rumkata gwagogneretna wa wale pogirewatikowaka gajene.
41003025	Panchi gajene wannakakluko kotspalanshinikankakmaka gi rumkata gwagognereta wa wale panchi gajene.
41003026	Wa Satanasyo yagotinmakwa walenanuko wa, kotspalanshinikanutinmakwa gi rumkata gwaleta seyni nikawnanu.
41003027	Gike gimkata jiglokletlu gipji gichkolu, chowgutyaplu rejnunkate ma mostutkanuwalu wa gichkolu. Waneklu chowgutyalu gipji gajeru.
41003028	Galikaka wane nchingi, kaspuukalurupni wanna yine wgenene pejnuruneko mukochirkakna, mupashiregnuchi girukokta mupashiregnuchi yanumatini.
41003029	Seyni girukokta wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri mupashichkatu, gike rixiniko kaspukiko seyni giklukanuwnachri mukochri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa.”
41003030	Gi rixanu wanna wane china, “Waneylu kamchi puchotlewatachri.”
41003031	Tuna runro, repurune koxa. Maleka rawna. Repukmakluna.
41003032	Wa gixolune yine ruxiplatjene wane chinruna, “Petanu. Malekna punro, pepurune. Rujgayina.”
41003033	Wa Wale gigitna. Wane china, “¿Katni wa nunro, wa nepurune?”
41003034	Retjetna ruxiplatanune. Wane china, “Getanna nunro nepurune.
41003035	Wa girukokta kamrutlu Goyakalu galukanru, ga ga walenwa nepuru, nepuro, nunro.”
41004001	Rumepe yinuwaka ginkaklewleta tsru wenustsiya. Rapatyegitluna gixo potu yine. ¡Gi pejnunanukta! Giyagni ratskotatka kanawa. Wane tuplatatka tsru wenuya. Pejnuruneko yine chiji gwa, tsru wenuwnaga.
41004002	Runkaklewyegitna Geso yapkakluya gi gepikapirana. Wane chinna Geso runkaklewleya,
41004003	“Gjemanu. Satu kgitaklewakleru gishpakamta rutaklewtapanu.
41004004	Wane rixa kopalajreta. Pimriji gatnugapostsi gapokajita. Runna koshichine teno yapachine. Niklokajitluna.
41004005	Pimriji sotlu gwiyawaka gapokajita mawiyawakanu potu kajpa. Waneklu rupcheknimka gi rixanu gi wa tenru kajpa.
41004006	Ga wa rushpakini tkachi jimanatkalu. Ma matskinu chinanu rupriganatka.
41004007	Pimriji kona yegi gapokajita. Tseruwna konkaka. Kapotanatkalu. Gi kajinatkalu.
41004008	Pimriji kiglewaka chiji, gapokajita. Wane jiwatya. Tseruwna. Ruxolewna. Rawa satu mapamoleji, satu patsrujirmoleji, satu satu pachaji.”
41004009	Wane chinna Geso, “Kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
41004010	Walepje rixini repomgaluna rawastsitanune pamole gepiyma wa yapkaklupiranaya.
41004011	Wane chinna Geso, “Ga wa gixa geneeka gimatyaplu giyogimanatkaluru Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana. Wa maleka gajene ginkaaka yapkaklupjeya pejnurukopirana.
41004012	Retinna retanmakna, ma mumatinitipna. Jeminna, jemanmakna, ma mumata jeminitipna, ma kashrijetikotupna, ma kaspukmukochiretkanupna.”
41004013	Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge gimatlu tye yapkaklu? ¿Gi gixpoko gimatletanru ptowruko yapkaklu?
41004014	Wa kgitaklewakleru gitaklu tokanchi.
41004015	Ga ga wannanwa gatnugapostsi gwachine. Rutakikna tokanchi. Wa jeminitkana waneklu runa Satanasyo. Konyanna tokanchi rajna gitaakaluru.
41004016	Waneko pixka rixna wa gitaakalurune sotlu gwiyawaka. Wa jeminitkaluna tokanchi waneklu yoptotluna rumuwleyna.
41004017	Gi wa waneyna gitskina wanna. Wa pshinitsonu gwachinepa. Wa runini salewakchi, wa kojwawakchi tokanchi chinanu waneklu rutspekaakana.
41004018	Pimrine gitaakalune wannanwa konyegirune wa tokanchi jemachine.
41004019	Wa kojwakanshinikanrukaka tyegogneya ga wa ponikolewlu yokwire ga wa getsotanrewlu pagixankakaya jigloka. Kapotlu tokanchi. Gi wa jiwatanatka.
41004020	Wannanwa gitaakaluru kiglewaka chiji, wa jemachine tokanchi. Wanna yoptotlu. Jiwatna, satu mapamoleji, satu patsrujirmoleji, satu satu pachaji.”
41004021	Wane koxa chinna Geso, “¿Taniikege yochpikjetkalurompuko wa gimatumpuko ga wa shechimpuko tutakikolupa? ¿Gi ge katalo kgapiko tutakikolupni, wa tpokamlatinripa?
41004022	Gi rixanu maleshlu wa yogimatkaluru ma mupgujetikotupa. Gi wa pochkeruko mpogijetkotupni.
41004023	Girukokta kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
41004024	Wane koxa chinna Geso, “Xakoka gyijnakotanru. Wa yantapi gixa yantajetinro, walako yantatingina gixanuko. Gyognikyegitko gixapa.
41004025	Wa waneyalutu wanepnute reneeka. Waneyamigjetu wane rixle konikona.”
41004026	Wane china Geso, “Wane rixa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wa satu jeji gitaklu giji chijiya.
41004027	Rumka, yotunota, goyechno ga wa gogi. Wa kajiruji gipcheka. Tseruwna. Gi rumata gi rixpokota.
41004028	Walenanuko jiwkaknawa wa chiji. Muchinanu yosnukapcheta; wanepnute gigwutka, wanepnute giji galixachri gigwuya.
41004029	Wa ralijitinitka waneklutka gistakapi rustajikatka gi rixanu rapokatka gipapko jirgikolupa.”
41004030	Wane china Geso, “¿Giru wutakanru wale pixkalutu pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu? ¿Giru yapkaklu wutakanru?
41004031	Wa mostasaji pixka rixa. Wa chiji rutaakoklunu walenwa mtserutu ptowruko kajiruji giyagokolutu wa chijiya.
41004032	Wa rali gitakletkoklunutka. Rupcheka. Tseruwna tsru potu ptowru kshana gitaakaluru pnute. Tsruplukakni. Giyagni koshichine tengogne gajene gimkata gwaleta gichiklempuko.”
41004033	Gixo tye pixkalutu yapkakluya Wale ginkakna tokanchi wa rumkata jemletyawakna.
41004034	Ga wa yapkaklu migje gi wa runkakna Geso, seyni Waleko yimaklene wannapje rixini runkakpokowakatna ptowruko.
41004035	Wa walegogne wa kayi rixinitka wane chinna Geso, “Wakanu gayanu.”
41004036	Wa yokanatkatkana gixolune yine. Waneklu ranikatkaluna yimaklene kanawaya. Wane koxa yana pimro kanawkaka Waleyma.
41004037	Yopyoka tsru kannipgyalu. Tuygajetlo gishpurga kanawa. Giyagni katsepgatkalo kanawa.
41004038	Tostsi rawananumta. Rumkananumta rutspannojreya. Komyekluna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, ¿gikenna rixyi wa wupninripatka?”
41004039	Wa yotunotinitka chigetjetlu kannipgyalu. Wane chinru wa tsru wenu, “Pochke. Pushyanamatanu.” Rutuka wa kannipgyalu. Mayegixgataa rixanatka.
41004040	Wa wane chinna Geso, “¿Klu chinanu mpikatka? ¿Klu chinanu gi galixgognenatawa?”
41004041	Pikna tsru piklu. Wane chinkakna wannakakluko, “¿Katni wa Tye? Wa kannipgyalu wa tsru wenu jemyawaklu.”
41005001	Wakanu yana tsru wenuya Gerasenonesreta.
41005002	Wa ruptekinitka kanawaya, waneklutka yoptotaplu satu jeji yomlechi gajeru. Kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu.
41005003	Yomlechi yegi gwachrini wale. Gikeko gimkata gosturetatkalu, gi wa yowumatsayakoxapa.
41005004	Wa gi gepi kata wane rostutkamkatka supoya yowumatskoxaya. Wa yowumatsni rustonjemtana waleya. Wa supni tutskinjemtana. Gikena poyago gipuchkakletlu.
41005005	Psolyechnoko psolgogneko wane rixa saplewjenanumta magkaya yomlechkakaya. Rustajitnawa sotluya.
41005006	Wa retinitkalu wa Geso gowukayako rasukamta. Yoptsojityegitlu.
41005007	Saplewata. Tsruplaji rixa. Wane china, “¿Gi pixanutkano Geso, Goyakalu teno potu Gajeru Wgene? Kachingagjire nixyi Goyakalu kawchinanu, gi wa psaletpotutanno.”
41005008	Gi rixanu Geso wane chinatkalu, “Pushpakyegitanru tye jeji, kamchi puchotlewatachri.”
41005009	Geso gepomgalu, “¿Klu giwakyi?” Rugitlu. Wane china, “Ngiwaka Gixoluru, wa gixolurunpotwu.”
41005010	Wa ragjitlu maleka ma yokanatyaplu tyesretaya.
41005011	Wanenanru magkastsi gixoluru kochi. Nikanatna.
41005012	Ragjitluna pejnuruneko kamchine. Wane chinna, “Kochi yegi pyokanatanunwu wa wanna wjiglokyapa.”
41005013	Geso gichichna. Rushpakamtatkana kamchine puchotlewatachine. Kochinni jiglokamtatkana. Gixolunni kochinni gipjita gijrukyanatka. Tsru wenu rapokanna. Wanegetkonna gepi waragka. Tsru wenu gagyekyachinena.
41005014	Wanna kochi girukotachine gasukamta. Runkaklewtapna tsru pokchiya, ga wa sana gajene koxa. Runatkana retapyapluna klunerukta wane gixkaluru.
41005015	Runyegitluna Geso. Retluna wa kamchitpachri wa gixoluru gwanatanru. Tuplanatatka. Kamkatkalu. Kanshinikanutkalu. Pikanna.
41005016	Retanatjene ginkakna gikta rixpokonatka wa kamchitpachri, wa kochinepirana.
41005017	Yinuwaka gagjiretluna Geso wa rushpakinripa wannasretaya.
41005018	Ratskota kanawa. Wa kamchitpachri gagjitlu wa Wale yegi rawinripatka.
41005019	Geso gi galuka ganikletlu. Wane chingonuklu, “Pupji pyanutka pumwanune yegi. Punkakanna gikta rixpokotatkayi Gitsrukaachi. Wale punkakanna retwamonutyayi.”
41005020	Ralimta. Yinuwaka ginkaklewletatka Ntekapoliya gikta rixpokotatkalu Geso. Pejnuruneko gimyeka.
41005021	Koprugatatnaka Geso kanawaya. Wakanu ya. Rapatyegitluna gixo yine. Tsru wenuwnaga rawa.
41005022	Runa satu wa tsru gitaakalurune ginkaklewawakapji gajenyegiya, Gayro giwakatletachri. Retinitkalu yoptsojityegitlu Gesojixistsiya.
41005023	Wane chinru, “Wuya wanepnawakla nshicho wgeneji. Petapanunro. Tupnakastsinatkani. Putakamyogogotanunro tutskalginripa. Tuwekanu.”
41005024	Geso waleymamnutka. Romkagimtluna gixolune yine. Rachpakluna.
41005025	Sato suxo gigragalewatachrona. Pamole gepi walapu gigragalewatachrona.
41005026	Gixo kpinrewaklerunyegimka tyanitka. Wanna chinanu tsalewna gixo. Tnikatlewatanatka ptowruko walanuko tixinri. Gikena gipxakanro. Seyni taalinanumtana.
41005027	Tjempiranyegitinitkalu Geso, tuna Wale gajxigiya wa gixolune yine yegi. Tkamrukamkatlu.
41005028	Wa wane china wala, “Nkamrukamkashatinri nutskalganu.”
41005029	Waneklutka tograga gitskikatka. Tumatnawa tomaneya tuglewatinritka wa tsalewnanatinri.
41005030	Waneklutka Geso gimatatka Walenanuko rushpakamtyatka giyaklu. Ruprotaka wa gixolune yine yegi. Wane china, “¿Katu kamrukamkatno?”
41005031	Wane chinruna wa yimaklene, “Gi ge petna wa gixolune yine gachpakyawakyi. Seyni wane pchina, ‘¿Katu kamrukno?’ ”
41005032	Wale geknojtata retyaplo katukta wane gixlu.
41005033	Wa suxo pika. Tutatata. Tumata wa wala gixyawaka. Tuna. Tyoptsojityegitlu Wale. Tunkaklu ptowruko galikaka.
41005034	Wale wane chinro, “Wiwi, palixle gitskalakyi. Pyanu. Kiglenshinikanpatkayi. Kiglepatkayi wa psalewninrinanutka.”
41005035	Yanumsatiniwa Wale, ginkaklewawakapji gitsrukatepji runyana pimrine. Wane chinna, “Pshichni tupnanatka. ¿Klu chinanu pkojwakawalu Yimaklewatachri?”
41005036	Seyni Geso jemashatlu tye tokanchi wane chinkaluru. Wane chinru tsru gitaakaluru ginkaklewawakapji gajeru, “Gi pumyekanu. Palixashatanu.”
41005037	Gi wa ruchichlu wa satu gininripa Wale gajxigi ga wa Petro, wa Santiyako, wa Gwa, repuru wa Santiyako
41005038	Wane ya gipjiya ginkaklewawakapji gitsrukate. Retlu sejrechi, chiyagatachine, saplewjepotutachine.
41005039	Jiglokamta. Wane chinna Geso, “¿Klu chinanu nsejrewna nchiyaganata? Wa mturo gi tupna seyni tumkanata.”
41005040	Ruxpiranatluna. Wale maleka giknokna pejnuruneko. Ranikna wa mturni giru ga wa tunro, ga wa Waleymalune koxa. Jigloka mturni gwiyawaka.
41005041	Ga wa kosemyotinitkalo mturni, wane chinro, “Talita komi.” Walenwa yokaakaluru: “Mturo, pixa wane nchinyi, pyotunotanu.”
41005042	Waneklutka mturo yotunotatka. Tyanatka, gi rixanu waneyatkalo pamole gepi walapu. Waneklutka ruglajitna. Tsru giglajru rixna.
41005043	Wale gijretna gikena gimatanru. Wane china teneeko tnikanru.
41006001	Rushpakamta waneya. Rapoka gichijne. Romkagitluna yimaklene.
41006002	Rapokinitka, gapnanutikalurgogne yinuwaka ginkaklewleta wa ginkaklewawakapjiya. Gi gepika yijnakotlu. Ruglajitna. Wanna wane china, “¿Ginaka rumatyalu Wale tyekaka? ¿Klu gimatkalewlunwa tye renekikolu wa Wale? ¿Gi pixkalutunanni ruyaklekaka kamrutkalurni gimyoya?
41006003	¿Gi ge kyosokoklerukni tye, wa Mariya wgene, wanna Gosi, wa Gota, Simo wanna yegwaklu? ¿Gi wa gewna wixayma repurone?” Wale rutspenshinikanutyana.
41006004	Wa Geso wane china, “Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine kagwakpiratkalunni, seyni gichijnepjeya, ga wa gimolenyegisretaya, ga wa gipjiya mkagwakpiratkotni.”
41006005	Gi wa rumkata kamruretlu waneya wa satu ruyakleya. Rutuukakna psotsotajiko yayixachine, walepje. Wanna gogo rutakamyota.
41006006	Ruglajita wa ma malixleyna. Sajrukamta papokchikaka walesreta. Runkaklewata.
41006007	Tomgana Geso wa pamole gepi. Wa yinuwaka yokanretna gepkaka. Tsru rutakna wa kamchine puchotlewatachine chinanu.
41006008	Yokanatatkana gikena ranikanna wa gatnugapoya, satupjeru kanojerna; gi wa nikanruna, gi wa tsapako, gi wa sroschiko tsapaneyna.
41006009	Wa rutakanrona yoshmakjixrechishpatapje. Gi wa gepimkalu rutakanna.
41006010	Wane chinna Wale, “Ginakakokta gjiglokanu satu panchi, wanepji gwanu gishpakamtinpotunanuko waneya.
41006011	Wa pejnuruneko wa gma yoptotjenepa, gma jemjenepa, gishpakamtinpatka wa waneya giplokjiximtanu gistapjixipagi wa rumatikolupa wanna chinanu.”
41006012	Rushpakamtatkana. Runkaklewatna wa yine genshinikanutanu.
