41006013	Gixo kamchine maleka ruknokna. Ruyookana ringi gixo yayixachine. Rutukna.
41006014	Pogirchi Girore jemyegitlu. Gi rixanu rumatkatka Geso giwaka. Wane china, “Gwa wa katlewatachri yotunota gipnachineya. Giyagni kgiyaklewaklerni Wale.”
41006015	Pimrine wane china, “Giliyni.” Pimrine wane china, “Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachrini. Satu tokanchi geneklewatachri pixka rixa.”
41006016	Jeminitka Girore wane china, “Gwakni wale wa nustaknoojixanru. Yotunotatka.”
41006017	Gi rixanu muchikawako Girore towyegitanru. Kashijixlu Gwani. Rostujixlu wa yoshmakwaka wa Giroryana chinanu repuru gnunro Wilipi. Wa wala ganunrota Girore.
41006018	Gi rixanu wa Gwa wane chinatkalu Girore, “Ginanshichkalurni wa pepuru gnunro waneyyi pixinri.”
41006019	Giyagni Giroryana gayegixlu. Taluka giylajixletlu. Gi tumkatlu.
41006020	Gi rixanu wa Girore piklu wa Gwa. Rumatlu wa wale jeji poyagkakachrini wa kpashirni. Girukotlu. Giyagni jeminri gi rumatanshinikanuta. Yijnakotlu rumuwleya.
41006021	Runa pagogne ruglepoktapini wa Girore wa poyagkakawalaputetini. Meyiwlu nachnewlupa kamruta wa tsrukakalune, tsru gitaakalune, wa wanna potu Kalile gajene chinanu.
41006022	Tjiglokamta Giroryana nshicho. Tansata. Tmeyitlu Girore ga wa waleyma gwanatachine nikawakakwa. Pogirchi wane chinro makloji, “Pagjitanno klunerukokta paluka. Gita genekanyi.”
41006023	Wale kawchinau wane chinro, “Pagjitanru pejnunanuka nenekanyi. Ganikajiko npogirewatyawakaya nenekanyi.”
41006024	Tushpakamta wala. Wane chinro tunro, “¿Klu nagjitanu?” Wala wane china, “Wa Gwa katlewatachrijiwu pagjitanu.”
41006025	Waneklutka giyampotu tjiglokyegitlu pogirchi. Tagjitlu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu xawakniko, penekyapno satu kotajipi Gwa Katlewaklerujiwu.”
41006026	Wa pogirchi wamonuwnapotuta, seyni Wale kawchinanu chinrekaka, waleyma gwanatachine nikawakakwaya chinanu, gi raluka giknokakletokanuta.
41006027	Waneklutka pogirchi yokanatlu satu girukotjeru. Yokanatlu ranikjiwutikolupa. Wa wale wane ya. Rustaknojitlu yoshmakawakaya.
41006028	Ranikjiwutatkalu kotajipiya. Reneklo makloji. Wa makloji geneklo tunro.
41006029	Jeminitkana wa yimaklene, runna. Ranikluna gimane. Yomlechi rutakluna.
41006030	Yokanatanune rapatjetna Geso yegi. Runkaklewyegitluna ptowruko klunerukta kamrutanrunapirana, wa runkaklewtapinrina.
41006031	Geso wane china, “Ginanu gixa mkoje yineru mwiyawakanuya. Gapnanutanu pshinitsonu.” Gi rixanu gi gepikna wane ginachine yachine. Gi wa kagognena nikinripna.
41006032	Ralimtna wanna mkoje sato kanawaya yineru mwiyawakanu.
41006033	Gixo geta yaletna. Rumatkana. Wane rasukyegitluna chijiya ptowruko tsru pokchikaka gajene. Wanna gapka gapoka. Rapatyegitluna Geso.
41006034	Ruptekamta Geso. Retna gixolune yine. Retwamonutna gi rixanu gowegane pixka rixna gi waneyna girukotjerna. Yinuwaka ginkaklewyegitna gixopirana.
41006035	Wa kayi rixinitka yimaklene gapyegitlu. Wane chinna, “Gewni yineru mwiyawakanu. Wa kayitkani.
41006036	Pyokanatanna yine wa sana yinripna, wa pokchikaka tyesretaya wa ragjityapluna nikanrupna.”
41006037	Rugita Wale. Wane china, “Gixa genekanna nikanropna.” Wane chinruna, “¿Wanerge gayanu? ¿Wagjitanro jimapro gepi pachproji wenroloto, wenekyapna nikinropna?”
41006038	Wale wane china, “¿Gi pejnu jimapro waneygi? Getapanro.” Rumatinitkana. Wane chinna wanna, “Pamyo. Gepi shima.”
41006039	Towutna wanna tuplatinripna pejnuruneko paptogkaka peklomta poleru.
41006040	Tuplatna paptogkaka satu pachkaka ga wa pamyomolkaka koxa.
41006041	Geso kashichlo pamyo jimapro ga wa gepi shima. Tengogne yigata. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Wa jiknajrotlu jimapro. Renekna yimaklene rutspamtinripna. Raneksatkana wa pejnuruneko wa gepiroto shima koxa.
41006042	Nikatkana pejnuruneko. Jinanutkana.
41006043	Koschekluna psojkaka pamole gepi kojita katsepo, ga wa shima koxa.
41006044	Wa nikachine pamyo waragka jejine.
41006045	Waneklutka kanawa ratskojixatkana yimaklene wa Wetsayta gapka yinripna wakanu. Wane yakopshinna yokanatna gixolune yine.
41006046	Rali gingaletinitkana wane ya magka. Ragjigognetapa.
41006047	Wa kayi rixinitka wa kanawa ganikajgatkalo tsru wenuya. Walepje chiji gwatka.
41006048	Retna kegeknanuwatna ranikgatyawakna. Wa kannipgyalu satkakanna. Wa goyechnokawpotuko Geso ginyegitna. Tsru wenumta yapananumta. Raluka giknoglemtna.
41006049	Retinitkaluna wa tsru wenumta yanamtyawaka. Kagwakluna pagixanu. Saplewatanna.
41006050	Gi rixanu pejnuruneko getlu. Rumyekanna. Waneklutka Geso giynumatna. Wane china, “Kiglenshinikanupgi. Gitni. Gi wa mpikanu.”
41006051	Ratskota kanawa wanna yegi. Rutukamta kannipgyalu. Ruglajpotutanna.
41006052	Gi rixanu gi rumata jemluna wa jimaprokakapirana. Shikowgajitna wane rixinrina.
41006053	Wa koprugatinitkana, wane yana Genesarchijne. Rutspakatkana.
41006054	Ruptekinitkana wa kanawaya, waneklutka rumatkatka Geso.
41006055	Rasuktatna psoluko walesretaya. Yinuwaka gwapletkana pnumnu gajene yayixachine gijekoyna ginakakta jemyegityawakluna.
41006056	Ginakakokta rapoka pokchikaka, tsru pokchikaka, sana, rutaakana giputkaka yayixachine. Ragjitluna wa kamrukashatyapluna gimkaluptostsiya. Wa pejnuruneko wa kamrukachine wanna gitskalgatka.
41007001	Rapatyegitluna Gwariseyone, pimrine koxa yonchikgapine wa Gerosale giyakatyachine.
41007002	Wanna getinna wa pimrine Wale yimaklene nikyawakna gimyoyna gimuteru, walenwa merkakotu yangakanna.
41007003	(Wa Gwariseyone, pejnuruneko Gote gajene waneyna giykolu rutsrukateynina wa gixo kata ma meromyogkanna ma merkakanotkanna gi wa nikanna.
41007004	Giputu ruyakatyana ma powratkannuwana gi nikanna. Gixo pimripirana wa yoptotanruna kamrutanruna, wa gerkikaluro wa girapkaka, gashgajkaka, yowumaswagkaka.)
41007005	Repomgaluna Gwariseyone ga wa yonchikgapine, “¿Klu chinanu wa pyimaklene gi wa wane rixna wa gitsrukaachinni giykole, seyni nikna wa gimyoyna gimuteru?”
41007006	Geso wane china, “Sanowashatachingi. Goyakalu tokanu kigle reneklewata Gisayiya gixapirana. Wane rixa yonatkaluru: Nyi yine gispuyna kagwakpiratno seyni rajiyna wajra yanna Gitaya.
41007007	Magijeru yonogleyegitnona. Runkaklewatna wa Goyakalu tokanu pixkalutu wa yokanrekakna wa yine.
41007008	Wa gixa giknoklu Goyakalu yokanatanru tokanchi. Waneygi wa yine giykole.”
41007009	Wane chinkoxna Geso, “Kigle giknokle gixlu wa Goyakalu yokanatanru tokanchi wa gomkagityaplu wa gixako giykole.
41007010	Wa Moysisi wane china, ‘Pkagwakpiratanru puru punro.’ Wane koxa china, ‘Girukta gogimtukaklu ruru, runro walepni wa gipnanu.’
41007011	Ga wa gixa wane china, ‘Wa satu jeji wane chininri wa ruru ga wa runro, “Ptowruko gitanu wa wale gipxakyapmakyi, korwani” ’ (Walenwa genekashlu Goyakalunupa).
41007012	Gixa gi gichichanutkalu pagixanu kamrutinripa ruru, runro chinanu.
41007013	Gixa kaspuklu wa Goyakalu tokanu wa giykole chinanu wa gixako genekanru. Gixo wale pixkalutu gkamruta.”
41007014	Wa tomgatnakna gixolune yine. Wane chinna Geso, “Gyijnakotanno pejnurunekgi. Gimata jemanu.
41007015	Gike wane wa yineru malekate wa jiglokinripa rumkata puchotletyaplu, seyni wa yineruyako gishpakyachri walenwa puchotlu wa yineru.
41007016	Girukokta kajnakopnapa wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
41007017	Rutspalamtinitka wa gixolune yine yegi, jiglokinitka panchi, repomgaluna yimaklene wa yapkaklupiranaya.
41007018	Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gixa koxa wane gixa mumatjemkangi? ¿Gi ge gimata jemlu wa pejnuruko maleka gwachri wa jigloklu yineru gi rumkata puchotletlu?
41007019	Gi rixanu gi wa jigloklu wa raji seyni ginanwakapje. Rushpaka gichkajetyawaka.” Wale powratlu ptowruko niikaluru.
41007020	Wane china, “Wa yineruya gishpakyachri, ga ga walenwa puchotlu yineru.
41007021	Wa gitoko rajiyna yine rushpakya gektutu shinikanchi, gimopatlewlu, gapoklewlu, giylalewlu,
41007022	chowguchkaka, gimkapnuglu, muglenchi, yokwikaklu, mpogijpatnuchi, sotanugnuchiygale, mupashiregnuchi, tserpiranawlu walenanuko, sepronchi.
41007023	Ptowruko wa tye muglenchi gishpaka gitokoya. Ga ga walenwa puchotlu yineru.”
41007024	Wane yiyatka Geso. Tirosreta ga wa Sitoya yatka. Jiglokamta panchi. Wale galuklu gike ma mumatyanupa, seyni gi rumkata yogimleta.
41007025	Seyni waneklutka tjemyegitlu sato suxo. Tshicho wgenejni waneyanro kamchi puchotlewatachri. Tuna. Tyoptsojityegitlu gijixistsi.
41007026	Wa suxni Kriyko, Sirogwenisanemole. Tagjitlu ruknokyaplu maleka kamchi tshichoya.
41007027	Geso wane chinro, “Petashgapkatanna jinanu rixinripna yine wgenene. Gi kigleru kashichikolupa wa nikanruna wgenchine, ruknokikolupa kewene yegi.”
41007028	Tugitlu wala. Wane chinru, “Gigi, Gitsrukaachi, seyni wa wanna keweneko nikawakakwa rapukote nikyaluna wa mturune gipopejre.”
41007029	Wale wane chinro, “Tye tokanchi chinanu pyanutka. Wa kamchi gishpakyatkalo wa pshicho.”
41007030	Talimta topji. Tetamtatkalo tshicho tukluganatatka tojeko, wa kamchi gishpakyatkalo.
41007031	Wane yiyatnaka wa Tirosretaya. Sito yapamta. Tsru wenu Kalile ya, Ntekapoli ganikajite.
41007032	Ranikyegitluna satu majnakotu, myanumatkatu. Ragjitluna rutakamyogogotyaplu.
41007033	Geso ganiklu yine mwiyawakanu Walepje. Yoshmakamyojita gijnakopnakakaya. Rutskagata. Kamrukannutlu.
41007034	Tengogne yigata. Kosennipgyapotuta. Wane chinru, “Gegwata.” (Walenwa: Putpukanu.)
41007035	Rutpukajnakopnatatka. Waneklutka rushpirokatka wa kashinatjeru wa ginnu. Yanumpotutatka.
41007036	Yokanatatkana Geso gikena runkakanna, seyni gixkatmaka wane china wanepnuteko runkaklewamtna.
41007037	Tsru giglajru rixna. Wane chinna wanna, “Kiglepotlu ptowruko kamruta. Jemkakna majnakone. Wa myanumatkane yanumkaka.”
41008001	Wa walegognekaka wanetnakna gixolune yine. Gi wa waneyanna nikanruna. Geso tomgana yimaklene. Wane chinna,
41008002	“Netwamonutna gixolune yine, gi rixanu waneyatkana mapgogne Gitayma. Maleshayna nikanruna.
41008003	Wa nyokanatinnatkana ma niikanna wa gipjina, rujxipakgapotanunna. Wa pimrinni gowuka giyakatyana.”
41008004	Rugitluna yimaklene, “¿Ginaka giyakatyachro jimapro wa satu gimkata ginanuwkakletanunna gewi yineru mwiyawakanuya?”
41008005	Geso gepomgana. Wane chinna, “¿Gi pejnu jimapro waneygi?” Wanna wane china, “Payokgipre.”
41008006	Yokanatna wa gixolune yine tuplatinripna chiji. Kashichlu wa payokgiprerutu jimapro. Poyagnutatka. Jiknajrotlu. Wa renekna yimaklene rutspamtinripna. Reneksatna gixolune yine.
41008007	Waneyna psotsotaji shima wgenkaka. Wale giglenshinikanyegitlo. Wa yokanatna rutspamtinripna. Rutspamtna gixolune yine yegi.
41008008	Nikatkana. Jinanna. Koschekluna wa gixetachri psojkaka payokgipre kojitaya.
41008009	Wanegetkona gepkoxamkoje waragka yine. Yokanatatkana.
41008010	Waneklutka ratskota wa kanawa yimakleneyma. Wane ya Talmanutasreta.
41008011	Runna Gwariseyone. Yinuwaka yoptopiiretluna. Rujgaluna Waleya getkaluru tengogne gajeru. Yantaletluna.
41008012	Wamonuwnalenshinikanuya kosennipgyapotuta. Wane china, “¿Klu chinanu rujgaluna getkaluru tye gimuweekakgognenatachine? Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa reneekona getkaluru tye gimuweekakgognenatachine.”
41008013	Kaspukatkana. Kanawa ratskotatnaka. Wakanu ya.
41008014	Ramtaka gwalemtluna nikanruna. Maleshayna. Satupje jimapro waneyna wa kanawa.
41008015	Yokanatna Geso. Wane china, “Xako. Ggirukotinwa wa gisekachriya wa Gwariseyonenu, wa gisekachri koxa Girorenenu.”
41008016	Yoptopirkakna wannakakluko. Wane chinkakna, “Jimapro maleshaywu.”
41008017	Geso gimatlu. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Klu gyoptopirkakya wa maleshaygi jimapro? ¿Gi ge gishinikanuwatawa? ¿Gi ge gimata jemanatawa? ¿Waneygi shikolu gaji?
41008018	Kaygalmakgi ¿gi ge geta? Kajnakmakgi ¿gi ge gjema? ¿Gi ge gishinika? Wa njiknajrotinitkalu pamyo jimapro wa pamyo waragkaneya ¿gi pejnu kojita katsepo wa psojkaka gkoschekyatkalu gixa?”
41008019	Wanna wane chinru, “Pamole gepi kojita.”
41008020	“Wa payokgipre jimapro wa gepkoxamkoje waragkaneya ¿gi pejnu kojita katsepo wa psojkaka gkoschekyatkalu gixa?” Wanna wane china, “Payokgipre kojita.”
41008021	Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge gimata jemawalu?”
41008022	Rapokna Wetsayta. Rawapluna Wale yegi satu maygaletu. Ragjitluna kamrukyaplu.
41008023	Geso kanjimtlu wa maygaletu. Raniklu pokchi kegneteya. Gitskaga sagaygaletlu. Rogwaka rutakamyoyegitlu. Repomgalu, “¿Gi ge petlu pa gixanu?”
41008024	Rumrekgata. Wane china, “Netna yine, wa yanachine wa gagmuna pixka gixachine neta.”
41008025	Rumepe gitakamyoyegletatnaklu wa giygale. Waneklu retatka. Ruglewatatka. Retashpotutatka gowuka ptowrupotuko.
41008026	Geso yokanatatkalu gipji. Wane chinru, “Gi wa pokchiko pyanu.”
41008027	Yatkana Geso wa yimakleneyma. Pokchikaka ya Susari Wiliponu yegi. Wa gatnugapoya repomgiyna wa yimaklene. Wane chinna Wale, “Wa yine ¿katu wane chinna Gita nixinri?”
41008028	Wanna gigitlu. Wane chinruna, “ ‘Gwa Katlewakleru;’ pimrine, ‘Giliya;’ pimrine, ‘Satu Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine.’ ”
41008029	Wa Wale gepomgana, “¿Ga wa gixa katu wane chinno?” Rugita Petro. Wane chinru, “Pixni Kristoyi.”
41008030	Rujretna ma yanumsatinitipna Walepirana gikena.
41008031	Yinuwaka ginkakletna wa Yineru Wgene salewninripa gixo, ma yoptotikotupa tsruneya, tsrukakalune sasertoteneya, ga wa yonchikgapineya. Ruylatikolupa. Yotunotanu mapgogne chininri. Wane chinru tye tokanchi gipgujetkaluru.
41008032	Wa Petro ganiklu. Yinuwaka chigetjeretlu.
41008033	Geso giprotakyegitna. Retjetna yimaklene. Chigetjetlu Petro. Wane chinru, “Najxigi pyanutka, Satanasyo. Gi rixanu gi pushiniklu wa Goyakalupirana, seyni wa yinepirana galikaka pushinika.”
41008034	Tomgana Geso wa gixolune yine yimakleneyma. Wane china, “Katukokta galuka gwagajxigletno raalixinwa walenanuko. Rawanro koroshishkitate. Romkagitanno.
41008035	Girukokta galuka gishatkapletlu wa ruwekinri, ruwekinri ramginina. Girukokta gamtakanru ruwekinri Gita chinanu, Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi chinanu, rushatkapanru ruwekinri.
41008036	Gi rixanu ¿klu kigleyanaplu wa yinerupni psolchijnekmaka waneyapmaklu wane rixle, seyni ruwekinri ramgapotutinina?
41008037	Gi rixanu ¿klu rupekotanru yineru ruwekinripa?
41008038	Katukokta gipatewatanno ga wa ntokanuya koxa wa nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine yegi, kgimopataklerune ga wa kmukochirerunni, Gita wa Yineru Wgenno koxa gipatewatanru wale, wa nuninipa Nuru goyaknuya, wanna kpashirine Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene numuninipa.”
41009001	Wane chinkoxna Geso, “Galikaka wane nchingi, pimrine gewi gwachine gi wa getumganru gipnalu ma metkanuwalunachi Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka ginachripa giyakluyma.”
41009002	Patsrujirgogne rixinri, Geso ganikna Petro, Santiyako, Gwa. Ranikna wannapje satu magka tenolu. Wanna getanu satuko kogetkogatka.
41009003	Ga wa gimkalu yochigatatka klatpotlu. Wa giwru pixka rixa. Giyagni gi satuna kgerkakleru tye chiji gwachri gimkata klataa gixkakletlu tye pixka.
41009004	Wanna yegi rupgujewniyna Giliya ga wa Moysisi, Geso giynumsatachine.
41009005	Petro, wane chinru Geso, “Yimaklewatachri, poyagnu gewi gawinri. Gewi wkamrutanru mapa gimajechri. Pixanupa satu, Moysisinupa satu, wa Giliyanupa satu.”
41009006	Gi rumata yanumatana, ga wa pikanna.
41009007	Runa kyachgapererumko. Wale chikletyegitna. Waneylu tokanchi kyachgapererumkoya, wane chinachri, “Tyenwa Noturu nalukanru. Wale gyijnakotanu.”
41009008	Pshinitsonu potu retanatinna, gikena retatkana wannayma. Gesopjetkani.
41009009	Magka yopikyatkana. Yokanatna Geso gike runkakinripna wa retanruna, ma yotunotkanuwa wa Yineru Wgene gipnachineya.
41009010	Rushinikluna wa tokanu. Rugjekakna wannakakluko, “¿Klunerni wa tye, wa gipnachinyegiya yotunotini?”
41009011	Repomgaluna. Wane chinruna, “¿Klunerni wa yonchikgapine chinanru wa Giliya gapkamka ginanu?”
41009012	Rugitna Wale. Wane china, “Giliya galikakni rungapkatanu rugletyaplu ptowruko. ¿Gi chinpiranata koxa wa yonchi wa Gita Yineru Wgenno gixo nsalewninripa, ga wa gi nkagwakpiratko?
41009013	Seyni wane nchingi Giliya ginpatka. Wane rixluna klunerukokta ralukyawakna chinyawaka yonchi walepirana.”
41009014	Runinitkana wa yimaklene yegi. Retna gixolune yine wanna yegi. Wa yonchikgapine yoptopiratna wanna.
41009015	Waneklutka pejnuruneko gixolune yine getlu. Ruglajitna. Rasukyegitluna. Ralukluna.
41009016	Geso gepomgana, “¿Klu gyoptopiratyana wanna?”
41009017	Gixolune satute gigitlu. Wane china, “Yimaklewatachri, nanikyegityi noturu. Waneyanru kamchi myanumatkatu rixkakjeru.
41009018	Ginakakokta kashichyanru shipchojtakakjetanru. Soliwanamjetana. Raskereygitana. Ruprigananumtana. Wane nchinna pyimaklene ruknokyapluna maleka, seyni gi rumkatluna.”
41009019	Rugita. Wane chinna Wale, “¡Ya nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine malixkane! ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta numwanutkagi? ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta nakotangi? Ganikyegitanno.”
41009020	Ranikyegitluna. Retinitkalu waneklutka wa kamchi shipchojtakakpotutanru mturni. Chiji rapokamtana. Ruprurutana. Rushpaksolnamatana.
41009021	Geso gepomgalu ruru, “¿Gipshini wane gixlenatkalu?” Wale wane china, “Mturuyakawa rixini.
41009022	Gixo kata ruknoklu xirnachri, wa gonga koxa ruylatyapmaklu, seyni pumkatiniplu pupxakanunwu. Petwamonutanunwu.”
41009023	Geso wane chinru, “Pumkata galixletinipa, ptowruko gimkata gixkota wa galixachri chinanu.”
41009024	Waneklutka mturu giru saplewata. Wane china, “Nalixa. Pupxakanno nma malixlenuya.”
41009025	Geso getna gixolune yine. Rasukamtna. Potowurutna. Chigetjetlu kamchi. Wane chinru, “Kamchi myanumatkatu majnakotu, Gita yokanatyi pushpakyegitanru wale. Gi wanepnuteko pjiglokanutkalu.”
41009026	Saplewatana. Shipchojtakakpotutanru mturni. Rushpakamtatka. Walenitka gipnachri pixka rixanatka. Giyagni gixo wane china, “Rupnanatka.”
41009027	Seyni Geso kosemyotlu. Tunwakaklu. Yotunota.
41009028	Wa jiglokinitka wa panchi yimaklene gepomgalu wannapje rixini, “¿Klu chinanu wixa gi wumkata giknokletlu maleka?”
41009029	Wane chinna Geso, “Wa tye pixkalutu gi gimkata gishpakleta seyni gagjigognerupjeya.”
41009030	Wa rushpakinitkana waneya, Kalile yapamtna. Gi raluka gimatkota.
41009031	Wa runkaklewyegitna Geso yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookalurupno yinemyoya. Ruylatannona. Nupnanu. Nyotunotanu mapgogne rixinri.”
41009032	Seyni wanna gi gimata jemlu wa tokanu. Pika gepomgaletluna.
41009033	Rapokna Kapernawo. Panchi rawinitka, Geso gepomgana, “¿Klu gyoptopirkakananumtya gatnugapoya?”
41009034	Wa pochkena. Wannakakluko yoptopirkakananumtna wa gatnugapoya katni wa tsru potu.
41009035	Tuplata Geso. Tomgana pamole gepi. Wane chinna Wale, “Girukokta galuka muchinanu gixleta, walepni wa gapkatpotutachri pejnuruneyapa. Pejnuruneko gipxakjetachrinapni.”
41009036	Koscheklu mturu. Wanna ganikajite rutaklu. Kampuklu. Wane chinna Wale,
41009037	“Girukta yoptotlu satu tye pixkalutu mturu Gita giwakaya, Gita yoptota. Girukta yoptotno, gi Gita yoptota seyni wa nyokanatjeru galikaka.”
41009038	Wane chinru Gwa, “Yimaklewatachri, wetlu satu wa pgiwakaya ruknokyana maleka kamchine. Wale gi gomkagitwu. Wujretlu gi rixanu gi romkagitwu.”
41009039	Geso wane china, “Gi wa gijretanru. Wa gikena wane gixa giyakleta ngiwakaya wa rumkata pshinitsonu gektuchinretno.
41009040	Wa wma kamnixjetni wixasretni wale.
41009041	Girukokta genekangi sato girapistonoya gonu ngiwakaya gi rixanu Kristonungi, galikaka wane nchingi gi ramgini wenutikolupa.
41009042	“Girukokta gitspeekaklu wa satu wa nyi mturune wa nalixjene Gita, kiglemkalu waleya rushriknojitikolupa wa tsru sotlu ginripiya, tsru wenu ruknokikolupa.
41009043	Wa pumyo gitspeekakinipyi pustakanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa wa puwekinri mastsi, wanepnute gepimyoyi pixinipa wane pyanuna Gigena wa xirnachri muwnakatupa.
41009044	Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu.
41009045	Wa pujixi gitspeekakinipyi, pustakanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa wa puwekinri yokmatachriyi, wanepnute gepijixyi pixinipa puknookona Gigena wa xirnachri muwnakatupa.
41009046	Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu.
41009047	Wa puygale gitspeekakinipyi, puknokanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka paygalepjeya wanepnute gepiygaleyi pixinipa puknookona Gigena.
41009048	Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu.
41009049	“Wa pejnuruneko tuwutkalurupa xirnachriya.
41009050	Kiglerni wa tuwu, seyni wa tuwu mushi rixinitka ¿klu gmorotanu? Waneyapgi gixnanuko tuwu. Kigle gimwakaklepgi.”
41010001	Wane yiyatka. Gotesreta ya, Gorta wakanute. Rapatyegitatnakluna gixolune yine. Rumepe ginkaklewyegitatnakna wa rixjetyawaka.
41010002	Rapyegitluna Gwariseyone. Repomgaluna wa muklukanutlege giknokagnunrolu wa gnurchi. Rumlukanatluna.
41010003	Wale gigitna. Wane china, “¿Klu yokanyegitgi Moysisi?”
41010004	Wane chinruna, “Moysisi gichichlu kiruka yonatyapa ma ganunrotyanpatkalo. Ruknokanrotka.”
41010005	Wane chinna Geso, “Nshiknu gaji chinanu yonyegitgi wa tye Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
41010006	Seyni yinuwakyawaka giyaklewlu, jeji, suxo kamrutna Goyakalu.
41010007	Giyagni jeji giknokanna ruru, runro. Rupxaletanrotkani ganunro.
41010008	Wa gepinanna pamanepje rixanutkana. Giyagni gi gepimanetkana, seyni pamanepjetkana.
41010009	Giyagni wa Goyakalu gapatanru ma mutspalkakinitipa wa yineru.”
41010010	Wa panchiya repomgatnakluna yimaklene walekotnaka.
41010011	Wane chinna Geso, “Girukokta giknoklo wa ganunro, sato ganunrotinitnaka rumopatlewata wala chinanu.
41010012	Wa suxo giknokinri tganuru wa satu tganurutini, tumopatlewata.”
41010013	Ranikyegitluna mturune wa kamrukyapna. Wa yimaklene chigetjetna wa ranikjerna.
41010014	Retinri Geso jigekanuwata. Wane chinna Wale, “Getashatanna mturune runyegitannona. Gi gimaletanna. Gi rixanu wanna pixkalune wannanni wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.
41010015	Galikakni wane nchingi, girukokta gi yoptotanru Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka mturu pixka gi wa jiglokanruna.”
41010016	Kampukna. Wanna gogo rutakamyota. Ruglenshinikanyegitna.
41010017	Gatnugapo yapananumtini, runyegitlu satu gasukamtachri. Yoptsojityegitlu. Repomgalu, “Yimaklewatachri kigleru ¿Klu nkamrutanu nyoptotyaplu wa nuwekinri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa?”
41010018	Geso wane chinru, “¿Klu chinanu wane pchinno kigleru? Gi satuna waneru kigleru. Satupjeru, Goyakalupje.
41010019	Wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru pumata: Gi pumopatlewatanu. Gi puylalewatanu. Gi pchowguwatanu. Gi wa maleshawaka pupgujtalewashatanu. Gi pyokwirewatanu. Pkagwakpiratanru puru ga wa punro.”
41010020	Rugitlu. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, pejnuruko tyekaka nkamrutatka nmaklutinyakawa.”
41010021	Geso yopukgatlu. Raluklu. Wane chinru, “Satupje pmagatya. Pyanu. Pushankanru ptowruko wane pixle. Penekanna wa kwamonurune. Waneyapyi ponikolewlu tengogneyapa. Punanu. Pomkagitanno. Panikanru pkoroshishkitate.”
41010022	Seyni wale yanshinikanpotutana tye tokanchiya. Ralimta wamonuwatachri gi rixanu waneyanru ponikowle gixo wane rixle.
41010023	Geso geknokyegitna. Wane chinna Wale wa yimaklene, “Kyaprepotlu jiglokinripna Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wa ponikolune.”
41010024	Wa yimaklene giglajita wa tokanuya, seyni Geso gigitatnaka. Wane chinna Wale, “Wiwine, ¡gi payaprenanutkalu wa jiglokyapluna wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wanna serojiproji gaponshinikanutachine!
41010025	Myapretmakni kameyo tsapujripna tjiglokinripa wa ponikolu pnute jiglokyaplu Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.”
41010026	Wanna giglajpotuta. Wane chinkakna wannakakluko, “¿Katu gimkata gognetkaakotanu?”
41010027	Geso yopukgatna. Wane china, “Wa yineru mumkatanutu, wale rumkata Goyakalu. Wa ptowruko rumkata Goyakalu.”
41010028	Petro yinuwaka wane chinretlu, “Petanu. Wixa giknokamtlu ptowruko. Womkagitatkayi.”
41010029	Giyagni Geso wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, girukokta giknokapjimta, yegwakane, repurune, repurone, wa ruru, runro, wugenene, wa rusanatkaka giknokachri Gita chinanu, wa Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi chinanu,
41010030	wale geneeko satu pacha kata pnute xani tyegognekaka, panchikaka, yegwakane, repurune, repurone, runrone, wugenene, rusanatkaka, kojwawakchi koxa. Pagognesha ginachripa reneeko ruwekinri mnikawnakatupa.
41010031	Seyni gixo muchichachine gapkatpotutanu. Gapkatpotutachine wannapni wa muchichachinpatka.”
41010032	Wanena gatnugapo. Gerosale kanikna. Kosekamtna Geso. Ruglajitna. Romkagitluna pikachineko. Ranikatnakna wa pamole gepine. Yinuwaka Wale wane chinretna wane rixikolpatka:
41010033	“Xani Gerosale wkanika. Wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyookotka wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa yonchikapine yegi. Ruklukanuwnayegjixannona nupninripa. Samyokannona payinyegiko.
41010034	Rapnokatannona. Kochipjetannona. Rutskagjetannona. Ruylatannona. Wa mapgogne giknoginpatka nyotunotanu.”
41010035	Wa Santiyako Gwa, Sewereyo wgenene, rapyegitluna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, waluklu klunerukokta wagjityayi wane pixanwu.”
41010036	Wane chinna Geso, “¿Kluneru galuka wa nixyapgi?”
41010037	Wanna wane chinru, “Penekanwu Pixa wuxiplatanyi poyaknu yegi, satu potuklesretate, satu pkegnetesretate.”
41010038	Wane chinna Geso, “Gi gimata wa gixa gagjitanru. ¿Gimkatge giiretyalo wa girapistono wa Gita girinro? ¿Gimkatge gkatletikolu wa katlu wa Gita katikolu?”
41010039	Wanna wane chinru, “Wumkatlu.” Wane chinna Geso, “Wa girapistono nurapre girini. Wa katlu wa Gita katikolu wale koxa gkatikolupa.
41010040	Seyni tuplalu npotuklesretate, wa nkegnetesretate gi wa Gitanni nenekyaplu, ga wa wannanupni galpokyegitkalunepni.”
41010041	Wa jeminitkaluna, wa pamole yinuwaka gimtuwnaleta Santiyakoya ga wa Gwaya
41010042	Geso tomgana. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimata wa tsrukakalune kagwakikalune payinetskalaya towutlewpotutna. Wanna gitsrukatene tsru gitaaka wanna chinanu.
41010043	Seyni gi wane gixkakanu, seyni girukokta galuka tsru gixletnachriwa gixayegkakluko walepni wa gipxakjerupa.
41010044	Girukokta gixayegkakluko galuka muchinanu gixletnawa, walepni pejnurune wayegreru.
41010045	Gi rixanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno gi nuna nupxakikolupa, seyni nuna nupxaklewatinripa, nenekyaplu nuwekinri nwenutyaplu rushpakinripna gixolune yine.”
41010046	Geriko yana. Geriko yiyatka Wale, ga wa yimaklene, ga wa gixolune yine. Wartimeyo wa maygaletu, Timeyo wgene, tuplanata wa gatnugapostsi, ragjigognenatlo sroschi.
41010047	Jemyegitlu Walenwa Geso Nasare gajeru. Yinuwaka saplewleta. Wane china, “Geso, Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanno.”
41010048	Gixolune yine chigetjetlu pochke rixinripa, seyni wanepnuteyaka saplewjeta, “Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanno.”
41010049	Geso tunwata. Wane china, “Ntomganru.” Tomgaluna wa maygaletu. Wane chinruna, “Kiglenshinikanupyi. Palnanu. Tomgayi.”
41010050	Ruknoksapowlechratamta. Rupteka palnaleta. Yayegitatkalu Geso.
41010051	Geso gepomgalu. Wane chinru, “¿Klu palukatka wa nixyapyi?” Maygaletu wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, netinripa.”
41010052	Geso wane chinru, “Pyanu. Palixle gitskalakyi.” Waneklutka retatka. Romkagitatkalu Geso wa gatnugapoya.
41011001	Goliwa Magkatetkana. Gi gowukatkana Gerosalestsi, ga wa Wetpage ga wa Wetani. Wane yokanatyana gepi yimaklene.
41011002	Wane chinna Wale, “Gyanu tujra pokchi gixa ginaple gajeru. Pokchipotuko gapokinpatka wane gikshikinri mporo wgene tsatkaluru, gi satuna yineru mtuplatjitanutuwa. Gkoshrikanru. Ganikanru.
41011003	Girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘¿Klu chinanugkoshpiroklu?’ wane nchinanu, ‘Gitsrukaachi galuklu. Waneklutka yokanatanutnaklu gewi.’ ”
41011004	Wane yana. Rukshikluna mporo wgene tsatkaluru gipgyapto maleka rutspalgapotyawaka. Koshpirokluna.
41011005	Pimrine wane gwanatachine wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu gkoshpirjetlu mporo wgene?”
41011006	Wanna wane china Geso chinyawakna. Retashatkatkana.
41011007	Ranikatkaluna mporo wgene Geso yegi. Gimkalna sapwakatjitluna. Wale gogo tuplamtatka Geso.
41011008	Gi gepikna gikwekamkatachine gatnugapo. Pimrine gagmunasurkaka gistakamta. Rukwekamtluna gatnugapo.
41011009	Kosekamtachine ga wa kaptomtachine saplewjenanumtna. Wane china sapletna: ¡Wuya! ¡Gimalwutkaluru ginachri Gitsrukaachi giwakaya!
41011010	¡Gimalwutkaluru wutsrukatni Tawi pogirewtapyawakni! Waneplu pogirewatyawaka. ¡Wuya tengognepotuya!
41011011	Geso gapokamtatkalu Gerosale. Kpashiwakapji ya. Retjetinitkalu ptowrunanuka, kayi rixinitka rushpaka. Wa Wetani ya wa pamole gepiymananuko.
41011012	Waleprika Wetani yamtyatkana. Nachlu.
41011013	Retlu gowukaya gikera kasureru. Yayegimtlu, wane getko rukshikinri pagixanu. Rapyegitinri gike rukshika. Gisurepjeni. Gi gipapkoni wa sagiwatinri wa gikera.
41011014	Geso wane chinanru gikerni, “Gikena niksagitanutkayi gike pixiniko.” Jemluna yimaklene.
41011015	Wane yana Gerosale. Jiglokamta kpashiwakapji. Yinuwaka maleka giknokletna kgishanrewaklerunni ga wa gagjijetachinni wa kpashiwakapjiya. Yawnajkaklo kwalkaka gipekoserojiprojitachineni, motkoko gishanretachinni tuplapijere koxa.
41011016	Gi ruchichna Wale wa satuna ganikyalo kastonolo wa kpashiwakapji.
41011017	Runkaklewyegitna. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Gi ge yonatkaluru: Wa nopji gagjigognewakapji chinkalurupni ptowruko payinerumnunanuko yegi? Ga wa gixa wane gixatkalu gitawakapna kachowgurune gwiyawaka pixka.”
41011018	Yijnakotluna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene wa yonchikgapine. Rujgaluna gi rixpoko giylaletanruna gi rixanu pikluna. Wa ptowruko yine giglajita runkaklewleya.
41011019	Wa kayi rixinitka tsru pokchiya yiyatka Geso.
41011020	Ruknoginna goyechnokawa, retluna gikera rupriganatka gitskiymananuko.
41011021	Petro gishinkapatka. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, petanru gikera pkamakpiratanruna rupriganatka.”
41011022	Geso, wane chinna, “Galixanru Goyakalu.
41011023	Galikaka wane nchingi, katukokta wane chinru tye magka, ‘Puxrikanu. Wa tsru wenu puknokinwa.’ Gi wa shikpokwakgajitachriko, seyni ralixa wane rixanu chinyawaka, wanepotuko rixanu wale chinanupa.
41011024	Giyagni wane nchingi, ptowruko girukokta gagjitanu gagjigognetini, galixinri gyoptotanru, waneyapgi gixinripa.
41011025	Wa ntunwa gagjigogneretini, gkaspukinri wa waneygi gixinipa pnu gixjeru, wa gixa Giru tengogne gajeru koxa kaspukmukochiretyapgi wa gmukochirkaka.
41011026	Ga wa gixa gma kaspukinri, wa Giru koxa tengogne gajeru gi wa kaspukmukochiretanungi.”
41011027	Satokna Gerosale. Yotaljeta kpashiwakapjiya. Runyegitluna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa yonchikgapine, wa tsrune.
41011028	Wane chinruna, “¿Klu putakika pixa tyekaka pkamrutinri? ¿Katu gitakyi tyekaka pkamrutinri?”
41011029	Wane chinna Geso, “Nepomgangi gixa satu tokanchi. Gigitanno. Wanepnute nunkakyapatkagi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.
41011030	Wa Gwa katlewle, ¿tengogne giyakatyachrirge? ¿waka yinenukla? Gigitanno.”
41011031	Yoptopirkakna wannakakluko. Wane chinna, “Wane wchininipmaka tengogne giyakatyachrini, Wale wane chinanunwu, ‘¿Klu chinanu koxa gi galixlu?’
41011032	Ga wa wane wchiniplu, ‘Yinenni’ ”—wanna pikna gixolune yine, gi rixanu pejnuruneko kagwaklu wa Gwa walenwa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri.
41011033	Rugitluna Geso. Wane chinruna, “Gi wumata.” Wane chinna Geso, “Gita koxa gi ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.”
41012001	Yinuwaka Geso yanumsayegletna yapkakluya: “Satu jeji gitaklu sana gowasha. Pirijeretjetlo. Tapgatyawakapa jitota. Tenopjiru kamruta. Renekamtna sana girukotachine. Pnu yatka. Wajra ya.
41012002	Talixinipapko yokanatlu wayegrechri sana girukotachine yegi rawapyaplo wa sana girukotachinyegiya wa gwachrotka gowashaya.
41012003	Kashichluna. Kochipjetluna. Yokanatanruna maleshalni.
41012004	Rumepe yokanreyegitna satu wayegrechri. Ruylajiwutanruna. Rektutetluna.
41012005	Rumepe yokanretatnaklu satu. Waleni ruylatna. Pimrinnikoxni gixni. Kochipjetkanna pimrinni. Ruylatkanna pimrinni.
41012006	“Waneyawalu satu gituru ralukanru potu. Yokanyegitna waleni koxa gapkatpotutachritka. Wane china, ‘Kagwakpiratanruna noturu.’
41012007	“Wa sana girukotachine wane chinna wannakakluko, ‘Tyenwa yoptotachripatka. Ginanu. Wuylaganru. Yoptotanrupmaka wixanpatkani.’
41012008	Kashichluna. Ruylatluna. Ruknokluna maleka gowashaya.
41012009	“¿Gi rixpokotanu wa kgowashateru? Runanu. Ruylatanunna wa sana girukotachinepni. Renekanna gowasha pimrine.
41012010	¿Gi ge tye yonchiga getyongata? Wa sotlu myoptotkotu kamrupjitachineya, Wale gitaaka yoptowaka gitsejita.
41012011	Gitsrukaachi chinanu kamrutka wa tye. Rakaglajiygaletwu.”
41012012	Raluka kashretluna. Wanna tsrukakalune pikna gixolune yine. Rumata jemluna wa wannapirana wa yapkaklu. Kaspukluna. Yatkana.
41012013	Yokanyegitluna pimrine Gwariseyone ga wa Giroreyone wa kashtokanutyapluna.
41012014	Runna wanna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, wumatyi Pixni mayrokletyi. Gike pkagwakpirata. Gi petlu wa yinermanewle giglenu, seyni galikaka potu punkakwu Goyakalu gatnugapotepirana ¿Wa munanshichkotnige renekikolupa wenrukaka wa Susa waka gike? ¿Wenekerge waka gi wa wenekanru?”
41012015	Wa Wale gimatlu rixashleyna. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Klu chinanu gimlukanutno? Ganikinno sroschiproji netyaplo.”
41012016	Wanna ganikyegitlu. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Katu yaglunwa tye, ga wa katunni toyonga?” Wanna wane chinru, “Susanni.”
41012017	Wane chinna Geso, “Genekanru Susa wa Susanuko, ga wa Goyakalu genekanru wa Goyakalunu.” Ruglajitna Waleya.
41012018	Runyegitluna Sariseyone. Wanna wane china maleshaplu gipnachine yotunre. Repomgaluna. Wane chinruna,
41012019	“Yimaklewatachri, Moysisi yonyegitwu wa satu yegwakluko gipnini, ruknokagnunrotana, gi ruknokawgenetana wa repuru gwanro wale gnunronanni, ruxolewkakinripa giklopishapa yegwakluni chinanu.
41012020	Wanenannina payokgiprerune moletkakachine. Muchinanu tsru gnunrowata. Rupnana. Gi ruknokawgenetana.
41012021	Gapkatatachri gwatnaklo. Rupnana koxa waleni. Gi waleniko giknokawgenetana. Mapa rixinrini waneko pixka rixana.
41012022	Payokgipre gwalo. Gi wannaniko giknokawgenetana. Suxni gapkata potu gipnaletanatka.
41012023	Yotunruklupa yotunotinipna, ¿katu gnunropni wa wannaya? Gi rixanu payokgipreni gnunronitka wa wala.”
41012024	Rugitna Geso. Wane china, “¿Gi ge mpupjeta gi rixanu gi gimatlu wa Tokanchi Yonatkaluru, gi wa Goyakalu giyaklewleko?
41012025	Wa yotunotinipna wa gipnachineya gi ganunrowatanutkana, gi kashimyokaakotkana, seyni wa Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene wannako pixka rixanutkana.
41012026	Wa yotunotachinepa gipnachinepirana, ¿gi ge getyongatlo wa Moysisi kirukate, wa Goyakalu giynumatyawaklu kawshipiriya? Wane china: Gitni wa Gawra Goyakalute, Gisaaka koxa Goyakalute, ga wa Gakowo koxa Goyakalutno.
41012027	Gi wa gipnachine Goyakalutni, seyni giwekachine Goyakalute. Giyagni gixni gamtakanshinikanpotutana.”
41012028	Rapoka satu yonchikgapri koxa. Yijnakotna rugjekakyawakna. Rumata kigle gigle Geso gixna. Repomgalu, “¿Girni wa tsru potu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi pejnuruko pnute?”
41012029	Geso gigitlu, “Wa muchinanu walenwa: Pjemanu, Gisrayili. Wa Gitsrukaachi Woyakalute, wa Gitsrukaachi satupjeru.
41012030	Pushinikanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute psolpotuyako pajiya, psolpotuyako punshinikanuya, psolpotuyako pmuchkonuya. Ga ga walenwa muchinanu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi.
41012031	Gepi chininri tye pixka rixa: Pushinikanru pumole pixnanuko pixka. Maleshlu satu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi tyekaka pnute tsru.”
41012032	Wa yonchikgapri wane chinru, “Kigleru, Yimaklewatachri. Galikaka wane pchina, Satupjeru Goyakalu. Maleshlu satu. Walepjeni.
41012033	Wushinikanru psolpotuyako wajiya, psolpotuyako wunshinikanuya, psolpotuyako wmuchkonuya. Wushinikanru wumole wixnanuko pixka, tyekaka ptowruko genekashlu yoxiikalurupa wa genekashlu giylatkalurupa pnute tsru.”
41012034	Geso getinri wa yonchikgapri gigitlu rumatleya, wane chinru, “Gi wa gowukyi pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu.” Gi satuna tserpiranawanshinikanyegitlu repomgiyatkalu.
41012035	Kpashiwakapji runkaklewatya. Geso wane china, “¿Gi chinna wa yonchikgapine wa Tawiklopisha rixinri wa Kristo?
41012036	Wa waleko Tawi wane china wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya: Gitsrukaachi wane chinru Nutsrukate, Ptuplatanu npotuklesretate, Wa nutakinpotukna pkamnixjene pujixipta rapukote.
41012037	Waleko Tawi wane chinru Gitsrukaachi. ¿Gi rixpokotyawaka giklopishayapni?” Gixolune yine rumuwleyna yijnakotluna.
41012038	Wane china Geso wa runkaklewleya, “Ggirukotinwa wanna yonchikgapineya, galuka yanretachine gowuukalkaka gimkaluyna. Ralukluna ralukikolupna giputuya.
41012039	Ralukluna wa tsrukakalune tuplapijere ginkaklewawakapjikakaya, muchinanu tuplapijkaka koxa nikjetikowakaya.
41012040	Konapjijetkanna gipnagnurutachronni. Rixashleyna gogagjirgognerkakna. Tsru potu ruklukanuwnayegjixikolupna.”
41012041	Tuplanata Geso tugnantakikowaka genekashlukaka ginaple. Retjetna yine gi rixpoko gitakletyaplona sroschi gignantakikowaka. Gixna ponikolune gitaklo gixo.
41012042	Tuna sato suxo gipnagnurutachro kwamonuro. Tutaklo gepi mturomchataaji. Walanwa satopje sintawo.
41012043	Tomgana Geso wa yimaklene. Wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, wa twu suxo gipnagnurutachro kwamonuro wala gitaklo pejnurune pnute gitakachine gignantakikowaka.
41012044	Pejnuruneko gitaklo ruxetanrona. Wa twu suxo twamonnupoga tutaklo pejnuroko walanu, pejnuruko tuwekinripa.”
41013001	Wa rushpakamtini kpashiwakapjiya, satu yimakleru wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, ¡petanru gi pixka sotlerutkakananni, ga wa gi pixkapjirutunanni!”
41013002	Geso wane chinru, “¿Petlu tyekaka tsru panchikaka? Gi wa rutukanu sotlu rogotkakinripa, gi wa mujrolekatunpakni.”
41013003	Tuplatini wa Goliwa Magkateya kpashiwakapji ginaple, repomgaluna wanna mkoje rixinna, Petro, Santiyako, Gwa, Gantirishi,
41013004	“Punkakanwu. ¿Giklupni wa tyekakapa? ¿Klu getkaluru wanepa wa tye pejnuruko wa poyagkakinpatka?”
41013005	Yinuwaka Geso wane chinretna, “Xako gi satunako yokwitangi.
41013006	Gi rixanu runanna gixo ngiwakaya, wane chinachinepa, ‘Gitni wa Kristono.’ Yokwitanunna gixopni.
41013007	“Seyni wa gixa jeminiplu wa giylalupirana ga wa pogiwlesha giylalupirana, gi gkegeknanuwatanu. Rumkata wane gixleta, seyni gi wa yoptukyawakapnichi.
41013008	Gi rixanu ruylakakanna pachijne gajene ga wa pachijne gajeneyma, ga wa pogirewatyawaka giylakakanu pogirewatyawakayma. Waneplu giyolikchijrukaka pachijnemnunanukaya. Waneplu nachlukaka. Tyekakapni muchichachripa wa kachinolkakapa.
41013009	“Gixako getinwa gixnanuko. Wa samyokangina jemanshinikankakyawakapna. Ginkaklewawakapjikakaya gkochipjetiko. Gitsrukaachine, pogirchine getanu gixapni tunwatanuna Gita chinanupa gipgujtalewlu waneyapna.
41013010	Muchinanu ptowruneko payinerumnunanuka runkakikolupna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchiya.
41013011	Wa ganiikoklunpatka gixa wa nsamyookoklunupa gma mapookanupachi gi gkojwakinwa wa gixa chinyawakapa. Gi waleko gyanshinikanutanu, seyni wa genekikolupa gixa walepapkopa, wane nchinyawakapa. Gi wa gixni yanumsatachinepgi seyni Giwekikaluru Kpashiripni.
41013012	“Gimole samyokanru rupninripa gimoleko ga wa ruru samyokanru gituru rupninripa. Wa wugenenna gimtuwnayegitanuna rurunepnina. Ruylajixanunna rurunepni.
41013013	Gayegixkalunepgi pejnuruneyako Gita giwaka chinanu, seyni wa kashnantakanshinikanutachripa yoptukyawakpotunanukopa walepni wa gognetkaako.
41013014	“Wa getyongatachripa gimata jemanru: Wa getiniplu gagnanutkaluru gimtukpotlewatachri wane rawinri mawiyawakanupmaka, waneklu Gote gwachine gasukanu. Magkakaka yanna.
41013015	Panchi gogo gwanatachri wa rujrukanmaka, gi jiglokapjitanu ranikyaplu gipji gajeru.
41013016	Wa sana gwanatachri gi wa satkapanu rawapyaplu gimkalu.
41013017	¡Gi waneni wa kamshironepni ga wa gashichakachinepni walegognekakpatka!
41013018	Gagjigognetanu gi waneyapgi ginapuklu gasuktatinripa.
41013019	Wa walegognekakapa waneplu salewakchi wa mwajejetkatu wa muchi giyakletinitkalu wa Goyakalu giyakle, ga wa xanigognenanu. Gi wane rixanu.
41013020	Wa Gitsrukaachi ma sustakanmaklu walegognekaka gi pamanenapnikmaka gognetkaakona seyni tsomitkalune chinanu wa Wale tsomitanune sustaklu walegognekaka.
41013021	Giyagni satu wane chininipgi, ‘¡Gewru Kristo!’ ga wa wane chiningi, ‘¡Getanru. Waneru!’ gi wa galixanu.
41013022	Rupgujewnanna wale migje Kristone, wa wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Kamrutanruna getkalurkakapa ga wa koglajrukakapa, yokwitikolupmakna tsomitkalune wa rumkatmaka wane gixleta.
41013023	Xako gixa. Nunkakatkagi psoluko ma mapookanuwa.
41013024	“Seyni walegognekakpatka ruknoginpatka wale salewakchi, wa tkachi gichpokanu. Wa ksuru gi wa pokamlatanu.
41013025	Wa katagirkaka gijirotanu tengogneyapa. Wa gichkolkaka tengogne gajeru kowshiwshitko.
41013026	Wanepnute retannona Gita wa Yineru Wgenno kyachgapererumkoya ginachripno. Tsru nuyakle ga wa noyaknu numunanu.
41013027	Waneklu nyokanatanna notowrene tengogne gajene rapatjetikolupna ntsomitanune. Wa gepkoxamkojesretkakayako yoptukyawakpotuko chiji, yoptukyawakpotuko tengogne rapatjerewatinna.
41013028	“Gimatanru yapkaklu gikerapiranaya. Wa tyosnuygalejiplutinitka, tupcheksuretinpatka, gimatanutkalu wa walapustsitkani.
41013029	Waneko pixka gixa getinpatkalu wane gixlutkani tyekaka, gimatanutkalu gi gowukpatkalu. Gipgyaptostsitkalu.
41013030	Galikaka wane nchingi, gi ruknoganu tye gimuweekakgognenatachinesha wa ptowruko tyekaka ma mixkanuwa.
41013031	Wa tengogne ga wa chiji giknoganu, seyni wa ntokanu gi giknoganu.
41013032	“Seyni walegogne, wale gipapko gike gimata, gi wa Goyakalu towreruneko tengogne gajene, gi wa Gituruko, ga wa Girchipje galikaka gimata.
41013033	Giyagni giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu. Gi gimatlu giklupaktani gipapkopa.
41013034	Waneko pixka rixa wa jeji wajra yachri. Ruknokamtlu gipji. Rutakamtna wayegrene. Satkaka renekamta kamrure. Gipgyapto gwachri towutamta ruyokinripa.
41013035	“Giyagni gixa giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimata giklu runanu wa kwangixlerupji, patako kayi, patako ganikajyechno, patako gaxawripa yanumatini, patako goyechnokawpotuko.
41013036	Wa rawraka ginretinipa ma mukshiikyanupgi gimkanatachingi.
41013037	Wa gixa nchinyagi wane koxa nchinna pejnuruneko: Giyokanu.”
41014001	Gepigogne magatiniwa Tsru Giknoglushgogne wa Tsrugogne jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotu, rujgaluna tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yonchikgapine gi rixpoko kashichyapluna gayroklewluya ruylatyapluna.
41014002	Wane chinna wanna, “Gi wa tsrugogne wkashichanru, ma mejnugimalewatinitipna yine.”
41014003	Wetani rawanata Geso Simopji gijirgitutpachri. Tuplanata nikjetikowakaya. Tuna sato suxo. Waneylo pastono pgamlugalo nartogapje kwenuru potu. Tupokastonotlo. Tuyokjiwutlu.
41014004	Wanena pimrine gimtuwnachine wannananuko. Wane chinna wanna, “¿Klu chinanu wane tixa saletletatkalo pgamlugalo?
41014005	Wa tumkata gishankakotmaka wa twu pgamlugalo, wa mapa pachaproji pnute. Walamka kwamonurunni geneeko.”
41014006	Geso wane china, “Getashatanro. ¿Klu chinanu nsalewnakaklo? Kigleru kamrurchi tkamrutyano.
41014007	Gi rixanu waneygognenangi wa kwamonurune gixayma. Wa galukiniplu gimkata kigleru kamruyegletna, seyni gi waneygognenanupgi Gita.
41014008	Wa wala kamrutlu tumkatyawaka. Tuyokagnaputlo pgamlugalo nomane wa nkapnatikolupa.
41014009	Galikaka wane nchingi, ginakakokta runkakletiko Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wa psolchijneko wa tye koxa tkamrutanru wala wane chinkalurupa wa tushinikikolupa wala.”
41014010	Gota Giskaryote satu pamole gepi rixinri yayegitna tsrukakalune sasertotene samyokyaplu Geso wanna yegi.
41014011	Wanna jeminitkalu, rumuwatna. Rupiratyaluna renekyapluna sroschiproji. Rujgaluna ruglepoktapinri gi rixpoko samyokletyapluna.
41014012	Muchinangogne jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotu wa renekashatinrina giylatkalurupa wa Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanu, yimaklene wane chinru, “¿Ginaka paluka yokanretwu wa walpokotyaplu wa pnikanrupa Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanupa?”
41014013	Yokanatna gepi yimaklene. Wane chinna Wale, “Tsru pokchi gyanu. Wane yoptotingi satu jeji wa gashgaji gonu gwanru ganikachri. Gomkagitanru.
41014014	Ginakakta jigloka wane nchinanru wa kapjiru, ‘Yimaklewatachri wane china, “¿Ginaklu wa napokagrukowakle wa nnikyawakapa Tsru Giknoglushgogne nyimakleneyma?” china.’
41014015	Wale gekakgitangi satu teno gajeru tsrugruko gali galpokletkalurutka. Wane galpokotinri wixanupa.”
41014016	Wane yatkana yimaklene. Tsru pokchi yatkana. Rukshikluna Wale chinyawakpotukna. Ralpokotluna Tsru Giknoglushgognenupa.
41014017	Wa kayi chininitka wane ya wa pamole gepiyma.
41014018	Wa tuplatinitkana nikawakakwa, nikna. Wane china Geso, “Galikaka wane nchingi, wa satu gixate numnikjeru, wale samyokanno.”
41014019	Wa wanna yinuwaka wamonuwleta. Wane chinna wanna satkaka, “¿Gitgetkopni?” Satu koxa, “¿Gitgetkopni?”
41014020	Wane chinna Geso, “Wa satu pamole gepi rixinri, wa gigakachri Gitayma kolpetoya.
41014021	Galikaka Gita wa Yineru Wgenno wane nyanu chinyawaka wa yonchi Gitapiranaya. ¡Gi waneni wa tye jeji, wale chinanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyooko! Kiglemkalu tye jeji chinanu ma mushpaakanmaka.”
41014022	Wa nikanatinna wanna, Wale kashichlu jimapro. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Jiknaglu. Wane gixachri renekna. Wane china, “Gyoptotanru. Tyenwa nomane.”
41014023	Wale kashichlo girapistono. Poyagnutatkalo. Renekna. Rurna walaya pejnuruneko.
41014024	Wane chinna Wale, “Tyenwa nograga wa gerotu tokanchi gipiratkaluru chinanu, gixoluru yineru chinanu giyookaluru.
41014025	Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa nuranutkalo gowajiga wa walegognepotuko wa nuranro geroto wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawakaya.”
41014026	Wa wanna shikaletlu gimalwuru. Rali shikaletinitkaluna, Goliwa Magkate yana.
41014027	Wane chinna Geso, “Pejnurunepnikgi gixapni gitspeekaakona. Yonatkalurutkani: Nuylakanru wa girukotapratachri. Rupalatanna wa gowegane.
41014028	Nyotunotanu. Nali yotunkakletkoklunpatka, Gita gapka kosekanu gixaya. Kalile nyanu.”
41014029	Petro wane chinru, “Wa pejnurunekmaka gitspeekaako, ga wa gita gike.”
41014030	Geso wane chinru, “Galikaka wane nchinyi, wa pixa xani tye yechno ma yanumatkanu gnapu wa gaxawripa gepi kata, pnutatanno mapa kata.”
41014031	Seyni wale psolmuchkonuko tokanuwna. Wane china, “Wa nupnanmaka koxa Pixayma, gi wa nnutatanyi.” Pejnuruneko waneko pixka china.
41014032	Wane yana Getsemani giwakatletyawaka. Wane chinna Wale wa yimaklene, “Ntuplatanu gewi. Nagjigognetkakopshini.”
41014033	Ranikna Waleyma Petro, Santiyako, Gwa. Yinuwaka giglajreta, wamonuwnaleta.
41014034	Wane chinna Wale, “Nonshinikanu nwamonuwnapotutya gipukchi pixkapotuko. Gkagwakanu gewi. Giyokanu.”
41014035	Psotsotaaji wajrayaka ya. Wane yoptsojita chijiya. Ragjigogneta wa rumkata wane gixletikolupmaka, ruknoganu Waleya wale salewakchi.
41014036	Wane china, “Gagwa, Nuru, ptowru gimkatachriyi Pixa. Pkoshripatinno twu girapistono, seyni gi wa Gita galukyawakapni, seyni Pixa galukyawakapni.”
41014037	Runa. Retamtna gimkanatachine. Wane chinru Petro, “¿Simo, pumkanatge? ¿Gi ge pumkata giyokleta pshinitsonu?
41014038	Giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu gma jiglokinitipa yantaletikowakapa. Wa ginshinikanu galikakni jmererni, seyni manchi muchkotni.”
41014039	Rumepe yaletinitnaka ragjigognetyawaka, waneko pixka chintokanutatnaka.
41014040	Satokatnaka. Retamtatnakna gimkanatachine. Ruxapnewatna. Gi rumata gigretluna.
41014041	Runa mapa kata rixinritka. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimkanutka. Gapnanutanu. Wanekotka. Nopapko gapokatka. Xani Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookatka kmukochirerunemyoya.
41014042	Gyotunotanutka. Gayanutka. Gi gowukatkalu nsamyokjerupa.”
41014043	Waneklutka yanumsanatiniwa Geso, runatka Gota. Walenwa pamole gepi rixinri. Waleymana gixolune yine kyoglolewaprerune, kgagajererune. Wannanwa tsrukakalune sasertotene gayinerutene, yonchikgapineyegirune koxa, tsrunyegirune koxa. Gotaymamnutkana.
41014044	Wa samyokjeru genekagnaputatkana saturutu gimaxiklechi. Wane chinna wale, “Girukta namlutanu gita, Walepakni. Gkashichanru. Ganikanru. Ggirukotpotumtanru.”
41014045	Runinitka, waneklutka runyegitlu. Wane chinru, “¡Yimaklewatachri! ¡Yimaklewatachri!” Ramlutlu.
41014046	Romyokyegimtluna. Kashichluna.
41014047	Wa satu wane gwanatachri koshpakyoglolewapreta. Rustaklu wa sasertote gitsrukate potu wayegreru. Yostakjepitlu.
41014048	Geso wane china, “¿Gishpakamta gixa yoglolewapiyma gagajeyma, kachowguru pixka gixa kashretnoge?
41014049	Pagognemnunanuka gixayma nwanata, nunkaklewanata wa kpashiwakapjiya. Gi wa wane gkashichyano, seyni wa poyagkakikolupa wa yonatkalurkaka, wane gixyatkano.”
41014050	Ruknokamtluna pejnuruneko. Rasukatkana.
41014051	Satu jeji gomkagitlu sapwakmanetachri gichrataya. Jejine kashichlu.
41014052	Wa wale ruknokachratamtlu. Rasukyana mamkatni.
41014053	Ranikluna Geso sasertotene gitsrukate potu yegi. Rapatna Walyegiya pejnuruneko tsrukakalune sasertotene, tsrune, yonchikgapine.
41014054	Wa Petro gomkagitlu gogajxigiyako. Sasertote gitsrukatpotupjipotunanuko romkagitlu. Tuplanata towrechineyma. Rolkanata chichpawa.
41014055	Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya rujgaluna gipgujtalewlumka Gesoya rupninripa, seyni gi rukshikluna.
41014056	Gi rixanu gixo gipgujtatlu maleshawaka, seyni wa rupgujtalewlena gi wa pixkakakluni.
41014057	Pimrine gapoka. Rupgujtatluna maleshawaka. Wane chinna wanna,
41014058	“Wixa jemlu wane chininri, ‘Gita yotkakanunru wa tye kpashiwakapji myochi kamrutikaluru. Wa mapagogne chininri satu nkamrutanu myochi mkamrutikotpatka.’ ”
41014059	Seyni rupgujtalna wanna koxa gi pixkakakluni.
41014060	Wa sasertote gitsrukate potu tunwata ganikajitskalaya. Repomgalu wa Geso. Wane chinru, “¿Gikeko pugityano? ¿Klu rupgujtatyayina wanna nyi Pixaya?”
41014061	Seyni Wale pochkeru. Gike rugita. Sasertote gitsrukate potu rumepe gepomgaletatnaklu. Wane chinru, “¿Pixlege wa Kristoyi Gimalwutkaluru Wgenyi?”
41014062	Geso wane china, “Gitakni. Gixa getanno Gita, Yineru Wgenno, tuplatyawakapa potuklesreta ruyakle Goyakalu, nuninkoxapa kyachgapererumkoya tengogneya.”
41014063	Giyagni wa sasertote gitsrukate potu suskakamkata. Wane china, “¿Klu wanepnute magatyawu gipgujtalewatachine?
41014064	Gjematkalu wa mupashiregnuchi china. ¿Gi pixka getle gixlu?” Wa wanna pejnuruneko wane chinyegitluna wa Wale giklukanuwna rupninripa.
41014065	Pimrine yinuwaka gitskagjeretanru, rushyagojitanruna, yotmutanruna. Wane chinruna, “Goyakalu tokanu peneklewatkoxewa.” Towrechine giptagojitlu.
41014066	Rapuko rawanata Petro panchiya. Tuna sato rupxakjero wa sasertote gitsrukate potu.
41014067	Wa tetinri wa Petro rolkanatini, tyopukgatlu. Wane china, “Pixni Waleymalutyi, Geso Nasare gajeru.”
41014068	Seyni wale nutata. Wane china, “Gi numatlu. Gi koxa numatjemlu wa pchinyawaka.” Rushpaka. Maleka ya. Yanumatatka gaxawripa.
41014069	Wa gipxaklewatachro getinri, tyinuwaka wane chinretatnakna wane gwanatachine, “Tyenwa satu wannate.”
41014070	Seyni wale nutatatnaka. Gowukshini wane gwanatachine wane chinruna Petro, “Galikakni pixni satu wannatyi. Gi rixanu Kalile gajeryi.”
41014071	Yinuwaka kamakpiirewleta, wane chinreta Wale kawchinanu, “Gi numatpotunatlu wa tye jeji wa Walepirana gyanumsatinri.”
41014072	Waneklu gaxawripa yanumatatka gepi kata chininri. Petro gishiniklu wa tokanu Geso chinyawaklu, “Ma yanumatkanugnapu gaxawripa gepi kata, pnutatanno mapa kata.” Yanshinikanunatlu wa wale, chiyagatatka.
41015001	Waneklutka wa goyechnokawa jemanshinikankakatkana wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa tsruneyma, wa yonchikgapineyma, wa ptowruneko jemanshinikankakachineyma. Rostutluna Geso. Ranikatkaluna. Pilato samyokatkaluna.
41015002	Pilato gepomgalu, “¿Pixlege wa Goteyone Pogiryi?” Rugitlu. Wane china, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
41015003	Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene jigyegitlu gixo.
41015004	Repomgatnaklu Pilato. Wane chinru, “¿Gi ge pugita? Petanu. ¡Gi pajigyeglenanukta rixyegityina!”
41015005	Ga wa Geso gi wa waleko rugitya. Giyagni ruglajita Pilato.
41015006	Wa tsrugogneklu rushyegjetna gostutkaluru girukokta ragjitna.
41015007	Wane rawanata satu Warawasu giwakatletachri gostutkaluru yagotkakachineyma, giylalewatachine yagotkakluya.
41015008	Runna gixolune yine. Yinuwaka gagjiretluna rixjetyawakna.
41015009	Pilato gigitna. Wane china, “¿Gi ge galuklu gita gishyegityapgi wa Pogirna Goteyone?”
41015010	Rumata ranxalna chinanu samyokluna tsrukakalune sasertotene.
41015011	Seyni wa tsrukakalune sasertotene komyekanshinikanutna gixolune yine rushyegityapna Warawasu galikakapni.
41015012	Rugitatnakna Pilato. Wane china, “¿Klu nixyalu galuka wa gixa giwakatyalu Goteyone Pogire?”
41015013	Wanna saplewatatnaka, “¡Koroshishkita putakjixaganru!”
41015014	Wane chinna Pilato, “¿Klu gektutu kamruta?” Wanna saplewpotuta, “¡Koroshishkita putakjixaganru!”
41015015	Pilato galuka giglenshinikanretna yine. Giyagni rushyegitna Warawasu. Kochipjetka Geso. Rali kochipjeretkoklunutka, samyoklu koroshishkita rutakikolupa.
41015016	Wa solalone ganiklu wa tsru panchi gitokote. Walenwa Pretoryo. Tomgana ptowruneko wa solalone.
41015017	Yoshmakluna pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri. Yoshmakluna sagyeta kona kamgikolu.
41015018	Yinuwaka galukletluna, “¡Wuya, Goteyone Pogire!”
41015019	Ruylakjiwutluna katsluksuya. Rutskagjetluna. Yonogyegitluna. Yoptsojityegitluna.
41015020	Wa rali gapnokatletinitkaluna, komkagatkaluna wa pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri. Waleko gimkalu yoshmakatkaluna. Ranikatkaluna koroshishkita rutakyapatkaluna.
41015021	Rutjikakluna satu giknogamtachri, Simo, Surene gajeru, Galegantro, Rogwo giru, wa sana ginyachri wa ranikyaplo wa Geso koroshishkitate.
41015022	Kolkota chinikowaka ranikatkaluna. Walenwa yokaakaluru, Jiwchiswaga yegi.
41015023	Renekluna winga smurna yapjetkalurga, seyni gi wa yoptotlo.
41015024	Koroshishkita rutakluna. Kotspaltamkatluna. Rutakluna rupenookaklena ranikyapluna satkaka.
41015025	Wa goyechnokawasreta koroshishkita rutakatkaluna.
41015026	Wa tokanu rogwaka gwachri yonatkaluru wa jigyegitikolu, wane china, “Wa Goteyone Pogire.”
41015027	Waleyma koroshishkita rutaakana gepi kachowgurune, satu potuklesreta, satu kegnetesreta.
41015028	Poyagkaakatka Tokanchi Yonatkaluru, wane chinachri: Mugleneyma kagwakikolupa Wale koxa.
41015029	Mupashiregnuchi chinruna giknogachine. Ruwnownojiwutna. Wane chinna, “¡Gaga! Wa Pixni wa kpashiwakapji yotkakachripyi, mapgogne chininri pkamrupjitanru.
41015030	Pixnanuko gognetkakinwa. Pujrukanu wa koroshishkitaya.”
41015031	Waneko pixka rixna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene gapnokatletlu. Wane chinkakna yonchikgapineyma, “Pimrine rognetkaka. Walenanuko gi rumkata gognetkakletnawa.
41015032	Kristo, Gisrayiline Pogire gijrukanu wa xani wa koroshishkitaya. Wetyaplu. Walixyaplu.” Wa Waleyma koroshishkita gitaakalune koxa yangalu.
41015033	Tumananutkani ruchpokatka psolchijnepotunanuyako kayinwakasreta rapokinpotunanuko.
41015034	Kayinwakpapko Geso saplewata. Tsruplaji rixa. Wane china, “Geloyi, Geloyi, ¿Glama sawajtani?” Walenwa yokaakaluru: “Noyakalute, Noyakalute, ¿klu chinanu puknokatkano?”
41015035	Jeminrina pimrine wane gwanatachine, wane chinna wanna, “Gjemanru. Tomgalu Giliya.”
41015036	Rasukamta satu. Katsopi kotsgatapyaluna kachgalu. Katsluksu rutaklu. Reneklu ruranrupa. Wane china, “Getashatanru. Wetkoxewa gikta runanu Giliya koshpakapyaplu.”
41015037	Geso tsruplaji rixa. Rupnanatka.
41015038	Waneklutka mkachrichrata gimaletanatachri kpashiwaka potu gajeru giskakamtatka gepichratatkalu. Teno rumuyaka giskakletyatka chijiina.
41015039	Wale ginaple tunwanata satu ksolaloteru. Retanata wane rixa gipnaletinri. Wane china, “Galikakpotunanni tye jejni Goyakalu Wgenni.”
41015040	Wane koxa tunwanatna suxone. Retanatna gowukayako. Wa wannatskala rawanatna Mariya Maktala gajero, Mariya Santiyako mturu wa Gosi ginro, ga wa Salome koxa.
41015041	Wa wanna Kalile rawanatiniwa romkagjenatluna. Rupxakjenatluna. Wa pimrone gixo waneklu koxa, Waleyma kanikachine wa Gerosale.
41015042	Wa kayi rixinitka wa galpokotikolgogne, walenwa gapnanutikalurgognestsi.
41015043	Gosi Garimate gajeru, jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajeru kagwakpiratkaluru. Wale koxa kagwaklu pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu. Wane ya. Mpiikatu jiglokyegitlu Pilato. Ragjitlu Gesnimane.
41015044	Wa Pilato giglajita wa rupninrinatka. Repuklu ksolaloteru. Repomgalu wa muchikawako rupninrinatka.
41015045	Runkaklu wa ksolaloteru. Reneklu gimanetka Gosi.
41015046	Wale gagjitlu mkachrichrata. Jijrukatkalu. Poyitatkalu mkachrichrata. Rutaklu yomlechi wa sotlu jitotikalurupna. Rakaprurjixlu sotlu wa giyomle gipgyaptote.
41015047	Wa Mariya Maktala gajero, wa Mariya Gosi ginro, getanatna ginakakta rutakanunruna.
41016001	Wa ruknoginitka wa gapnanutikalurgogne, Mariya Maktala gajero, wa Mariya Santiyako ginro, wa Salome, ragjitlona pgamlugalo wa ruyogatyapluna.
41016002	Goyechnokawpotuko muchinangogne simana wane yana yomlechi yegi. Tkachi gishpakatka.
41016003	Wane chinkakananumtna wannakakluko, “¿Katmakla gakaprurutyanwure sotlu yomlechi gipgyaptote gajeru?”
41016004	Wa retinitkaluna, retluna wa sotlu gajritkalurutka. Gi rixanu tsrupotunanu sotlu.
41016005	Jiglokatkana yomlechi. Retluna jeji tuplanatachri potuklesreta, gimkalu gowukalu gitakachri klatalu. Ruglajpotutna.
41016006	Wane chinna wale, “Gi wa giglajitanu. Gijgalu Geso, Nasare gajeru, wa koroshishkita gitakanatkaluru. Yotunomtatka. Gi gewitkalu. Getanru rutakikowaka.
41016007	Seyni gyanutka. Ginkakanna wa yimaklene, Petro koxa, Wale gapka wane kosekingi. Kalile yanu. Wane getinitkalu chinyawakpotukgi.”
41016008	Wane yiyatkana. Rasukamtna yomlechiya. Wa rutatatna. Ruglajitna. Giketsotaji runkakna, piklena chinanu.
41016009	Wa yotunotinitka wa goyechnokawpotuko muchinangogne wa simanatka, rupgujewnayegitlo muchinanu wa Mariya Maktala gajero. Walanwa ruknokakamchitetanro payokgipre kamchine.
41016010	Tyinitka wala. Tunkakna wa Waleymalunenanu, wa wamonuwnanatachine, chiyaganatachine.
41016011	Wa wanna jemyegitinitkalu ruwekinritka, wa retikolutka walaya, gi ralixna.
41016012	Wanepnute gepi wa wanna yanananumta sana yachine. Geso wane gipgujewnayegitna. Satuko kogetkogatka.
41016013	Wane yiyatkana. Runkakna pimrine. Gi wannako ralixna.
41016014	Ralipretka rupgujewnayegitna Geso pamole satupjene wa tuplanatinna nikawakakwaya. Chigetjetanna wa ma malixleyna shikowgajitinriyna, gi rixanu gi ralixkana retjene yotunomtinritka.
41016015	Wane chinna Wale, “Psolchijneko gyanu. Ginkakletanru Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pejnurunenanuko giyakotkalune yegi.
41016016	Wa galixachripa katko wale gognetkaako, seyni wa malixakletu giklukanuwnayegjixko.
41016017	Tyekaka getkalurkaka kamrujetanna wa galixachine. Gita giwakaya ruknokinrina kamchine. Gerotu patokanchikaka yanumatinna.
41016018	Koschekanruna gimnukaka. Rurinrina kamakalu gi wa rumtukanna. Wa yayixachine gogo rutakamyotanna. Ruglewatanna.”
41016019	Wa Gitsrukaachi gali yanumsayegletinitkana, tengogne yoptotikatka. Tuplatatka Goyakalu potuklesretate.
41016020	Wanna gishpakamtatka. Runkaklewatna pasretamnunanukaya. Wa Gitsrukaachi gikamrurewatna. Wannaya Goyakalu kamrujetlu getkalurkaka. Gitsrukaachi poyegitlu tokanu wa getkalurkakayma. Wane gixkalurupa.
42001001	Wane rixa. Gi gepika yagota yonretlu wixa yegi kamrutikalurutkapirana. Yagota ginkakpokwakletluna.
42001002	Waneko pixka rixna reyinuwaklewayakawa getachine. Wannanwa tokanchi kamruklerune. Ga wa wanna samyokwu tyekakapirana.
42001003	Giyagni kigle getle nixlu gita koxa nyonyegityi, kshinikanuru potu Teyogwilo. Rixpokotyawaka nunkakyi. Gi rixanu reyinuwakayakawa nomkaginshinikanpiranpotutlu,
42001004	pumatpotutyaplu koxa pixa poyegitkalurni wa tokanchi punkakikolu.
42001005	Gotechijne pogire Giroreklunanu, waneru satu sasertote, Sakariya giwakatletachri, Gawiyaklopishaneyma gitaakaluru. Ganunronwa Gaaroklopisha. Gilisawetinwa tgiwaka.
42001006	Ga wa gepiko poyagkakachinni Goyakalu getanuya. Muklukanuwnakane. Romkagitluna pejnuruko Gitsrukaachi yokanatanru, Wale gitakanru.
42001007	Gi kwugenna gi rixanu migatni Gilisaweti, ga wa gepiko gi gepika walapu waneyanatkana.
42001008	Wa gipapko gapokinpatka sasertote kamrure kamrutinri Goyakalu getanu, wane rixa.
42001009	Sasertotene gixjetyawaka, wale gitaaka yochpikyaplu pgamlupagiri. Kpashiwaka potu Gitsrukaachinu jigloka.
42001010	Pejnuruneko gixolune yine maleka gagjigognenatya yochpiikakopshini pgamlupagiri.
42001011	Gitsrukaachitowreru gipgujewnayegitlu. Pgamlupagiri yochpikjetikowakakwa potuklesretate tunwata.
42001012	Wa retinitkalu Sakariya, kojwakanshinikanutnanwa. Tsru piklu rixa.
42001013	Ga wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinru, “Sakariya, gi pikanu. Gi rixanu pagjigognere jemka. Ga wa pganunro Gilisaweti gishpaakakanru puturu. Gwa pgiwakatanru.
42001014	Pumuwatanu. Pumjikanu. Gixo yine gimuwatanu rushpakinri chinanupa.
42001015	Gi rixanu tsrupni Goyakalu getanu. Gi wa wingako ruranu. Gi wa kapsagaluko ruranu. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu rixanu, runronanwakyakawa.
42001016	Gixo Gisrayiliklopishane satkakanu puturupa Gitsrukaachi Royakalutna yegi.
42001017	Giwekikaluruya, Giliya pixka, ga wa ruyakleya runanu. Ma mapookanuwa Gitsrukaachi, wale gapka kosekanu. Wale satkakgajinshinikanutanna girchine wugenenna yegi; ga wa kaalirerune satkakyapa kanshinikanurune rixinripna poyagkakachine pixka. Yine galpokotachripni Gitsrukaachi chinanu giglepokotkalunepa.”
42001018	Sakariya wane chinru Goyakalutowreru, “¿Gi nixpoko gimatletanru? Gi rixanu tsrutsolejinatkano. Ga wa nganunro koxa gi gepika walapu waneyatkalo.”
42001019	Goyakalutowreru gigitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitni Kawrilno. Goyakalustsi tunwatachrino. Gitni yokanatkalurno nuynumsatyapyi, ga wa nunkakyapyi tye kiglerupirana.
42001020	Ga wa xani myanumatkatupyi. Gi pumkata yanumletannuna wale wane gixkoklugognepotunanukopa, pma malixtokanutkalchinanno. Gigogne poyagkaakalurupni ntokanu.”
42001021	Ga wa yine kagwakanatlu Sakariya. Ruglajitna wa kpashiwaka ramginritka chinanu.
42001022	Ga wa rushpakamtinitka, gi rumkata yanumletanatka. Rumatna wa pagixanu retinrinatka getkaluru kpashiwakaya. Rutsejrigjeyegishatatkana. Myanumatkatunannatkani.
42001023	Wane rixa. Poyagkaklu wa sasertote kamrure. Rali poyagkakletinitkalu, gipji yatka.
42001024	Ruknoginitka walegognekaka, kamshirotkani ganunro Gilisaweti. Pamyo ksuru tyogimatnawa. Wane china,
42001025	“Giyagni wane rixno Gitsrukaachi, wa walegogne retyano konpatetyapatkano yine getanuya.”
42001026	Patsrujire ksuru chininri Goyakalu yokanatlu gitowreru Kawrili. Satu pokchi Nasare giwakatletachri, Kalilesreta, yokanatlu.
42001027	Makloji jeji metkatowa yegi yokanatlu. Satu jeji gipiratanrotka, Gosi giwakatletachri, Tawiklopisha. Wala makloji giwaka Mariyni.
42001028	Wala yegi jigloka Goyakalutowreru. Wane china, “Mariya, gimutkalurpotyi. Pixaymalu Gitsrukaachi.”
42001029	Tkojwakanshinikanutnanwa wale tokanu chinanu. Tnutanshinikanuta gi pixkalutuknige wa tye galuklewlu.
42001030	Giyagni wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinro, “Mariya, gi pikanu. Gi rixanu Goyakalu gimutatkayi.
42001031	Xani pmushiwatanu. Pushpaakakanru puturu. Pgiwakatanru Geso.
42001032	Tyepni wa tsru. Teno potu Gajeru Wgene chinko. Gitsrukaachi Goyakalu genekanru rutsrukatni Tawi pogirewatyawaka.
42001033	Gakowniklopishane yegi pogirewgognenatini. Pogirewatyawaka gike rixiniko nikawnanu.”
42001034	Giyagni Mariya wane chinru Goyakalutowreru, “¿Gi rixpokotanu wa tye? Gi rixanu gi jeji numatawa.”
42001035	Goyakalutowreru gigita. Wane chinro, “Giwekikaluru Kpashiri ginyegitanyi. Teno potu Gajeru giyakle chikletyegitanyi. Giyagkoxni kpashiripni gishpakachripa wane chinko Goyakalu Wgene.
42001036	Ga wa petanro. Pumole koxa Gilisaweti wala koxa tutsroginiko tmushiwata. Toturupni. Patsrujire ksuryegitkalo wa migato chinkaluronanu.
42001037	Gi rixanu Goyakalu gi satuna ma mumkatanutni.”
42001038	Giyagni Mariya wane china, “Gitsrukaachi wayegrerno. Wane nixikolupa pixa chinyawakpotuko.” Wala yegi yiyatka Goyakalutowreru.
42001039	Walegognekaka tpalnamta Mariya. Kmagkatewaka tya. Teyakawamta. Gotechijne gajeru pokchi tya.
42001040	Sakariyapji tjiglokamta. Taluklo Gilisaweti.
42001041	Wane tixatka. Wa Gilisaweti yijnaka galukletinitkalo wa Mariya, wa mturu tonanwaka gajeru ruptekapa. Wa Gilisaweti Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanro potu gixachrotkani.
42001042	Tsru saple tixa. Wane china sapleta, “Giglenshinikanyegitkaluryi pixje suxonyegiya. Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru punanwaka gishpakyachripa.
42001043	¿Gi nixge gita wa tye giknogyapno, wa Nutsrukate ginro ginyegityawakno?
42001044	Gi rixanu neyijnako galukletiniyakawayi, wa mturu nonanwaka gajeru ruptekapa rumuwle chinanu.
42001045	Giglenshinikanyegitkaluro galixachro, gi rixanu poyagkakikolupa wa tunkakikolupirana, wa Gitsrukaachi ginkakjixyalo.”
42001046	Mariya wane china, Numalwutlu Gitsrukaachi nonshinikanuya.
42001047	Ga wa numuwyegitlu Goyakalu, Nognetkakjeru.
42001048	Gi rixanu mpogireto retyano wayegrerno. Xaniyakawa giglenshinikanyegitkalurno Wane chinannona pejnurune gimuweekakgognenatachinepa gapkatatachineshaklumnunanukapa.
42001049	Gi rixanu wa Kgiyaklewakleru tsrupirana kamruyegitno. Kpashiri giwakni.
42001050	Retwamonunanumtna pagwashlukaka gimuweekakgognenatachinmnunanuka wa pikjene.
42001051	Muchkowamyota. Galixkotnachinewa rajiyna ga wa ginshinikanuyna kopalatna.
42001052	Pogirewatyawakna tsrukakalune ruknokya. Mpogirene tsrune rutaka.
42001053	Kiglerkakaya jinanu rixkakna nachichachine. Ga wa ponikolune maleshayalune yokanatna.
42001054	Rupxaklu wayegreru Gisrayili, gi rixanu rushiniklu retwamonrewle,
42001055	Chinyawakpotukna wutsrukatenni, Gawra ga wa giklopishane rushinityawakpotuko.
42001056	Mapa ksuru Gilisawetiyma wane twa Mariya. Wanepnute topji tsatokatnaka.
42001057	Ga wa Gilisaweti poyagkakatkalu togogne tushpakawgenetinripatka, rushpakatka toturu.
42001058	Yijnakotinitkana tumwastsitanune ga wa tomolene wa tsru getwamonre rixyalo Gitsrukaachi, rumuwatna walayma.
42001059	Wane rixatka. Yokgipgogne chininri runna wa sajruka gistakletyapatkaluna wa mturu. Ruru giwakmaka rutakluna, Sakariya.
42001060	Tugita runro. Wane china, “Gike. Seyni Gwa giwakatko.”
42001061	Wane chinrona, “Gi satuna pumole wane tye giwaka giwakatletachri.”
42001062	Rutsejrigjeyegitluna ruru klu giwaka ralukyalu wale.
42001063	Ragjitlu pamta. Yonatlu. Wane china, “Gwanwa giwaka.” Pejnuruneko giglajita.
42001064	Waneklu Sakariya kotpuknamatka ga wa ginnu. Yanumatatka. Rumalwutlu Goyakalu.
42001065	Tsru piklu rixanna pejnuruneko rumwastsitanune. Ga wa psoluko Gotechijne gajeru kmagkatewaka pogiwatya pejnuruko tyepirankaka.
42001066	Pejnuruneko yijnakotachine gimretpiranatlu rajiyna. Wane chinna, “¿Gi gixachrini: xani tye mturu? Gi rixanu waleymalu Goyakalu.”
42001067	Ga wa Sakariyni ruru, Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu. Goyakalu tokanu reneklewata. Wane china:
42001068	Gimalwutkalurni Gitsrukaachi, Gisrayiline Goyakalute. Salwayegitna rayinerutene koshpakapna.
42001069	Wixa yegi rupgujewnakakyalu Gognetkaklewatachri potu, satu wayegrerni Tawniklopisha.
42001070	Reyinuwakleyakawa wane chinjetyawakpotuko pejnurunniko kpashirinni tokanchi geneklewatachinniya,
42001071	Gognewatikalurupapirana, wkamnixjeneyegiya, ga wa pejnuruneko wayegixjeneyegiya.
42001072	Gi rixanu retwamonutna wutsrukatenni ga wa rushiniklu kpashiri tokanu rupiratanru.
42001073	Wutsrukatni Gawrani rupiratya Wale kawchinanu renekyapwu
42001074	Mpiikonepwu wushatkapko wkamnixjenyegiya, Wale yegi wkamrurewatinripa,
42001075	Kpashirinepwu, poyagkakachinepwu Goyakalu getanu psolgogneko wugogne.
42001076	Ga wa pixa, mturu, teno potu Gajeru tokanu geneklewatachri pchinko Gi rixanu Gitsrukaachi kosekachripyi palpokgapotyaplu.
42001077	Rayinerutene pumatkakanu gognewatikalurupirana kaspukmukochiretikolupna,
42001078	Woyakalute gishiniklewle ga wa retwamonrewle chinanu, Wa wale chinanu salwayegitwu pokamlatachri tengogne potu gishpakyachri.
42001079	Wane rixa pokamlatyegityapna mapshagwaka gwachine, ga wa gipnalchikle tuplanatachinena, wkosekikolupa, giglewanshinikanrugapo gayinripa.
42001080	Ga wa mturu tseruwna. Muchkowata Giwekikaluruya. Yineru mwiyawakanu rawanata walegognepotunanuko wa Gisrayiline yegi rupgujewnini.
42002001	Wane rixatka walegognekaka. Susa Gakosto yokanrewata psolchijne gajeneko gitakgiwakatikolupa. Walepirana pogiwata.
42002002	Tye muchinanu gapka gitakgiwakatikolu wane gixka wa Surchijne girukotlewatyachri rixini Surino.
42002003	Satkaka waleko gipokchi ya, rutakgiwakatikolupna pejnuruneko.
42002004	Giyagni Kalilchijne gajeru pokchi Nasare yiyatka Gosi. Gotchijne kanika. Tawi pokchi ya Wele chinikowaka. Tawiklopishni wale. Tawnineru.
42002005	Wa rutakgiwakatikolupa Mariyayma rupiratanro. Kamshirni wala.
42002006	Wane rixatka. Wane rawanatinna tpoyagkakatkalu togogne tushpakawgenetinripatka.
42002007	Tushpaakakatkalu muchinanu toturu. Mkachrichrata tpoyitatkalu. Prachine wakane nikjetyawaka tuklukakatkalu, gi rixanu maleshayna pagruko pnu giyakatyachine gwajetyawaka.
42002008	Walesretako wanena girukotapratachine, maleka gwachine, girukotaprayechnotachine.
42002009	Goyakalutowreru gapyegitna wanna. Gitsrukaachi gatajiwnale yochigyegitna. Pikpotutna. Tsru piklu rixna.
42002010	Ga wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinna, “Gi mpikanu. Gi rixanu kigleru tokanchi nunkakapgi, tsru gimuwlupirana, pejnuruneko yinenupni.
42002011	Tawi pokchi rushpakya xani gixa chinanu Gognetkaklewatachri. Walenwa Kristo Gitsrukaachi.
42002012	Waleko rumatikolupa: Gikshikanru mturu mkachrichrata poyitkaluru; prachine nikjetyawaka giklugachri.”
42002013	Walegnapunanu Goyakalutowreruymatkana gixolune solalone tengogne gajene. Goyakalu gimalwutachine. Wane chinachine:
42002014	Goyakalu gimalwutkaluru teno potu Gajeru. Ga wa tyechijne gajene yinenupa giglewanshinikanrewlu, wa giglenshinikanutachinenupa.
42002015	Wane rixatka. Wanna yegi yiyatkana Goyakalutowrerune. Tengogne yatkana. Ga wa girukotapratachine wane chinkakna, “Wele gayanu xani. Wetapanru tyepirana wa giknogachri wa Gitsrukaachi ginkakjixyawu.”
42002016	Giyampotu wane yatkana. Rukshiklona Mariya, ga wa Gosi, ga wa mturu prachine nikjetyawaka giklugachritka.
42002017	Wa retinitkaluna, pogitatkaluna wa mturupirana, wa chinikowakna.
42002018	Ga wa pejnuruneko yijnakotachine giglajita wa girukotapratachine chinyawakna.
42002019	Ga wa Mariya pejnuruko tyekakapirana tumreta tajiya. Tyanshinikanpiranatlu.
42002020	Satokatkana girukotapratachine. Ralixkotluna Goyakalu ga wa rumalwutluna pejnurukopiranaya, wa yijnakotanruna ga wa retanruna, wa chinikowakpotukna.
42002021	Yokgipgogne chininitka wa sajruka gistakletikolpatka wa mturu, giwakatka Geso, wa Goyakalutowreru giwakatyawaklu, ma nanwakchi mawakanuwa giwakatlu.
42002022	Wa poyagkakgognetkatka powralu rutakikolupna, wa Moysisi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawakpotuko, Gerosale ranikatkaluna, wa Gitsrukaachi renekyapatkaluna.
42002023	Wa rixyongatyawaka Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru: Pejnuruneko jejine kotpukawugenewlemapatini kpashirine chinkalunepni Gitsrukaachi chinanupa.
42002024	Wa genekashlu giylatkalurupa renekanna wa Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka: Gepirine kamowane, waka gepi motkoko wgenene.
42002025	Gerosale waneru satu jeji, Simo giwakatletachri. Walenwa jeji poyagkakachri ga wa kgipashiregolu. Wale kagwaklu rumnanukikolupna Gisrayiline. Waleymalu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri.
42002026	Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya runkaaka gichi rupnanu ma metkanuwalu Gitsrukaachi Kristote.
42002027	Giwekikaluruya kpashiwakapji yatka. Wa kpashiwakapji ranikinitkaluna rurune wa mturu Geso, wane rixyapatkaluna wa rixjetyawakna wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinanu.
42002028	Giyagni wale kampukatkalu. Rumalwutlu Goyakalu. Wane china:
42002029	“Xani, Gitsrukaachi, petasha yaletanutkalu pwayegreru giglewanshinikanutachri pchintokanutyawaka.
42002030	Gi rixanu noygalpotuko netyatkalu gognewatikaluru Pixanu,
42002031	Wa pejnuruneko yine getanu palpokotanru.
42002032	Pokamlatachripni payinyegiya gipgujewnakakachripa. Ga wa payinerutene Gisrayiline yochigyegitachripni.”
42002033	Ga wa ruru, runro giglajita wa wale wane chinikowaka.
42002034	Simo giglenshinikanyegitna. Wane chinro runro Mariya, “Pjemanu. Wa Tye gitaaka rujrukinripna, ga wa yotunomtinripna gixolune Gisrayiline. Rutaaka rumatikolupa rixinripa. Gapatkalurupni Wale,
42002035	rupgujewninripa gixolunenshinikangaji. Ga wa yoglolewapi yoglonshinikanutanyi pixako.”
42002036	Wane koxa twanata Gana, tokanchi geneklewatachro, Panwuri nshicho. Gaseriklopishni. Gixo potu walapu waneyatkalo. Talixinitka, payokgipre walapu tganuru yegi twanata.
42002037	Gipnagnurutachrotkani, ga wa yokgipimole gepkoxamkoje walapu waneyatkalo. Goyechno ga wa gogi gi tushpaka kpashiwakapjiya. Togajirewatinri ga wa tagjigognetinri Gitsrukaachi yegi tkamrurewatya.
42002038	Walepapko tapoka. Wala koxa gipgujtatlu Goyakalu. Walepirana tunkakleta pejnuruneko kagwakachinyegiya, gognewatikaluru Gerosale chinanu kagwakachine.
42002039	Wa poyagkakinitkaluna wa pejnurkakakopirana wa Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka, satokatkana. Kalilechijne gajeru pokchi, Nasare, yatkana.
42002040	Ga wa mturu tseruwna. Ga wa muchkowananumta. Kgimatkaleru potu rixinri. Ga wa Goyakalu gimutlewle waneylutni.
42002041	Pawalapkaka Gerosale yana rurune, wa meyiwlu yegi, Tsru Giknoglushgogne.
42002042	Wa pamole gepi walapu chininitka, Gerosale kanikna meyiwlugogneklu, rixjetyawakna.
42002043	Nikawnagognetinitka, satokatkana. Ga wa mturu Geso Gerosale rutukatka. Gi rumatna rurune rutukinritka.
42002044	Kagwakluna rumotsananumtjene yegi rawamtinri. Pagogne yanru yinitkana, rujgatkaluna gimolenna yegi ga wa rumatanunna yegi.
42002045	Wa ma mukshiikanutkaluna, Gerosale satokna. Rujgananumtluna.
42002046	Wane rixatka. Mapgogne giknoginitka, kpashiwakapji rukshikyatkaluna. Kgimatkalerune ganikajite tuplanata. Jemanatna, ga wa repomgana.
42002047	Pejnuruneko wa yijnakotjene giglajita rushinikanuwleya ga wa Wale gigityawakna.
42002048	Wa retinitkaluna, ruglajitna. Runro wane chinru, “Noturu, ¿klu chinanu wane pixwu? Gi rixanu, gita ga wa puru gijgayi. Kachingajpotwu.”
42002049	Giyagni Wale wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu gijgano? ¿Gi ge gimata wa Nuru kamrure numkata kamruretatka?”
42002050	Gi rumata jemluna wale tokanu wa chinyawakna.
42002051	Wannayma yopikatka. Nasare yatka. Yijnakotna. Runro taji gimretpiranatlu pejnuruko tyijnakotanru ga wa tetanrupirana.
42002052	Ga wa Geso tseruwnagimatkalewleta. Ya tseruwnaleta. Pnuteyaka Goyakalu gigleretyawaka kamruta, ga wa yine gigleretyawaka koxa.
42003001	Pamole pamyo walapu girukotlewwatinitka Tiweryo Susa, Ponsyo Pilato girukotlewata Gotesretaya. Ga wa Girore girukotlewata Kalilesretaya. Ga wa repuru Wilipi girukotlewata Gitorisretaya ga wa Trakonitesretaya. Ga wa Lisani girukotlewata Gawilinisretaya.
42003002	Sasertotene gitsrukatene potu rixanatinna Ganasu ga wa Kaygwasu, Goyakalu tokanu ginyegitlu Gwa, Sakariya wgene, yineru mwiyawakanuya.
42003003	Psoluko Gorta Gapgasretchijne yamta. Runkakletananumtlu katlupirana renshinikanutinripna yine, ga wa kaspukmukochiretikolupna.
42003004	Wane rixa chinyongatyawaka Gisayiya tokanchi geneklewatachri kirukate: Yineru mwiyawakanu saplewatyachri tokanu: Galpokotanru Gitsrukaachi gatnugapote. Mpotukatanru gigapkaka.
42003005	Pejnuruko magkachpalkaka tsepotkalurupni. Pejnuruko magkamriji ga wa mturu magka patenkaklutkalurupni. Ga wa katpagapkakalu potukatgapotkalurupni. Ga wa kamlojgapolu pgayamta rixgapotko.
42003006	Ga wa pejnuruko yineru getanru gognewatikaluru Goyakalunu.
42003007	Ga wa Gwa wane chinna gixolune yine gishpakamtachine wale katyapna, “Gimnu pixkalungi. ¿Katu ginkakgi gasukyegityawaklu Goyakalu jgekanupa?
42003008	Giyagni gkamrutanru genshinikanrewlu gimuknu kamrure. Gi wa gyinuwaka wane chinkakletanu, ‘Waneywu wutsrukatni Gawrani.’ Gi rixanu gita wane chingi, Goyakalu gimkata gipgujewnakakletanna Gawraklopishanemka tyekaka sotlukakaya.
42003009	Xani koxa gagmunasko rapokatka gepchi. Pejnuruko gagmuna kiglejiru mwanutu kayiikalurni. Xirnachri ruknookona. Waneko pixka rixko yineru kigleru kamrurchi ma kamrutkanupa.”
42003010	Ga wa gixolune yine gepomgalu. Wane chinruna, “Giyagni ¿klu wkamrutanu?”
42003011	Rugita Gwa. Wane chinna, “Wa gepi mkachri waneyalutu, renekanru waneyamigjetu. Ga wa nikchi waneyalutu waneko pixka rixanu.”
42003012	Runkoxna gijgawenutachine katikolupna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, ¿klu wkamrutanu?”
42003013	Wale wane chinna, “Gi wa gitaakaluru pnute gijganu.”
42003014	Solalone koxa gepomgalu. Wane chinruna, “¿Ga wa wixa klu wkamrutanu?” Wane chinna wanna, “Gi satuna mpiikakanu sroschi gijginriya. Gi koxa gapatlewatanu. Mpoyagnutanru gwenutikolu.”
42003015	Kagwakanatna yine. Pejnuruneko rajiyna gishinikanuwyegitlu Gwa, gikta Kristoni.
42003016	Pejnuruneko rugita Gwa. Wane chinna, “Gita galikakni katgi gonuya. Ga wa runa gita pnute muchkonurutu. Gi wa gita gimuluni nkoshpirokyaplu yoshmaklejixitsa. Wale katangi Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya ga wa xirnachriya.
42003017	Ruplokapre gimyo gwa. Triko powratpotutanru giylakaajetikowaka. Rapatjetanru trikneji rumretyawakaplu, ga wa yoxikanru gichicha xirniywaka gike rixiniko muwnakatupa. Waneko pixka rixanunna yinepni. Genshinikanutachine rumretanu, ga wa menshinikanutkane xirnachri ruknokanu.”
42003018	Giyagni gixo giykolu ga wa pimripirana giykolu kigleru galikakni runkakletna yine.
42003019	Giyagni Gwa gijretlu Girore pasreta girukotlewatyachri wa Giroryana repuru Wilipi gnunro chinanu, ga wa pejnuruko mugletu kamrutanru Girore chinanu.
42003020	Pejnuruko tyekaka pnute potu rixyatka. Yoshmakikowaka rushyayegitlu Gwa.
42003021	Ma yoshmaakonuwa Gwa wane rixatka. Pejnuruneko yine katkatka, ga wa Geso koxa katkatka. Ga wa ragjigognetini tengogne kotpuuka.
42003022	Wale yegi Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gijrukatka, kamanemnuru. Motkoko pixka rixmanemta. Waneylu tokanchi tengogneya wane chinachri, “Pixni Noturyi nalukanruyi. Pixa gigletanshinikanutno.”
42003023	Waleko Geso mapamole walapustsitka. Gosi wgene kagwakikaluru.
42003024	Ga wa Gosni wa Gili wgene. Walenwa Mata wgene. Walenwa Rewi wgene. Walenwa Melchi wgene. Walenwa Ganasu wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene.
42003025	Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Gamo wgene. Walenwa Nawomo wgene. Walenwa Gesli wgene. Walenwa Naaka wgene.
42003026	Walenwa Mati wgene. Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Simi wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene.
42003027	Walenwa Gowana wgene. Walenwa Resa wgene. Walenwa Sorowawil wgene. Walenwa Salatili wgene. Walenwa Neri wgene.
42003028	Walenwa Melchi wgene. Walenwa Gawti wgene. Walenwa Kosami wgene. Walenwa Gelmotami wgene. Walenwa Geri wgene.
42003029	Walenwa Geso wgene. Walenwa Giliyase wgene. Walenwa Goreyi wgene. Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Rewi wgene.
42003030	Walenwa Simo wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene. Walenwa Gonani wgene. Walenwa Giliyachi wgene.
42003031	Walenwa Meleya wgene. Walenwa Maynani wgene. Walenwa Nata wgene. Walenwa Tawi wgene.
42003032	Walenwa Gesi wgene. Walenwa Gowe wgene. Walenwa Poosi wgene. Walenwa Salmo wgene. Walenwa Naasoni wgene.
42003033	Walenwa Gaminata wgene. Walenwa Gatni wgene. Walenwa Pare wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene.
42003034	Walenwa Gakowo wgene. Walenwa Gisaaka wgene. Walenwa Gawra wgene. Walenwa Tara wgene. Walenwa Nachori wgene.
42003035	Walenwa Sarochi wgene. Walenwa Rakawo wgene. Walenwa Paleka wgene. Walenwa Gewre wgene. Walenwa Sala wgene.
42003036	Walenwa Kaanani wgene. Walenwa Garpaksa wgene. Walenwa Seme wgene. Walenwa Nowe wgene. Walenwa Lamechi wgene.
42003037	Walenwa Matosala wgene. Walenwa Genochi wgene. Walenwa Gare wgene. Walenwa Malereri wgene. Walenwa Kaanani wgene.
42003038	Walenwa Genoso wgene. Walenwa Seti wgene. Walenwa Gata wgene. Walenwa Goyakalu wgene.
42004001	Ga wa Geso Gorta satokyatka. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanrupotni. Yineru mwiyawakanu raniika Giwekikaluru chinanu.
42004002	Gepkoxamkojmolgogne tsru kamchi yantaletlu. Gike nika walegognekaka. Ruknoogognetinitka, nachneru.
42004003	Giyagni tsru kamchi wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, wane pchinanru tye sotlu jimapro rixinwa.”
42004004	Geso gigitlu, “Wane chinyongayegitkalurutkani: Gi wa niikalurupje ruwekya yineru.”
42004005	Tenolu potu magka raniklu. Pshinitsonuji rekakgitlu pejnuruko pogirewatyawaakaka psolchijiko.
42004006	Tsru kamchi wane chinru, “Nutakanyi tye ptowruko chinanu. Ptowruko pogirewle nenekanyi. Gi rixanu gita samyookalurni, ga wa katukta naluka nenekanru.
42004007	Wa pyoptsojityegitinipno pejnuruko pixanpatkani.”
42004008	Geso gigitlu, wane chinru, “Yonatkalurutkani: Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute pyoptsojityegitanu. Walepje pkamrurewyegitanu.”
42004009	Giyagni Gerosale raniklu. Kpashiwakapji gwachri tenoptaji potu rutaklu. Wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pchininipa, gewi pakaxikamtini.
42004010	Gi rixanu wane chinyongayegitkalurutkani: Gitowrene towutyegitanyi wanna girukotyapyi.
42004011	Ga wa: Kashichanyina gimyoyna, gi pagogneko sotlu putspejixitinripa.”
42004012	Geso gigita. Wane chinru, “Kapiranalutkani: Gi pyantaletanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute.”
42004013	Rali yantaletletinitkalu pejnuruko yantaletlewluya, Wale yegi yiyatka tsru kamchi. Wanepshini retashatlu.
42004014	Ga wa Giwekikaluru giyakleyma satokatka Geso. Kalile yatka. Psolchijiko walesreta pogiwapiranatyatka.
42004015	Wanna ginkaklewawaklepjikaka runkaklewatya. Gimalwutkalurni pejnuruneyako.
42004016	Nasare yatka, wa tseruwakikwaka. Rixjetyawaka gapnanutikalurgogne jiglokjetlu ginkaklewawakapji. Palna. Retyongata.
42004017	Tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiya kirukate reneeka. Koprakatkalo kiruka. Rukshiklu wane china yongatyawaka:
