44003004	Ga wa Petro Gwayma yopukgatluna. Wane chinru, “Petanwu.”
44003005	Wa wale getpotutna. Kagwakanata pagixanu yoptotinripa, wanna genekashatyaplu.
44003006	Petro wane china, “Maleshayno sroschi, gi wa koriko. Seyni satu waneyno. Wale nenekyi. Geso Kristo Nasare gajeru giwakaya, palnanu. Pyananu.”
44003007	Potuklemyo kashichyalu. Palnakaklu. Waneklu gichko rixkatka gijixi ga wa giygaleji.
44003008	Rupteka tunwaleta. Yanatka. Wannayma jiglokamtatkalu kpashiwakapji. Yanamtatka. Ruptemta. Rumalwumtlu Goyakalu.
44003009	Pejnuruneko yine geta yanretlu ga wa rumalwumtlu Goyakalu.
44003010	Rumatluna wa kpashiwakapji Kigleru Gipgyaptotestsi tuplajetachri sroschi gagjijetachri. Ruglajpotutanna. Rumyekpotutanna wa wane rixinritka.
44003011	Wa myankatunanu gigletkalurutka kashichna Petro ga wa Gwa. Pejnuruneko yine potogiwnayegitna Salomotamnu chinikowakaya. Giglajitachine.
44003012	Petro getlu. Wane chinna yine, “Jejine, Gisrayiline, ¿gi gixge giglajita wa tyeya? ¿Klu chinanu gyopukgapotutwu, wixako wuyaklepgutlege, wixako wupashirenupgutlege wyankakyalu wa tye?
44003013	Gawra Goyakalute, Gisaakanu, Gakowonu, wutsrukatenni Goyakalute tsru pogirewlu renekanru Gituru Geso, wa gixa samyokanru ga wa ginutatanru Pilatyegiya. Giklukanuwnayegjixlu wa kaspuukalurupmaka.
44003014	Gixa ginutatlu wa Kpashiri ga wa Poyagkakachri. Gixa gagjitlu genekikolupa kgiylalewakleru.
44003015	Giylatanru giweklu genekachri wa Goyakalu yotunkakanru gipnachine tskalaya. Walenwa gipgujtatachinwu wixa.
44003016	Ralixgiwakatko chinanu, giwaka gichko rixkaklu wa tye, gixa getanru ga wa gimatanru. Wa galixlu Wale chinanu, tye gituukakpotutlu gixa pejnurunekgi getanu.
44003017	“Ga wa xani, nomolene, numatlu wa gma mumatkanchinanu wane gixlu, gitsrukatene pixka koxa.
44003018	Giyagni Goyakalu poyagkaklu wa muchikawa runkaklewjixanru pejnurunniko tokanchi geneklewatachinninamaya, wa Kristote salewninripa.
44003019	Giyagni genshinikanutanu. Gkashrijetko, powratkalunepgi gmukochireya,
44003020	Gitsrukaachyegiya runinipa giyalganshinikanrugogne, ga wa Geso Kristo yokanyegityapgi, wa muchikawa gixa chinanu gitaakaluru.
44003021	Galikakni rumkata tengogne chipetletlu wa rugletkoklungognepotunanuko ptowruko. Wale runkakleta Goyakalu, Walenune kpashirine tokanchi geneklewatachinnamaya, muchikawa potu gwapachinni.
44003022	Gi rixanu Moysisi wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi Goyakalute gipgujewnakakyegitangi Tokanchi Geneklewatachri satu gimolepa gita pixka. Wale gyijnakotanu pejnurkakako Wale ginkakangi.
44003023	Wane rixanu: Girukokta yineru gi yijnakotanru Wale Tokanchi Geneklewatachri, nikatkalurupni yinyegiya.’
44003024	“Pejnuruneko tokanchi geneklewatachine, Samoyroni muchichachri ga wa gapkatamtachine, pejnuruneko ginkaklewatachine ginkakletpiranatlu tyegognekaka.
44003025	Gixni wa tokanchi geneklewatachinniklopishangi. Gixa chinanni wa gipiratkaluru wa Goyakalu gipiratyana wutsrukatenni. Wane chinru Gawrani, ‘Puklopisha chinanu giglenshinikanyegitkalunepni payinemnunanuka tye psolchijneko gwachine.’
44003026	“Rali yotunkakletinitkalu Gituru Goyakalu gixa yegi gapka yokanatlu ruglenshinikanyegityapgi gkashrijetikolupa satkaka gma muglenuya.”
44004001	Wanna Petro ginkaklewyeginatinna yine, sasertotene gapyegitna kpashiwakapji gitsrukateyma ga wa Sariseyone.
44004002	Kojwakanshinikanutkana wa Goyakalupirana runkakikolutkana yine, ga wa Geso chinanu yotunkoklunchipa gipnachinetskalaya runkaakana.
44004003	Kashichkana. Yoshmakikowaka rutaakana waleprikpotunanuko, gi rixanu kayitkani.
44004004	Seyni gixo tokanchi yijnakonatachine galixa. Wane pejnugetkona jejine pamyo waragka.
44004005	Wane rixatka waleprikgogne Gerosale rapatjetyana rutsrukatenna, ga wa tsrune, ga wa yonchikgapine.
44004006	Ga wa Ganasu Sasertotene Gitsrukatpotu, ga wa Kaygwasu, ga wa Gwa, ga wa Galegantro, ga wa pejnuruneko Sasertotene Gitsrukatpotumolene.
44004007	Wanna ganikajite tunwakaakana. Repomsatkana, “¿Klu giyakluya, katu giwakaya wane gixyalu wa tye?”
44004008	Giyagni Petro Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu wane chinna, “Yine gitsrukatengi ga wa Gisrayiline tsrutengi,
44004009	xawakni gepomsatkalunwu wixinri, satu kigleru chinanu, jeji yayixachri kamrutikoluya, gi rixpoko gituukakota.
44004010	Pejnurunekgi gixa ga wa pejnuruneko Gisrayilinerune gimatanrupa tye: wa Geso Kristo giwakaya rutuka tye yineru. Geso Nasare gajerunwa gixa koroshishkita gitakanru, ga wa Goyakalu yotunkakanru gipnachinetskalaya. Gesoya wa tye jeji gixa getanu gitukachritka tunwatachri.
44004011	Gesonwa Tye: Sotlu myoptotkotu gixaya sotlupji kamrupjitachingi Wale gitaaka yoptowaka gitsejita.
44004012	“Gi satuna rawa gognewatikaluru. Gi rixanu maleshlu pagiwaka tengogne rapukote renekikolna yine, wa wale chinanu wumkata gognetletikolupa.”
44004013	Retkana pgujetanuwaka china ginkakletna Petro ga wa Gwa. Rumatkana jejine kiruka myimaakone, mumatkanni. Giyagni rumatkana wa Gesoyma rawanatinrina. Tsrukakalune giglajita.
44004014	Retanatluna jeji gituukaakaluru wannayma tunwatachri. Gike rumkata chinretna.
44004015	Yokanatkatkana maleka rushpakinitkana jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya. Jemanshinikankakna wannakakluko.
44004016	Wane chinkakna, “¿Gi wixanutkana wa nyi jejine? Gi rixanu getkaluru pgujetanuru kamrutkaluru wannaya. Pejnuruneko Gerosale gwachine yegi rumatika. Gi wumkata ginutletlu.
44004017	Seyni ma poshalpiranyegitikotupa yinyegiya, wkawgutanna xaniyakawa gikena ma munkakinitpatkana tye giwakaya.”
44004018	Tomgakatnakna. Towutkana ma munkaklewatinitpatkana giketsotaji, gi wa yimaklewatanna Geso giwakaya.
44004019	Wa Petro ga wa Gwa gigitna. Wane chinna, “Gitakyagokanru poyagkakachri chininipa Goyakalu getanu, wa Goyakalu pnute gyijnakotko gixa.
44004020	Gi rixanu gi wumkata kaspukle ginkakletletlu wa wetanru ga wa wyijnakotanru.”
44004021	Giyagni yokanatkatkana. Pnute kawgutkatkana, gi rixanu gi wa rukshiika saletikolupna wa yine chinanu. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko Goyakalu gimalwuta wa wane rixikolutka.
44004022	Gi rixanu wa jeji wa gituukaakalurutka tye getkaluruya, wale waneya gepkoxamkojmole pnute walapu.
44004023	Wa kaspuukana. Wannanune yegi yana. Runkakletluna wa pejnuruko wa tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune chinyawakna.
44004024	Rali yijnakletinitkana, panshinikanurune muchkowtokanutna. Wane chinruna Goyakalu, “Gitsrukaachi potu, Pixni wa Goyakalyi, wa tengogne kamrutachriyi, ga wa chiji, ga wa tsru wenu, ga wa ptowrunanuka wanerutu kamrutachriyi.
44004025	Wa putowreru Tawinamaya wane pchina: ¿Klu chinanu matsuwatna payinemnunanuka, Ga wa yine gike gapri rushinikna?
44004026	Tyechijne gajene pogirchine gimalpookakatka, Ga wa tsrukakalune potowruta Gitsrukaachi kamnixachine, Ga wa Kristote kamnixachine.
44004027	“Gi rixanu galikakpotunanu kpashiri Puturu Geso ptsomitanru chinanu, tye pokchi rapatyana Girore ga wa Ponsyo Pilato, ga wa payinemnunanuka, ga wa Gisrayilinerune.
44004028	Wane rixinripa puyakleya ga wa pushinikanruya muchikawako putakanru wane rixikolupa.
44004029	Ga wa xani, Gitsrukaachi, petanru kawgurna. Penekanna pwayegrene psolpotuyako pgujetanwaka china ginkakletyapluna ptokanu.
44004030	Giyagni wixyempotupyi wane gixkalurkakapa gitskalgalkaka, ga wa getkalurkaka, ga wa koglajrukaka wa kpashiri Puturu Geso giwakaya.”
44004031	Rali gagjigogneretinitkana, rapatjetyawakapjina gimyemyeta. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri psolmuchkonuko jiglokgajpotutna pejnuruneko. Goyakalu tokanu runkakletna pgujetanuwaka.
44004032	Wa gixolune galixachine panshinikanurunni. Gi satuna wane china, “Gitanupjeni,” wa wane rixlemka, seyni ptowrunanuka rejnunkatna pejnurune gejnunkatni.
44004033	Ga wa yokanatanune gipgujtatlu Gitsrukaachi Geso yotunotinri tsru giyaklewluya. Gimutlewatachinpotni pejnuruneko wanna.
44004034	Gi satuna magatyachri wanna. Gi rixanu katukokta kwangixleru sankaka ga wa panchikaka, rushankalu. Raniklu wa rushankanru wenru.
44004035	Yokanatanunejixistsi rutakluna. Reneksatkana satkaka wane rixa magletyawakna.
44004036	Giyagni Gosi, wa yokanatanune wane chinanru yoklegiwaka Wirnawisi (walenwa yokaakaluru Gimnanuklewatachri) Rewineru, Supro giyakatyachri.
44004037	Waneyananru chiji. Giyagni rushankalu. Raniklu wenru. Yokanatkalunejixistsi rutakwenutlu.
44005001	Waneru satu jeji Ganani giwakatletachri. Sagirni ganunro. Rushankalu wane rixlena.
44005002	Psoji kotnukwenutyaluna. Tumata koxa ganunro. Psoji ranika. Yokanatkalunjixistsi rutaklo.
44005003	Petro wane china, “Ganani, ¿klu chinanu Satanasyo tsepotgajityi pyokwitmaklu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri, pkotnukyalu puchijne wenru?
44005004	Pumretanatinri ¿gi ge waneyananyi? Wa pushankinitkalu ¿gi ge pixa chinanni? ¿Klu chinanu pyanshinikangaji kamruretlu? Gi wa yine pyokwita seyni Goyakalu pyokwitmaka.”
44005005	Giyagni Ganani jeminitkalu tye tokanchi, yawnamtanatka. Rupnanatka. Tsru piklu rixna pejnuruneko jempiranyegitachine.
44005006	Palnamtna maklujine. Poyitanatkaluna. Koshpakanatkaluna. Kapnatanatkaluna.
44005007	Gowukshini tjigloka ganunro. Gi tumata wane rixinrinatka.
44005008	Giyagni Petro wane chinro, “Punkakanno. ¿Wane pejnurge gishankiylu wa chiji?” Wala wane china, “Gigi. Wane pejnu.”
44005009	Ga wa Petro wane chinro, “¿Klu chinanu wanerutu nchinanshinikanuta gyantaletyaplu Giwekikaluru Gitsrukaachinu? Petanna gipgyaptostsi rapokatkana pganurni kapnatpachine. Koshpakankoxyina pixa.”
44005010	Waneklu tyawnamtanatka walejixistsiya. Tupnanatka. Jiglokamtna maklujine. Gipnachroni rukshikatkana. Koshpakanatkalona. Tganurustsi kapnatanatkalona.
44005011	Tsru piklu rixna pejnuruneko gapatjetachine, pejnuruneko tyepirana yijnakotachine.
44005012	Yokanatkalune kamrujetlu gixo getkalurkaka, koglajrukaka yinetskalaya. Pejnuruneko panshinikanurune Salomotamnu rawanatna.
44005013	Gi pimrineko tserpiranawata gipxaletletna wanna, seyni wa yine gimalwupotutna.
44005014	Gitsrukaachi galixachine gixolewnananumta wanepnute gixo potu jejine, ga wa suxone koxa.
44005015	Giyagokni gatnugapkaka raniikana yayixachine. Gijeekakayna ga wa shechimtakakaya rutaakana, wa Petro gininipa mayawlepjeko chikletyegimtyapmaklu satu wa wanna.
44005016	Gerosale potowrurutyana gixolune Gerosalesputa gwapokchijetachine. Raniikana yayixachine ga wa kamchine kojwakanune. Pejnuruneko wanna gituukaakalunetkani.
44005017	Wane rixna wa Sasertotene Gitsrukate potu ga wa pejnuruneko waleymalune. Wannanwa Sariseyone mkoje. Ranxatna.
44005018	Kashichkana yokanatanune. Yoshmakikowaka pejnurunenu rutaakana.
44005019	Wa Gitsrukaachitowreru goyechno kotpukaplu yoshmakikowaka gipgyaptote. Koshpakna. Wane china,
44005020	“Gyanutka. Kpashiwakapji ntunwatanu. Ginkakanna yine pejnupiranako tye giweklupirana.”
44005021	Wa yijnakotinitkaluna goyechnokawpotuko jiglokluna kpashiwakapji. Wane runkaklewatyana. Ga wa rapatna sasertotene gitsrukate potu ga wa waleymalune. Repuukana jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajene, ga wa pejnuruneko tsrune mkoje Gisrayiliklopishane. Yoshmakikowaka rawapjixikna.
44005022	Yoshmakikowaka rapokna towrechine. Gi rukshiikana. Satokna wa towrechine. Runkaklewatna.
44005023	Wane china, “Yoshmakikowaka wukshika gishyatkaluru poyegishyaleru, ga wa girukowatachine gipgyapto ginaple tunwatachine. Wa wkotpukinitkalu gi satuna wukshika gitokogrukoya.”
44005024	Tyepirana yijnakotinna wa sasertotene gitsrukate potu ga wa kpashiwakapji gitsrukate, ga wa tsrukakalune sasertotene gi rumatanshinikanutanna kluneru giknoganutka.
44005025	Satu gapoka. Runkakna, “Wa yoshmakikowaka gitakanune jejine, kpashiwakapji tunwanatatkana. Yine runkaklewyeginatkana.”
44005026	Giyagni kpashiwakapji gitsrukate ga wa towrechineyma wane yana. Wale gwapna. Gi wa psolmuchkonuko, gi rixanu pika sotlujetkotna yineya.
44005027	Rawapkana. Jemanshinikankakjetikowaka tunwakaakana. Sasertotene gitsrukate potu gepomgana. Wane china,
44005028	“Gachi wujretpotutatkagi wa tye giwaka gma munkakletinitpatka. Psolpotuko Gerosale mposhalpiranatatkalu ginkaklewle. Galuka giklukletwu tye jejigragaya.”
44005029	Rugitna Petro ga wa pimrine Geso yokanatanune. Wane chinna, “Gi wa yine gimkata galixkota. Goyakalu galikakni.
44005030	“Wutsrukatenni Goyakalute yotunkaklu Geso, wa gixa giylatanru. Gagmunashkita gixripkakanru.
44005031	Wale Goyakalu potuklesretate tsru potu rutakanru Gitsrukaachi rixinripa ga wa Gognetkaklewatachri, renshinikankakyapna Gisrayiline kaspukamukochiretikolupna.
44005032	Wixni ga wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gipgujtatachinwu tyepirana. Wale Goyakalu genekna ralixjene.”
44005033	Wanna yijnakotinri kegeknanuwatna. Jemanshinikankakna ruylatikolupna.
44005034	Giyagni jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya tunwata satu Gwariseyo, Kamalye giwakatletachri. Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru yimaklewatachri. Pejnuruneko yine kagwakpiratanru. Wale maleka koshpakjixna pshinitsonu yokanatkalune. Wane chinna wale,
44005035	“Jejine, Gisrayiline, ggirukotinwa nyi jejineya wa gkamrutanruyapa.
44005036	Gi rixanu muchikawako rupgujewna Teyota. Tsru chinashatnachriwa. Wane pejnu getko gepkoxamkoje pacha jejine gapatyegitlu. Giylatkalurni. Pejnuruneko ralixjene gipalata. Gikeenanatkanina.
44005037	Wanepnute gitakgiwaakaklugogneni Gota Kalile giyakatyachri gipgujewna. Rawapna gixo yine rawgajxigitjenepa. Walekoxni gipnana. Ga wa pejnuruneko ralixjene rakapalatkana.
44005038	Xawakni wane nchingi, getashatanutkana nyi jejine. Gkaspukanutkana. Gi rixanu tye shinikanchi, wa tye kamrurchi yinenu rixinipa nikawnanu.
44005039	Wa Goyakalunu chininipa gi gimkata nikatletanru, gma mukshikikotupa Goyakalu gyagotinri.” Wane rixa gishinikanutletna Kamalye.
44005040	Tomgakatkana yokanatkalune. Muchinanu kochipjetkana. Rali kochipjeretkoklunutkana, rujretkana wa Geso giwaka ma munkakletinitpatkana. Kaspuukatkana.
44005041	Giyagni wanna jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajenyegiya yatkana gimuwamtachine, gi rixanu rutaka yagookana rumuknina salewninrina, reyiikana Geso giwaka chinanu.
44005042	Psolgogneko kpashiwakapjiya ga wa papjikakaya gi kaspuka ginkaklewletna Geso Kristopirana, gi kaspuka yimaklewletna.
44006001	Walegognekaka ruxolewnatkana yimaklene, Kriykone tokanu yanumatyachine yegi kegemgayegitna Gewreyone chinanu, gi rixanu wannanu gipnagnurutachrone gi gislagika geneksajetikowakaya pagognemnunanuka.
44006002	Giyagni wa pamole gepine rapatkakna gixolune yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Gi kigleru wa wixa giknokamtyalu Goyakalu tokanu wkamrurewatinripa wa nikikowaka chinanu.
44006003	Giyagni, nomolene, gijganna payokgipre jejine gixkaklukoya kiglepiranyegirune, Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajpotutanunetka ga wa kgimatkalerune. Wanna wutakanu tye kamrurchi chinanupa.
44006004	Ga wa wixa gomkagitanru wagjigognere ga wa wkamrure tokanchi chinanu.”
44006005	Pejnuruneko gixolune yine gigleretlu tye tokanchi. Ga wa tsomitkana Gishtuwa, jeji galixachri potu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu ga wa Wilipi, ga wa Prokoro, ga wa Nikanoro, ga wa Timo, ga wa Parmena, ga wa Nikolasu, Goteyo gitaknachriwa, Gantiyoki giyakatyachri.
44006006	Wa wanna yokanatkalune ginaple tunwakaakana. Yokanatkalune gagjigogneyegitna. Wannatseptagi rutakamyotna.
44006007	Gitsrukaachi tokanu tseruwna. Ruxolewnana yimaklene Gerosaleya. Sasertotene koxa gixolune galixlu tokanchi.
44006008	Wa Gishtuwa kgimutlewakleru potu ga wa kgiyaklewakleru potu rixkaklu Goyakalu. Giyagni wale kamrutlu tsru koglajrukaka, tsru getkalurkaka yinetskalaya.
44006009	Giyagni wane rixna pimrine ginkaklewawakapji gajene Gishpakachinenu, ga wa Sureyone, ga wa Galegantrinone, ga wa Surisyane, ga wa Gasya giyakatyachine. Yoptopiratluna Gishtuwa.
44006010	Gi wa rumkata gaaliretluna rumatkaleya, gi wa Giwekikaluru koxa yanumkakjeru.
44006011	Giyagni yokshatkana jejine wane chininripna, “Wjema wane chinretlu tokanchi mupashiregnuchi Moysisipirana ga wa Goyakalupirana.”
44006012	Komyekanshinikanutkana yine ga wa tsrune koxa, ga wa yonchikgapine. Rapyegitluna. Rakapgogomtluna. Jemanshinikankakjetikowaka ranikluna.
44006013	Tunwakaakana gipgujtalewashatachine kayroklewaklerune. Wane chinna, “Tye jeji gi wa kaspuka gapatletlu tye kpashiwaka ga wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
44006014	Gi rixanu wyijnako wane chinretlu, ‘Wa tye Geso Nasare gajeru nikatanru tyepji. Kashrijetgimatanru wa Moysisi genekyawu wixjetyawaka.’ ”
44006015	Giyagni pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowaka tuplatachine yopukgapotutlu. Retgojitluna. Wa Goyakalutowreru pixka rixgojita.
44007001	Sasertotene Gitsrukate potu wane chinru Gishtuwa, “¿Wane gixachrirge?”
44007002	Wale wane china, “Jejine, nomolene, ga wa tsrune, Gyijnakotanu. Goyakalu gimalwutkaluru gipgujewnayegitlu wutsrukatni Gawrani. Mesopotami rawanatini. Chara mawakanniwa.
44007003	Goyakalu wane chinru Gawra, ‘Puchijne pushpakinitka, ga wa pumolenyegiya. Nekakgichijnetyawakapyi pyanutka.’
44007004	“Giyagni Kalteyonchijne rushpakamtyatka. Chara rawanatatka. Rupnanatka rurni. Wane Goyakalu ganikyatnaklu Gawra. Tyechijne rapoka wa gixa gwiyawaka wa xani.
44007005	Waneya gi renekchijnetlu, gi psojiswajinako rutakjixityawakapmaka. Seyni rupiratyalu renekchijnetyaplu walenu chininripa, ga wa giklopishanenupa wanepnute. Gi wa kwugenewalu.
44007006	Wane chinru Goyakalu wa waleklopishanepni pnu gajenenapni payinchijneya. Wayegrechine rutaakonna. Gepkoxamkoje pacha walapupa gi yigleko retkona.
44007007	“Wane china Goyakalu, ‘Gita giklukanuwnayegjixanna wa payine wanna wayegretlewanatachine. Wanepnute rushpakanna waleklopishane. Gewiya yonogyegitinnona.’
44007008	“Tokanchi gipiratkaluru reneklu, sajruka gistaklewlupirana. Gawra wugenetlu Gisaaka. Yokgipgogne chininri sajruka gistakletlu. Gisaaka wugenetlu Gakowo. Ga wa Gakowo wugenetna pamole gepi tsrupotunni gitsrukaachinni.
44007009	“Ga wa tsrupotunni gitsrukaachinni kanxalerune rushankanruna Gosni Gigipto yinripa.
44007010	Seyni Goyakalu waleyma. Koshpaklu pejnuruko salewninriya. Goyakalu gipxaklu rumutyaplu Gwarawo, Gigipsyone pogire. Kgimatkaleru rixkaklu Gwarawo getanu. Wale gitaklu girukotlewatinripa Gigiptoya ga wa pejnuruko gipji gajeruya.
44007011	“Runa tsru nachi psolchijnepotunanuko Gigiptoya, ga wa Kana koxa. Tsru salewakchi. Wutsrukatenni gi rukshikluna nikanruna.
44007012	Giyagni Gakowo jempiranyegitinri wa Gigipto rawinri triko, yokanatna wutsrukatenni muchinanu kata.
44007013	Gepi kata rapkapinitkana yegwakane. Gosi ginkakatkana wa repurna rixinrina. Gwarawo gimatanerutatkalu Gosi.
44007014	Gosi gepuklu ruru Gakowo ga wa pejnuruneko gimolene, payokgipremole pamyo yineru.
44007015	“Yopikatka Gakowo. Gigipto rapoka. Wane rupniyanatka waleni ga wa wutsrukatenni.
44007016	Wannani Suche ganiikana. Kapna rutaakanatkana wa Gawrani gagjityawakapna sroschi wenruya. Wa Gemoro wgenene, Suche gajene ragjityalu.
44007017	“Konapu chininitka wa gogi wa Wale kawchinanu Goyakalu gipiratyalu Gawra Gigipto ruxolewnananumtna yine.
44007018	Gigipto jiglokinpotunanuko satu pogirchi Gosi mumatkatu.
44007019	Wale yokwitna wumolenni. Gi yigleko retanna wutsrukatenni. Maleka rutakjixinpotukna gegishpaklunniwa ma muweekananumtinitipna.
44007020	“Walegognekaka rushpaka Moysisi. Goyakalu gigleretanru. Mapa ksuru rurupji tseruwakika.
44007021	Wa maleka rutaakoklunutka, Gwarawonshicho gwapatkalu. Tseruwakatkalu. Toturu pixka tixlu.
44007022	Psolpotuyako Gigipto gajene gimatkale yimaaka Moysisi. Tokanchi ga wa kamrurchi gixo gimkatachrini.
44007023	“Gepkoxamkojemole walapu poyagkakinitka rushinika salwayegletna gimolene, Gisrayiliklopishane.
44007024	Wa retinitkalu wa satu yenetkaluru, yoptoyegitlu. Ruylatanru Gigipto gajerni. Rapnuyegitlu yenetkaluru.
44007025	Wale kagwaklu gimolene gimata jemyaplu wa Goyakalu gognetkakanna waleya. Seyni wanna gi gimata jemlu.
44007026	Waleprika yagotkakna. Wale gapyegitna. Ruykotmakna kigle gimwakakle rixinripna. Wane china, ‘Jejine, moletkakachingi. ¿Klu chinanu gyenetkaka?’
44007027	“Giyagni rumwastsitanru yenetachri satkaklu. Wane china, ‘¿Katu gitakyi wutsrukate ga wa wuklukanuwnayegjixjeru pixinripa?
44007028	¿Paluka giylaletno kapetgogne puylatanruna pixka Gigipto gajerni pixka?’
44007029	“Tye tokanchi chinanu rasukatka Moysisi. Pnu gajeru rixnatkawa Matiychijne ya. Wane gepi wugenetya.
44007030	“Gepkoxamkojmole walapu poyagkakatnaka. Goyakalutowreru gipgujewnayegitlu xirnalmero kawshipiriya, yineru mwiyawakanuya Sina Magkatestsiya.
44007031	Giyagni Moysisi giglajita retyawaklu wa xirnachri. Kayegiklu rumata getyaplu. Gitsrukaachi tokanu jema,
44007032	‘Gitni putsrukatenni Goyakalutno, Gawra Goyakalute, ga wa Gisaaka Goyakalute, ga wa Gakowo Goyakalute.’ “Rutatatana pikle Moysisi. Gi rumkata getleta.
44007033	Wane chinru Gitsrukaachi, ‘Pkoshpakanro pyoshmaklejixi. Gi rixanu kpashiwakchijne ptunwatyawaka.
44007034	Netpotutlu nayinerutene Gigipto gwachine ma yigleko ma metikolna. Nyijnakotlu wanna gochgire. Nujruka nkoshpakyapna. Punanu wa xani. Gigipto nyokanatanyi.’
44007035	“Waleko Moysisi wanna ma yoptotanutu—wane chinanruna, ‘¿Katu gitakyi gitsrukaachi ga wa giklukanuwnayegjixlewatachri pixinripa?’ chinanruna. Waleko yokanata Goyakalu, wanna Gisrayilini gitsrukate rixinripa, ga wa koshpakjerepni Goyakalutowreru chinanu. Walenwa gitowreru, kawshipiri gipgujewniyachri.
44007036	Wale koshpakna, koglajrukaka getkalurkaka kamrutinri Gigiptochijneya, ga wa Tsru Wenuya Sergalu, ga wa yineru mwiyawakanuya gepkoxamkojmole walapu.
44007037	Tyenwa Moysisi wa Gisrayiliklopishane wane chinachri, ‘Gitsrukaachi Goyakalute gipgujewnakakyegitangi Tokanchi Geneklewatachri satu gimolepa gita pixka.’
44007038	Walekni wa gapatikowaka gwachri yineru mwiyawakanuya, wa Goyakalu towreruyma, wa Sina Magkate ruynumsatjeru, ga wa wutsrukatenni giynumsatachri. Wale yoptotokanuta tokanchi giwekachri renekyapwu.
44007039	Walekni wutsrukatenni ma maluka yijnakletanutu, seyni satkakmakluna. Rajiyna raluka satokletyatnakna, Gigipto yinripatnakna.
44007040	“Wane chinruna Gaaro, ‘Pkamrutinwu goyakalune wkosekjenepa. Gi rixanu tye Moysisi wa Gigiptochijne wkoshpakapjeru, gi wumata gikta rixanatka.’
44007041	Walegognekaka kamrutlona waka wgene. Ranikyegitlona yaglusha genekashlukaka giylatkalurupa. Rumeyiwakatluna gimyona kamrutinrina.
44007042	“Giyagni Goyakalu katjitna. Samyokna gixolurkaka tengogne gajerkaka yonogyegityapna. Wa tokanchi geneklewatachine kirukate chinyongatyawaka: Gisrayiliklopishangi, ¿Ganikyegitnoge Gita giylatkalunepa ga wa genekashlukaka giylatkalurupa wa gepkoxamkojmole walapu wa yineru mwiyawakanuya?
44007043	Gkoscheklu mkachripji Molochopji. Wane gixno, ga wa gkoscheklo katagiri koxa, Rempanni goyakalute. yagluchkaka wa gkamrutanru gyoptsojityegitanrupa. Giyagni najriikanungi Wawilonya tukasretate.
44007044	“Wutsrukatenni waneya mkachripji Goyakalu gipgujewnajetyawakapji pochkewakaya. Goyakalu towutyawakpotuko. Wa Moysisi chinyawaka wa retyawakpotuko, wane rixa kamruretanruna.
44007045	Wutsrukatenni yoptopjitatkalu. Goswuyma rutakluna payine gwanatyawakaya. Wannani panenni ruknoka Goyakalu wutsrukatenniyegiya, Tawigognepotunanuko.
44007046	Goyakalu gimutlu. Tawi gagjitlu retyaplu, kamrujixyaplu wa Gakowo Goyakalute gwapjityawaka.
44007047	Seyni Salomo kamrutlu panchi Walenupa.
44007048	“Seyni wa tengajeru potu gi wa myochi kamrupjitikaluru rawa. Tokanchi geneklewatachri chinyawaka:
44007049	‘Tengognenwa ntuplapijere. Chijni wa nutspanjixgapre. ¿Gi pixkapjirutu gkamrutinno?’ china Gitsrukaachi. ‘¿Ga wa ginakapni wa napnanutyawakapa?
44007050	¿Gi ge nomyo nkamrutyalu pejnurkakako tyekaka?’
44007051	“Shikonshinikanurungi. Gixni msajruka gistaakongajgi ga wa gijnakopnaya koxa. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gyagotgognenata, gitsrukatenniko pixka. Waneko pixka gixa gixa.
44007052	Pejnurunniko tokanchi geneklewatachinni kojwaknina gitsrukatenni. Ga wa wanna giylatanna Poyagkakachri gininripapirana ginkakletachinni. Wale Poyagkakachri samyokachingi gixa xani. Wale giylatachingi.
44007053	Gixni wa gyoptotlu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru Goyakalutowrerune gitakyawaka. Gi wa gkamrutlu.”
44007054	Yijnakotinitkaluna kegeknanuwatna. Rashkaygityegitluna.
44007055	Seyni wa wale, Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu, teno yigata. Retpotuta. Retlu Goyakalu goyaknu, ga wa Geso Goyakalu potuklesretate gwachri.
44007056	Wane china, “Netlu tengogne gitpukachri, ga wa Yineru Wgene Goyakalu potuklesretate tunwatachri.”
44007057	Giyagni saplewpotumtna. Kachpokajnakopnamtna. Pagakapgogomtkalune rixanruna.
44007058	Koshpakluna pokchiya. Sotlujetanatkaluna. Getashanatachine satu maklujijixistsi rutakamkatluna. Sawolo giwakatletachrini wale.
44007059	Gishtuwni sotlujetanruna. Ragjigogneta. Wane china, “Nutsrukate Geso, pyoptotanno.”
44007060	Yoptsojitamta. Tsru saple rixa. Wane china sapleta, “Nutsrukate, gi puklukjixanna tye mukochriya.” Wane chintokanutinitka rapnanutatka. Sawolo gigleretlu ruylatikolu.
44008001	Walgogne tsru kojwawakchi rixkana gapatjetachine, Gerosale gwanatachine. Pejnuruneko gipalata Gotechijneya, ga wa Samarchijneya. Yokanatkalunepje gixeta.
44008002	Ranikanatkaluna Gishtuwni jejine kgipashiregolune. Tsru chiyaglu rixna wale chinanni.
44008003	Giyagni Sawolo yenetpotutna gapatjetachine. Papjimnu jigloka. Kosepowjixna jejine, suxone. Samyokjixna yoshmakikolupna.
44008004	Giyagni gipalatachine pasretamnunanuka yana. Runkakletananumtluna tokanchi.
44008005	Giyagni Wilipi yopika. Samari Pokchi rapoka. Runkaklewyegitna Kristopirana.
44008006	Panshinikanurune yine yijnakpotutlu Wilipi chinyawaka. Yijnakonatna, ga wa retanatluna wa getkalurkaka kamrutanru.
44008007	Gi rixanu kamchine puchotlewatachine gishpakyana gixo kamchichachine. Tsru saple rixna kamchine. Gixo giktegachine, ga wa myankane gituukaakalunetka.
44008008	Giyagni waneru tsru gimuwlu wale pokchi.
44008009	Wanenanru satu jeji Simo giwakatletachri. Muchikawa kagonchinanni wale pokchiya. Rumyekna Samari gajene. Satu tsru chinnachriwa.
44008010	Pejnuruneko yijnakpotutlu, mturune ga wa tsruneymananuko. Wane chinna, “Tyenwa tsru ruyakle Goyakalu chinkaluru.”
44008011	Yijnakpotutluna gi rixanu wa kagonchitinri rumyekyana muchikawgognenanuyakawa.
44008012	Seyni wa ralixinitkaluna Wilipi Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi runkakletini Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana, Geso Kristo giwakapirana, katkana jejine ga wa suxone.
44008013	Wale koxa Simo galixa. Katka. Wilipiyma rawa. Tsru getkalurkaka, ruyaklekaka wane gixkaluru reta. Rumyeka.
44008014	Wa yokanatkalune Gerosale gwanatachine yijnakyegitluna Samari gajene yoptotyawakatkalu Goyakalu tokanu. Giyagni wanna yegi yokanatkana Petro ga wa Gwa.
44008015	Wanna yopika. Rapokinitkana ragjigognetna Samari gajene chinanu wa yoptotyapluna Giwekikaluru Kpashiri.
44008016	Gi rixanu gi satuna rapokawa. Katashatkana Geso giwakaya.
44008017	Giyagni rutakamyotseptagitkana. Yoptotatkaluna Giwekikaluru Kpashiri.
44008018	Wa retinitka Simo wa rutakamyotseptaglewatinrina yokanatkalune, Giwekikaluru Kpashiri geneekatka, sroschi ranikyegitmakna.
44008019	Wane china, “Gitakankoxno gita tye chinanu, wa gi gixachrikokta nutakamyotseptagitanu, yoptotanru Giwekikaluru Kpashiri.”
44008020	Giyagni Petro wane chinru, “Pixaymaplo pserojiprojite gamgikowaka, gi rixanu pkagwaklu Goyakalu genekashle sroschi yoptotikalurni.
44008021	Maleshayyi pixa tyepirana. Gi putaaka. Gi rixanu gi potukgajyi Goyakalu getanu.
44008022	Giyagni penshinikanutanu tye gektutuya. Gitsrukaachi pagjitanu gikta pkaspukmukochirgajitko pyanshinikanutanru.
44008023	Gi rixanu pachikgajitachriyi, gektutu gostutanruyi wane nixa getletyi.”
44008024	Giyagni rugita Simo. Wane china, “Gitsrukaachi gagjiyegitanunno gixa, gi satuna wa gixa wane chinyawaka ma munyegitkanupno.”
44008025	Giyagni wanna gipgujtatinri. Goyakalu tokanu rali ginkakletinrina, satokna. Gerosale yana. Papokchimnunanuka Samaritane pokchi wane runkakletyaluna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi.
44008026	Gitsrukaachitowreru giynumatlu Wilipi. Wane chinru, “Palnanu. Tkachi kegnetesretate pyanu, Gerosale yopikgapotyachri. Kasa gapokgapotachri. Wanenwa yineru mwiyawakanu.”
44008027	Palnatka. Wane yatka. Wanenanru satu Getyope gajeru, suxone girukotachri, tsru jiglokachri Kanrasa yegi Getyope gajene pogirewatyachro. Wale gitaaka pejnuruko tponikole chinanu. Wane ya, Gerosale yoptsojtapinripa.
44008028	Rali yoptsojityentapinitkalu, satoka. Chijiyapachrote tuplananumta. Retyongananumtlo Gisayiya tokanchi geneklewatachri kirukate.
44008029	Giwekikaluru wane chinru Wilipi, “Pyayegitanro. Twu chijiyapachrostsi pyanu.”
44008030	Wilipi gasukyegitlo. Yijnako getyongaletlo tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiya kirukate. Wane china, “Giyagni ¿pumata jemluge wa peta yongatanru?”
44008031	Wale wane china, “¿Gi rixyawaka numata jeminri gi satuna ginkakpokowakatanno?” Ragjitlu Wilipi ratskotinripa, waleyma tuplamta.
44008032	Tyepiranyegiktani retyongananumta: Gowega pixka giylajetikowaka raniika. Gowega wgene myanumatkato tjiwjitjeru yegi, waneko pixka rixa Wale. Gi yanumata.
44008033	Kamturetkoklunu gi wanepotuko rixluna girukotlewatachine. ¿Katu ginkakletanna walegogne gajene? Gi rixanu chiji konikaluru ruwekinri.
44008034	Suxone girukotachri gepomgalu Wilipi. Wane chinru, “Nepomganyi. ¿Katupiranni wane china tokanchi geneklewatachri? ¿Walenanuklege waka satupiranra?”
44008035	Giyagni Wilipi tyepiranako yonatkaluru yinuwaka ginkakpokowakletyaplu. Runkaklu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi Gesopirana.
44008036	Gatnugapo yapananumtna. Gongastsi rapokna. Wane china suxone girukotachri, “Petanru gonu. ¿Klu gimaletlu nkatikolupa?”
44008037	Wilipi wane chinru, “Psolpotuyako pajiya palixini, pumkatlu.” Giyagni rugita. Wane china, “Nalixlu wa Geso Kristo Goyakalu Wgene rixinri.”
44008038	Tunwajixlo chijiyapachro. Ruptekgamtna Wilipi ga wa suxone girukotachri. Wilipi katlu.
44008039	Kanikatkana. Giwekikaluru Gitsrukaachinu koschekamtatkalu Wilipi. Gi wanepnuteko suxone girukotachri getatkalu. Yatka gatnugapo gimuwamtachri.
44008040	Gasoto retikatka Wilipi. Pnumnu ya. Pejnuru pokchiko runkakletyalu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi, Susari rapokinpotunanuko.
44009001	¡Gi pakawgurenanuktalu rixna Sawolo Gitsrukaachi yimaklene! Ruylalewlennaspuu rixa. Sasertotene gitsrukatpotyegi ya.
44009002	Ragjitlu kiruka Tamasko gajene chinanu, wa ginkaklewawakapji gajene, wa rukshikinipna jejineko ga wa suxoneko tyepirana gomkagitachine Gerosale ranikyapna gostutkalune.
44009003	Gatnugapo yapamta. Tamaskostsi rapokatka. Walegnapunanu yochigyegitanru tengogne gajeru yochigatachri.
44009004	Chiji rapokamtana. Yijnakotlu satu tokanchi wane chinjeru, “Sawolo, Sawolo, ¿klu chinanu pkojwakno?”
44009005	Wane china, “¿Katyi Pixa, Gitsrukaachi?” Wane chinru, “Gitni Geso, wa pixa kojwakanruno.
44009006	Seyni palnanutka. Pokchi pyanu. Wane punkakiko pumkata kamruretanrupa.”
44009007	Sawoloymalune jejine menuwatachine. Plaschi galikakni yijnakotna, seyni gikena retna.
44009008	Giyagni Sawolo chiji palniyatka. Rumrekgatnimkatka. Gikena retanatka. Giyagni kanjimtanatkaluna. Tamasko Pokchi rutakatkaluna.
44009009	Mapgogne wane rawa. Metkatuna. Mniikatuna. Murkatuna.
44009010	Tamasko rawanata satu Gitsrukaachi yimakleru Ganani giwakatletachri. Kaygawleya wane chinru Gitsrukaachi, “Ganani.” Wale gigita, “Gewno, Gitsrukaachi.”
44009011	Gitsrukaachi wane chinru, “Palnanu. Gatnugapo pyanu, Potukgapolu chinkaluru. Gotapji pujginri satu Sawolo giwakatletachri, Tarso gajeru. Gi rixanu wale gagjigogneta.
44009012	Satu jeji reta kaygawleya, Ganani giwakatletachri, wa pixa. Reta jiglokletyi. Pixa gitaktseptagimyogogotanru retinripatka.”
44009013	Giyagni Ganani gigitlu Gitsrukaachi, “Nutsrukate, gi gepika yine njempiranyegityalu tye jeji, gi pejnunanukta gektutu kamrutyana Pixanune kpashirine Gerosale gajene.
44009014	Gewi koxa rutakika tsrukakalune sasertoteneya rostutyapna pejnuruneko Pixa giwaka koschekachine.”
44009015	Gitsrukaachi wane chinru, “Wane pyanu. Gi rixanu walenwa nkamrurewapre ntsomitinri, ngiwaka ranikinripa payinyegiya, ga wa pogirchinyegiya, ga wa Gisrayiliklopishanyegiya.
44009016	Gi rixanu Gita gekakgitanru gi pejnunanpaktalu rumkata salewnaletinripa ngiwakaya.”
44009017	Giyagni Ganani wane ya. Panchi jigloka. Rutaktseptagimyogogotlu. Wane china, “Nepuru Sawolo, Gitsrukaachi Geso, wa gatnugapoya petinri wa puninitka, Wale yokanatno petinripa, wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajpotutyapyi.”
44009018	Waneklu rujruktataygalemtatka gitataji pixkalutu. Retatka. Palnatka. Katkatka.
44009019	Wa nikinitka gichkonshinikanutkalu. Gi pejnugognekta Sawolo gimwana Gitsrukaachi yimaklene Tamasko gwachine.
44009020	Waneklu ginkaklewawakapjikaka Kristopirana runkakleta. Wane chinjeta wa Gesonwa Goyakalu Wgene.
44009021	Wa pejnuruneko yijnakonatachine gimyeka. Wane chinna, “¿Gi ge tyenwa Gerosale saletlewatyachri wa tye giwaka koschekachinni? Wale chinanu runa gewi, gostutkalune ranikyapna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene yegi.”
44009022	Giyagni Sawolo wanepnute muchkotanshinikanutka. Gi rumatanshinikankakna Goteyone Tamasko gajene. Runkakpokowakatna Kristokni wa Geso.
44009023	Gixgogne giknoginitka Goteyone jemanshinikankaka ruylatyapluna Sawolo.
44009024	Wale gimata jemanshinikankakpiranyegitluna. Wanna girukotpotutlu gipgyaptokaka gogi ga wa goyechno ruylatyapluna.
44009025	Giyagni wa Gitsrukaachi yimaklene pokchi prijere gogote rutakluna goyechno. Wane rujruukakyaluna. Wane kojita jijrukyaluna.
44009026	Wa Gerosale rapokinitka raluka Gitsrukaachi yimaklene gipxaletleta. Seyni pejnuruneko pikanru. Gi ralixluna wa Gitsrukaachi yimakleru rixinri.
44009027	Giyagni Wirnawisi gwaplu. Raniklu yokanatkalune yegi. Runkakna gi rixpoko Sawolo getletlu Gitsrukaachi gatnugapoya, ga wa Gitsrukaachi giynumatyawaklu. Runkaakoxna wa Tamasko Sawolo ginkaklewatya pgujetanuwaka Geso giwakaya.
44009028	Rupxaletjetna. Wannayma yotaljeta Gerosaleya. Pgujetanuwaka china yanumsaleta Gitsrukaachi giwakaya.
44009029	Wale gigjetna Kriykone tokanu yanumatyachine. Ruylatmakluna.
44009030	Wa rumatinitkana moletkakachine ranikluna Susarpotuko. Wane Tarso yokanatyatkaluna.
44009031	Giyagni gapatjetachine ruglewanshinikanutna psoluyako Gote, ga wa psoluyako Kalile, ga wa psoluyako Samari. Tseruwakanshinikanutkana. Kosekna Gitsrukaachi pikachine. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gimnanukanune ruxolewnana.
44009032	Wane rixa Petro. Pnumnu yapamta. Yopika koxa kpashirine Lita gwachinyegiya.
44009033	Wane retyalu satu jeji Geneyasa giwakatletachri. Yokgipi walapu gijeko rukluganatka. Giktegachrinni.
44009034	Wane chinru Petro, “Geneyasa, Geso Kristo gituukakyi. Pyotunotanutka. Puglepokjejekotanutka.” Waneklu yotunotatka.
44009035	Retluna pejnuruneko Lita gwachine, ga wa Sarona gwachine. Wanna kashrijetka. Gitsrukaachinunepa.
44009036	Gope twa sato Gitsrukaachi yimaklero, Tawita giwakatletachro. Walenwa yokaakaluru Kshotero. Kigleru kamrujetachro. Kwamonurune genekjetachro.
44009037	Wane rixatka walegognekaka. Tyayixana. Tupnanatka. Rerkatkalona. Tenogruko rutakanrona.
44009038	Litaya gi gowuklu Gope. Giyagni wa Gitsrukaachi yimaklene yijnakotlu wa Petro wane gwanata. Gepi jejine yokanyegitluna. Ragjityapluna, “Gi pyoxigikamtanu. Punyegitanwu.”
44009039	Giyagni Petro palnamta. Wannayma wane ya. Rapokatka. Tenogruko ranikatkaluna. Walestsi tunwatna pejnuroneko gipnagnurutachrone. Chiyagatna. Rekakgitluna gitokoochi ga wa mkachri wa Kshoterni kamrurni wanna yegi twanatini.
44009040	Giyagni pejnuruneko maleka yokanata Petro. Yoptsojita. Ragjigogneta. Ruprotakyegitlo tomane. Wane china, “Tawita, pyotunotanutka.” Tumrekgata. Tetlu Petro. Tuplata.
44009041	Romyokyegitlo. Tunwakaklo. Giyagni tomgana kpashirine ga wa gipnagnurutachrone. Giwekachro rekakgitatka.
44009042	Wale gimatka psoluyako Gopeya, ga wa gixo galixlu Gitsrukaachi.
44009043	Wane rixa Petro. Gi gepikgogne Gope rawa Simopji, nikchimta yoshmojetachri.
44010001	Susari rawanata satu jeji Kornelyo giwakatletachri, ksolaloteru gixolune solalone Gitalyanone chinkalune.
44010002	Kgipashiregolu. Goyakalu pikachri pejnuruneko gipji gajeneymananuko. Kgetwamonreru. Renekashjetna yine. Goyakalu ragjigognejeta.
44010003	Kayinwaka retpotutlu kaygawleya satu Goyakalu towreru. Reta jiglokleyegitlu. Wane chinru, “Kornelyo.”
44010004	Retpotutlu. Pikanatka. Wane china, “¿Klunerni, Gitsrukaachi?” Wane chinru, “Pagjigognere ga wa petwamonrekaka Goyakalu getanu rushinikikolpatka.
44010005	Ga wa xani pyokanatanna jejine Gope yinripna. Pepukanru satu Simo. Yoklegiwaka Petro.
44010006	Wa Simopji rawanata, kyoshmomtakleru. Tsru wenustsi gwapjitachri,” china.
44010007	Wa yinitka Goyakalutowreru Kornelyo giynumsatachri. Tomgana gepi kamrurewyegitjene, ga wa satu solalo kgipashiregolu, satu rupxaletjetanruymalutu.
44010008	Runkakna pejnurukopirana. Yokanatatkana Gope.
44010009	Waleprika yagaponatatkana wanna. Tsru pokchistsi rapokinitkana, Petro tenogruko ratskota, ragjigognetinripa. Tumananustsitkani.
44010010	Wane rixa. Nachpotunru. Raluka nikletana. Ralpokokopshinna, rushpakanshinikanuta.
44010011	Retlu tengogne gitpukachri. Reta gijrukletlu katlogamnuru. Tsru mkachrichrata pixka rixa. Gepkoxamkojetsojri gishrikikaluru. Jijruukaluru.
44010012	Wane rawamtna ptowrunanuka nikchine gepkoxamkojejixirune, ga wa yosrolotachine chiji gajene, ga wa tengogne yapachine kamejirune.
44010013	Satu tokanchi jema, “Palnanu, Petro. Puylatanru. Pnikanru.”
44010014	Giyagni Petro wane china, “Gitsrukaachi, gike nixiniko. Gi rixanu gi pagogneko gimuteru, kapcholu nnikjejeta.”
44010015	Gepi kata chininri jematnaklu tokanchi wale yegi: “Wa Goyakalu powratanru gi wa gimuteru pchinanutkalu.”
44010016	Mapkata wane rixatka. Waneklu gitloga tengogne rawikatka.
44010017	Petro gi rumatanshinikanunata walenanuko klunerni wa kaygawlu retyawaka. Waneklu wa Kornelyo yokanatanune jejine gipgyapto gapokatka. Repomsayeginanumtluna Simopji.
44010018	Tomgana. Repomgana gikta xani wane rawanata Simo wa Petro yokletgiwakatletachri.
44010019	Yanshinikanunatiniwa Petro wa kaygawleya, wane chinru Giwekikaluru,
44010020	“Pete. Mapa jejine gijgayi. Ga wa xani palnanutka. Pujrukanutka. Gi putakyagoka yaletanu. Wannayma pyanu. Gi rixanu Gita yokanatna.”
44010021	Giyagni Petro gijrukyegitna jejine Kornelyo yokanatanune. Wane china, “Getanno. Gitni wa gijganruno. ¿Klu chinanu gina?”
44010022	Wa wanna wane china, “Kornelyo wa ksolaloteru, jeji poyagkakachri, Goyakalu pikachri, kiglepiranyegirni pejnuruneko Goteyoneyegiya. Satu Goyakalutowreru kpashiri yokanatlu wale gwapjixapyapyi, gipji pyinripa. Yijnakotokanutanyi.”
44010023	Giyagni chanixna jiglokinripna. Renekna rumkiyawakapna. Waleprikgogne yotunota. Wannayma wane yatka. Waleymamnuna pimrine Gope gajene moletkakachine.
44010024	Pagognetnakni Susari rapokna. Kornelyo kagwakanatna. Rapatanunetka gimolene ga wa rumatletanune potu.
44010025	Wane rixa. Petro jiglokamtinitka, Kornelyo yoptotaplu. Chiji rapokamta gijixistsi. Yoptsojityegitlu.
44010026	Giyagni Petro palnakaklu. Wane china, “Palnanu. Yinerkoxno gita.”
44010027	Ruynumsakakamtatkana waleyma. Jiglokamta. Retna gixo gapatanatachine.
44010028	Wane chinna wale, “Gixa gimatlu ginanshichkaluru satu jeji Goteyo gipxaletyaplu payineru, yayegityaplu. Ga wa Goyakalu gekakgitno gi satuna yineru gimuteru, kapcholu chinkalurupa.
44010029	Giyagni nepuuka pnumnu mchinkatno nuna. Giyagni nepomgayi, ¿klu chinanu pepukno?”
44010030	Kornelyo wane china, “Gepkoxamkojegognetkani xanipapko nogajirewanata. Kayinwakpapko nagjigognenata nopjiya. Netlu satu jeji. Tunwaginapletno. Katajimkalu.
44010031	Wane china, ‘Kornelyo, pagjigognere jemkalurni, ga wa petwamonre gishiniikalurni Goyakalu getanu.
44010032	Giyagni Gope pyokanrewatanu,’ chinno. ‘Pepukanru satu Simo, Petro yokletgiwakatletachri. Simopji rawanata, kyoshmomtaklerupji, tsru wenustsi gwapjitachri.’
44010033	Giyagni waneklu nyokanrewata pixa yegi. Kigleru pkamruta punyawaka. Ga wa xani geewu pejnurunekwu wixa Goyakalu getanu, wyijnakotyapyi pejnuruko Gitsrukaachi yokanatyayi.”
44010034	Giyagni Petro yanumata. Wane china, “Galikakni numatjematkalu gi wa manewle giglenu chinanu yoptotyaplu Goyakalu wa yineru.
44010035	Seyni payinerumnunanuka Wale pikachri, poyagkakachri, walenwa Goyakalu gigleretanru.
44010036	Gisrayilineklopishane yegi yokanatlu tokanchi. Tyenwa Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi giglewanshinikanrupirana Geso Kristo chinanu. Walenwa pejnuruneko Gitsrukate.
44010037	Gixa gimatlu tokanchi pogitkaluru psoluko Goteya. Kalile yinuwakya. Wane chininitka katlu wa Gwa runkakletanru.
44010038	Wa Geso, Nasare gajeru, wa Goyakalu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gipkakyegitanru, ga wa giyaklu koxa. Wa Wale pnumnu yapananumta. Kigleru kamrunanumta: rutuukakna pejnuruneko tsru kamchi kapsakletanune, gi rixanu Waleymalu Goyakalu.
44010039	“Wa wixni wa gipgujtatachinwu pejnurupirankakayako wa Gotechijne kamrutinri ga wa Gerosale. Wa Wale ruylatna. Ruxripkakluna gagmunashkitaya.
44010040	Wa Wale Goyakalu yotunkaka mapgogne chininri. Ruchichlu rupgujewninripa.
44010041	Gi wa pejnuruneko yine yegi rapoka, seyni gipgujtatachinyegipje, wa Goyakalu muchikawa tsomitanune, wa wixa Waleyma nikachinwu ga wa girachinwu rapyegita, rali yotunremtinitka gipnachinetskalaya.
44010042	Yokanatwu wa yinyegiya wunkaklewatinripa ga wa wupgujtatyaplu; wane wchinanu wa Walenwa Goyakalu gitakanru gitakyagoklewatachripa giwekachineya ga wa gipnachineya.
44010043	Pejnuruneko tokanchi geneklewatachine gipgujtajenatanruni wa Wale. Wane chinna wa pejnuruneko wa Wale galixachinepa kaspukmukochiretkalunepni giwakaya.”
44010044	Wa yanumsatiniwa Petro tyepirana, wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gapokyegitna pejnuruneko wanna tokanchi yijnakonatachine.
44010045	Rumyekna galixachine sajrukgistaakalune Petro gimotsatachine gi rixanu payine koxa yegi rupkaaka genekashlu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri.
44010046	Rumyekna gi rixanu yijnako yanumsaletkana payinerunemnuka tokanu ga wa rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Giyagni wane china Petro.
44010047	“¿Katu gimkata ginanshiretlu gonu wa ma katikotupna wa nyi Giwekikaluru Kpashiri yoptotachine wixako pixka?”
44010048	Katjixatkana Geso Kristo giwakaya. Giyagni ragjitluna pimrigognechi wanna yegi rawinripa.
44011001	Yokanatkalune ga wa moletkakachine Gote gwanatachine yijnakyegitna wa payineko koxa wa Goyakalu tokanu yoptotyawakatkana.
44011002	Wa Gerosale kanikinitka Petro, yoptopiratluna wa sajruka gistaakotachine.
44011003	Wane chinna, “Pixni jiglokyegitna jejine msajruka gistaakotkone. Wannayma pnika.”
44011004	Giyagni Petro yinuwaka ginkakpokowaklepotutna. Wane china,
44011005	“Gope Pokchi nwanatini, nagjigognenatini. Nushpakanshinikanuta. Kaygawleya netlu katlogamnuru gijrukachri. Tsru mkachrichrata pixka rixa. Gepkoxamkojetsojri jijrukikaluru tengogneya. Gita yegi rapoka.
44011006	Nyopukgatlu. Netpotutlu. Nikchine chiji gajene gepkoxamkoojixirune, ga wa kmatsurune, ga wa yosrolotachine, ga wa kamejirune tengogne yapachine neta.
44011007	Nyijnakotlu satu tokanchi wane nchinjeru, ‘Palnanu, Petro. Puylatanru. Pnikanru.’
44011008	“Wane nchina, ‘Gitsrukaachi, gike nixiniko. Gi rixanu gi pagogneko gimuteru, kapcholu jigloknamatno.’
44011009	“Giyagni gepi kata chininri tengogne giyakatyachri tokanchi gigitno, ‘Wa Goyakalu powratanru gi wa gimuteru pchinanutkalu.’
44011010	“Mapkata wane rixatka, ga wa pejnuruko tengogne rawikatka.
44011011	“Waneklu rapokna mapa jejine wa nwapjitanru. Susari yokanatikna gita yegi.
44011012	Giwekikaluru wane chinno nma mutakyagoka yaletinitipa wannayma. Giyagni nyatka. Gitaymalune koxa nyi patsrujire nomolene. Satu jejipji wjigloka.
44011013	Wale ginkakwu gikta rixpoko getletlu Goyakalutowreru gipjiya. Wane gima tunwanata. Wane chinru, ‘Gope pyokanrewatanu. Pepukanru satu Simo, Petro yoklegiwakatletachri,’ chingimata.
44011014	‘Wale ginkakanyi tokanchi, wa wale tokanchi chinanu pognetkaako pixa ga wa pejnuruneko pupji gajene.’
44011015	“Giyagni nyinuwaka ginkaklewyegletinna, rapyegitna Giwekikaluru Kpashiri wixa muchinanu pixka, wa rapyegitinitkawu.
44011016	Giyagni nushinkaplu Gitsrukaachi tokanu. Wale chinyawaka, ‘Gwa katlewata galikakni gonuya, ga wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gkatikolupa gixa.’
44011017	Giyagni wa Goyakalu renekinna waleko genekashlu koxa wa wixako pixka, wa Gitsrukaachi Geso Kristo galixachinwu, ¿gi gixachripno gita numkata gimaletletyapmaklu Goyakalu?”
44011018	Giyagni yijnakpiranatluna tyekaka, ruchkekna. Rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Wane china, “Giyagni Goyakalu geneekoxna payine renshinikanutinripna, ruwekinripna.”
44011019	Giyagni wa gipalatachine salewakchiya Gishtuwni chinanu, pnumnu yapananumtna, Winisipotuko ga wa Supro, ga wa Gantiyoki. Gike runkakna wa tokanchi, ga wa Goteyonepje.
44011020	Wanena pimrine wa nyi jejine Supriyone ga wa Surenensene, Gantiyoki rapokinitkana. Kriykone runkakna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi Gitsrukaachi Gesopirana.
44011021	Wannaymalu Gitsrukaachi. Gixolune galixa. Wanna kashrijetka Gitsrukaachinunepa rixinripna.
44011022	Gapatjetachine Gerosale gwachine yijnakotlu tyepirankaka. Wirnawisi yokanatna. Gantiyoki yinripa.
44011023	Wa wale gapokinitka, retlu Goyakalu gimutyawakna. Rumjika. Ruykotna pejnuruneko psolgalukleya rajiyna Gitsrukaachi yegi rawgognenatinripna.
44011024	Gi rixanu jeji kiglerni. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanrupotni ga wa kalixaklerpotni. Gixolune yogniwnananumtna Gitsrukaachi yegi.
44011025	Tarso yatka Wirnawisi. Sawolo rujga. Rukshiklu. Gantiyoki raniklu.
44011026	Psolwalapuko gapatjetachineymana. Gixolune yine runkakpokowakyegitna. Kristonune chinkana Gitsrukaachi yimaklene muchinanu gapka Gantiyokiya.
44011027	Walegognekaka Gerosale yopikyana tokanchi geneklewatachine. Gantiyoki rapokna.
44011028	Satu tokanchi geneklewatachri palna. Gakawo giwakatletachri. Runkakna Giwekikaluruya waneplu tsru nachi psolchijne gajenpotunanuko yegi. Klawtyoklunanu wane rixanata.
44011029	Giyagni Gitsrukaachi yimaklene wane rixanshinikanutna yokana gipxakletinripna Gote gwachine moletkakachine yegi.
44011030	Satkaka poyagotyawaka wane rixle yokanatanu. Wanepotuko rixna. Wirnawisi, Sawolo ganiklu tsrune yokanyegitikolu.
44012001	Waneklu koxa pogirchi Girore kashichjixanna pimrine gapatjetachine yenetyapna.
44012002	Gwa yegwakluni Santyakni yoglolewapi ruylajixya.
44012003	Retlu Girore waleko rugleretkakna Goteyone, pnute rixa. Petro koxa kashicha.
44012004	Wa jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotgognekakni. Wa kashichinitkalu Petro, yoshmakikowaka rutakjixlu. Gepkoxamkojeptogi solalone yegi samyoklu, rumretyapluna. Ruknoginitka Tsru Giknoglushgogne raluka koshpakletlu yine chinanu.
44012005	Giyagni Petro yoshmakikowaka girukotika. Ga wa gapatjetachine psolmuchkonuko Goyakalu ragjigogneyegitluna.
44012006	Wa Girore galuka koshpakletinitkalu, walyechno Petro gimkanata gepi solalone ganikajite. Gostutkaluru gepi yowumatsaya. Wa girukowatachine gipgyapto ginapleya girukotluna yoshmakikowaka.
44012007	Gitsrukaachitowreru gapoka. Pokamlalu yoshmakikowaka gatajitya. Petrokwanapa ruylaka. Komyeklu. Wane china, “Giyampotu pyotunotanu.” Rujrukatsamtatka yowumatsa gimyo gajerni.
44012008	Goyakalutowreru wane chinru, “Pushrikapchijitanu. Postutanru pyoshmakjixre.” Wane rixa. Wane chinru, “Pyoshmamkatanu. Pomkagitanno.”
44012009	Rushpakamta. Romkagimtatkalu. Gi wa rumata wa galikaka rixinri wa Goyakalutowreru wane gixyawaka. Wale kagwaklu kaygawlu reta.
44012010	Ruknogamtluna muchinanuptogi girukowatachine, ga wa gepi chininriptogi girukowatachine. Yowuma gipgyapto rapokna, maleka gishpakikowaka, pokchi ganikajite. Wa gipgyapto gitpukamta walenanuko wanna chinanu. Rushpakamtna. Ruknogamtluna pagapo. Waneklu Goyakalu towreru gitspalamtyatkalu.
44012011	Rushinikpotutatka Petro. Wane china, “Xawakni numatatkalu galikakni wa Gitsrukaachi yokanatlu gitowreru; koshpakapno Giroremyoya, ga wa pejnurukoya Goteyone kagwakanatyatkano.”
44012012	Rumata jematkalu. Mariyapji yatka. Gwa, Marko yokletgiwakatachri ginropji, gixo gapatanatyawaka. Ragjigognenatna.
44012013	Maleka gajeru gipgyapto ruylaylata Petro. Tushpakamta sato tserowaklechi, Rote giwakatletachro, tyijnakotinripa.
44012014	Tumat yijnakootokanutinitkalu Petro, tumuwlepoga gi tkotpuklu maleka gipgyaptote. Seyni gitokogruko tya gasukleta. Tunkaklewata wa Petro maleka gipgyaptote tunwatinritka.
44012015	Wanna wane chinro, “Pseprolokana.” Seyni wala tupnaje ginkakleta wane rixinri. Giyagni wanna wane china, “Goyakalutowreru, Petro girukotachrini xani.”
44012016	Seyni Petro gomkagi giylaylagipgyaptotleta. Kotpukyegitinitkaluna. Rumyekna.
44012017	Seyni yotukamyoyegitna pochke rixinripna. Runkakna gi rixpoko koshpakletlu Gitsrukaachi yoshmakikowakaya. Wane china, “Ginkakanna Santiyako ga wa moletkakachine tye pirana.” Rushpakamtatka. Pnuko yatka.
44012018	Wa gogi chininitka tsru kegeknanuwlu rixna solalone Petro chinanu klukta giknogyawakatkalu.
44012019	Girore gijgapotutlu. Gi wa rukshiklu. Repomsapotutna girukowatachine. Rali gepomsaletinna ruylajixanna. Wanepnute Girore Gote yopikya. Susari ya. Wane rawanata.
44012020	Ruylakakna Girore wa Tiro gajene ga wa Sito gajeneyma. Seyni panshinikanurunetkani wale yegi yana. Rushinikanutluna Plasto, pogirchi gimkiyawaka girukotachri. Rawashatinripna ragjitna, gi rixanu wa gichijnena gajene waneyna nikanruna pogirchichijneya.
44012021	Rutakgognetka pagogne. Girore gitaklu pogirchimkalu. Pogirchi tuplapijere tuplata, ga wa runkaklewyegitna.
44012022	Saplewatna yine, “Goyakalu tokanuktani. Gi wa yinerunni.”
44012023	Waneklu Gitsrukaachitowreru giylatanru Girorni, gi rixanu gi wa Goyakalu rumalwujixa. Tsomi nikanru. Rupnana.
44012024	Ga wa Gitsrukaachi tokanu tseruwna. Ruxolewna.
44012025	Poyagkakinitkaluna kamrurna Gerosale satokyatkana Wirnawisi, Sawolo. Raniikoxluna Gwa, Marko yoklegiwakatletachri.
44013001	Gantiyoki gajene gapatjetachinetskalaya wanena tokanchi geneklewatachine ga wa yimaklewatachine. Wirnawisi, ga wa Simo, Nigi giwakatletachri, ga wa Losyo, Surene gajeru, ga wa Manaya tseruwaakaluru Giroreyma, pasreta girukotlewatyachri, ga wa Sawolo.
44013002	Wanna yonogyegitlu Gitsrukaachi, ga wa rogajirewatna. Wane china Giwekikaluru Kpashiri, “Gkotspalatinno Wirnawisi ga wa Sawolo kamrurchi chinanu. Wale chinanu ntomgana.”
44013003	Giyagni rogajirewatna. Ragjigognetna. Wannatseptagi rutakamyotna. Yokanatkatkana.
44013004	Giyagni wanna yokanatkalune wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya yopikna. Selesi rapokna. Wane yagapgatyana. Supro rapokna.
44013005	Salamina rapokatnakna. Wane runkakletyaluna Goyakalu tokanu Goteyone ginkaklewawaklepjikaka. Waneyamnuna Gwa kamrurewyegitjerna.
44013006	Koprutna psolu kniprekako, Papo rapokinpotukna. Wane retyaluna satu jeji kagonchi, tokanchi geneklewatachri wale potu migje. Goteyni. Wargeso giwakatletachri.
44013007	Sergyo Pawlo girukotlewatachriymalu Wargeso. Jeji kgimatkalerni Sergyo Pawlo. Wale gepukna Wirnawisi ga wa Sawolo. Raluka yijnakletlu Goyakalu tokanu.
44013008	Gilima kagonchimka gaalixna. Gilimni wa yokaakaluru Wargeso giwaka. Raluka satookakletmaklu girukotlewatachri ma malixinitipa.
44013009	Giyagni Sawolo, walenwa Pawlo, Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu, retpotutlu.
44013010	Wane chinru, “Psolpotuyako kyokwirewakleryi, mshinikanutyi. Tsru kamchi wgenyi. Poyagkaklewlu gayegixachriyi. ¡Wuya! ¡Pkaspuka yoliwgapkakletanmaklu potukgapolu Gitsrukaachinu!
44013011	Ga wa xani, Gitsrukaachimyo pixa yegi rapoka. Metashatkatunapyi. Gowukshinina gi petlewatanuna tkachi.” Waneklu rapyegitanatkalu yachgapere pixkalutu ga wa mapshagalu. Sajrurunatanatka. Rujgalu kanjitjerupa.
44013012	Giyagni wa girukotlewatachri wane gixkaluru retinitka, ralixa. Ruglajitana Gitsrukaachi tokanuya.
44013013	Papo rutspegyatkana wanna Pawlo. Perge yana Pampirisreta. Ga wa Gwa gitspalatyana. Gerosale satoka.
44013014	Perge yagapgatyana. Rapokluna Gantiyoki, Pisirisreta. Gapnanutikalurgogne jiglokluna ginkaklewawakapji. Wane tuplatna.
44013015	Retyongatka Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachine kirukate. Rali getyongaletkoklunu yokanrewatna ginkaklewawakapji gitsrukatene wanna yegi. Wane chinjixkana, “Jejine, wumolene, waneygi nchininipa satu tokanchi yine giykotinripa, ginkaklewatanu.”
44013016	Giyagni Pawlo palna. Yotukamyoyegitna pochke rixinripna. Wane china, “Jejine, Gisrayiline, wa Goyakalu pikachine, gyijnakotanu.
44013017	Wutsrukatenni tsomita nyi Gisrayiline Goyakalute. Pnu gajene rixanatinna Gigiptoya, tsru potu rixkakna. Tsru ruyakle wane koshpakyana.
44013018	Gepkoxamkojmole walapupshini Goyakalu gakotlu rixjetyawakna yineru mwiyawakanuya.
44013019	Payokgipreneru nikata Goyakalu Kanachijneya. Payinnichijne renekna.
44013020	“Ruknoginitka gepkoxamkoje pacha pamyomole walapu, renekna gitakyagoklewatachine, Samoyro tokanchi geneklewatachriklupotunanuko.
44013021	Wanepnute pogirchi renekikolupna ragjitna. Goyakalu genekna Sawolo, Susu wgene, jeji Wigamiklopisha, gepkoxamkojmole walapu rawinripa.
44013022	Konkoklunutka wale. Tawi renekna Goyakalu pogirna rixinripa. Wane china gipgujtaletlu, Netlu Tawi, Gesi wgene, nugleretgajityawaka. Wale kamrutanru pejnuruko nalukanru.
44013023	“Rupiratyawakpotuko waleklopishaneya Goyakalu gipgujewnakaklu Geso, Gisrayiline Gognetkakachritka.
44013024	Ma munkanuwa Geso, Gwa ginkakletlu katlu genshinikanrupirana pejnuruneko Gisrayiline chinanu.
44013025	Wa poyagkaka kamrurenanumtinitka Gwa, wane china, ‘¿Giru gkagwakyano? Gi wa gitni gkagwakanru, seyni runa satu najxigi. Gi wa gita gimukluni nkoshpirokyaplu yoshmaklejixitsa.’
44013026	“Jejine, nomolene, Gawraklopishane wgenengi, ga wa gixatskala gwachine. Goyakalu pikachingi, Goyakalu yokanyegitgi gixa tokanchi tye gognewatikalurupirana.
44013027	Gi rixanu wa Gerosale gwachine ga wa rutsrukatenna gi rumatluna gognewatikalurupirana. Ga wa gi rumatluna wa tokanchi geneklewatachine tokanu pagapnanutikalurgognemnu retyongatka. Giyagni poyagkakluna tye tokanchi wa Geso ruklukanuwnayegjixyana.
44013028	Gi rukshika giklukanuwnaletluna rupninripa, seyni Pilato ragjitna ruylatikolupa.
44013029	Poyagkakinitkaluna pejnurkakako Walepirana yonatkaluru, gagmunashkitaya rawiyatkaluna. Yomlechi rutakluna.
44013030	Seyni Goyakalu yotunkaklu gipnachinetskalaya.
44013031	Gixgogne retkatnaka rukanikanuneya wa Kalileya kanikini Gerosale. Wannanwa yine yegi rupgujtatjene.
44013032	“Wixa koxa ginkaklewyegitgi Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wa gitsrukatenni gipiratyegitkalurupirana.
44013033	Wanepotuko Goyakalu poyagkakatkalu wannaklopishane yegi: wixa yegi yotunkakatkalu Geso. Shikalchi gepi chininri chinyongatyawaka koxa: Pixni Noturyi. Xawakni nwugenetyi.
44013034	“Kapiranalni wa tye: wa gipnachinetskalaya yotunotinri Geso, gi pagogneko gijpagikowaka satokinripatka. Wane china: Nenekangi kpashirkaka gaponshinikanutkaluru Tawinu.
44013035	“Giyagkoxni wane china satu shikalchiya: Gi puchi gijpagletanru Pixa Wgene kpashiri.
44013036	“Gi rixanu Tawi galikakni gigogne gajene gipxaka. Rali gipxakletinitkana, rapnanutatka. Rutsrukatenni yegi rutaaka. Rujpaganatka.
44013037	Ga wa Wale Goyakalu yotunkakanru gi gijpaga.
44013038	“Giyagni jejine, nomolene, gimatanru runkakletka gixa chinanu kaspuka mukochiretikolu Waleya.
44013039	Moysisi Tokanu Yokanatkaluruya gi gimkata ptowruyako muklukanuwnakaakone gixletna yine, ga wa Gesoya ptowruyako muklukanuwnakaakonetka rixinritkana pejnuruneko galixachine.
44013040	Giyagni getinwa ma munyegitinitipgi wa tokanchi geneklewatachine chinyawaka:
44013041	Getanu kgeyikaklerune. Giglajitanu. Gisuptaganuna. Gi rixanu kamrurchi nkamrutanu gixagogneklu. Kamrurchi satumka ginkakpokowakatangi gi galixanru.”
44013042	Goteyone ginkaklewawaklepji rushpakinitkana Pawlo ga wa Wirnawisi, payine gagjitna tujra gapnanutikalurgogne runkaklewyegitikolupna tyepirana.
44013043	Rungakatkana gapatachine. Gixolune Goteyone ga wa Goteyone gitaknachinwa kyonogiklerune, Pawlo romkagitna ga wa Wirnawisi. Pawlo ga wa Wirnawisi giynumsatna. Rushinikanutkana Goyakalu yegi rawinripna Wale gimutyapna.
44013044	Giyagni rapokinitka gapnanutikalurgogne psolu pokchi gajenenshinikanuko gapatjeta yijnakotyapluna Goyakalu tokanu.
44013045	Ga wa Goteyone getna gixolune yine. Ranxapotutna. Giyagni Pawlo ginkaklewle yoptopiratna mupashiregone.
44013046	Giyagni Pawlo ga wa Wirnawisi pgujetanuwaka china ginkakletna. Wane chinna, “Gixa muchinanu gapka wumkata ginkakleta Goyakalu tokanu. Seyni gi rixanu gixa giknoklu, ga wa gitakyagoknawa gi wa gimuknuni gyoptotyalu giwekinri mnikawnakatu, xanipatka pnuko gayanutka payine yegi.
44013047	Gi rixanu wane rixa yokanretwu Gitsrukaachi: Nutakyi payine pokamlatyegitachripyi Gognewatikaluru chinanu pixinripa yoptukyawakpotunanuko chiji.”
44013048	Payine yijnakotinri tyepirana, rumuwatna. Rumalwutluna Gitsrukaachi tokanu. Ralixna pejnuruneko wa gitaakalune waneyapna ruwekinrina gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa.
44013049	Wa Gitsrukaachi tokanu psoluko walesretaya raniika.
44013050	Ga wa Goteyone yokshatna suxone kyonogiklerone wannapotune, ga wa tsrukakalune pokchi gajene. Pawlo, Wirnawisi chinanu kojwawakchi gixkaaka. Ruknookana wanechijneya.
44013051	Giyagni wa wanna ruplokjiximtna gistapjixnapagi wannayegiya. Gikonyo yatkana.
44013052	Giyagni Gitsrukaachi yimaklene gimuwaatachine potu ga wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanune potu rixna.
44014001	Wane gixlutkani Gikonyo yana. Pawlo, Wirnawisi jigloklu Goteyone ginkaklewawaklepji. Wane rixa ginkaklewletna wa gixolune yine galixatka, Goteyone ga wa Kriykone koxa.
44014002	Ga wa Goteyone malixkane komyekanshinikanutna yine. Yokshatkana moletkakachine chinanu.
44014003	Giyagni gi gepikgogne wane rawna. Pgujetanuwaka china ginkakletna Gitsrukaachi chinanu. Wale gipgujtajetlu tokanchi Gitsrukaachi gimutlewleyapirana. Renekna getkalurkaka, koglajrukaka. Wannamyoya wane rixika.
44014004	Seyni gixolune pokchi gajene kotspalanshinikankaka: pimrine Goteyoneyma, pimrine yokanatkaluneyma.
44014005	Payine giptekyegimtmakna ga wa Goteyone koxa, rutsrukateneymananukna. Yenetikolupmakna ga wa sotlujetikolupmakna.
44014006	Wanna gimata. Rasukna. Listra, Terwe yana, pokchikaka Likayonisretaya ga wa sajrukyawaka chiji.
44014007	Wane runkakletyaluna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi.
44014008	Listra gajeru jeji muglejixitu tuplanata, myankatu rushpakinyakawa. Pagogne myanjejetkatu.
44014009	Wale yijnaka yanumsaletlu Pawlo. Pawlo yopukgapotutlu. Retlu ralixinri rutuukakikolupa.
44014010	Muchkowtokanuta. Wane china, “Palnanu. Potuktunwalepyi.” Ruptekapa. Yanamtatka.
44014011	Giyagni yine getinri wa Pawlo kamrutanru, saplewatna. Likayoni gajene tokanu wane chinna, “Goyakalune, jejine pixkalune wixa yegi gijrukachine.”
44014012	Giyagni Gopite chinruna Wirnawisi, ga wa Pawlo Merkoryo chinruna, gi rixanu walenwa tokanchi ginkakletjepotuta.
44014013	Giyagni Gopite sasertotete pokchi ginaple gwachri, gipgyaptokaka ranikna wakane jejine ga wa giglegwutkaluru. Raluka genekashletlu giylatkaluru yineyma.
44014014	Wanna yokanatkalune Pawlo, Wirnawisi yijnakotinitkalu suskakamkatna. Rakaxikamtna. Yine ganikajite rapokna. Saplewatna.
44014015	Wane chinna, “Jejine, ¿klu chinanu wane gixa? Yinkoxwu wixa. Gixa pixka geta salewnaletachinwu. Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wunkakleta gkashrijetikolupa tyekaka gike gaprimigjeya. Goyakalu giwekachrinunepgi. Tengogne kamrutachri, ga wa chiji, ga wa tsru wenu, ga wa ptowrunanuka wanerutu kamrutachri.
44014016	Giknogachri gwashlukakatka Wale getashatna payinemnunanuka wannako gigapo yapinripna.
44014017	Seyni koxa gi wa mupgujtatkotu retashyegitnawa. Seyni kigleru kamruta. Teno giyakatyachri gina renekgi, ga wa jirgalupapko. Poyampotutyawaka renekgi gnikjetanruya, ga wa gimuwleya.”
44014018	Wane chinikopshinna kyapreru rumkata gituukakletna yine ma menekashatikotupna giylatkalurupmaka.
44014019	Rapokna Gantiyoki ga wa Gikonyo giyakatyachine Goteyone. Rushinikanutkana gixolune. Sotlujetluna Pawlo. Gipnachri kagwakyaluna. Pokchi kotlolomtyatkaluna. Maleka rutakluna.
44014020	Wa Gitsrukaachi yimaklene sajruklu. Yotunota. Pokchi satokatnaka. Waleprika Terwe yatkana Wirnawisiyma.
44014021	Wane pokchi Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wanna ginkakletya. Gixo yimaklene rixkakna. Listra satokatkana, ga wa Gikonyo, ga wa Gantiyoki.
44014022	Muchkotanshinikanutkana Gitsrukaachi yimaklene. Ruykotkana romkaga galixletinripna. Ruykotkana wa gixo salewakchiyma wumkata jiglokletyaplu Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.
44014023	Satkaka gapatjetikwaka rutaakana tsrune. Ragjigognetna gogajirewatachine. Gitsrukaachi raponshinikanutna wanna chinanu, wa ralixanrutkana.
44014024	Pisiri yapa kopruremtna. Pampiri Pokchi rapokna.
44014025	Perge runkakletyaluna tokanchi. Gatali yopikna.
44014026	Wane rutspegyana. Gantiyoki rapokna, wa Goyakalu gimutlewle rumaponshinikanutikowakna kamrurchi chinanu, wa poyagkakapanrutkana.
44014027	Rapokinitkana, wanna gapatjixna gapatjetachine. Runkaklewatna gi pejnunanukta Goyakalu gikamrurewatyawaknapirana, ga wa Goyakalu kotpukyegitna payine galixlu gipgyaptote.
44014028	Gi gepikgogne wane rawna Gitsrukaachi yimakleneyma Pawlo ga wa Wirnawisi.
44015001	Wa pimrine Goteya giyakatyachine ginkakna moletkakachine. Wane chinna, “Gma sajruka gistakletkonu wa Moysisi gixjixlewatyawaka, gi gimkata gognetkaakotanu.”
44015002	Giyagni waneru tsru gigjekaklu, gepomsakaklu Pawloyma ga wa Wirnawisi wanna chinanu. Rutaakana Pawlo ga wa Wirnawisi Gerosale kanikinripna, pimrine wannayma, wa yokanatkalune ga wa tsrune yegi tye gepomsakaklu chinanu.
44015003	Giyagni wanna gipxaletamtka gapatjetachineya. Winisi yapa kopruremtna ga wa Samari. Runkaklewananumtna payine kashrijetikolupirana. Tsru gimjiklu rixkakna moletkakachine.
44015004	Gerosale rapokinitkana, yoptotkana gapatjetachineya ga wa yokanatkaluneya, ga wa tsruneya. Runkaklewatna gi pejnunanukta Goyakalu gikamrurewatyawaknapirana.
44015005	Giyagni tunwatna pimrine Gwariseyone mkoje galixachinetka. Wane chinna, “Rumkata sajruka gistaakotkana. Rumkata kamrujixkotkana Moysisi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru.”
44015006	Yokanatkalune gapatjeta ga wa tsrune rumatyapluna wa tyepirana.
44015007	Tsru gepomsakaklu wane chininitka, palna Petro. Wane chinna, “Jejine, nomolene, gixa gimatlu wa muchikawako Goyakalu tsomitno gita tokanuya wa payine yijnakotyaplu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi, ralixinripna.
44015008	Goyakalu gaschi gimatachri gipgujtatna, wa wane rixa genekletna Giwekikaluru Kpashiri wixako pixka.
44015009	Psolpotuyako pixkakakanwu rixa getletwu wixa, wanna. Powratgajitna ralixleyna.
44015010	Giyagni wa xani ¿klu chinanu gyantaletlu Goyakalu, Gitsrukaachi yimaklene gogo gitakyawaklu gitjipije? Gi wa wutsrukatenniko gimkata ganikletlu, gi wixako.
44015011	Seyni walixlu Gitsrukaachi Geso gimutlewleya wognetkaaka wannako pixka.”
44015012	Giyagni pejnuruneko gixolune gichkeka. Yijnakotluna Wirnawisi ga wa Pawlo runkaklewatinna gi pejnunanukta tsru getkalurkaka ga wa koglajrukaka Goyakalu wane gixkakyawakna payinetskalaya.
44015013	Wa ruchkekinitkana wanna, Santiyako gigita. Wane china,
44015014	“Nomolene, gyijnakotanno. Simo ginkakletlu gikta rixpokotlu Goyakalu. Muchinanu salwayegitna payine, wa wannayegiya yoptotyapna rayinerutenepa.
44015015	Waneko pixka chintokanutna tokanchi geneklewatachine, yonchi chinyawaka:
44015016	Wanepnute nsatokanutnaka. Nugletanutnaklu Tawnipji, wa yawnachrinatka. Nugletanutnaklu gimtutewnachritka. Ntunotakanutnaklu.
44015017	Wa gixetachine yine gijgiyaplu Gitsrukaachi, ga wa pejnuruneko payinemnunanuka, ngiwakaya chinkalune. Wane china Gitsrukaachi tyekaka pejnuruko kamrutachri.
44015018	Muchichyawakpotunanuko rumatkakatkalu Goyakalu tyekakapirana.
44015019	“Giyagni gita gitakyawaka mkojwaakonepni payine kashrijetkalune Goyakalunune rixinripna.
44015020	Seyni yonyegitkalunepni rutspalatyapluna puchotlewatachri yagluchishaya, ga wa gapoklewluya, wa saprinojrurusha, ga wa granchiya.
44015021	Gi rixanu muchikawa potu gwashluyakawa Moysisi waneya runkakletjene papokchikaka ginkaklewawakapjikakaya. Wane retyongapiranatika pagapnanutikalurgognemnu.”
44015022	Giyagni kigle getle rixluna yokanatkalune, ga wa tsrune, ga wa pejnuruneko gapatjetachine tsomitikolupna pimrine jejine wannayegiruneko, Gantiyoki yokanatikolupna Pawlo Wirnawisiyma, wa Gota, wa Warsawa yokletgiwakatachri, ga wa Sura girukotlewatachine jejine moletkakachinyegiya.
44015023	Kigle getle rixluna yonatkaluropa kiruka wanna ganikanropa. Wane chinachropa: “Wixa yokanatkalunwu ga wa tsrunwu, ga wa wumolene galukgiwakatgi, wumolengi, Gantiyoki gwachine, ga wa Suri gwachine, ga wa Surisya gwachine.
44015024	Gi rixanu wyijnakyegitlu pimrine wixa yegi giyakatyachine kojwakgi tokanchiya. Rumtukanshinikanutgina. Gi wa wanna wyokanata.
44015025	Panshinikanurunwu wixanatini kigle getle wixlu wtsomitkapna jejine ga wa wyokanatyapna gixa yegi: walukanune Wirnawisi ga wa Pawloyma.
44015026	Giyagni wutakna jejine genekgiwekletachinemka Wutsrukate Geso Kristo giwaka chinanu.
44015027	Giyagni wyokanatna Gota ga wa Sura. Waneko pixka china ginkakletangina.
44015028	Kigle getle rixlu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri ga wa wixa koxa gi satuna kamrurchi gitakyegitko wanepnute. Tyekakapjetkani gimkata kamrutkaluru:
44015029	Gitspalatinri wa yagluchisha geneekalurkaka, ga wa granchi, ga wa saprinojrurusha, ga wa gapoklewlu. Wale pejnunanukaya gkamrutini, kigleru gkamruta. Seyoka.”
44015030	Giyagni wanna yokanatkalune yopikna. Gantiyoki rapokna. Wanna gapatkakna gixolune. Kiruka yonatkaluro reneekana.
44015031	Retyongatinitkalona rumuwatna giykolu chinanu.
44015032	Gota koxa ga wa Sura tokanchi geneklewatachinkoxna wanna. Giyagni ruykolewatna gi gepika tokanchiya moletkakachine yegi. Muchkotanshinikanutkana.
44015033	Pshinitsonu wane rawamtna. Yokanatkana moletkakachineya kiglenshinikanurune, yokanatjenna yegi yinripna.
44015034	Seyni wa Sura kigle getle rixlu rutukinripa wane. Gotapje yatka.
44015035	Pawlo ga wa Wirnawisi Gantiyoki rawanatna. Gitsrukaachi tokanu runkakletna. Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi runkakletna pimrine gixoluneyma.
44015036	Pagognetnakni Pawlo wane chinru Wirnawisi, “Wsatokanutnaka wsalwayegityapna moletkakachine papokchimnunanuka wa Gitsrukaachi tokanu wunkakletanatyawaka, gi pixkaktana.”
44015037	Wirnawisi galuka ganikletmaklu Gwa, Marko yokletgiwakatachri.
44015038	Seyni Pawlo gi kigle getle rixlu ranikikolupa wannayma rixinripa gi rixanu wa Pampiri Marko gitspalamtyana; kamrurchi yegi myakatutka wannayma.
44015039	Jigeekakna. Wane rixlenanukna rutspalkakyana. Wirnawisi ganikatkalu Marko. Koprugatna. Supro yana.
44015040	Ga wa Pawlo Sura tsomitatka. Yatka. Gitsrukaachi gimutlewleya rumaponshinikanyegitkana moletkakachineya.
44015041	Suri ga wa Surisya yapananumtna. Muchkotanshinikanunanumtkana gapatjetachinkaka.
44016001	Terwe rapoka Pawlo. Wanepnute Listra. Wane rawa satu Gitsrukaachi yimakleru Timotiyo giwakatletachri, galixachro Goteyo suxo wgene. Ga wa ruru Kriykoni.
44016002	Listra ga wa Gikonyo gajene moletkakachine kiglepiranyegiru chinanruna.
44016003	Walemka Pawlo galuka waleyma chininripa. Raniklu. Sajruka gistakletlu Goteyone chinanu wane pokchikaka gajene, gi rixanu pejnuruneko gimatlu Kriykoni wa ruru.
44016004	Papokchimnu yapananumtna. Renekananumtkana rumretyapluna tokanchi poyagkaakalurupa wa yokanatkalune ga wa tsrune gitakanru Gerosale gwachine chinanu.
44016005	Giyagni wa gapatjetachinkaka muchkotanshinikanutkana ralixleyna. Pagognemnunanuka ruxolewnananumtna.
44016006	Prigi sreta koprutna. Wanepnute Kalatasreta. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gijretna Gasya ma munkaklewatinitipna tokanchi.
44016007	Misi rapokatnakna. Witinimka yana. Giwekikaluru Gesonu gi gichichna.
44016008	Giyagni ruknogamtluna Misi. Yopikna. Trowa rapokna.
44016009	Goyechno Pawlo getlu kayigawlu. Satu jeji Masetoni gajeru tunwastsitlu. Ragjitlu. Wane chinru, “Pkoprutgatanu. Masetoni punanu. Pupxakapanunwu.”
44016010	Wa retinitkalu kaygawlu waneklu wupruka Masetoni gayinripa. Wale wumatyatkalu Goyakalu tomgawu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wunkaklewyegityapna.
44016011	Trowa wutspegyatka. Potuklega gaya. Samotrase wapoka. Waleprikgogne Neyapoli wapokatnaka.
44016012	Waneya Wilipo wapoka. Walenwa tsru potu pokchi Masetonisretaya. Walenwa pnu giyakatyachine gwiyawaka. Wale pokchi gawanata gi pejnugognekta.
44016013	Pagogne gapnanutikalurgogne pokchi gayiyatka gipgyaptoteya. Gonustsi gayiya wa ragjigognejetyawakna. Wane wtuplata. Wuynumsatna suxone wa gapatachine.
44016014	Wanenanro sato suxo Litya giwakatletachro, Tiyatira Pokchi mkachri pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu gishanretjetachro. Goyakalu yonogyegitachro. Tyijnakota. Gitsrukaachi kotpukanshinikanutlo wala, tyijnakpotutyaplu Pawlo chinyawaka.
44016015	Wala katka ga wa tomolene. Rali katkoklunutkana, tagjitwu. Wane china, “Gitakyagokinno wa Gitsrukaachi nalixinri, gjiglokapjitanno. Wane gwanu.” Chipetpotutwu.
44016016	Wane rixatka. Gagjigognetikwaka gayamtini, tyoptotapwu sato makloji wayegrechro. Waneylo kamchi kagonchiwatinri. Gixo tkanashkatanru twapyegitna twayegitanune tkagonchitinri.
44016017	Tomkagimtwu Pawlo ga wa wixa. Wane china saplenanumta, “Nyi jejine Goyakalu teno potu Gajeru wayegrenni. Wanna ginkaklewyegitgi gognewatikalurgapopirana.”
44016018	Gi gepikgogne wane tixjeta. Seyni gi rugleretlu Pawlo. Ruprotaka. Wane chinru kamchi, “Geso Kristo giwaka nyokanatyayi, pushpakanutka walaya.” Wanekluyakawa rushpakamtatka.
44016019	Retinitkana twayegitanune wa maleshatkalu kagwakanshinikanutanruna kanashkatinripna, kashichanatkaluna Pawlo ga wa Sura. Kosemtkanatkana. Tsrukakalune gapatjetyawaka raniikana.
44016020	Girukotlewatachine yegi rutaakoklunutkana. Twayegitanune wane china, “Nyi jejine Goteyoneko. Tsru kojwaklu rixpokchitwuna.
44016021	Runkakletluna gixjetikowaakaka ginanshichkalurni wyijnakotyaplu, wkamrutyaplu gi rixanu Romanonwu wixa.”
44016022	Gixolune giptekyegimtna. Girukotlewatachine suskamkatna. Gagaje kochipjejixikna.
44016023	Rali gipgoletkoklunutkana yoshmakikwaka yoshmaakana. Kyoshmaklewakleru yokanatka rumretpotutyapna.
44016024	Wane rixa towutkota, gitokpotugruko yoshmakna. Yoshmakjixitkana.
44016025	Ganikajyechno ragjigognetna Pawlo ga wa Sura. Goyakalu gimalwutikolu shikaletna. Wa gostutkalune yijnakotna.
44016026	Walgnapunanu waneru tsru giyolikchijru. Wane rixlunanuko wa yoshmakwakapjistsigi gimyemyeta. Wanekluyakawa pejnuru gipgyaptoteko gitpukamta. Pejnuruneko gitkokgosturemtatka.
44016027	Giyagni ruyoka kyoshmaklewakleru. Retlu yoshmakwaka gipgyaptotkaka rutpuukanatatka. Koshpaklu yoglolewapi. Ruylatinmakatkawa. Kagwaka gasukletatkana gostutkalune.
44016028	Seyni Pawlo tsru saple rixnawa. Wane china, “Gi wa pumtukinwa, gi rixanu pejnurunekwu gewi.”
44016029	Giyagni katalo ragjita. Rakaxikamta. Jiglokagrukomta. Gitatatachri chiji rapokamta Pawlojixistsi ga wa Sura.
44016030	Maleka koshpakatkana. Wane chinna, “Tsrune, ¿klu numkata kamrureta nognetkakikolupa?”
44016031	Wanna wane chinru, “Palixanru Gitsrukaachi Geso Kristo. Waneklu pognetkaako pixa ga wa pupji gajene.”
44016032	Runkakluna Gitsrukaachi tokanu, ga wa pejnuruneko gipji gajene.
44016033	Wanekluyakawa waleyechnoko ranikna. Rerkatkana wa rupgotikolna. Waneklu katkatka wale ga wa pejnuruneko walenune.
44016034	Gipji ranikatkana. Ralpokotlu nikikwaka. Rumuwata gi rixanu pejnuruneko gipji gajeneymananuko ralixatkalu Goyakalu.
44016035	Gogi chininitka girukotlewatachine yokanatna kashrewaklerune. Wane chinna, “Pkaspukanna wa nyi jejine.”
44016036	Kyoshmaklewakleru ginkakatkalu Pawlo tye tokanchi. Wane china, “Wa girukotlewatachine yokanrewata gkaspukikolpatka gixa. Giyagni wa xani gyanutka. Kiglenshinikanurunemnupgi.”
44016037	Giyagni Pawlo wane chinna, “Kochipjetwuna pejnurune getanu, muklukanuwnakanwu. Jejine Romanonekwu; yoshmakikwaka yoshmakwuna. ¿Ga wa xanimkalge ruknokanwuna giyogimatkalunwu? ¡Gike wixiniko! Seyni runanna wannako. Koshpakapanwuna.”
44016038	Kashrewaklerune ginkakapna girukotlewatachine tye tokanchi. Pikanna wa yijnakotinrina Romanone rixinrina.
44016039	Runna. Rumnanuukana. Koshpaakatkana. Ragjitkana wa pokchiya yinripna.
44016040	Giyagni yoshmakikwaka rushpakamtyatkana. Lityapji jiglokna. Retatkana moletkakachine. Rumnanuukatkana. Wane yiyatkana.
44017001	Gampipoli yapamtna, ga wa Gapoloni. Tesalonika rapokna. Wane rawa Goteyone ginkaklewawaklepji.
44017002	Pawlo gixjetyawaka jiglokyegitna. Mapa kata gapnanutikalurgogne wale giynumsatna Tokanchi Yonatkalurupiranaya.
44017003	Rekakgitna rumkata salewnaletinri Kristo. Rumkata gipnachinetskalaya yotunretinri. Wane china, “Geso wa nunkakletyegityagi Walenwa Kristo.”
44017004	Pimrine wanna galixa. Pawlo, Surayma jiglokna. Wa Kriykone kyonogyegiklerune, gi gepikna wanna. Ga wa suxone wanna potu gixolune.
44017005	Giyagni Goteyone wa malixaklene ganxata. Rawapkana pimrine jejine yaglotashatachine muglene. Potowurkaakana gixolune. Sejrewnananumtna pokchiya. Ruptekyegimtluna Gasopji. Koshpaakomkana Pawlo, Sura yinyegiya.
44017006	Gi wa rukshiikana. Gasni kostapna, ga wa pimrine moletkakachine koxa. Pokchi girukotlewatachine yegi raniikana. Wane china sapletna, “Nyi psolchijne gajeneko komyekanshinikanutachine gewi koxa runna.
44017007	Gaso yoptotatkana. Susa yokanrekaka mpoyagkaakane wanna Pawlo pejnuruneko. Wane chinna wanegimlu satu pogirchi Geso.”
44017008	Kojwakanshinikanutkana yine ga wa pokchi girukotlewatyachine, tyepirana yijnakotinrina.
44017009	Yoptomtlona sroschi satkapinripa Gaso ga wa pimrine koxa. Kaspuukatkana.
44017010	Waneklu moletkakachine yokanatatkana Pawlo ga wa Sura goyechno, Were yinripna. Wane rapokinitkana, Goteyone ginkaklewawaklepji jiglokna.
44017011	Tesalonika gajene pnute kshinikanna wanna Were gajene, gi rixanu yijnakotluna tokanchi psolgalukleyako. Pagognemnunanuka retjetluna yonchi wa galikaklege tyekakapirana.
44017012	Giyagni wanna gixo galixa Kriyko suxone wanna potune, ga wa jejine gixolune.
44017013	Giyagni Tesalonika gajene Goteyone gimatinitka Were koxa runkakletikatka Goyakalu tokanu Pawlo chinanu. Wane yana. Komyekanshinikanutkana gixolune yine. Kojwakanshinikanutkana.
44017014	Giyagni waneklu wa moletkakachine yokanatatkalu Pawlo. Tsru wenusreta yinripa. Ga wa Sura ga wa Timotiyo waneko gituka.
44017015	Wa Pawlo ganikjene Gatenpotuko ranikluna. Wanna ganiklu Pawlo tokanu giyampotu runinripna Sura ga wa Timotiyo. Yatkana.
44017016	Kagwakinikopshinna Pawlo Gatenaya jigekanshinikanutka wa pokchi retinri gi gepiklu yagluchisha.
44017017	Giyagni ginkaklewwakapjiya ruynumsatna Goteyone ga wa kyonogyegiklerune. Pagognemnunanuka giputuya ruynumsatna yoptotanunkaka.
44017018	Pimrine galuka gimatletachine Gepikoreyone mkoje gajene ga wa Gestoyko mkoje gajene yoptopiratluna. Ga wa pimrine wane china, “¿Klu raluka chinreta tye kyanumsakleru?” Pimrine wane china, “Kginkaklewaklergetkoni pnuko gixachine goyakalunepirana.” Gi rixanu Gesopirana ga wa gipnachine yotunrepirana runkakletyegitna.
44017019	Kashichanruna. Gareyo Magkate ranikluna. Wane chinna, “¿Gi ge wumkata gimatletlu tye gerotu ginkaklewlu, wa pixa ginkakletanru?
44017020	Gi rixanu pnuko gixpiranatachri punkakwu. Giyagni waluka gimatletlu klupiranni wa tye.”
44017021	Pejnuruneko Gatena gajene ga wa pnu gajene, walepiranapje ruknokakgognetyana, wane rixinrina yijnakotinrina gerotupirana.
44017022	Gareyo Magkate ganikajite tunwata Pawlo. Wane china, “Jejine, Gatena gajene, psoluyako netgi yonogyegjeshpotutachingi.
44017023	Gi rixanu wa nuknogamtini, netlu gyonogyegjetanrukaka. Netkoxlu satu genekashatikwakakwa, wane china yongatyawaka: Goyakalu Mumatkotu Chinanu. “Giyagni wa Wale wa gixa yonogyegitanru gma mumatanutuko, Wale nunkakletyegitangi.
44017024	“Tye psolchijneko ga wa ptowrunanuka tyechijne gajeru kamrutachri Goyakalu, wa tengogne, tyechijne Gitsrukate rixinri, gi wa myochi kamrutikaluru kpashiwakapji rawa.
44017025	Gi wa yinemyo gipxakikaluru pagixanu magatyachri pixkalutu. Gi rixanu Wale pejnuruneko geneka giwekleta, ga wa runnipgyatinrina, ga wa pejnurkakako.
44017026	“Pagragapje kamrutyana panermnunanuka psolchijnemtako rawinripna. Wale gitakyegitna rushingognetyawakapna, ga wa yoptukyawaka rawyawakapna.
44017027	Wa rujgiyapluna Goyakalu, wa kamrumrunshinikanutkamkaluna rukshikanmakluna. Gimka gowuklu wa satkaka wixa yegi.
44017028	Gi rixanu Wale wuwekya, ga wa Wale wuyoljetya, ga wa Wale gawya. Wa pimrine kiglerupirana kamrutachine gixanune chinyawaka: Gi rixanu Wale gishpakyachinkoxwu.
44017029	“Giyagni Goyakalu gishpakyachinwu wixinri, gi wumkata kori pixkalutu kagwakletyalu Goyakalu, gi wa sroschi pixkalutuko, gi wa sotlu pixkalutuko, gi wa yaglu kamrutikolu gimatkalewluya, yinerushinikannuya.
44017030	Giyagni mumatkonchiklushananu, retashlewata Goyakalu. Ga wa xani yokanatna pejnurunekoneru pachijnemnunanuka gajene renshinikanutinripna.
44017031	Gi rixanu pagogne rutaka wanepotuko rutakyagokyapna psolchijne gajeneko tye jejiya Wale gitakanru. Renekna pejnuruneko ralixinripna gi rixanu gipnachinetskalaya yotunkaklu.”
44017032	Giyagni wa yijnakotinrina wa gipnachine yotunrepirana, pimrine gixpiranawata. Pimrine wane china, “Wumepe yijnakletanutnakyi tyepirana.”
44017033	Giyagni Pawlo wanna ganikajite rushpakamtyatka.
44017034	Pimrine jejine galixa. Rupxaletluna. Wannaymakoxlu Tiyonisyo, Gareyo Magkate gajeru, ga wa sato suxo Tamari giwakatletachro, ga wa pimrine wannayma koxa.
44018001	Wanepnute Gatena yiyatka Pawlo. Korinto rapoka.
44018002	Wane retyalu satu Goteyo, Gakila giwakatletachri, Ponto gajeru, ga wa ganunro Presura. Gi gowukshini Gitalya giyakatyachri. Gi rixanu Klawtyo towuwata wa pejnuruneko Goteyone Roma gishpakinripa. Pawlo yayegitna.
44018003	Wannapji rawa gi rixanu waleko kamrurchi koxa kamrujeta wale. Kamrurewata. Gi rixanu mkachripji kamrutachinni.
44018004	Ruynumsalewjeta pejnuruko gapnanutikalurgogne ginkaklewwakapjiya. Rushinikanutna Goteyone ga wa Kriykone.
44018005	Wa Masetoni ruyakatinitkana Sura ga wa Timotiyo, Pawlo gimupruklu tokanchi. Goteyoneyegiya rupgujtatlu wa Gesni wa Kristo.
44018006	Raalixmakluna. Mupashiregnuchi chinna. Pawlo giplokamkaluta. Wane chinna, “Gixako chinanupni gamga giwekletanuna. Powrano gita. Xaniyakawa payine yegi nyanutka.”
44018007	Wane yiyatka. Gosto giwakatletachri jiglokapjitatka. Goyakalu yonogyegitachri. Ginkaklewwakapjistsi rawapjita.
44018008	Krispo wa ginkaklewwakapji gitsrukate galixlu Gitsrukaachi, pejnuruneko gipji gajeneymananuko. Ga wa gixo Korintyo gajene yijnakotlu. Ralixluna. Katkatkana.
44018009	Giyagni Gitsrukaachi wane chinru goyechno Pawlo kaygawleya, “Gi pikanu. Seyni punkaklewatanu. Gi wa pochkepyi.
44018010	Gi rixanu pixaymano. Gike giptekyegitanyi wa rumtukyapyi. Gi rixanu gi gepikayno yineru tye pokchi.”
44018011	Satu walapu wanepnute patsrujire ksuru wane rawa. Goyakalu tokanu runkakna.
44018012	Kalyo walenwa Gakayi girukotlewatyachri rixini Goteyone panshinikanurunni kamnixluna Pawlo. Gitaka yagoklewjetikowaka ranikluna.
44018013	Wane chinna, “Tye gishinikanutna yine yonogyegityapluna Goyakalu, Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru ginanshichyawaka.”
44018014	Yanumatkastsini Pawlo, Kalyo wane chinna Goteyone, “Satu mpoyagkaakatumka ga wa yokwirumka mugletu rixinri, numkata yijnakletanmakgi, Goteyone.
44018015	Wa gepomsakaklusha chinini tokanchipirana, ga wa giwakchipirana, ga wa Gyokanyegitikolu Tokanchipirana, getanru gixa. Gi rixanu gi naluklu gitaka yagoklewatachri nixinri tyekakapirana.”
44018016	Gitaka yagokjetikwakaya wane rakaxrijetyana.
44018017	Pejnuruneko Kriykone kashichlu Sostenese wa ginkaklewwakapji gitsrukate. Gitaka yagokjetikowakaya ginaple ruylakyanruna. Ga wa Kalyo gike rixlu tyekaka.
44018018	Wanepnute Pawlo gixgogne wane rawinitka, rungatkana moletkakachine. Rutspegatka. Suri ya, ga wa Presura ga wa Gakila. Senkre Pokchi jiwjitika, gi rixanu waneylu wa Pawlo Goyakalu rupiratinri.
44018019	Gigwiso rapoka. Wane ruknokna Pawlo. Wale ginkaklewawakapji jigloka. Ruynumsatna Goteyone.
44018020	Wanna gagjitlu wannayma rutukinripachi gowukshiniyaka. Seyni gi rugita.
44018021	Rungagonukna. Wane china, “Goyakalu galukiniplu nsatokyegitanutnakgi.” Gigwiso yiyatka.
44018022	Susari yinitka. Kanika. Ralkapna gapatjetachine. Gantiyoki ya.
44018023	Rali wane gwaletinitka ralimta. Kalatasreta ga wa Prigisreta kopruta. Papokchimnunanuka rapokananumta. Muchkotanshinikanunanumtna pejnuruneko Gitsrukaachi yimaklene.
44018024	Giyagni satu Goteyo Gigwiso gapoka, Gapolo giwakatletachri, Galegantri giyakatyachri, jeji gimata yanumsatachri potu, gimkatachri potu Tokanchi Yonatkalurupirana.
44018025	Runkakpokowakatluna Gitsrukaachgapopirana. Muchkopiranawatachri ginshinikanuya. Runkaklewata ga wa yimaklewpotuta Gitsrukaachipiranaya. Gwa katlewlepiranapje rumata.
44018026	Gapolo yinuwaka pgujetanwaka china ginkaklewleta ginkaklewwakapjiya. Presura ga wa Gakila yijnakotlu. Ranikluna. Runkakpokowakpotutluna Goyakalgapo.
44018027	Raluka koprugleta, Gaka yinripa. Moletkakachine yonyegitna Gitsrukaachi yimaklene. Ruykotikolna yoptotyapluna. Wa wale gapokinitka, gixo rupxakna wa gimutlewluya galixyachine.
44018028	Gi rixanu psolmuchkonuko rushinikanutna Goteyone pejnurune getanu. Tokanchi Yonatkaluru rekakgityana Kristo chininri wa Geso.
44019001	Wane rixatka. Korinto rawanatinikopshini Gapolo, Pawlo gitokosha potu koprunata. Gigwiso rapoka. Retna pimrine Gitsrukaachi yimaklene.
