44019002	Wane chinna wale, “¿Gi ge gyoptotlu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri wa galixinitka?” Wanna wane chinru, “Giyaka wyijnakpiranyegitlu wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri wane rixinri.”
44019003	Wane china, “¿Giyagni klu gkatika?” Wanna wane china, “Gwa katlewleya.”
44019004	Wane china Pawlo, “Gwa katlewata. Genshinikanrupirana katlewatya. Gwa wane chinna yine ralixyapluna rajxigi ginachripa. Walenwa Geso Kristo.”
44019005	Wa yijnakotinitkaluna katkatkana Gitsrukaachi Geso giwakaya.
44019006	Wa Pawlo gitakamyotseptaagogotinitkana, rapyegitna Giwekikaluru Kpashiri. Panerunmnu tokanu yanumatyana, ga wa Goyakalu tokanu reneklewatna.
44019007	Wane pejnugetkona pamole gepi jejine.
44019008	Mapa ksuru ginkaklewwakapji jiglokjeta. Pgujetanwaka china yanumsaleta. Ruynumsalewata. Rushinikanutlewata Goyakalu pogirewatywakapiranaya.
44019009	Seyni pimrine shikowata. Gi ralixna. Rapatluna Gitsrukaachgapo gixolune jemanu. Pawlo gitspalatyana ga wa Gitsrukaachi yimaklene ranika. Pagognemnunanuka Tiranopji yimaklewatywaka ruynumsalewatya.
44019010	Wane rixa gepi walapu. Giyagni pejnuruneko Gasya gwachine Goteyo ga wa Kriyko, yijnakotluna Gitsrukaachi tokanu.
44019011	Metjejetkotu ruyaklekaka Goyakalu kamruta Pawloya.
44019012	Giyagni mkachrisamkaka, gistatlechkaka gimane gajeru yayixachine yegi ranikna. Rutuka yayixlemtatkana. Kamchine gishpakamtyatkana.
44019013	Wanena pimrine Goteyone kagonchine yapashawakle gwachine. Wa kamchine waneyalune chinanumka koschekmakluna Gitsrukaachi giwaka. Wane chinna, “Wa Pawlo ginkakletanru Geso kawchinanu nyokanatgi.”
44019014	Wanena Sewa wgenene payokgipre, Goteyo, sasertotene gitsrukate. Wanna wane gixa.
44019015	Kamchi gigita. Wane china, “Geso numata. Pawlo koxa numata. Ga wa gixa, ¿katgi gixa?”
44019016	Wa jeji kamchi gwanru ruptekyegimtna. Raalixna. Gepi pnute muchkonru. Giyagni walepji rasukyana mamkane poletkalunena.
44019017	Kapiranyeglu wa tye pejnuruneko Goteyone ga wa Kriykone yegi Gigwiso gwachine. Pikatkana pejnuruneko. Gitsrukaachi Geso giwaka tserutpiranyegitka.
44019018	Gixna galixachinetka gapoka. Rupgujtatnawana. Runkaklewatna wa kamrutanruyna.
44019019	Gixna wa kagonchiwanatachine kiruka rapatna. Yoxikanatkalona pejnuruneko getanu. Koshpakwenutlona. Wane pejnu rukshikwenrotyalona: pamole waragkaproji.
44019020	Wane rixa muchkonpotuya tseruwnaleta Gitsrukaachi tokanu. Muchkowata raalirewatinri.
44019021	Giyagni wane rixkatka, Giwekikaluru gishinikanutlu Pawlo Masetoni ga wa Gaka yinripa. Waneya Gerosale yinripatnaka. Wane china, “Nali wane gwaletinipa, Roma koxa numkata getleta.”
44019022	Giyagni gepi rupxakjene Masetoni yokanata, Timotiyo ga wa Gerasto. Gasya rutukawa wale pshinitsonu.
44019023	Walegognekaka tsru kegeknanuwlu wane Gitsrukaachgapo chinanu.
44019024	Gi rixanu waneru satu sroschi pagixanu kamrujetyachri, Rimitri giwakatletachri. Wale sroschi kamrujetyalu kpashiwakapjiiji Tiyananupa. Gixo wenru rawyana kamrurewaklerune.
44019025	Wale gapatjekakna kamrurewaklerune waleko kamrurchi kamrujetachine. Wane chinna, “Gixa gimatlu tye kamrurchi chinanu waneywu wponikowle.
44019026	Gixa getlu ga wa gyijnakotlu wa tye Pawlo, gi wa Gigwisopje seyni psolunshinikanuko Gasya, rushinikanutananumtyana gixolune. Wale kashrijetjetna. Wane china wa gi gima goyakalunni wa myochi kamrutikaluru.
44019027	Gi wa walepjeni wa tye kamrurchi gike gaprini chinanatko, seyni wanepnute wa kpashiwakapji wa tsro goyakalo Tiyanapji gike gapri rumkata gixkota. Yinuwaka nikatkotanu toyaknu. Walanwa yonogyegitka psolu Gasya gajeneyako, ga wa psolchijneko gajeneya.”
44019028	Wa yijnakotinitkaluna tyepirana, ramewnapotutna. Saplewatna. Wane chinna, “Tsropotni wa Tiyana, Gigwiso gajenenu.”
44019029	Pokchi gajene gixrijeptajitaa gixa. Panshinikanurune gakaxikamta. Pejnurune gapatjetyawakagruko yana. Kayo ga wa Garistarcho kashichna, Masetoni giyakatyachine, Pawlo gipxaaletanune.
44019030	Pawlo galuka gishpakyegletna gixolune yine. Gitsrukaachi yimaklene gi gichichlu.
44019031	Pimrine koxa tsrukakalune Gasya gajene, ralukjene, yokantokanyegitluna. Ragjitluna pejnurune gapatjetyawakagruko ma mutakinitipa.
44019032	Pimrine saplewjeta, ga wa pimrine pnuko china sapleta. Gi rixanu gapatachine sejrewnashatachine. Gixo potu gi gimata klu chinanu rapatna.
44019033	Gixolune yine ganikajite koshpakluna Galegantro. Goteyone gertamtanru. Giyagni Galegantro yotukamyoyegitna pochke rixinripna. Raluka giglepokleyegitnawa wa gixolune yegi.
44019034	Wa rumatinitkaluna Goteyo rixinri, pejnuruneko pasaplewatkalune. Gepi goranshinikanu saplewjetna. Wane chinna, “Tsronwa Tiyana Gigwiso gajenenu.”
44019035	Giyagni wa yonchikgapri kochrokatkana. Wane china, “Jejine, Gigwiso gajene, ¿girni wa jeji mumatkatu wa Gigwiso Pokchi gajene kpashiwakapji girukotachine wa tsro Tiyanapji, ga wa Gopite gijrukyachro.
44019036	Giyagni gi rixanu gi rumkata nutatkota, gixa gimkata gitukletatka. Gike giyampotu wane gixanu.
44019037	Gi rixanu gixa gwapna nyi jejine. Gi wa mupashiregonni. Gi koxa woyakalote kapataklerunni.
44019038	Giyagni Rimitri ga wa waleymalune kamrurewaklerune waneyna rixinna jijyegitikolu papirana satu chinanu, gapatikowakapa rutakanna. Wanena girukotlewatachine. Runkakletkakanna.
44019039	Ga wa gijginiplu satuyako, gapatjetikwaka gitaakaluru ruglepokotikolupa.
44019040	-
44019041	Gi rixanu gimkata tomgakota gixa yagotkakluyapa xawakni chinanu. Gi rixanu gike chinanni wugityaplu tye potowurushatyawakapirana.” Wane chininitka, yokanatatkana gapatachine.
44020001	Wa rutukinitka gejnugima Gitsrukaachi yimaklene repuka Pawlo. Rumnanukatkana. Rungatkana. Yatka. Masetoni yinripatka.
44020002	Wanesreta yapamtini, ruykonanumtna gixo tokanchi. Kresi rapoka.
44020003	Mapa ksuru wane rawanata. Raluka yagapgaleta, Suri yinripmaka. Goteyone jemanshinikankakyegitlu. Wane rixa gishinikleta Masetoni satokinripa.
44020004	Gasyapotuko rupxaaltapyaluna Sopate Were gajeru, wanepnute Tesalonika gajene Garistarcho ga wa Sekonto, wanepnute Kayo, Terwe gajeru, ga wa Timotiyo; wanepnute Gasya gajene, Tichiko ga wa Trogimo.
44020005	Wanna koseka. Trowa kagwakyawuna.
44020006	Wa jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotugognekaka giknoginitka, Wilipo wutspegya. Pamyogogne Trowa wapyegityatkana. Wane gawanata payokgipregogne.
44020007	Muchinangogne simanaya, rapatna Gitsrukaachi yimaklene jiknajrotyapluna jimapro. Pawlo giynumsatna. Waleprikgogne raluka yaletatka. Goginkaklewleru ganikajyechnopotunanuko.
44020008	Gi gepiklo katalo wa tenogruko wa rapatyawakna.
44020009	Satu makluji Gewticho giwakatletachri gonotaswawaka tuplanatachri. Ruxapne gaalixanruna. Wa Pawlo gogiynumsalewle rixini, ruxapne gaalixanrunatka. Mapagruko chininriya ruyaka gijrukletyana. Gipnachrinatka gwapkanatka.
44020010	Giyagni Pawlo yopikamta. Wale gogo rapokamta. Kanopatlu. Wane china, “Gi wa gejnugimalewatanu. Gi rixanu ruwekinri waneyawalu.”
44020011	Giyagni ratskotatnaka. Jiknajrotatkalu jimapro. Niklu. Gixo ruynumsatna goyechnokawpotunanuko. Wane gixachri yatka.
44020012	Ranikatkaluna makluji giwekachri. Rumnanukpotutkana.
44020013	Wixa gatskotatkalo kanawa. Gaso gayatka. Wane wyoptotinri Pawlo. Gi rixanu wane rixa ginkakpokowakleta. Wale chiji yapamtanu.
44020014	Wale yoptotinitkawu Gasoya. Wpokotatkalu. Mitirini gayatka.
44020015	Wane wutspegya. Waleprikgogne wapoklu Chiyo ginaple. Pagognetnakni Samo yopjewakle wutspaka. Trogelyo gawamta. Waleprika wapoklu Mireto.
44020016	Gi rixanu Pawlo gishinika giknoglemtlu Gigwiso, Gasya ma mamginitpatka. Gi rixanu shireta Gerosale rumkata giknokakletyaplu Tsru Jirgikolgognepatka.
44020017	Mireto repukyana Gigwiso gajene gapatjetachine tsrutene.
44020018	Rapyegitinitkaluna, wane chinna, “Gixa gimata wa nejigloklegogne Gasya wanekluyakawa, gi pixka gimwale nixanatgi.
44020019	Gitsrukaachi wayegrerno nixa. Psolpotuyako malixkotnachriwano. Ga wa gixo noktegayma. Ga wa gixo nyantaletikolu Goteyone jemanshinikankakjetyawakno.
44020020	Klunerukta gimkata gipxakjerupa gi wa nyoxigika ginkakletgi yimakletgi pejnurune getanu ga wa papjikakaya.
44020021	Goteyone yegi ga wa Kriykone yegi nupgujtatlu genshinikanrupirana Goyakalu chinanu, ga wa Wutsrukate Geso Kristo galixikolupapirana.
44020022	“Ga wa xani gostutkalurno Giwekikaluruya, Gerosale nyanu. Gi numata klunerukta giknoganno waneya.
44020023	Seyni papokchimnunanuka Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gipgujtayegitno. Wane china wa gosturewlu ga wa salewakchi waneyapno.
44020024	Seyni gike rixno. Gi wa nutakyagoklu nuwekinri kigleypotno gita. Walepje, npoyagkakyaplu psoluko Goyakalu gitakyano numuwleypotuko, ga wa kamrurchi Gitsrukaachi Geso nyoptotinri, nupgujtatyaplu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi Goyakalu gimutlewlepirana.
44020025	“Ga wa xani, numata gita gi satuna gixa getgojitanutkano, pejnurunekgi wa gixatskalaya nyapanatini, nunkakletanatinri Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana.
44020026	Giyagni tyegogne nupgujtatlu muklukanuwnakatno gita pejnuruneko giwekgognenatinripa chinanu.
44020027	Gi rixanu gi wa nyoxigika ginkakletgi pejnuruko Goyakalu gishinikanru.
44020028	Ggirukotinwa gixnanuko, ga wa ggirukotanna pejnuruneko rowegatene. Wa wanna girukotjene Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gitakgi, ggirukotuyapna Gitsrukaachi gapatjetanune, wenutanune Walenuko gigragaya.
44020029	Gi rixanu numata gita, gitgajxigiyaka gixa yegi yoshmakinwana kewetnane kmatsurune, gowegane metashatkanepa.
44020030	Pimrine wa gixa, jejine mpotukatupirana ginkakletjetachine gipgujewnanu. Gitsrukaachi yimaklene wanna gajxigimka rawkakanna.
44020031	Giyagni giyokanu. Gishinikanru wa mapa walapu goyechno ga wa gogi gi nkaspuka giykoletgi satkaka gixa noktegayma.
44020032	“Ga wa xani Goyakalu naponshinikanyegitgi, ga wa tokanu rumutlewleya. Walenwa kgiyaklewakleru tokanchi, tseruwakyapgi, ga wa renekyapgi kiglerkakapa gyoptotanrupa pejnuruneko kpashirine gixkaluneyma.
44020033	Gi satuna neta sotanserojipjojita, gi koriteko, gi gimkaluko.
44020034	Gixa koxa gimata tye nomyo nkamrurewatya nalukanru chinanu ga wa gitaymalune koxa chinanu.
44020035	Psolpotuyako nyimakgi, wane gixa kamrurewlepotletinripa gimkata gipxakletna gigrokachine. Gimkata gishinikletlu Gitsrukaachi Geso tokanu. Wale wane china, ‘Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru geneklewashatachri yoptotachri pnute.’ ”
44020036	Wane chininitka, yoptsojita. Ragjigogneta pejnuruneko wannayma.
44020037	Giyagni pejnuruneko tsru chiyaglu gixa. Kanopnojitluna Pawlo. Ramlutluna.
44020038	Kachingajpotna wane chintokanutyawakna ma metgojityanpatkaluna. Rumotsamtatkaluna kanawyempotuko.
44021001	Wutspalamtyatkana, wyagapgatatka. Potuklegapo gaya. Kowo wapoka. Waleprikgogne Rota wapoka. Wane gaya. Patara wapoka.
44021002	Wukshiklo sato kanawa gitsroka. Winisi koprugatachropa. Wane wuptekatka. Wyagapgata.
44021003	Pguje chininitka Supro. Wuknogamtlu. Wkegnetesretate rawa. Suri gaya. Wapokatkalu Tiro. Gi rixanu wa kanawa wane koschekwunutiko.
44021004	Wane wukshikyana Gitsrukaachi yimaklene. Payokgipregogne wane wutuka. Wanna wane chinru Pawlo Giwekikaluruya Gerosale ma kanikinitipa.
44021005	Wpoyagkakgognetinitka, wyiyatka. Pokchi suputalpotuko rumapwuna pejnuruneko suxone ga wa mturuneymananuko. Wanga wyoptsojitatka. Wagjigognetatka.
44021006	Wungakakatka. Kanawa watskotatka. Wanna rawyawakna satokatka.
44021007	Tiro wuyakatyatka. Wpoyagkaka yagapgaletatka. Tolemayta wapoka. Walukna moletkakachine. Wanna yegi pagogne wutuka.
44021008	Waleprika gayatka. Susari wapoka. Wilipi Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi ginkakletachripji wjigloka. Walenwa payokgipre chininri. Wale yegi wutuka.
44021009	Gepkoxamkoje wgenru. Maklojine. Tokanchi geneklewatachine.
44021010	Gi gepikgogne wane gawa. Gote yopikyana satu tokanchi geneklewatachri Gakawo giwakatletachri.
44021011	Runyegitwu. Rawlo Pawlo gishrikapchijremta rawa. Waleko gijixi rostutnawa Gakawo, ga wa gimyo. Wane china, “Giwekikaluru Kpashiri wane china, ‘Goteyone Gerosale gajene wane rixa gosturejixanruna jeji tye gishrikapchijremta waneyalutu. Payinemyo samyokanruna.’ ”
44021012	Wyijnakotinri, wagjitlu wixa wane gajene koxa Gerosale ma kanikinitipachi.
44021013	Giyagni Pawlo gigita, “¿Gi gixanatge nchiyaganata, gwamontakgajitno? Gi rixanu galpokomtachritkano gi wa gostutkalurupjepno, seyni nupninrikoxapa numkata gixkota Gerosaleya Gitsrukaachi Geso giwakaya chinanu.”
44021014	Gi wumkata gishinikanutletinitkalu, pochketkawu. Wane wchina, “Wane gixkalurupa Gitsrukaachi gishinikanru.”
44021015	Walegognekaka giknoginitka, wuprukatka. Gerosale wkanikatka.
44021016	Wixaymakoxna Susari gajene pimrine Gitsrukaachi yimaklene. Raniikoxluna satu Gitsrukaachi yimakleru kapokotu, Mnaso, Supro gajeru. Waleyma wane gawamta.
44021017	Gerosale wapokinitka moletkakachine gimuwatachine yoptotwu.
44021018	Waleprikgogne wixayma jigloka Pawlo Santiyako yegi. Pejnuruneko tsrune gina.
44021019	Rali galukletinitkana, psolpotuko Pawlo ginkakna ptowruko wa Goyakalu gixyawaka payineyegiyako wale kamrureya.
44021020	Wa yijnakotinitkana, rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Wane chinruna, “Petewa, wumole, gi pejnu waragkananukta Goteyone galixachinetka. Pejnuruneko muchkopiranawyegitlu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
44021021	Wanna ginkaaka pixapirana: pixa gima yimakna pejnuruneko Goteyone payinetskala gwachine wanna gitspalatyapatkalu Moysisinu. Wane pchingimata ma sajruka gistakletikotpatkana mturune; gixjetikwaka ma mixinitpatkana.
44021022	Giyagni ¿klu wanepa? Wa gixolune gimkata gapatleta. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko yijnakyegitinipyi papokinritka.
44021023	Giyagni wane pixanu wa wchinyawakyi. Wanena wixa yegi gepkoxamkoje jejine Goyakalu gipiryegitachine.
44021024	Panikanna nyi. Kpashiri pixkaako wannayma. Wanna chinanu pwenutanu shishyajiwutikolupna. Pejnuruneko gimatanu wa pixapirana runkaakana gikeenani, seyni pixa koxa wanepotuko gixanata. Pkamrutlu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
44021025	Ga wa payine galixachine wyonyegita wa ginanshichkaluru yagluchisha geneekalurkakaya, ga wa granchiya, ga wa gapoklewluya.”
44021026	Giyagni Pawlo ganikna jejine. Waleprikgogne kpashiri rixka wannayma. Kpashiwakapji jiglokatka. Runkakletyaplu poyagkakikolgognekakapa kpashirine rixikolpatkana, satkaka genekashle giylatkalurupa genekikolupa.
44021027	Payokgipregogne nikawnakastsi, pimrine Goteyone Gasya gajene, wa retinrina kpashiwakapji, komyekanshinikanutkana pejnuruneko gixolune yine. Kashichluna.
44021028	Saplewjetna, “Jejine, Gisrayiline, gipxakanunwu. Tyetkanwa jeji pasretmnunanuka pejnuruneko ginkaklewyegitachri, yine gapatachri, ga wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru koxa, ga wa tyepji koxa. Wanepnute Kriykone yoshmaka kpashiwakapji. Tye kpashiwaka gimuteru rixkaka.”
44021029	Gi rixanu muchikawa retjejetanruna waleyma pokchiya Trogimo, Gigwiso gajeru. Wanna kagwaklu Pawlo jiglookakyawaklu kpashiwakapji.
44021030	Giyagni pejnuruneko pokchi gajene yotaljeptaajitaa rixna. Potowurutna yine. Kashichanruna Pawloni. Kpashiwakapji koshpakyaluna. Waneklu gipgyaptokaka gishyatka.
44021031	Ruylatanmakluna. Runkakapka solalone gitsrukate, “Psolpokchiko Gerosale yotaljeptaajitaa gixa.”
44021032	Waneklu solalone gitsrukate ganikna solalone ga wa ksolaloterune. Rasukamtna. Gixolune yine yegi rapokna. Giyagni retkana, solalone gitsrukate ga wa solalone, kaspuka giylaklemtluna Pawlo.
44021033	Giyagni rapokinitka solalone gitsrukate, kashjixlu. Rostujixanru gepitsa yowumatsaya. Repomgalu gi gixachrini, ga wa klu kamruta.
44021034	Wa gixolune pnumnu china sapletna. Gi rumkata gimata jemletlu galikaka wa sejrewakchi chinanu. Giyagni gitoko ranikjixatkalu solalonepji.
44021035	Gatskopije rapokinitka. Wane rixa koschekletatkaluna solalone psolmuchkonuko yine kamrutanru chinanu.
44021036	Gi rixanu gixolune gwagajxigitna. Saplewananumtna, “¡Puylaganru!”
44021037	Yoshmaakastsitkalu Pawlo solalonepji, wane chinru solalone gitsrukate, “¿Gi ge munanshichkotni wa papirana nunkakyapyi?” Wale wane china, “¿Pumatluge Kriyko tokanu?
44021038	¿Gi ge Gigipsyo gajerukyi pixa, wa muchikawako gepkoxamkoje waragka jejine kgiylalewaklerune pkomyekanshinikanuta; yineru mwiyawakanu panikna?”
44021039	Wane china Pawlo, “Gita galikakni jeji Goteyno, Tarso gajerno, pokchi kapiranyegiru Surisyasretaya. Giyagni nagjityi puchichyapno yine nunkakinripa.”
44021040	Giyagni wale gichichlu Pawlo. Gatskopije tunwata wale. Yotukamyota pochke rixinripna yine. Wa pochke potu rixinitkana, Gewreyone tokanu yanumatya. Wane china,
44022001	“Jejine, nomolene, tsrune, gyijnakotanunno. Nuykoyegitnawa xani gixyegiya.”
44022002	Jeminitkana Gewreyone tokanu yanumatinna, pochkepotutkana. Wane china,
44022003	“Gita galikakni Goteyno. Tarso gishpakyachrino Surisyasretaya. Tye pokchi ntseruwakika Kamalyoyegiko. Wanepotuko yimaakalurno Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru wutsrukatenni chinyawaka. Muchkopiranawatachrino Goyakaluya, pejnurunekgi gixako pixka xani.
44022004	Gita kojwakjenatna tyegapo yapachine rupninpotunanukna. Nostutna. Yoshmakjetikowaka nsamyokna jejine ga wa suxone.
44022005	Wa wane nixatka sasertotene gitsrukate potu walenwa netjeru, ga wa pejnuruneko tsrune. Wanna yegi nagjityalo kiruka wumolene chinanu. Tamaskomka nyanu, Gerosalemka nanikyapna gostutkalune wane gwanatachine saletkalunepmaka.
44022006	“Wane rixatka, nyanatini, Tamaskostsi napokini, ganikajgogneni walegnapunanu yochigyegitno tengogne gajeru yochigatachri.
44022007	Chiji napokana. Nyijnakotlu satu tokanchi wane nchinjeru, ‘Sawolo, Sawolo, ¿klu chinanu pkojwakno?’
44022008	“Giyagni gita gigita, ‘¿Katyi Pixa, Gitsrukaachi?’ “Wane chinno, ‘Gitni Geso, Nasare gajeru, pixa kojwakanruno.’
44022009	Gitaymalune retluna galikakni yochigatachri. Pikanna. Seyni gi wa jemluna wa nuynumsatjeru tokanu.
44022010	“Wane nchina, ‘¿Klu nkamrutanu, Gitsrukaachi?’ “Gitsrukaachi wane chinno, ‘Palnanu. Tamasko pyanu. Wane punkakiko pejnuruko putakikolupa pkamrutanrupa.’
44022011	Ga wa gitnitka gi netanatka wale gatajnu yochigle chinanu. Gitaymalune kanjimtno. Tamasko napoka.
44022012	“Giyagni satu Ganani, jeji kgipashiregolu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinyawakpotuko, kiglepiranyegiru pejnuruneko Goteyone yegi wane gwachine.
44022013	Runyegitno. Tunwata. Wane chinno, ‘Nepuru, Sawolo, petanutka.’ Wanekluyakawa netatkalu.
44022014	“Wane china, ‘Wutsrukatenni Goyakalute muchikawako yokgitatkayi pumatyaplu Wale gishinikanru. Petyakoxaplu wa Poyagkakachri. Pyijnakotyakoxaplu tokanu ginamaya.
44022015	Gi rixanu Wale gipgujtatachripyi payinmnunanuko yegi petanrupirana ga wa pyijnakotanrupirana.
44022016	Ga wa xani ¿klu pyoxigikanatya? Palnanutka. Pkatkotka. Pmukochire gerkikalurpatkayi. Pkoschekgiwakatanutkalu.’
44022017	“Wane nixatka. Gerosale nsatokatka. Kpashiwakapji nagjigognenatyatka. Nushpakanshinikanuta.
44022018	Netlu wane nchinjeru, ‘Pshiretanu. Giyampotu pyanutka Gerosaleya. Gi rixanu wanna gi yopto gipgujtaletanyi Gitaya.’
44022019	“Wane nchina, ‘Gitsrukaachi, wanna gimata yoshmakjetikwaka nyoshmakjenatna Pixa galixachine. Nkochipjetna ginkaklewakapjikakaya.
44022020	Pupgujtatjerni Gishtuwni giylatkoklununa wane koxa ntunwanata gita. Nugleretlu. Numretamkatna wa ruylatjene.’
44022021	“Wane chinno, ‘Pyanutka. Gi rixanu Gita yokanatanyi wajra payine yegi.’ ”
44022022	Yijnakotluna wale tokanchi chininpotunanuko. Waneklu saplewpotutna. Wane chinna, “Tye chiji gkoninri wane gixachri. Gi rumkata giwekleta.”
44022023	Saplewjetna. Ruknopxemkatna. Yoptepagitna.
44022024	Solalone gitsrukate ranikjixlu solalonepjigruko. Wane china wa kochipjetikolupa, repomsatko, rumatikolupa klu chinanu wane rixa saplewjeyegitluna.
44022025	Nikchimtatsaya kanraakakanatluna. Pawlo wane chinru ksolaloteru wane gwanatachri, “¿Munanshichkotlege gkochipjetyaplu satu jeji Romano muklukanuwnayegjixkotuko?”
44022026	Giyagni ksolaloteru yijnakotinitkalu, wane ya. Runkakaplu solalone gitsrukate. Wane china, “¿Gi pixanu? Gi rixanu Romanni tye jeji.”
44022027	Wane ya solalone gitsrukate. Wane chinru, “Punkakanno, ¿pixni Romanyi?” Wale wane china, “Gigi.”
44022028	Solalone gitsrukate gigita, “Tsru wenru napkapyalu Romano nutakikolu.” Ga wa Pawlo wane china, “Seyni gita wane nixa gishpakleta.”
44022029	Giyagni waneklu rutspalamtyatkaluna saletjenepmaka. Ga wa solalone gitsrukate koxa pika, rumatinri Romano rixinri, ga wa rostujixyalu.
44022030	Waleprikgogne raluka gimatleta galikakni klu chinanu jigyegitluna Goteyone. Koshpirokjixatkalu rostutikolu. Repukatkana tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajene. Rawpatkalu Pawlo. Wanna yegi rutaklu.
44023001	Giyagni Pawlo yopukgatna jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajene. Wane china, “Jejine, nomolene, muklukanuwnanshinikanutkatno wa nixjetyawaka xanigognenanu Goyakalu getanu.”
44023002	Sasertotene Gitsrukate potu Ganani towutna walestsi gwanatachine giylaknamatyaplu.
44023003	Giyagni Pawlo wane china, “Goyakalu giylakanmakyi pixa, prijeru galatatkaluru pixkalutyi. ¿Pixa tuplanatachrirayge putakyagokyegitno Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka, ga wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru mchinyawakanu puylakjixnoge?”
44023004	Wane gwanatachine wane china, “¿Pyangalge sasertotene gitsrukate potu Goyakalunu?”
44023005	Giyagni Pawlo wane china, “Gi numata, nomolene, wa sasertotene gitsrukate potu rixinri. Gi rixanu yonatkalurni, Gi wa gektutu tokanchi pchinyegitanru punerune gitsrukate.”
44023006	Giyagni Pawlo gimatinri pimrine Sariseyone rixinri, ga wa pimrine Gwariseyone jemanshinikankakjetikowaka saplewatya, “Jejine, nomolene, gitni Gwariseyno, ga wa Gwariseyone wgenno. Nalixkalchinanru yotunkakikolupna gipnachine, gitni wa giklukanuwnayegjixkalurno.”
44023007	Wane chininitka rugjekaktokanutna Gwariseyone ga wa Sariseyone. Gixolune kotspalanshinikankaka.
44023008	Sariseyone wane china maleshlu yotunru, gi wa Goyakalutowreruko, gi wa giwekikaluruko. Seyni Gwariseyone gipgujtatlu gepiko wane.
44023009	Tsru saplechi rixna. Palnana yonchikgapine Gwariseyonesreta gwachine. Yawrotna. Wane chinna, “Gi satuna gektutu wukshikyalu tye jeji. Gikta xani wa giwekikaluru giynumatinri waka Goyakalutowreru.”
44023010	Tsru yagotkaklu wane rixinri, solalone gitsrukate pikana kochnokakyapluna Pawlo. Giyagni repukna solalone. Kashjixlu wanna ganikajiteya. Solalonepjigruko ranikjixlu.
44023011	Waleprikyechno Gitsrukaachi tunwastsitlu. Wane chinru, “Kiglenshinikanupyi Pawlo. Gi rixanu Gerosale pupgujtatiniko pixkano waneko pixka pumkata gipgujtaletno Romaya koxa.”
44023012	Gogi chininitka pimrine Goteyone jiigkaka. Kamakpiratnamkawana. Wane chinna ma muylatkangimapluna Pawlo gi nikanna, gi ruranna.
44023013	Gepkoxamkojmole pnutna jiigkakachine.
44023014	Tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune yegi yana. Wane chinna, “Wkamakpiratnamkawa gi ptsotsotajiko wnikloknijitutanu wma kamakatkanupluchi Pawlo.
44023015	Giyagni wa xani gixa wa jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajeneyma ginkakanru solalone gitsrukate, koshpakyegitangi wanepotuko galuka gimatlepgutatanru pagixanupirana waleya. Ga wa wixa ma mapookanuwa galpokotachinepwu wuylatyaplu.”
44023016	Giyagni Pawlo palikleru yijnakyegitlu yogimagnaputyawakapluna. Wane ya. Solalonepji jiglokamta. Runkakatkalu Pawlo.
44023017	Giyagni Pawlo tomgalu satu ksolaloteru. Wane china, “Panikanru tye makluji solalone gitsrukate yegi. Gi rixanu waneylu papirana runkakyaplu.”
44023018	Giyagni yoptotlu. Raniklu solalone gitsrukate yegi. Wane china, “Wa gostutkaluru Pawlo tomgano. Ragjitno tye makluji nanikyegityapyi. Waneygimlu papirana runkakyapyi.”
44023019	Wa solalone gitsrukate kanjimtlu. Kegnete ya wannapje. Repomgalu, “¿Klu waneyyi punkakyapno?”
44023020	Wane china, “Wa Goteyone jemkaka ragjitanyina wa yechikawa pkoshpakyaplu Pawlo jemanshinikankakjetikowaka yegi. Wanepotuko raluka gimatlepgutgimatanruna pagixanupirana waleya.
44023021	Giyagni gi palixanna pixa. Gi rixanu gepkoxamkojmole pnute jejine wannanune yogimagnaputlu. Wanna kamakpirjetnachinwa ma niikanupna, ma murkanupna ma muylatkanuplunachi. Xani ralpokotatkana. Kagwakluna ptokanu.”
44023022	Giyagni solalone gitsrukate yokanatatkalu makluji. Rujretlu, “Gikena pma munkakinitipa wa punkakapyatkano tyepirana.”
44023023	Gepi ksolaloterune tomga. Wane china, “Galpokjixanna gepi pacha solalone gokaynona Susari yinripna, ga wa payokgipremole kawalyo kyapaklerune, ga wa gepi pacha kchokorejerune.
44023024	Gwapanna kawalyone Pawlo gwamtanropa. Kigle gapokle gixkakanru Gitsrukaachi Wilisi yegi.”
44023025	Yonatlo kiruka wane chinyawaka:
44023026	Gitni Klawtyo Risyano. Wa kshinikanuru potu Gitsrukaachi chinanupa Wilisi. Nalukgiwakatyi.
44023027	Tye jeji, Pawlo, Goteyone kashichanruna, ruylatanrupmakna. Solaloneyma napyegitlu. Nkoshpaklu. Gi rixanu numatatkalu Romano rixinri.
44023028	Naluka gimatletinri klu chinanu jigyegitluna. Jemanshinikankakjetyawakna naniklu.
44023029	Nukshiklu wa jigyegityaluna Goteyone gepomsalkakapiranaya Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya wannanu. Gike jigyegityaluna rupninri chinanupa ga wa rostutikolupa.
44023030	Wa nunkakapkoklunutka jemanshinikankakatkana waleya, wanekluyakawa nyokanatatkalu pixa yegi. Nunkakna jigyegitjene runkakyapyina waleya. Seyoka.
44023031	Solalone ganikatkalu Pawlo rixa towutikowakna. Goyechno Gantipatri ranikluna.
44023032	Waleprikgogne Pawloyma ruchi yaletkatkana kawalyo yapachine. Solalone satoka gipjigrukna.
44023033	Susari rapokinitkana. Kiruka renekatkaluna gitsrukaachi. Wale yegi rutaakoxluna Pawlo.
44023034	Gitsrukaachi getyongatatkalo kiruka. Repomgalu ginakasreta gajerunanni. Rumatinitka Surisa gajeru rixinri,
44023035	wane china, “Njemanyi runinipna wa pjigyegitjene.” Girorepji, tsrupji, girukotjixyatkalu.
44024001	Pamyogogne giknoginitka yopikatka Sasertotene Gitsrukatpotu Ganani, pimrine tsruneyma, ga wa satu ktokanuwakleruyma, Tertolo. Runkakletluna Pawlopirana gitsrukaachyegiya.
44024002	Tomgaka Tertolo. Yinuwaka jigyeglewleta. Wane china,
44024003	“Ga wa pixa chinanu kigle gwashlepotwu. Gixopirana giglepokotka yinyegiya pyanshinikanugnaplewle chinanu. Psolgogneko, pasretmnunanuka wyoptotyalu, psolpotuyako wpoyagnutjetyi, kanshinikanuru potu Wilisi.
44024004	Ga wa nma mumaletpotutyanupyi, nagjityi pyijnakotyapwu pshinitsonu wa pixjetyawaka potukalyi.
44024005	“Gi rixanu wukshiklu tye jeji kojwakpotlewjetachri. Yagotkaklu palnakakjetachrini wa pejnuruneko Goteyoneyegkaka psolchijiyako. Walenwa Nasarenone mkoje chinkalune kosekachri
44024006	Kpashwakapji gimuteru rixkakmaka. Wkashichanru. Waluka gitakyagokleyegitanru Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru wixanu chinyawaka.
44024007	Ga wa solalone gitsrukate Risya gapyegitwu. Psolmuchkonuyako wumyo konyawu. Yokanatna jigyegitjene pixa yegi yinripna.
44024008	Pixpotuko gepomsatanru, pumkata gimatletyaplu pejnuruko tyekakapiranaya wjigyegityalu.”
44024009	Pajigyegitkolutu rixluna Goteyone. Wanepotuko chinruna tyepirana.
44024010	Gitsrukaachi towutlu Pawlo yanumatinripa. Giyagni Pawlo gigita, “Gi rixanu numata gixo walapu kgitakyagoklewakleryi nyi yinyegiya, kiglenshinikanurno nuykoyegitinwa.
44024011	Gi rixanu pixa gimkata gimata jemletlu gi wa pamole gepgognepnutewani Gerosale nkanikinri nyoptsojityeglewtapinripa.
44024012	Gi wa rukshiknona satuyma nugjekaktokanutinri kpashiwakapjiya. Gi koxa rukshiknona yagotkaklu palnakakachrino, gi wa ginkaklewwakapjiyako, gi wa pokchiyako.
44024013	Gi rumkata gimatkakletlu xani wa jigyegityanona.
44024014	Tye nupgujtatnawa pixyegiya, rixgapotyawaka wane chinka pnuko gixachri yimaklewlu, wanepotuko nixa kamrurewyegletlu nutsrukatenni Goyakalute. Nalixlu ptowrukakako Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachine kirukateya yonatkaluru.
44024015	Goyakalu nkagwakyalu waneplu yotunru gipnachine chinanu, poyagkakachine ga wa mpoyagkaakane. Wale koxa kagwakna wanna.
44024016	Wale chinanu nmuchkotnawa psolpotuyako muklukanuwnanshinikanutkatupno Goyakalyegiya ga wa yinyegiya.
44024017	“Giyagni gixo walapu giknoginitka wane nya nenekashatyapna kwamonurune nonerune, ga wa genekashlukaka nanikinripa.
44024018	Kpashiwakapji rukshikyanona pimrine Gasya gajene Goteyone. Kpashiri nixkaaka. Gi wa gixoluneyma, gi wa gejnugimalewanatachineyma rukshiknona.
44024019	Wanna gimkata gewi gwaleta pixa yegi jigyegitannona waneyna chininipna gitapiranaya.
44024020	Wannako gimkata ginkaklewleta wa pagixanu mpoyagkaakotu retinnona wa jemanshinikankakjetikowaka ntunwanatini.
44024021	Walepje getko satu tokanchipje wa nsaplewatinri wanna ganikajite ntunwanatini. Wane nchina, ‘Yotunkakikolupna gipnachinepirana gitni wa giklukanuwnayegjixkalurno xani gixyegiya.’ ”
44024022	Giyagni Wilisi yijnakpiranatinitkalu kagwakjixna, gi rixanu rumatpotutlu wanna Pawlo galixlepirana. Wane china, “Wa yopikinipa wa solalone gitsrukate Risya, numatpotutanu gixapirana.”
44024023	Giyagni yokanatlu ksolaloteru Pawlo girukotinripa. Kayaagostureko rixatkaluna. Gi wa rumaletkona gimolene rupxakjenepa.
44024024	Pagognetnakni runa Wilisi Trosilayma ganunro. Walanwa Goteyo. Pawlo tomga. Yijnakyegitlu galixlu Geso Kristoya.
44024025	Poyagkaklupirana ruynumsatlu, ga wa girukotmanrewlupirana, ga wa giklukanuwnayeglupapirana. Pika Wilisi gitsrukaachi. Rugita, “Pyanutka xani. Kagogne nchininipa nepukanyi.”
44024026	Kagwaakoxlu Wilisi renekikolupa sroschi Pawlo chinanu kaspukyaplu. Giyagni gi gepiko kata repuklu. Ruynumsatlu.
44024027	Gepi walapu giknoginitka, Porsyo Wisto kashrigatkalu Wilisi. Ga wa Wilisi galuka gimutletna Goteyone. Giyagni ruknokamtatkalu gostutkaluru Pawlo.
44025001	Giyagni walesreta rapokinitka Wisto. Mapgogne chininitka Susari kanikya. Gerosale rapoka.
44025002	Runkakluna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa wanna potu Goteyone Pawlopirana. Ragjitluna.
44025003	Ragjitluna rupxakikolupna Pawlo chinanu. Gerosale ranikjixyaplu. Yogimagnaputyatkaluna gatnugapoya ruylatyapluna.
44025004	Giyagni Wisto gigita wa Pawlo Susari girukotikaluru, ga wa waleko pshinitsonu yanutka.
44025005	Wane china, “Giyagni wa gixa gimkatachine Susari giyopikanu. Gjigyegitanru wa waneya chininipa pagixanu mugletu wa tye jeji.”
44025006	Wanna yegi rawanata yokgipgognepje ga wa pamolgogne getko. Yopika. Susari ya. Waleprikgogne gitakyagoklewjetikowaka tuplata. Rawapjixatkalu Pawlo.
44025007	Rapokinitka wale, Gerosale giyakatyachine Goteyone sajruklu. Runkaksayempotutluna gektutpotupirana. Gi rumkata gipgujtaletluna galikaka rixinri.
44025008	Ruykoyegitnawa Pawlo. Wane china, “Giketsotaji wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruko Goteyonenu, gi wa kpashiwakapjiko, gi wa Susako mugletu nkamrutya.”
44025009	Wa Wisto galuka gimutletna Goteyone. Giyagni Pawlo rugita. Wane china, “¿Gi ge paluka kanikleta Gerosale? Wane nutakyagokinyi tyekakapirana.”
44025010	Wane china Pawlo, “Wa Susa gitakyagoklewjetyawaka ntunwatanu. Wane numkata giglepokletikolupa nutakyagokikolupa. Gikena mugletu nkamrutkamka Goteyone, wa pixa gimatpotutyawaka.
44025011	Gi rixanu wa mugletu nkamrutmaka ga wa pagixanu nupninri chinanupa, gi wa nkegemga nma mupninitipmaka. Seyni malesha chinini wa jigyegityanona gikena gimkata samyokletno wannayegi. Napguwyegitlu Susa.”
44025012	Giyagni Wisto giynumsatna jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajene. Rali giynumsaletinitkana, wane china, “¿Papguwyegitluge Susa? Susa yegi pyanu.”
44025013	Pagognetnakni pogirchi Gakripa ga wa Wirnisa Susari rapokna. Wisto ralukinripna.
44025014	Gixgogne wane rawinitkana, Wisto ginkaklu pogirchi Pawlopirana. Wane china, “Waneru satu jeji Wilisi giknokamtanru gostutkaluru.
44025015	Gerosale nyini, tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune Goteyone ginkakno walepirana. Ragjiyegitluna ruklukanuwnayegjixikolupa.
44025016	“Wanna nugita, gi wa rixjetyawakna Romanone wa satu yineru samyooko wale ma metgojitkanuwana jigyegitjene wuchichyaplu ruykoyegitinipwa jigyegitikoluya.
44025017	Giyagni gewi runinitkana pejnurunemnuni, gi nkagwakjixajitna. Waleprikgogne gitakyagokikowaka ntuplata. Nwapjixlu jeji.
44025018	Rapokinitkana jigyegitjene gi satuna jigyeglewlu mugletu ranikna, wa nkagwakanrumka.
44025019	Satupjeru waneyna waleya gepomsalewlukaka rupashichanruyna, ga wa satu Gesopirana gipnachrinatka wa Pawlo gipgujtatyalu giwekachri rixinri.
44025020	Gita gi numatanshinikanuta wane pixkalutu gepomsalewlupiranaya. Giyagni wane nchinru gikta Gerosale raluka yaleta ruglepokyegitikolupa, rutakyagokikolupa tyepirankaka.
44025021	Wa Pawlo gapguwata rumretikolupa Pogirchi Gakosto gimata getjerewatinrigognepotunanuko. Giyagni numretjixlu Susa yegi yokanatkoklunpotunanuko.”
44025022	Giyagni Gakripa wane chinru Wisto, “Gita koxa galuka yijnakletlu wale jeji.” Wale wane china, “Yechikawa pyijnakotanru.”
44025023	Giyagni waleprikgogne runa Gakripa ga wa Wirnisi koxa. Tsru pogirewlu rumupgujewnana. Jiglokjetikwaka rapokna, solalone gitsrukateneymananuko, ga wa jejine wanna potu pokchi gajene. Wisto gwapjixlu Pawlo.
44025024	Wane china Wisto, “Pogirchi Gakripa ga wa pejnurune jejine wixaymalune, getanru tye. Pejnuruneko gixolune Goteyone jigyegitluna gita yegi Gerosaleya ga wa gewi koxa. Wane china saplewjeretna ma muwekinitpatka.
44025025	Ga wa gi satuna numata jema rupninri chinanupa, ga wa waleko gapguwyegitlu Gakosto. Giyagni wane nixa gishinikleta yokanatkalurupni.
44025026	Gi wanepotuko waneyno walepiranaya nyonyegityaplu wa gitsrukaachi. Giyagni nkoshpaklu gixa yegi. Pixpotuko galikaka, pogirchi Gakripa, wa repomsatkoklunpatka waneyapno tokanchi nyonatanrupa.
44025027	Gi rixanu gita goya seproloklunwa gostutkaluru yokanatkoklunchi munkaklewyegitkotuko klu chinanu jigyegitka.”
44026001	Giyagni Gakripa wane chinru Pawlo, “Pumkata ginkakleyegitnawa.” Giyagni Pawlo yotukamyota. Ruykoyegitnawa,
44026002	“Pogirchi Gakripa, npoyagnutlu wa pixyegiya nuykoyegitinwa xani ptowrukopirana wa Goteyone jigyegityano.
44026003	Galikakakni. Gi rixanu pixni wa Goteyone gixjetyawaka ga wa repomsalewlekakna gimatachriyi. Giyagni nagjityi mapognanutupyi pyijnakotyapno.
44026004	“Gi rixanu nmaklutinyakawa nixjetyawaka muchikawayakawa nonerunetskalaya ga wa Gerosaleya, pejnurune Goteyone gimata.
44026005	Muchikawayakawa rumatnona wanna, wa raluka gipgujtaletinipmaknona, wa wanepotuko gixa yonogletachine wixanune mkoje pixkalutunanno Gwariseyonanno.
44026006	Ga wa xani kagwakikolu chinanu Goyakalu gipiratanru wutsrukatenniya nutunwata nutakyagokikolu.
44026007	Wale kagwakikolu kagwaka gapkapletna wpamolegepinerutene, Goyakalu kamrurewyempotutachine gogi ga wa goyechno. Wale kagwakikolu chinanu Goteyone jigyegitno, Pogirchi Gakripa.
44026008	¡Gaa! ¿Gixa goya gayroklurge gixkaklukoya wa Goyakalu yotunkakanna gipnachine?
44026009	“Giyagni gita galikaka gishinikanuwtapa numkata kamrureta gixo nkamnixyaplu giwaka Nasare Gajeru Geso.
44026010	Tye nkamrutapa Gerosaleya. Gitaakalurunanno tsrukakalune sasertoteneya. Yoshmakikwaka nushyayegityana gixo kpashirine. Ruylatkoklunutkana, nugita gita.
44026011	Gi gepiko kata pejnuruko ginkaklewawakapjikakaya nsaletjetyana. Psolmuchkonuko nertatna mupashiregnuchi chininripmakna. Gimtuwnananumtachripotno wanna chinanu. Nkojwakananumtna pasreta gajerkaka pokchipotunanuko.
44026012	“Wane nixananumtini, Tamasko nyinitka. Nutaaka ga wa waneyno kiruka nyokanatikolu tsrukakalune sasertoteneya.
44026013	Pogirchi, ganikajgognetkani gatnugapo netyalu tengogne gajeru yochigatachri, tkachi gatajnu pnute. Ratajiwnayegitwu gita ga wa numotsane.
44026014	Giyagni chiji wapokana pejnurunnikwu wixni. Satu tokanchi nyijnakota Gewreyone tokanuya nuynumatjeru. Wane china, ‘Sawolo, Sawolo, ¿klu chinanu pkojwakno? Pixnanniko kachinolu pixnanwa pakaxjerewatana yowumajri pixka.’
44026015	“Wane nchina, ‘¿Katyi Pixa, Gitsrukaachi?’ “Wane china Gitsrukaachi, ‘Gitni Geso wa pixa kojwakanruno.
44026016	Seyni palnanutka. Ptunwatanu. Gi rixanu tye chinanu nupgujewnayegityi nutakyapyi notowrerupyi ga wa gipgujtalewatachripyi petanrukakapirana ga wa nupgujewnayegityapyipirana.
44026017	Nkoshpakanyi yinyegiya ga wa payinyegiya, wa wanna yegi nyokanatanyi.
44026018	Rumrekgakakikolupna panene, ruprotakinripna, mapshagwaka rushpakinripna. Pokamlawaka yigatinripna; Satanasyo girukotlewatyawaka rushpakinripna; Goyakalu yegi yigatinripna; kaspukmukochiretikolupna, ga wa waneya rixinripna kpashirine gixkakaluneyma, gi rixanu ralixnona Gita.’
44026019	“Giyagni, pogirchi Gakripa, gita gi wa malixkatno wa Goyakalu gekakgityano.
44026020	Seyni wa Tamasko gwanatachine gapka, ga wa Gerosale gajene, ga wa psolusretako Gote gajene, ga wa payineko nunkaklewyegita renshinikanutinripna. Kashrijetikolupna Goyakalunune rixinripna, genshinikanutachine kamrure pixkapotuko kamrutinripna.
44026021	Wale chinanu Goteyone kashichno kpashiwakapjiya. Ruylatmaknona.
44026022	Giyagni Goyakalu gipxakalchinanno, xanigognenanu nomkagi gipgujtalewleyegitna mturune ga wa tsrune. Gikena nchina wanepnute. Tyepjeni tokanchi geneklewatachine chinyawaka ga wa Moysisi chinyawaka ginachripa.
44026023	Tokanchi ginkakletachine ginkakletlu wa Kristo salewninripa. Walenwa muchinanu gapka yotunotachripa gipnachinetskalaya, yine yegi runkakletyaplu pokamlalu ga wa payinyegiya.”
44026024	Wane china giykoyegletnawa. Giyagni Wisto tsru tokanu rixnawa. Wane china, “Seproluktayi, Pawlo. Gi gepika Tokanchi Yonatkaluru pumatinri seprolookakyi.”
44026025	Wane china Pawlo, “Gi wa seproluno, kshinikanuru Wisto, seyni tokanchi galikakpotunanu kanshinikanuru nyanumatya.
44026026	Gi rixanu, Pogirchi, pumatlu tyekakapirana. Pixa getanu koxa nyanumsata pgujetanwaka. Gi rixanu gi nkagwaklu yogimatika wale. Gi rixanu gi wa kegnete kamrutikalurni wa tye.
44026027	Pogirchi Gakripa, ¿gi ge palixna tokanchi geneklewatachine? Numatyi palixinri.”
44026028	Giyagni Gakripa wane chinru Pawlo, “Ptsotsotaji magata pushinikanutyano Kristonu nixinripa.”
44026029	Wane china Pawlo, “Nagjitlu Goyakalu wa ptsotsotajiyako ga wa gixpotuyako pixa ga wa pejnuruneko nyijnakotjene wa xani, gitako pixka gixachinetkani, seyni tye gosturutsapje gi waneyapgi.”
44026030	Rali wane chinretinitka Pawlo tyepirana, Pogirchi palnatka, ga wa gitsrukaachi, ga wa Wirnisa, ga wa wannayma tuplanatachine.
44026031	Wa ruxrikamtinitkana, wannakakluko wane chinkakna, “Gi satuna kamruta tye jeji rupninri chinanupa, gi wa rostutikolupako.”
44026032	Giyagni Gakripa wane chinru Wisto, “Tye jeji gimkata kaspukletkamka ma mapguwyegitkanumkalu Susa.”
44027001	Giyagni wa rutaaka wyagapgatinripatka, Gitalya gayinripatka. Ksolaloteru Golyo giwakatletachri, Gakosto solalotene yegi gwachri, samyokatkaluna Pawlo, ga wa pimrine gostutkalune waleyma.
44027002	Giyagni watskotatkalo sato tsro kanawa potu Gatromentina giyakatyachro. Gasya pokchikaka galuka yaletachro. Wutspegatka. Wixaymalu Garistarcho, Tesalonika, Masetonyasreta gajeru.
44027003	Waleprika Sito wutspakatka. Golyo kigle getle rixlu Pawlo. Ruchi yaletlu, ralukanune yegi yinripa, rupxakyapluna.
44027004	Wane wutspegyatka. Suproknipreka tukasretate gayapamta. Gi rixanu kannipgyalu gakaxrikamtwu.
44027005	Surisya Wenne ga wa Pampiri Wenne gayapamtatka. Mira wapoka Lisyasreta pokchi.
44027006	Ksolaloteru wane gikshikyalo sato tsro kanawa potu Galegantri giyakatyachro, Gitalya yachropa. Wala pokotwu.
44027007	Gi gepikgogne wyagapgata yiglepotuko. Wixasha gapokleta Knito ginaple. Gi kaspukapanwu kannipgyalu. Kretatlapga wyapamta Salmostsi.
44027008	Kyapre potu gayinri. Wapoklu Kigleru Yopjewaka chinikowaka. Wane gi gowukaylu Lase Pokchi.
44027009	Gi gepikgogne wuknokakatka. Kyowiklu yagapgalu, gi rixanu ruknogatka wa gogajirewlugogne. Pawlo giykotna.
44027010	Wane chinna, “Jejine, netlu tye yagapgalu waneplu tsru gimtuklupa ga wa tsru gamgalupa, gi wa wunruchipjeni ga wa kanawa koxa, seyni wuwekinriko koxa.”
44027011	Ga wa ksolaloteru galixna kanawa ganikachri tokanu ga wa kanawateru, wa Pawlo chinyawaka pnute.
44027012	Gi kiglepokyopjewakleru wuknokakyaplu ginapu. Gixo gishinika yaleta waneya, gikta rumkata gapokletluna Winisi, wane wuknokakyaplu ginapu, Kretakniprekla yopjewakle, tkachi kegnetesretateswaji ga wa potuklesretateswaji giyakatyachrinnipgya gapokannipgyajetyawaka.
44027013	Tkachi kegnetesretate ruyakannipgyatya. Yiglepotuko rajpopokannipgyata. Kagwakluna waneyatkana wa rushinikanruyna. Kosetatkaluna tsataprena. Kretakniprekawnaga yana.
44027014	Gowukshini rapyegitlo kannipgyalu jiweylunnipgya pixkalutu, Geroklito giwakannipgyani.
44027015	Tushatkapka kanawa. Gi tumkata yoptoretlu kannipgyalu. Wetashatatkalo. Gayashatatka.
44027016	Satu mturu kanipreklu, Klawta giwakatletachri, wuknogamta. Wixasha gimkatle gishatkapletlo mturo kanawa pokotkaluro.
44027017	Wala ranikinitkana. Wane rixa gigleretanutkalona tsro kanawa. Rapatlona. Surtesloji pika gapokletna. Jijrukluna mkachrichrata. Wane wixa gayashletatka.
44027018	Giyagni wyowjeyempotutana. Waleprika ruknopjegawunnutanatkana.
44027019	Waleprika potu wumyoypotuko wuknokgachratatyatkalu kanawa yaninri.
44027020	Gixgogne gi pgujru tkachi, gi katagiriko. Wunnewgognenatana. Gike kagwaakatka wanepnute wushatkapikolupa.
44027021	Gixgogne wogajirewatanatka. Giyagni Pawlo wanna ganikajite tunwata. Wane china, “Jejine, galikaka gixa gimkata galixletkamkano. Gimka Kreta wutspeginnichi, ma munyegitkanimkawu tye gimtuklu ga wa gamgalu.
44027022	Ga wa xani nuykotgi kiglenshinikanupgi. Gi rixanu gi satuna gixa gamgagiwekletanu. Seyni kanawapje gamganu.
44027023	Gi rixanu tyeyechnoni gita yegi rapoka Goyakalutowreru. Wa Walenno gita. Wale nkamrurewyegita.
44027024	Wane china, ‘Pawlo, gi pikanutka. Susa yegi pumkata gapokletinripa. Ga wa Goyakalu genekyi pejnuruneko puyagapgatanune.’
44027025	Giyagni, jejine, kiglenshinikanupgi. Gi rixanu gita galixlu Goyakalu, wanepotuko rixanu wa chinyawakno.
44027026	Seyni wumkata satu kanipreklu gitaakota.”
44027027	Pamole gepkoxamkojyechno chininri, Gatriyakoskitgatlapa gayashatanatka. Ganikajyechno kanawa ganikachine kagwaklu gi gowukatkalu chiji.
44027028	Yantagatluna. Gepkoxamkojmolekano rukshikyaluna tennuga. Wanepnuteyaka yana. Rumepe yagotgaletatnakna. Mapmole patsrujire metro tennuga rukshikyatkaluna.
44027029	Wanna piklu sotlu gwiywaka wyoxgiyegitinripa. Giyagni tostsi ruknokgatluna gepkoxamkoje tsataprena. Ragjigognetna rumrerekinripa.
44027030	Giyagni tsro kanawamka rasukyamkana ganikachine. Jijrukgatatkalona kanawa mturo. Wala pguta rapgutanatna jijrukgatyapluna wa tojri gajeru tsataprena.
44027031	Pawlo wane chinru ksolaloteru ga wa solalone “Tsro kanawa ma mutukinna wanna, gixa gi gimkata gishatkapkotanu.”
44027032	Giyagni solalone gistakatsatatkalona mturo kanawa. Retasha gijrukletatkalona.
44027033	Pawlo nikjixatkana pejnuruneko rumrerekastsipotunanuko. Wane china, “Pamole gepkoxamkojgognetkani tye gkagwakanata gogajirewatinri. Giketsotaji gnika.
44027034	Giyagni nuykotgi gnikanutka. Gi rixanu tyenwa giwekinripa. Gi rixanu gi pajiwutsana gamgini pejnurunekgi gixa.”
44027035	Wane chininitka, rawlo jimapro. Poyagnutlu Goyakalu pejnurune getanu. Jiknajrotlu. Yinuwaka nikletatkalu.
44027036	Giyagni pejnuruneko kiglenshinikanutka. Niikoxatkana wanna.
44027037	Wane pejnuwu tsro kanawa, gepi pacha payokgipremole patsrujire.
44027038	Jinanutkana. Komlikayakatatkalona kanawa. Tsru wenu ruknokanatkaluna trikoji.
44027039	Gogi rixinitka gi wa rumatluna chiji, seyni retluna ratlogkapyawaka. Kaksatewnaglu. Wane rushinika gitspaakakletlona kanawa rumkatiniplona.
44027040	Koshpirokatsatatkaluna tsatapre. Tsru wenu kaspukatkaluna. Waneklu koxa kogrokatsatatkaluna potukatapretsna. Romukluna mkachrichrata teno gajeru kannipgyalu yegi. Wangasreta ya kownokletatkalona.
44027041	Giskitga ganikajite, taschekatka kanawa. Taschekajritanatka. Gi tuyoljetatka. Ga wa tostsi tutspatgastsityatka gichkogalu chinanu.
44027042	Giyagni solalone gishiniklu ruylatikolupna gostutkalune, gikena ma masuukanpakni ganogatachri.
44027043	Seyni ksolaloteru galuka gognetkakletlu Pawlo. Rumaltayegitlu wanna gishinikle. Wale yokanatatkana gimkata ganogletachine muchinanu gapka ruptekgamtinripatkana, chiji rapokinripna.
44027044	Ga wa gixetachine, pimrineko kanawashpata, ga wa pimrineko klunerukokta kanawa gajeru, yiyatkana. Wane rixkatka pejnuruneko chiji gapoka. Rognewatatkana.
44028001	Wognewatinitka. Giyagni wumatatkalu kaniprekluni. Melita giwakni.
44028002	Ga wa patokanchiko yanumatyachine retwamonpotutwuna. Pawatatkana. Kigle yoptole rixwuna pejnurunekwu gina chinanutka ga wa kachikleru chinanu.
44028003	Giyagni rapatjepluta Pawlo. Xirnachri gogo rutaklu. Satu gimnu chichi gemnu rasukya. Saprikamyomtanru.
44028004	Patokanchiko yanumatyachine getinri gimnu ruxripamyonatlu, wane chinkakna, “Tye jeji galikakni kgiylalewaklerni. Tsru wenu rognewatyani, seyni kgiklukanuwnalu chinanu gi retashatka ruwekinripa.”
44028005	Giyagni wale giwlipatlu gimnu. Xirnachri rapokamtana. Giketsotaji yayixya.
44028006	Kagwaka gankaletmakluna, ga wa walegnapunanu yawnamtinripa gipnachri. Seyni gowukshini potu kagwakinitkana, retluna wa gike giknoglu. Kashrijetanshinikanutna. Goyakaluktani chinruna.
44028007	Waneru kachijneru, kanipreklu gitsrukate. Poplyo giwakatletachri. Kigle yoptole rixwu. Mapgogne gipji rutakwu. Rushinikanuwyegitwu.
44028008	Wane rixatka. Poplyo giru yayixachrina. Pachwatana ga wa tserugatana, giklugachrina. Pawlo jiglokyegitlu. Ragjigogneta. Rutakamyogogotlu. Rutuukaklu.
44028009	Wane rixinitka, pimrine koxa kanipreklu gwachine, yayixachine ginyegitlu. Rutuukaakana.
44028010	Gixo renekashatwuna kagwakpiratyachinanwuna. Wutspeginpatka pokotyawuna walukanru.
44028011	Mapa ksuru giknoginitka, sato kanawa Galegantrina giyakatyachro wutspegyatka, waneknipreka giknokakginaputetyachro. Wala waneya tumatikolu Gopite wgenene gepirune yaglu.
44028012	Surakosa wapoka. Mapgogne wane wutuka.
44028013	Waneya wsajruka. Wapokatkalu Rigyo. Waleprika tkachi kegnetesretate ruyakannipgyatya. Waleprika potu wapoklu Potewolo.
44028014	Wane wukshikyana moletkakachine. Ragjitwuna payokgipregogne wumwiyapna. Wane wixa yaleta Roma.
44028015	Wane gajene moletkakachine yijnakyegitinitkawu, yoptotapwuna. Gapyoputu Pokchipotunanuko ga wa Mapa Gwajetikwaka Pokchi rapokna. Pawlo getinitkana, Goyakalu poyagnuta. Kiglenshinikanutkalu.
44028016	Roma wapokatka. Ksolaloteru gostutkalune samyokatkalu solalonepji gitsrukate. Ga wa ruchichka Pawlo waleko rawyawaka rawinripa, satu solaloyma girukotjerupa.
44028017	Wane rixatka. Mapgogne giknoginitka, Pawlo gapatjixna tsrukakalune Goteyone. Rapatinitkana wane chinna, “Jejine, nomolene, gikeyaka nkamruyegitna yine. Gi wa wuneruneko gixjetyawaka nkotnuka.
44028018	Seyni Gerosale nsamyokika gostutkalurno Romanonemyoya. Wanna gitakyagokinno, raluka kaspukletnona, gi rixanu maleshayno nuklukanuwnale nupninri chinanupa.
44028019	Ga wa Goteyone yoptopiratno. Giyagni nerutka Susa napguwyegitinripa. Gi wa waneyno njigyegityapna nonerune.
44028020	Giyagni tye chinanu nepukgi netyapgi ga wa nuynumsatyapgi. Gi rixanu Gisrayiline kagwakle chinanu gostutkalurno tye yowumatsaya.”
44028021	Giyagni wane chinruna, “Gi Gote giyakatyachrotsotaji kiruka wyoptoyegityi. Gi satuna wane giyakatya wumole runkakletpiranyegityapyi, mugletu chinpiranyegityapyi.
44028022	Walukmaka yijnakyegletyi pchinanshinikanutyawaka. Gi rixanu wixa gimatlu psolusretayako nyi pnuko gixa galixletachine mkoje gapatkalunni.”
44028023	Pagogne rutakna. Gi gepika wanna yayegitlu rawyawaka. Runkakpokowakatna. Wanna yegi rupgujtatlu Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana. Rushinikanutna Gesopiranaya Moysisi Tokanu Yokanatkaluruya, ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachine kirukateya, goyechnokawpotuko wa kaypotunanuko.
44028024	Giyagni pimrine gishinikanutka chinyawaka chinanu, ga wa pimrine gi galixa.
44028025	Gi wa panshinikanurunni wannakakluko. Giyagni ralimtatkana. Pawlo wane china tye tokanchi, “Kigle yanumle rixa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri, tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiyaya. Wane chinna wutsrukatenni:
44028026	Nyi yine yegi pyanutka. Wane pchinanu: Gijnakopna gyijnakotini, gi gimata jemanuna. Getini getinmaka, gi gimata getanuna.
44028027	Gi rixanu shikowgajitatkana nyi yine. Ga wa gijnakopnayna kyapreru yijnakotyana Ga wa rushyaygaletna. Giygalna ma metinitipna. Gi wa gijnakopnayna yijnakotinripna. Gi rajiyakna rumata jemyana, ma kashrijetikotupna, nma mutuukakyanupna.
44028028	Giyagni gixa gimatanru payineko yokanyegitkatka tye gognetkaklewlu Goyakalunu. Wanna yijnakotanru.”
44028029	Wane chininitka, Goteyone yatka. Repomsakakpotna.
44028030	Giyagni Pawlo gepi walapu psolwalapuko gipji wenutkalurupji rawa. Yoptotna pejnuruneko runyegitjene.
44028031	Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana runkakleta. Pgujetanwaka china ginkakletna Gitsrukaachi Geso Kristopirana. Gike gimaletlu.
45001001	Gitni Geso Kristo wayegrerno Pawlono, tomgakalurno yokanatanrupa, nutakikolupa Kiglerpotunanu Goyakalu Tokanu chinanu.
45001002	Tye tokanchinwa muchikawa rupiratanru tokanchi geneklewatachineya Goyakalunu, kpashiri yonchiya.
45001003	Tye tokanchinwa Giturupiranni. Walenwa Tawiklopisha gimaneya.
45001004	Walenwa gipgujetkaluru Goyakalu Wgene rixinri muchkonuyma. Gipgujetkaluru Giwekikaluru Kpashirpotuya, wa gipnachinetskalaya yotunomtyachritka wa Geso Kristo Wutsrukate.
45001005	Geso gimutlewle chinanu yokanatanru nutakikolu, ralixyapluna Wale tokanu ptowruneko pachijnemnunanuka gajene wa giwakaya.
45001006	Wanna galixachinemkojenangi gixa. Geso Kristo tomganungi,
45001007	wa pejnurunekgi Roma gwachingi. Goyakalu galukanungi, tomgakalungi, kpashirinepgi, gimutkalunepgi gixa. Wa Goyakalu Wuru, Wutsrukate koxa Geso Kristo giglenshinikankakangi ga wa rumutangi.
45001008	Muchinanu npoyagnutlu Noyakalute, Geso Kristoya pejnurunekgi gixa chinanu, wa gixa galixle psolchijneko pogitikolutka.
45001009	Goyakalni nkamrurewyegitanru nonshinikanuya Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi Giturunu. Walenwa netjeru, gi nutuka gishinikletgi wa gixa nagjigogneyeegognenatgi.
45001010	Nagjitlu patako waneplu pagogne, Goyakalu galukiniplu, kigleru yagapgalu gixa yegi nyinripa.
45001011	Gi rixanu gita galuka getlepotutgi wa nkotspaltayegityapgi Goyakalu genekashle Giwekikaluruya gmuchkotanshinikanutjerupa.
45001012	Walenwa wugleretanshinikanutikolupa gixaymananuko satkaka galixleya, gixanni wa gitanu koxa.
45001013	Seyni gi naluklu, nomolene, gma mumatyanru, wa gixo katmaka wane nushinika gixa yegi nyinripa, seyni xanigognenanu wane nixa gimaletletkota. Naluklu wa gixatskalaya koxa waneyapno nkamrutanrupa, payinetskalaya pixka.
45001014	Nriwishkatna Kriykone, kgimtokanurune koxa, wanepnute kgimatkalerune ga wa mumatkalene.
45001015	Giyagkoxni gita pejnuruko numkatyawaka naluklu ginkaklewyegityapgi Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wa gixa koxa Roma gajengi.
45001016	Gi rixanu gi nupatewatlu gita Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi. Gi rixanu walenwa Goyakalu giyaklewle wa gognewatikaluru chinanu, pejnuruneko galixachine chinanu, wa Goteyone gapka chinanu, ga wa Kriykone koxa chinanu.
45001017	Gi rixanu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi gekakgitlu Goyakalu poyagkaklewle yineru galixle chinanu. Ga wa pnuteyaka galixlu waneyaplu, Yonchi chinyawaka: Wa poyagkakachri giwekanu ralixleya chinanu.
45001018	Pgujetanurni Goyakalu jgekanu tengogneya ptowruko makagwakpireyna, ma poyagkaklenuyna wanna yine chinanu wa rumretanruna galikakpotunanu tokanchi mpoyagkaakane rixinrina.
45001019	Gi rixanu wa Goyakaluya gimatikolutka wanna koxa gipgujetyegitka. Gi rixanu wa Goyakalu gipgujetlu.
45001020	Gi rixanu wa mpogijetkaka wa Goyakalunu, walenwa gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu ruyakle, wa Goyakalu rixinri. Mpogijetkaka pgujetanru wa ruyakotiniyakawlu wa tye psolchijneko. Gimata jemkalurni wa kamrutkalurkaka chinanu. Giyagni wannako chinanupni, wanna mpoyagkaakane.
45001021	Gi rixanu rumatmakluna Goyakalu, gi rupashichluna Goyakalu rixinri. Gi koxa poyagnutluna, seyni maleshawaka nutanshinikanutna. Manshinikanugajine mapshaga rixgajitkana.
45001022	Kgimatkalerune rixashatnawana. Seprolokanatkana.
45001023	Royaknu Goyakalu mpojpakatu rupekotluna yagluchi yineru pojpakalu pixkalutu, ga wa kamejirune pixkalutu, ga wa nikchine gepkoxamkojejixirune pixkalutu, ga wa gistako yosrolotyachrikaka ixkalutu.
45001024	Giyagkoxni wa Goyakalu samyokna puchowninripatkana sotanugnuchi rajiyna, mpashmanene rixkakinripna wannakakluko.
45001025	Wanna gipekotlu galikakpotunanu tokanchi Goyakalunu gayroklu chinanu. Yonogyegitluna, giyakotkalunkaka wa Kgiyaklewakleru pnute. Walenwa gimalwugognenatkalurupa gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa. Wane gixkalurupa.
45001026	Giyagni wa Goyakalu samyokna wa sotanugnuchi kapatmenuru waneyapna. Gi rixanu wa suxnena kashrijetluna rixjetyawakna rumumturetanruna wa ma mixyawakanna gimumturetkaluru.
45001027	Waneko pixka koxa rixna wa jejine. Ruknokluna rixjetyawakna rumumturetanruna wa suxoneya. Tsru sotanugnuchi rixna wa wannakakluko. Wane rixa mapatmennuchi kamrutna wa jejine jejinkakluko. Gimanekoyna saletikolupna rapnutikolupna pupjeyeginatanrunako pixkalutu.
45001028	Gi wa rugleretluna rumatpotutyapluna Goyakalu. Waneko pixka Goyakalu samyokna satu shinikanchi mugletuya, wa kamrutyapluna maluukotu.
45001029	Ptowruko mpoyagkaknuchi, muglenchi, gimkapnuglu, gektutu gwagajpotutanunni. Ga wa wanepnute waneyna ranxalna, ruylalewlena, yoptopirkakleyna, yokwireyna, ma nshinikannuyna. Gixaxatachinni.
45001030	Kapataklerune, Goyakalu kamnixachinni, kgektutetaklerune, galixkotnachinwa, tsru gixashatnachinewa, gektutu koshpakachine, kaaligiruklerune.
45001031	Manshinikanune, mpoyagkaakane, rumumtureta galuklewle mixkane, maluka gishinikanuwyeglekaakane, metwamonrene.
45001032	Rumata jemanrukmaknina Goyakalu gitakanru, wa wale pejnuka kamrutachine poyagkakluna wa rupninripna. Gi wa walepje kamrutna, seyni rugleretluna pimrine koxa waneko pixka kamrutinripna.
45002001	Giyagni pixako pchinanupni, yineru, girukoktayi pixini wa ruklukanuwna pchinyegitlu satu. Gi rixanu wa klunerukokta ruklukanuwna pchinyegitlu, pukluknanwa pixnanniko. Gi rixanu waneko pixkalutunyi pixni, wa pixa wane china ruklukanuwninripa.
45002002	Seyni wumatlu wanepotuko ruklukanuwnayegjixanna Goyakalu wale pejnunanuka kamrutachinepni.
45002003	¿Gi ge pushiniklu pixa, yineryi, ruklukanuwnana pchinyegitna tyekaka kamrutachine, pkamrutlu waneko pixkalutu: pixlege kaspuwnanu wa giklukanuwnalupa Goyakaluya?
45002004	¿Peyikluge pixa wa Goyakalu makotkotu rumutlewle, tsru pogirewlu potu shinikannuya, ga wa rakotanshinikanrewle? ¿Gi putakyagoklu walekni, wa Goyakalu kosekanshinikanutyi penshinikanutinripa?
45002005	Seyni pshiknugajiya, wa paji gi penshinikanutya, pumretanru pixanpako jgekanchi walegognepa jgekanchigogneklupa, rupgujewninrigognepa wa Goyakalu wanepotuko gitakyagoklewatinipa.
45002006	Wale gapnutanru satkaka rixpoko kamruretyawaka.
45002007	Kashnantakgognenatachine kigleru kamrutna, rujgaluna yochiglu, kagwakpiiru, mpojpaknuchi, Wale rapnutinna wanna ruwekinripna gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu.
45002008	Seyni kgimkapnugaklerune, gi wa ralixluna wa galikakpotunanu, seyni ralixluna wa mpoyagkaknuchi, Wale rapnutinna wannapni jgekanchi wanepnute gimtuwakchi.
45002009	Salewakchi, kachinolu koxa psolpotuko yineru giwekachri chinanu wa gektutu kamrukleru, wa Goteyonepni muchichachripa, ga wa Kriykonkoxapni.
45002010	Seyni pogirewlu, kagwakpiiru, giglewanshinikanru kigleru kamrutachinepa, muchinanu Goteyonupa, Kriykonekoxapni.
45002011	Gi wa manewle giglenu chinanu yoptotanru Goyakalu wa yineru.
45002012	Gi rixanu ptowruneko waneyamigjene Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru mukochirewatachine, Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru waneyamigjene koxa ramganna. Ga wa ptowruneko Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya mukochirewatachine ruklukanuwnanna Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya.
45002013	Gi rixanu gi wa poyagkakachine Goyakalu getanuya wa yijnakoshatachine, seyni Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru kamruklerune muklukanuwnakaakonetkani.
45002014	Gi rixanu wa payine gi waneyna Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru, rumumturetanruna kamrutluna wa Yokanatkaluru Tokanchiya, wanna Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru waneyamigjene, seynimka waneyna Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru wannayako.
45002015	Rekakgitluna wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru kamrurepa kayongalutkani rajiyna. Rupgujtanshinikanutnawana. Wanekopshini jigyegitnawana rushinikanuwnaleyna. Rapgutkakna panshinikanu wa satunshinikanu.
45002016	Wane rixanu walegognepa wa Geso Kristoya Goyakalu gitakyagokanru yine yogimatanru, wa chinyawaka Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi gita ginkakletanru.
45002017	Petanu, pixni Goteyo chinnachriwayi, wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru munangachriyi. Ptserpiranatnawa Goyakaluya.
45002018	Pixa gimatlu Goyakalu gishinikanru, pumata getanru wa kiglerpotu. Yimaakaluryi Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya.
45002019	Paponshinikanutnawa wa pixni wa maygalene kosekachriyi; pixni wa pokamlalyi mapshagawaka gwachineya.
45002020	Pyimakjetna manshinikanune. Mturune yimakachriyi. Waneyyi gimatkalewlu psoluko ga wa psoluko galikakpotunanu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
45002021	Giyagni pixa koxa wa satu yineru yimakachriyi pixinipa, ¿gi ge pyimaknawa pixnanuko koxa? Pixa wa ginkaklewatachriyi ma chowguwatikotupa, seyni ¿pchowguwatawa pixa?
45002022	Pixa wane chinachriyi ma mumopatlewatikotupa, ¿pumopatlewatge pixako? Pixni wa yagluchkaka getnanutachriyi ¿mupashiregotyi?
45002023	Tserpiranatnachriwayi wa Yokanatkaluru Tokanchiya. Pma kamrutkalchinanu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru, ¿gi ge pma mupashichyanru wa Goyakalu waka gike?
45002024	Gi rixanu mupashichkotu gixkaklu Goyakalu giwaka payinetskalaya, chinyawaka wa yonchi.
45002025	Gi rixanu sajruka gistaklewlu gipxaklewata galikakpotunanni, pkamrutiniplu wa Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi. Seyni pkaspukiniplu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru, wa pixa sajruka gistakikolu kamrutka masajruka gistakikotpatka.
45002026	Giyagni wa msajruka gistakletkotu kamrutyaplu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka, ¿gi ge wale ma sajruka gistakletkoklunu gitaako sajruka gistakletikolu chinanu?
45002027	Girukta wa mumumture sajruka gistakletkotu seyni kamrupotutlu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru, wale giklukanuwnakakanyi pixa kapiranyegirutkayi, ga wa sajruka gistakletkaluryi, seyni pkaspukinri wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
45002028	Gi rixanu gi wa Goteyni, wa wane rixa gipgujewnaletachrini, gi waleni koxa wa sajruka gistaklewlu gipgujewnalu wa manchiya.
45002029	Seyni Goteyni wa gitokoya Goteyo, ga wa sajruka gistaklewlu walenwa gaschiya, wa giwekikaluruya gi wa Tokanchi Yonatkaluruya. Gi wa rumalwurni yineya seyni Goyakaluya.
45003001	¿Giyagni kluneru waneylu Goteyo panene pnute? ¿Klu rupxaklewata wa sajruka gistaklewlu? Gixo psoluyako.
45003002	Gi rixanu muchinanu Goyakalu tokanu galikakpotunanu gaponshinikanutka Goteyone yegi.
45003003	¿Gi rixkoxge wa pimrine wanna malixaklene rixinrina? ¿Wanna ma malixle chinanu gi ralixikolupa Goyakalu?
45003004	Gike rixiniko. Seyni wa Goyakalni myokwiretu ga wa ptowruko yineru kayloklerunmakni, wa tokanchi yonatkaluru chinyawaka: Wa Pixa, Goyakalu, muklukanuwnakaakotupyi pchina yanumsaletinri; Wa paalirewatinripa wa putakyagokikolupmaka.
45003005	Yineru ma poyagkaklenu chinanu pnute pgujpotlu Goyakalu poyagkaklewle. Wane rixini galikaka, ¿gi wchinanuna? ¿Mpoyagkaakatlege wa saletlewatinri Goyakalu? (Wa yineru gixyawakako nchina.)
45003006	Gike rixininanuko. Wa wane rixini ¿gi rixpoko giklukanuwnayegjixletanna tye psolchijneko gwachine wa Goyakalu?
45003007	Seyni naylokle chinanumka tsru rixinipa Goyakalu myokwirnu, rumalwutikolupa Goyakalu, ¿klu chinanu nuklukanuwnayegjixkota gita kmukochireru pixka?
45003008	¿Klu chinanu gi wane wchina, “Wkamrutanru gektutu runinripa wa kigleru”? wa pimrine wane chinyegitwu wa wane pguta wchinyawaka. Poyagkaaka ruklukanuwnayegjixikolupna wane chinachine.
45003009	Giyagni ¿klunerni? ¿Wanna pnutlege kiglewu wixa Goteyonwu? Gike rixininanuko. Muchinanu wunkakletanatkana Goteyone, ga wa payineko, pejnuruneko kmukochirerunni.
45003010	Wane chinyongatyawaka: Maleshlu poyagkakachri, gi satunako.
45003011	Maleshlu gimata jemachri. Maleshlu satu Goyakalu gijgachri.
45003012	Pejnuruneko gitspalata. Gike gapine rixkanna. Pawane gixkalunenatkanina. Maleshlu satu kigleru kamrutachri.
45003013	Yomlechi gitpukachri pixka rixaplajitna. Ginnuyna yokwirewatna. Gimnu kachingate pixkalutu waneyna gispuyna rapukote.
45003014	Ginamna katsepoyna kamakpiirewleyna, kapsakletlewleyna.
45003015	Teyaknanjixirunni wa ruyokyapluna granchi.
45003016	Gigapkaka rawa gimtuklewlu, tsru salewnalu.
45003017	Gi rumatluna gwashatikowakgapo.
45003018	Wannaygale getanu maleshayna pikyaluna Goyakalu.
45003019	Seyni wumatlu ptowruko Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi chinyawaka, wane china Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru waneyalune chinanu, wa pejnuruko yineru pokche rixinripa wa psolchijnepotunanuko gwachri giklukanuwnakaakalurupa Goyakalu getanu.
45003020	Gi rixanu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru kamrutkalchinanu gi pamanennako muklukanuwnakaakonepni Wale yegi. Gi rixanu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya rumatika wa mukochri.
45003021	Ga wa xani Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru migje poyagkaklewle Goyakalu pgujetanurutkani. Gipgujtatkalurni wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachineya.
45003022	Poyagkaklewle Goyakalu, Geso Kristo galixikolu chinanu, wannanupni ralixjene pejnunanuka. Gi rixanu pixkakaklunni.
45003023	Gi rixanu pejnuruneko mukochirewata. Gi rapkapluna wa royaknu Goyakalu.
45003024	Ga wa rumutlewle chinanu Goyakalu muklukanuwnakaakone rixkakna. Walenwa renekashle, gi rixanu Kristo Geso wenutlu yine gognewatinripa.
45003025	Goyakalu galukyawaka, Geso chinanukni kaspuuka yineru mukochire ralixleya, Gesograga chinanu. Wane rixa gipgujewnakakletlu Goyakalu poyagkakachri rixinri, wa wane rixa getashletlu wmukochire wa muchikawa wkamrutanrukaka.
45003026	Pogetwamonrewlu rixkalchinanu Goyakalu, rumatyapluna yine wa galikakni poyagkakachrini Wale tyegognekakaya, gi rixanu tyegogneko poyagkakachrini Wale, ga wa poyagkakachri rutaklu yineru, Geso ralixinri chinanu.
45003027	¿Ginaakoxluge wa tserpiranawnalu? Ginanshichkaluru. ¿Giru Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinanu? ¿Kamrurchiylege? Gike. Seyni rixjetyawaka galixlu.
45003028	Giyagni wyanshinikanutlu muklukanuwnakaakotu rixinripa wa yineru ralixleya, wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru kamruremigjeya.
45003029	¿Wa Goteyonenupjerge wa Goyakalu? ¿Gi ge payine Goyakalutkoxni wa Goyakalu? Galikakpotunanni payine Goyakalutkoxni.
45003030	Gi rixanu satupjerutni Goyakalu. Walenwa muklukanuwnakane rutakanna sajruka gistaakotachine galixluya, ga wa msajruka gistaakotkone koxa galixlu chinanu.
45003031	¿Giyagni wutakashatlu maleshawaka wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru galixlu chinanu? Gike. Wmuchkotlu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
45004001	¿Gi wchinankoxlu wa Gawra gikshikanru? Walenwa wutsrukatni wumaneya.
45004002	Wa Gawra muklukanuwnakaakotu rixinmaka wa kamrurchiya, ralixkotinmakwa, seyni gi wa Goyakalu getanu.
45004003	Gi rixanu ¿gi china wa yonchi? Wa ralixlu Goyakalu Gawrani. Rutakyegitka poyagkaklewle rixinri.
45004004	Seyni wa kamrurewatachriya gi wa genekashlu kagwaaka wa wenutikolu, seyni riwishkaachi.
45004005	Ga wa girukta gi kamrurewata seyni ralixlu Goyakalu wa mupashiregolune muklukanuwnakaakone gitakachri, wale galixle gitaaka poyagkakleyapa.
45004006	Tawi pixka koxa wane chinyegitlu giglenshinikanyegitkaluru wa yineru wa Goyakalu gitakyalu poyagkakle kamrurchi migje.
45004007	Wane china: Giglenshinikanyegitkalune wanna ruklukanuwnalna kaspukyegitkana, wa wanna gishyamukochiretkalune.
45004008	Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru wa jeji gi wa kmukochireru rutaaka Gitsrukaachiya.
45004009	Giyagni wa tye giglenshinikanyeglewlu ¿wa sajruka gistaakotkalunepjenuplege? ¿Waka msajruka gistaakotkonkoxaplege? Gi rixanu wane wchina, wa Gawra galixle gitaaka wale poyagkakle rixinripa.
45004010	¿Gi rixpoko poyagkakachri kagwaakota wale? ¿wa sajruka gistaakotkaluru, waka msajruka gistaakotuwa? Gi wa sajruka gistakletkaluru, seyni msajruka gistaakotu.
45004011	Sajruka gistaakikolu yaglu rixinripa, rumatikolupa poyagkakachri rixinri ralixleya chinanu. Wane rixa msajruka gistaakotuwa, rurna rixinripa pejnuruneko galixachine msajruka gistaakone, wanna koxa poyagkakachine gitakikolupa.
45004012	Rurna rixinrikoxapa sajruka gistaakotkalune, gi wanna sajruka gistaakotkalunepje, seyni koxa wa gomkagitachine galixlugapo wa wutsrukatni Gawrani msajruka gistaakonuwa waneylu.
45004013	Gi rixanu gi wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinanu, seyni wa poyagkaklewlu chinanu galixlewluya, Gawra ga wa giklopishane gipiryegitka wanna yoptotyaplu psolchijneko.
45004014	Gi rixanu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru waneyalune wannapmakni yoptotachinepa, gike gaprimkatkani wa galixlu; giknookalurmakni wa gipiratkaluru tokanchi.
45004015	Gi rixanu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru kamrutlu jgekanchi. Gi rixanu ginakakta maleshlu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru, gi koxa wane kaspukika wa Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi.
45004016	Giyagni poyagkakachine gitaaka wa galixle chinanu, wa Goyakalu gimutlewleya rixinripa, poyegi rixinripa tokanchi gipiratkaluru pejnuruneko giklopishane chinanupa, gi wa wannapje chinanupni wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru waneyalune, seyni wanna koxa chinanupni, wa Gawra galixle waneyalune. Walenwa wutsrukatni pejnurunekwu wixa.
45004017	Wane chinyongatyawaka, Gita gitakyi gixo payinerumnunanuka gitsrukatni pixinripa. Wane rixa Gawra Goyakalu getanu. Walenwa Gawra galixanru. Walenwa gipnachine genekgiwekletachri. Walenwa wane gwachri pixka chinru wa mwakatuwa.
45004018	Mumkata kagwaakotupmaka, kagwaka Gawra. Ralixlu wa gixo payinerumnunanuka gitsrukatni rixinripa, chinyawakpotuko: Wane pixka rixanna puklopishane.
45004019	Gi wa rugroka galixluya. Gi rutakyagoknawa gimaneya gipnachritka. (Satu pacha walapustsitkani.) Gi koxa rutakyagoklu gipnachri twugenewlemapa Sara.
45004020	Gi koxa nutatlu Goyakalu gipiratanru ma malixlenuya. Seyni muchkotnawa ralixleya. Rumalwutlu Goyakalu.
45004021	Psolpotuyako rushinikanuwatya wa ptowruko rupiratanru Goyakalu, kgiyaklerni kamrutyaplu.
45004022	Giyagkoxni wa Gawra galixle rutakyegitlu poyagkaklewle rixinri.
45004023	Gi wa walepje chinanni yonatka wa rutakyegitikolu.
45004024	Seyni wixa koxa chinanu, wa wixa galixachinwu gitakyegitikolupa, gi rixanu walixlu wa Geso yotunkakachri Wutsrukate wixanu gipnachinetskalaya.
45004025	Walenwa samyookaluru wixa mukochire chinanu, ga wa yotunkaakaluru muklukanuwnakaakone wixinripa.
45005001	Giyagni muklukanuwnakaakonwu galixluya, kigle gwashletkawu Goyakaluyma Wutsrukate Geso Kristo chinanu.
45005002	Wale chinanu koxa wapkaplu tye gimutlewlu gawyegitanru galixluya. Wumuwata wkagwakinri Goyakalu goyaknu.
45005003	Gi wa walepjeni, seyni wumuwatanu koxa salewakchiya. Wumatlu wa salewakchi kamrutlu kashnantakgogneru.
45005004	Ga wa kashnantakgogneru kamrutlu gasruglewlu. Ga wa gasruglewlu kamrutlu kagwakikolu.
45005005	Ga wa kagwakikolu gi wa kapatmenurni. Gi rixanu Goyakalu gishiniklewle gipkaakalurni wajiya Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya, wenekikolu.
45005006	Gi rixanu wa Kristo muchkonwu wixanatini, gipapko rupnana mkagwakpiraklene chinanu.
45005007	Kyapreru satu gipnanmaka poyagkakachri chinanu, seyni patako satu mpiikatu rixnawa rupninripa kigleru chinanu.
45005008	Seyni Goyakalu gekakgi galuklewleta wixaya, gi rixanu, kmukochirerunwu wixanatini, Kristo gipna wixa chinanu.
45005009	Giyagni wanepnuteyaka muklukanuwnakaakonwu gigragaya; Waleya wognetkaako wa jgekanchiyegiya.
45005010	Giyagni wkamnixanatinrikopshini rupoyikgayegitinwu Goyakalu Gituru gipuka chinanu, wanepnuteyaka wupoyikgayegitikolutka, wognetkaako Wale giwekle chinanu.
45005011	Gi wa walepjeni, seyni wumuwata Goyakaluya, Wutsrukate wixanu Geso Kristo chinanu. Wale chinanu wupoyikgayegitikolutka.
45005012	Giyagni, wane rixa jiglokleta mukochri tye psolchijiko satupje yineru chinanu. Mukochri chinanni wa gipukchi. Giyagni wane rixa giknogletna gipukchi pejnuruneko yine. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko mukochirewata.
45005013	Wa ma mwanatkanuwa Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi, tye psolchijneko rawanatatka mukochri. Seyni Yokanataluru Tokanchi mwakanuwa gi wa ruklukanuwnakaaka yineru.
45005014	Seyni pogirewatatka gipukchi Gatakluyakawa wa Moysisiklupotunanuko, wanna koxa chinanu gi wa Gata ma mumretkale pixka rixa mukochirewletna. Gatanwa ginachripatka yaglu.
45005015	Seyni gi wa mukochri pixka rixa genekashlu. Gi rixanu satupje yineru mukochire chinanu rupninna gixni, pnuteyaklu wa Goyakalu gimutlewle gixo chinanu, ga wa genekashlu satupje yineru gimutlewle chinanu. Walenwa Geso Kristo.
45005016	Gi koxa wane pixka rixa wa genekashlu, wa satupje yineru mukochire pixka. Gi rixanu satupje mukochri runya giklukanuwnayegjixlu ruklukanuwnayegjixkolupna, seyni gixo mukochri runya gimutlewlu muklukanuwnakaakone rutakikolupna.
45005017	Gi rixanu satupje yineru mukochireya pogirewatinri gipukchi ga wa satupje yineru chinanu koxa, wanepnuteyaka pogirewatanna giwekachinepa satupje wa Geso Kristo chinanu, gixo gimutlewlu yoptotachinepa, wa poyagkaklewlu genekashatkaluru yoptotachinepa.
45005018	Giyagni waneko pixka rixanu satupje yineru mukochireya ruklukanuwnayegjixikolna pejnuruneko yine. Waneko pixka rixa: satupje yineru poyagkaklewleya, pejnuruneko yine muklukanuwnakaakone gitakikolu ruwekinripna.
45005019	Gi rixanu satupje yineru majnaknu chinanu rutaakana kmukochirerune gixolune. Waneko pixka satupje yineru yijnakle chinanu gixo gitaako poyagkakachinepa.
45005020	Wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru jigloka wa mukochri tseruwninripatka. Wa mukochri tseruwninitka tseruwnapotuta wa gimutlewlu koxa.
45005021	Wane rixa pogirewata mukochri rupninriyna yine, waneko pixka rixa poyagkaklewlu chinanu; pogirewata gimutlewlu ruwekinripna gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu Geso Kristo chinanu Wutsrukate wixanu.
45006001	¿Gi wchinanu koxa? ¿Womkagitanru wmukochirewatinri tseruwninripa gimutlewlu?
45006002	Gike wixiniko. Gi rixanu wixa gipniyanatkalu mukochrini. ¿Gi wixpoko satokleyegitanutnaklu wale?
45006003	¿Gi ge gimatlu gixa wa wixa girukokta katkaluru Geso Kristoya, katkaluru rupnaleya?
45006004	Gi rixanu katluya kapnatkalunwu. Waleyma gipnachinetkawu. Wa Kristo wane rixa yotunretinri gipnachinetskalaya Girchi goyaknuya, waneko pixka wixanu wixa: gawinripa gerotu giweklupa.
45006005	Waleyma pagipnakalunetkawu wixini Wale gipnale yagluya, waneko pixka rixa yotunotinri yaglu wixanu.
45006006	Wumatlu wa tye: wa kapokotmane wixinri Waleymananuko koroshishkita rutaaka, gike mumkatkatu rixikolupa wa mukochrimane, ma wayegretyanpatkawu mukochri.
45006007	Gi rixanu wa gipnachrinatka, gi wa mukochri giklukatkalu.
45006008	Kristoyma wupnini, walixlu wa wuwekinrikoxapa Waleyma.
45006009	Wumatlu wa Kristo yotunotinritka wa gipnachinetskalaya, gi rupnanutka. Waleya gi pogirewatanatka gipukchini.
45006010	Gi rixanu rupninri, pakatapje rupniyanatkalu mukochrini, seyni ruwekinri Goyakaluya ruwekatka.
45006011	Waneko pixkapotuko gixanu gixa. Gkagwakinwa galikakni gipniyanatkalu mukochrini, seyni Goyakaluya giweka wa Kristo Gesoya Wutsrukate wixanu.
45006012	Giyagni gi pogirewatanu mukochri gimaneya wa gimane gipnachripa, gma yijnakotyaplu gimane retsotanrewleya.
45006013	Gi koxa genekanru gimane psojite mukochri, mpoyagkaknuchi gapi rixinripa, seyni giwekachingi wa gipnapachine pixkalungi genekinwa Goyakalu. Goyakalu galikaka genekanru gimane psojite poyagkaklewlu gapi rixinripa.
45006014	Gi rixanu gi wa gitsrukatetanutkalu mukochri. Gi rixanu gi wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruyegitkagi, seyni gimutlewluyegitkagi.
45006015	Giyagni ¿klunerni? ¿Wmukochirewatewge gi rixanu gi wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluryegwu, seyni gimutlewluyegwu? Gike wixiniko.
45006016	¿Gi ge gimata gixa wa girukokta wayegrene gitakinwa gyijnakotyaplu, wale wayegrene gixinitka wa gyijnakotanru? Waka mukochri wayegrengi gixinripa, waka yijnaklewlu wayegrengi poyagkakachine gixinripa.
45006017	Poyagnutkalurni Goyakalu, wa mukochrimka wayegretanatanungi, gyijnakotatkalu gajiya tye pixkalutu ginkaklewlu wa wale chinanu gitaaka gixa.
45006018	Mukochri yegi gishpakyatka. Poyagkaklewlu wayegretatkagi.
45006019	Gi rixanu yineru muchkotu gixyawakpotuko pixka nchingi. Wane gixa genekletlu gimane psojite gimuteru wayegreru rixinripa, mpoyagkaknuchi wayegreru rixinripa, waneko pixka gixanu xani. Genekanru gimane psojite poyagkaklewlu wayegretyaplu gipashiregnuyapa.
45006020	Gi rixanu mukochri wayegretanatingi, gi wa poyagkaklewlu wayegrenenangi.
45006021	¿Klu koxa waneyatkagi waleya, wa xawakni gipatewatanrutka? Gi rixanu gipnalni wale yoptukyawaka.
45006022	Ga wa xani mukochri gishpakyatka. Goyakalu wayegrenetkagi. Ga wa gkamrure koxa kpashiritka. Ga wa yoptukyawakapni giwekinri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa.
45006023	Ga wa mukochri wenutikolni wa gipnalpotu, seyni Goyakalu genekashle yoptotachri walenwa giweklu gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa Kristoya Geso Wutsrukate wixanu.
45007001	Nomolene, gi wa mumatkangi, gi rixanu nuynumsatna Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru gimatachine. ¿Gi ge gimatlu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru rutsrukateta yineru ruwekakopshini?
45007002	Gi rixanu kganururo, ruwekakopshini tganuru, Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru ginanshichawalo. Seyni rupnini tganuru, Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru gnurchipirana tushpakyatka.
45007003	Giyagni wa ruwekiniwa tganuru, gimopatlewatachro chinkaluropni wa satu jeji tganurutinipa. Seyni tupnagnurutinitka tushpakatka Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya. Giyagni gi wa gimopatlewatachrotkani wa satu tganurutinitka.
45007004	Waneko pixka gixa, nomolene gitanune, gipniyanatkalu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru Kristomaneya, satunuko gixinripatka, walenwa yotunotachritka gipnachinetskalaya, kigle kamrurewlepwu Goyakalu chinanu.
45007005	Gi rixanu manchi wixanatiniwa, mukochri getsotanrewle, Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya, wumane psojitkaka kamrurewatya. Wale gwakakyaplu gipukchi.
45007006	Ga wa xani Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru wushpakyatka. Wupniyanatkalu wkashinatjerni, ga wa Giwekikaluruya wkamrurewatinripatka. Werotewatinritka. Gi wa yonchi kapokotewatinriya wkamrutanutka.
45007007	¿Gi wchinanu? ¿Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru mukochrirge? Gike rixiniko. Gi numatanatlu mukochri, seyni wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinanu numatlu mukochri. Gi rixanu gikoxmaka numatanru getsotanrewlu, wane ma chinkanumka Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru: Gi petsotanrewatanu.
45007008	Mukochri gikshiklu ruglepoktapinri yokanruya. Wane rixkakyano ptowruko getsotanugnuchi. Gi rixanu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru migje mukochri gipnachrini.
45007009	Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru migje nuwekanata. Seyni wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru gininitka, mukochri giwekatnaka, ga wa gita gipnana.
45007010	Netatkalu yokanru giweklu chinanmaka, walenwa nupnale chinanu.
45007011	Gi rixanu mukochri gikshiklu ruglepoktapinri yokanruya. Yokwitanno. Waleya ruylatanno.
45007012	Giyagni galikakni Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru kpashirni, ga wa yokanru kpashirni, poyagkakachrini, kiglerni.
45007013	Giyagni ¿kiglerunanu gita chinanu gipnalu rixa? Gike rixiniko. Seyni mukochri mukochri gipgujewninripa wa kigleruya ruylatno, mukochripotunanu rixinripa mukochri Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinanu.
45007014	Gi rixanu wumatlu Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru Giwekikaluruyni. Ga wa gitni manchino, gishankakalurno mukochrinupno.
45007015	Gi rixanu wa nkamrutanru gi numata jemlu. Gi koxa wa nalukanru nkamruta. Seyni nayegixanru wale nkamruta.
45007016	Wa nma malukanutu wale nkamrutini, nupgujtatlu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru kiglerni.
45007017	Giyagni xani gi wa gita kamrutlu, seyni mukochri gita gitokote gwachri kamrutlu.
45007018	Gi rixanu numatlu gitnanuko, walenwa nomaneya, gi rawa kigleru. Gi rixanu waneyno naluklewle, seyni gi nukshiklu kigleru nkamrutinri.
45007019	Gi rixanu gi nkamrutlu naluka kamruretanru kigleru. Seyni wa gektutu nma malukanutu wale nkamruta.
45007020	Ga wa nma malukanutu nkamrutini, gi wa nkamrutanutkalu gita, seyni mukochri kamrutanru gita gitokote gwachri.
45007021	Nukshiklu pnuko gixjetikowaka: wa naluka kigleru kamruretini, gektutu gwakoxno.
45007022	Gi rixanu wa gitoko gajeruya numjika Tokanchi Yokanatkaluruya Goyakalunu.
45007023	Seyni netlu nomane psojite pnuko gixpokotikowaka. Wale satkakmaklu nonshinikanu gixpokotyawaka. Raniikoxno gostutkalurno nkamrutyapmaklu mukochri gixpokotyawaka nomane psojiteya galukyawaka.
45007024	¡Kapsakletkalurno! ¿Katu koshpakanunno tye gipukchimaneya?
45007025	Npoyagnutlu Goyakalu, Geso Kristoya Wutsrukate wixanu. Giyagni nonshinikanu galukyawaka nkamrutini, Goyakalu yokanrekaka wayegrerno. Ga wa nomaneya galukyawaka nkamrutini, mukochri gixpokotyawaka wayegrerno.
45008001	Giyagni maleshpotutkalu ruklukanuwninritkana wa Kristo Geso gwachinetka, wa galixachinetka.
45008002	Gi rixanu Giwekikaluru yokanre giweklupirana Geso Kristoya wale koshpakno mukochri yokanreya, ga wa gipukchi yokanreya.
45008003	Gi rixanu wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru mumkatanatanutu, wumane gigroklewle chinanu, Goyakalu kamruta. Wane rixa yokanretlu Waleko Gituru kmukochirerunmane pixkalutu ga wa mukochri chinanu. Wane rixa nikatlepotutyaplu mukochri wumane gwachrini,
45008004	poyagkakikolupa wa kigleru yokanruya wixaya, wa manchi gixjetyawaka mixkanwu, ga wa Giwekikaluru gixyawaka.
45008005	Gi rixanu manchi pixka gixachine, manchipiranaya nshinikanutachinni; ga wa Giwekikaluru pixka gixachine, Giwekikalurupiranapje yanshinikanutachinni.
45008006	Gi rixanu manchinshinikanu gipnalni, ga wa Giwekikalurunshinikanu giwekluni, ga wa kiglenshinikangajirni.
45008007	Giyagni manchi gishinikyawaka walenwa kamnixikolu Goyakalu. Gi rixanu wane gixachri gi yijnakotlu Goyakalu yokanre. Gi koxa rumkatlu.
45008008	Giyagni manchi giyakatyachine gi rumkata giglenshinikanretluna Goyakalu.
45008009	Ga wa gi manchi giyakatyachingi, seyni Giwekikaluru giyakatyachingi, wa gixa gwinri Giwekikaluru Goyakalunu. Katukta Giwekikaluru Kristonumigjetu, gi Kristonni wale.
45008010	Seyni gixa gitokote rawini Kristo, gimane galikakni gipnachrini mukochri chinanu. Ga wa giwekikaluru giweka wa poyagkakikolu chinanu.
45008011	Wa gixa gitokote rawini Giwekikaluru, Geso yotunkakjerunu wa gipnachinetskalaya, wa yotunkakjeru Kristo Geso gipnachinetskalaya ruweekakankoxlu gixamane popukalu Giwekikaluruya Walenu, gixa gitokote gwachri.
45008012	Giyagni nomolene, riwishkatachinwu, gi wa manchiyni, giyagni gi wa manchi gixjetyawakako wixinripni.
45008013	Gi rixanu manchi gixyawakako gixininapa, gipnanuna. Seyni wa Giwekikaluruya gixa gipnakakanru wa manchi kamrure waneklu giwekanu.
45008014	Gi rixanu pejnuruneko Giwekikaluru Goyakalunu kosekanune, wannanwa Goyakalu wgenene.
45008015	Gi rixanu gi gyoptotlu wayegrechinshinikanu wa mpikyapatnaka. Seyni gyoptotlu wgenchi gitaakalurunshinikanu. Wale chinanu wsaplewata, “Gawwa, Nuru.”
45008016	Gi rixanu Giwekikaluruko wixanshinikanu gipgujtatlu Goyakalu wgenene wixinri.
45008017	Wale wgenene wixini, yoptotachinkoxapwu; yoptotachinepwu Goyakalunu; Kristoyma yoptotachinepwu. Waleyma salewnachinkoxapwu wixini, Waleymapotuko pogirewlu wenekikolupa.
45008018	Gi rixanu numatpotutlu wa tyegognekaka wsalewninri gi rumuknini pogirewlu ginachripa gipgujewnachripa wixaya.
45008019	Gi rixanu wa giyakotkaluru psolu galukleyako kagwakpotuta wa rupgujewninripna Goyakalu wgenene.
45008020	Gi rixanu moyakatu rixkaklu ruyakotanru Goyakalu, gi wa giyakotkaluru gishinikanru chinanu, seyni wane rixkakjeru wa Goyakalu chinanu. Wane rixlu wa Goyakalu wa kigleru kagwakyapna wa ruyakotanrutka.
45008021	Wa waleko giyakotkaluru koshpaakalurupni moyaknuchi wayegretlewatyawakaya. Rapkaplu gishpakikowaka katajiwaka Goyakalu wgenennu.
45008022	Gi rixanu wumatlu pejnuruko giyakotkaluru pagochgitkalune rixna, pakachinolu getkalunni xanigognenanu.
45008023	Gi walepjeni, seyni wannanuko, wa Giwekikaluru gekamrure waneyalune, wixa koxa ga wa wanna gitokoyako wochgita, wkagwakanatinri wa Wale wugenene gitakpotutikolupa, walenwa wumane gishpakleyapa, wenutikolutka chinanu.
45008024	Gi rixanu kagwakachinwu wognewatinri. Seyni wa kagwaakaluru getika, gi wa kagwaakalurni. Gi rixanu wa satu getkoklunu, ¿gi rixpoko kagwakletanru?
45008025	Seyni wma metanutu wkagwakini, wakotanshinikanreya wkagwakanru.
45008026	Waneko pixka rixa gipxakletwu Giwekikaluru wumenoklunshinikanruya. Gi rixanu gi wumata kluneru kigleru wagjitinripa. Seyni wa Giwekikaluruko gagjita wixa chinanu rochgiyle mumkata chinkotu.
45008027	Getjegajrewatachri gimatlu Giwekikaluru gishinikanru. Gi rixanu wanepotuko Goyakalu gishinikyawaka, ragjita kpashirine chinanu.
45008028	Wumatlu ptowrunanuka pakamrutkolutni kigleyapna Goyakalu galukachine, wannanwa tomgakalune Wale galukyawaka.
45008029	Gi rixanu muchikawako rumatanune rutakagnaputa, Gituru yaglu pixka rixkakikolupna, Wale muchinanu gishpakachri rixinripa gixo gimolenetskalaya.
45008030	Wa rutakagnaputanune wanna koxa tomga. Wa tomganune wanna koxa muklukanuwnakaakone rixna. Wa muklukanuwnakaakone rixanune wanna koxa royaknu reneka.
45008031	Giyagni ¿gi wchinanu wa tyeya? Wixa yegi rixini Goyakalu, ¿katu kamnixwu wixa?
45008032	Ga wa Wale gi chipetlu Giturpotuko, seyni samyoklu ptowruneko wixa chinanupa ¿gi rixpokotyawaka Gituruymananuko ma meneekanupwu ptowrunanuka?
45008033	¿Katu jigyegitna Goyakalu tsomitanune? Goyakalni muklukanuwnakaakone gixkaklewatachri ¿Katni wa giklukanuwnayegjixlewatachri?
45008034	Kristonwa gipnachri. Wanepnute Walenwa yotunkaakaluru. Walenwa Goyakalustsi potuklesreta gwachri. Wale koxa giykoyegitwu wixa.
45008035	¿Giru kotspalatinwu Kristo galuklewleya? ¿salewakchirge? ¿ga wa kachinolege? ¿ga wa kojwawakchirge? ¿ga wa nachlege? ¿ga wa mamkatutnuchlege? ¿ga wa kyowikolege? ¿ga wa yoglolewaprege?
